tika-vin06t:462_1: Sayameva patitamorasseva ito cito ca karoto thullaccayaṃ.
tika-vin06t:462_2: Ākāsaṭṭhavinicchaye tappasaṅgena tasmiṃ vehāsādigatepi asammohatthaṃ evaṃ gahetabbanti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:462_4: “Ṭhānācāvanaṃ akaronto cāletī”ti vacanato ṭhānācāvane thullaccayaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:462_6: “Te ṭhānācāvanaṃ akarontoti imaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ dassetvā paṭisedhetabbā”ti keci vadanti,
tika-vin06t:463_3: Ettha “ekakoṭiṃ nīharitvā ṭhapite vaṃse ṭhitassa ākāsakaraṇaṃ sandhāyā”ti keci vadanti.
tika-vin06t:463_4: Te pana atha “mūlaṃ acchetvā valayaṃ ito cito ca sāreti, rakkhati.
tika-vin06t:463_5: Sace pana mūlato anīharitvāpi hatthena gahetvā ākāsagataṃ karoti,
tika-vin06t:463_7: Bhittinissitanti bhittiyā upatthambhitaṃ sandhāya vuttanti eke.
tika-vin06t:463_8: Bhittiṃ nissāya ṭhapitanti nāgadantādīsu ṭhitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:463_9: Chinnamatteti upari uggantvā ṭhitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:464_1: Upari ṭhitassa piṭṭhiyāti ettha adho osāraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:464_2: Heṭṭhā osārentassa uparimassa piṭṭhiyā heṭṭhimena ṭhitokāsaṃ atikkantamatte pārājikaṃ,
tika-vin06t:464_8: Madanaphalavasādīnīti ettha sīhaḷabhāsā kira vasa iti visanti attho,
tika-vin06t:465_3: “Vāto āgammāti vacanato vātassa natthikāle payogassa katattā avahāro natthi,
tika-vin06t:465_7: Yesaṃ hatthe kahāpaṇāni gahitāni, tesaṃ vā,
tika-vin06t:465_8: nāvāsāminā nāvāya aggahitāya nāvāsāmikassa vā”ti anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:466_0: 104. Nirambitvā upari. Akataṃ vā pana patiṭṭhapetīti apubbaṃ vā paṭṭhapetīti attho.
tika-vin06t:467_0: 106. Gāmaṭṭhe vā “gāmo nāmā”ti na vuttaṃ paṭhamaṃ gāmalakkhaṇassa sabbaso vuttattā.
tika-vin06t:468_1: Araññaṭṭhe araññaṃ nāmāti puna na kevalaṃ pubbe vuttalakkhaṇaññeva araññanti idhādhippetaṃ,
tika-vin06t:468_5: Aggepi mūlepi chinnāti ettha “na veṭhetvā ṭhitā,
tika-vin06t:468_7: Tacchetvā ṭhapitoti araññasāmikehi parehi laddhehi tacchetvā ṭhapito.
tika-vin06t:468_10: Challiyā pariyonaddhaṃ hotīti iminā sāmikānaṃ nirapekkhataṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:469_1: Tattha “bhājanesu pokkharaṇītaḷākesu ca gāvo pakkosatīti ito paṭṭhāya tayo dasa vārā ādimeva dassetvā saṃkhittā”ti anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:469_3: “Gahetuṃ na labhatīti sāmīcikammaṃ na hotī”ti anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:469_7: Taḷākaṃ nissāya khettassa katattāti “sabbasādhāraṇaṃ taḷākaṃ hotī”ti paṭhamaṃ vuttattā taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:469_8: “Yasmā taḷākagataṃ udakaṃ sabbasādhāraṇampi mātikāya sati taṃ atikkamitvā gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:469_9: tasmā taṃ sandhāya kurundiyādīsu avahāroti vutta”nti apare āhūti.
tika-vin06t:469_10: Iminā lakkhaṇena na sametīti yasmā sabbasādhāraṇadeso nāma tañca taḷākaṃ sabbasādhāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin06t:469_11: katikābhāvā ca mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttameva yuttanti āhācariyo.
tika-vin06t:470_4: sabbasādhāraṇattā ca aññampi saṅghasantakaṃ idaṃ na hotī”ti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:471_1: Ujukameva tiṭṭhatīti ettha “samīpe rukkhasākhādīhi sandhāritattā īsakaṃ khalitvā ujukameva tiṭṭhati ce, avahāro.
tika-vin06t:471_6: No aññathāti sampatte ce vāte vātamukhasodhanaṃ karoti,
tika-vin06t:472_1: Aññesu pana vicāraṇā eva natthīti tesu appaṭikkhipitattā ayameva vinicchayoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:472_2: “Etena dhuranikkhepaṃ katvāpi corehi āhaṭaṃ codetvā gaṇhato anāpattīti dīpitaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:473_3: Padavārenāti corena nīharitvā dinnaṃ gahetvā gacchato.
tika-vin06t:473_7: Asukaṃ nāma gāmaṃ gantvāti vacanena yāva tassa gāmassa parato upacāro,
tika-vin06t:473_9: “Ṭhatvā vā nisīditvā vā vissamitvā purimatheyyacittaṃ vūpasamitvā gamanatthañce bhaṇḍaṃ na nikkhittaṃ,
tika-vin06t:473_15: Theyyacittena paribhuñjantoti ṭhānācāvanaṃ akatvā nivatthapārutanīhārena “pubbevedaṃ mayā gahita”nti theyyacittena paribhuñjanto.
tika-vin06t:473_18: tena dinne anāpattīti dīpitaṃ hoti gopakassa dāne viya,
tika-vin06t:473_21: So vātipi labbhatīti vicāretvā gahetabbo. Vā-
tika-vin06t:473_23: so vā deti rājagahe gaṇako viya dhaniyassa,
tika-vin06t:474_0: Tava thūlasāṭako laddhoti vuttakkhaṇe musāvāde dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin06t:474_1: Tassa nāmaṃ likhitvāti ettha “tena ‘gahetvā ṭhapeyyāsī’ti āṇattattā nāmalekhanakāle anāpatti kusasaṅkamanasadisaṃ na hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:474_3: Sace jānitvāpi cittena na sampaṭicchanti eseva nayo.
tika-vin06t:474_4: Jānantena pana rakkhituṃ anicchante paṭikkhipitabbameva etanti vattaṃ jānitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:475_2: tatheva kātabbanti sampattavāraṃ aggahetuṃ na labhanti,
tika-vin06t:475_3: “tassa vā sabhāgā adātuṃ na labhantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:475_4: Attadutiyassāti na hi ekenānītaṃ dvinnaṃ pahoti,
tika-vin06t:475_5: sace pahoti pāpetabboti dassetuṃ “yassa vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:475_9: “ito bhaṇḍato vaṭṭantaṃ puna anto pavisatīti mahāaṭṭhakathāpadassa kurundīsaṅkhepaṭṭhakathāhi adhippāyo vivarito”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:476_1: Gacchante yāne vāti ettha “suṅkaṭṭhānassa bahi ṭhitaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti upatissatthero vadati kira.
tika-vin06t:476_5: yānādīsu ṭhapite tassa payogaṃ vināyeva gatesu pārājiko na hoti.
tika-vin06t:476_8: Araññaṭṭhe “assatiyā atikkamantassapi bhaṇḍadeyyamevā”ti vuttaṃ tesaṃ sapariggahitattā.
tika-vin06t:476_9: Idha pana “atra paviṭṭhassā”ti vacanato na bahi ṭhitassa,
tika-vin06t:477_0: Suṅkaṭṭhāne suṅkaṃ datvāva gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti idaṃ dāni vattabbānaṃ mātikāti dhammasiritthero.
tika-vin06t:477_2: tesu dakkhiṇadvārassa purato maggo thūpārāmato ānandacetiyaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā jetavanavihārassantarapākārassāsanne niviṭṭho,
tika-vin06t:477_3: yo na gāmaṃ pavisanto upacāraṃ okkanto hoti.
tika-vin06t:477_4: Thūpārāmato ca mahācetiyaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā rājavihāraṃ gacchanto na okkamatī”ti kira mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgataṃ.
tika-vin06t:477_5: Ettha cāti suṅkaghāte “dvīhi leḍḍupātehīti ācariyaparamparābhatā”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:477_6: Dvīhi leḍḍupātehīti suṅkaghātassa paricchede aṭṭhapite yujjati,
tika-vin06t:477_7: ṭhapite pana atirekayojanampi suṅkaghātaṃ hotīti tato paraṃ dve leḍḍupātā upacāroti gahetabbo.
tika-vin06t:477_12: “Atra paviṭṭhassa suṅkaṃ gaṇhantūti hi niyamitaṭṭhānaṃ ekantato pārājikakhettaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:477_16: dutiyo leḍḍupātoti no adhippāyo”ti ācariyo vadati.
tika-vin06t:478_1: Dhanaṃ pana gataṭṭhāne vaḍḍhatīti ettha “vaḍḍhiyā saha avahārakassa bhaṇḍadeyya”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:478_3: tattha kammaṃ akarontassa vaḍḍhatīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:478_6: taṃ dentassa avahārakassa vaḍḍhiyā adāne pārājikaṃ hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:479_0: Nāmenāti sappanāmena vā sāmikena katena vā.
tika-vin06t:480_4: Goṇassa “aparikkhitte ṭhitassa akkantaṭṭhānameva ṭhāna”nti vuttattā khaṇḍadvāranti attanā khaṇḍitacchiddaṃ.
tika-vin06t:480_5: Tattheva ghātetīti “jīvitindriyārammaṇattā vadhakacittassa pācittiyaṃ hotīti? Na hoti. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:480_8: Idha tadubhayaṃ labhati saddhiṃ pubbabhāgāparabhāgehī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:481_1: Tassuddhāre sabbesaṃ pārājikanti yadi yo āṇatto avassaṃ taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ harati,
tika-vin06t:481_6: itaresañca paṭipāṭiyā ekekassāṇattattā ekekena ca dukkaṭena bhavitabbaṃ. Kathaṃ,
tika-vin06t:481_7: eko kira māsagghanakaṃ parissāvanaṃ thenetvā desetvā nirussāho eva vā hutvā puna māsagghanakaṃ sūciṃ tatheva katvā puna māsagghanakanti evaṃ siyāti? Na evaṃ,
tika-vin06t:481_8: taṃ yathā uppalathenako yena vatthu pūrati tāva saussāhattā pārājiko āsi,
tika-vin06t:481_9: evamime saussāhāva na desayiṃsu vā”ti likhitaṃ, pāḷiyaṃ,
tika-vin06t:481_10: aṭṭhakathāyañca saṃvidahitvā gatesu ekassuddhāre sabbesaṃ pārājikaṃ vinā viya āṇattiyā kiñcāpi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:481_11: atha kho “tassāyaṃ attho”ti vatvā pacchā vuttavinicchayesu ca ekabhaṇḍaekaṭṭhānādīsu ca sambahulā ekaṃ āṇāpentīti āṇattimeva niyametvā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:481_14: “‘Ekabhaṇḍaṃ ekaṭṭhāna’nti ca pāṭho ‘ekakulassa bhaṇḍa’nti vacanato”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:482_3: Atha vā taṃ saṅketaṃ atikkamitvā pacchā vā.
tika-vin06t:482_7: taṅkhaṇe eva bhaṇḍaṃ avaharituṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin06t:482_10: taṃ gahetuṃ yāva gacchati yāva ukkhipati,
tika-vin06t:482_12: Sace taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ adhigataṃ viya āsannaṃ,
tika-vin06t:482_16: pubbe vuttampi “tato paṭṭhāya teneva nimittena avaharatī”ti vuccati āraddhattā.
tika-vin06t:482_17: Yadi evaṃ “purebhattapayogo eso”ti vāro pamāṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:482_18: na ca taṃ pamāṇaṃ mahāpadumattheravādassa pacchā vuttattā,
tika-vin06t:483_3: eko gahetabbaṃ bhaṇḍanissitaṃ katvā “purebhattaṃ evaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhā”ti vadati,
tika-vin06t:483_4: evaṃvidhesu asammohatthaṃ evaṃvidhaṃ saṅketaṃ nimittañca dassetunti ca,
tika-vin06t:483_5: yathādhippāyanti dutiyo tatiyassa tatiyo catutthassāti evaṃ paṭipāṭiyā ce vadantīti attho.
tika-vin06t:483_14: kataraṃ phalaṭṭhāniyanti “atthasādhakacetanā nāma maggānantaraphalasadisā”ti vuttattā phalaṭṭhāniyā cetanāti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:483_17: tathā bhaṇḍassa avassaṃhāritā ca na sambhavati.
tika-vin06t:483_18: Āṇattikkhaṇe eva hi taṃ avassaṃhāritaṃ jātanti avahārakassa paṭiggaṇhañce,
tika-vin06t:483_22: bhaṇḍassa avassaṃhāritā eva vā phalaṭṭhāniyā ce,
tika-vin06t:483_25: na aññanti evaṃ tāva idha opammasaṃsandanaṃ sambhavati cetanā maggaṭṭhāniyā,
tika-vin06t:483_29: Saddhāya saddatthe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā”ti ettha añño saddho,
tika-vin06t:483_31: yathā ca “eko amohasaṅkhāto dhammo sampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo adhipatisahajātaaññamaññanissayaindriyamaggasampayuttaatthiavigatapaccayena
tika-vin06t:483_34: Yathā ca vinayapiṭake yāni cha āpattisamuṭṭhānāni,
tika-vin06t:483_44: Tathā hi tassā evaṃ maggaṭṭhāniyāya atthasādhikāya cetanāya yasmā aññā pārājikāpattitā anatthantarabhūtā ākāravisesasaṅkhātā phalaṭṭhāniyā atthi,
tika-vin06t:483_46: Atha vā kevalaṃ dhammaniyāmattaṃyeva upamattena ācariyena evaṃ vuttantipi sambhavatīti na tattha opammasaṃsandanaṃ pariyesitabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:483_47: “idaṃ sabbaṃ kevalaṃ takkavasena vuttattā vicāretvā gahetabba”nti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:486_1: “Vibhaṅganayadassanato”ti vuttattā taṃ sampādetuṃ “idāni tattha tatthā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:486_2: Tattha aṅgavatthubhedena cāti avahāraṅgajānanabhedena vatthussa haritabbabhaṇḍassa garukalahukabhāvabhedenāti attho.
tika-vin06t:486_3: Atha vā aṅgañca vatthubhedena āpattibhedañca dassentoti attho.
tika-vin06t:486_7: Anajjhāvuṭṭhakaṃ nāma araññapālakādinā na kenaci mamāyitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:486_8: Chaḍḍitaṃ nāma anatthikabhāvena atirekamattādinā sāmikena chaḍḍitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:486_10: Assāmikavatthūti acchinnamūlakampi yassa sāmiko koci no hoti,
tika-vin06t:486_14: Devatādīnaṃ vā buddhadhammānaṃ vā pariccattaṃ parehi ce ārakkhakehi pariggahitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:486_16: Tathārūpe hi adinnādāne rājāno coraṃ gahetvā hananādikaṃ kareyyuṃ,
tika-vin06t:486_18: abhikkhuke anārāmikādike ca yaṃ buddhadhammassa santakaṃ,
tika-vin06t:486_19: taṃ “āgatāgatehi bhikkhūhi rakkhitabbaṃ gopetabbaṃ mamāyitabba”nti vacanato abhikkhukāvāsasaṅghasantakaṃ
tika-vin06t:486_21: Issaro hi yo koci bhikkhu tādise parikkhāre corehipi gayhamāne vāretuṃ paṭibalo ce,
tika-vin06t:486_23: Apariggahite parasantakasaññissa chasu ākāresu vijjamānesupi anāpatti viya dissati,
tika-vin06t:486_25: parasantake tathā paṭipannake sandhāya vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:486_33: acchinditvā ca so “mama santakaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti gahetuṃ labhati.
tika-vin06t:486_34: Paṭhamaṃ dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā ce pacchā theyyacitto gaṇhati, esa nayo.
tika-vin06t:486_35: Sāmikena dhuraṃ nikkhittakāle so ce coro kālaṃ karoti,
tika-vin06t:486_39: taṃ theyyacittena gaṇhantassa bhikkhuno pārājikaṃ mūlabhikkhussa santakabhāve ṭhitattā.
tika-vin06t:486_40: Corabhikkhumhi mate “matakaparikkhāra”nti saṅgho vibhajitvā ce taṃ gaṇhati,
tika-vin06t:487_5: Na hi bhagavā sāvasesaṃ pārājikaṃ paññapeti.
tika-vin06t:487_8: te idha āgatesu ettha samodhānaṃ gacchantīti ca lakkhaṇato vā tesaṃ samodhānagatabhāvo vattabboti? Vuccate –
tika-vin06t:487_13: tassevaṃ gaṇhato avahāro theyyāvahāro”ti āgatattā tulākūṭagahaṇādayo theyyāvahāre samodhānaṃ gatāti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:487_14: Viparāmosaālopasāhasākārā ca aṭṭhakathāyāgate pasayhāvahāre samodhānaṃ gacchanti.
tika-vin06t:487_15: Imaṃyeva vā pasayhāvahāraṃ dassetuṃ “gāmaṭṭhaṃ araññaṭṭha”nti mātikaṃ nikkhipitvā “gāmaṭṭhaṃ nāma bhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin06t:487_16: catūhi ṭhānehi nikkhittaṃ hotī”tiādinā nayena vibhāgo vutto.
tika-vin06t:487_19: Na hi bhūmitalādīhi gāmāraññaṭṭhaṃ yaṃ kiñcīti.
tika-vin06t:487_21: taṃ rūpakūṭaṅgagahaṇapaṭicchannakūṭavasena catubbidhampi vehāsaṭṭhe samodhānaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin06t:487_22: Hadayabhedasikhābhedarajjubhedavasena tividhe mānakūṭe “svāyaṃ hadayabhedo mariyādaṃ chindatī”ti ettha samodhānaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin06t:487_24: “Phandāpeti attano bhājanagataṃ karotī”ti ettha sikhābhedopi labbhati.
tika-vin06t:487_27: “Dhammaṃ caranto sāmikaṃ parājetī”ti ettha ukkoṭanaṃ samodhānaṃ gacchatīti te ca tathā vañcananikatiyopi.
tika-vin06t:490_2: tassa santakaṃ vissāsagāhena gahitampi puna dātabbanti idaṃ “tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhū sahāyakā honti.
tika-vin06t:490_3: Eko gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi…pe… anāpatti, bhikkhu,
tika-vin06t:490_5: Ettha hi “so jānitvā taṃ codesi assamaṇosi tva”nti vacanena anattamanatā dīpitā.
tika-vin06t:490_7: vissāsaggāhe”ti vacanena attamanatāyapi sati vissāsaggāho ruhatīti dīpitanti ce? Taṃ na,
tika-vin06t:490_11: sopi bhikkhu sahāyakattā na kuddho codesi,
tika-vin06t:490_12: piyo eva samāno “kacci assamaṇosi tvaṃ, gaccha,
tika-vin06t:490_21: idha me cīvarānī”ti vatvā cīvarāni therena dinnāni,
tika-vin06t:490_23: thero puna pakkhaṃ labhitvā codetuṃ labhati,
tika-vin06t:490_24: pubbe adhivāsanā adhivāsanasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati bhayena tuṇhībhūtattā,
tika-vin06t:490_25: “yaṃ cīvaraṃ idha sāmiko paccāharāpetuṃ labhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:490_28: Sace saṅghassa santakaṃ kenaci bhikkhunā gahitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:490_29: tassa tena saṅghassa vā dhammassa vā upakāritā atthi,
tika-vin06t:490_31: “So tena yathāgahitaṃ pākatikaṃ katvā anaṇo hoti,
tika-vin06t:493_2: ahampi ekapassaṃ gaṇhāmīti saṃvidahitvā ubhayesaṃ payogena ṭhānācāvane kate kāyavācācittehi hoti.
tika-vin06t:493_3: Aññathā ‘sāhatthikaṃ vā āṇattikassa aṅgaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin06t:493_4: āṇattikaṃ vā sāhatthikassā’ti iminā virujjhatī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:493_5: Dhammasiritthero pana “na kevalaṃ bhāriye eva vatthumhi ayaṃ nayo labbhati,
tika-vin06t:493_6: pañcamāsakamattampi dve ce janā saṃvidahitvā gaṇhanti,
tika-vin06t:493_10: tasmā ‘sāhatthikaṃ āṇattikassa aṅgaṃ na hotī’ti vacanamimaṃ nayaṃ na paṭibāhati.
tika-vin06t:493_11: ‘Sāhatthikavatthuaṅganti sāhatthikassa vatthussa aṅgaṃ na hotī’ti tattha vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:493_12: Idha pana payogaṃ sandhāya vuttattā yujjatī”ti āha kira,
tika-vin06t:493_14: tasmā sāhatthikāṇattikesu payogesu aññatarena vāyamāpatti samuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin06t:493_15: tathāpi turitaturitā hutvā vilopanādīsu gahaṇagāhāpanavasenetaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:493_16: Yathā kālena attano kālena parassa dhammaṃ ārabbha sīghaṃ sīghaṃ uppattiṃ sandhāya “ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇā dhammā”ti vuttā,
tika-vin06t:494_0: Tatthapi ye anuttarādayo ekantabahiddhārammaṇā viññāṇañcāyatanādayo ekantaajjhattārammaṇā,
tika-vin06t:494_3: Ayaṃ pana āpatti yathāvuttanayena sāhatthikā āṇattikāpi hotiyeva,
tika-vin06t:494_6: tathā aniyatapayogattā ayampi āpatti ‘sāhatthikāṇattikā’ti vuttāti nidassanameveta”nti ekacce ācariyā āhu.
tika-vin06t:494_7: “Ime panācariyā ubhinnaṃ ekato ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ natthi. Atthi ce,
tika-vin06t:494_8: ‘ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā’tiādinā paṭṭhānapāṭhena bhavitabbanti saññāya āhaṃsu,
tika-vin06t:494_9: tesaṃ matena ‘siyā ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇā’ti vacanaṃ niratthakaṃ siyā,
tika-vin06t:494_12: Puna ‘ayaṃ so’ti niyamena ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇā dhammā viya niddisitabbābhāvato na uddhaṭo siyā.
tika-vin06t:494_13: Tattha anuddhaṭattā eva dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ubhinnampi ajjhattabahiddhādhammānaṃ ekato ārammaṇakaraṇadhammavasena
tika-vin06t:494_15: tasmā gaṇṭhipade vuttanayova sāroti no takko”ti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:494_16: Tattha “kāyavacīkamma”nti avacanaṃ panassa sāhatthikapayogattā ekapayogassa anekakammattāva,
tika-vin06t:494_19: yathā tattha manokammaṃ vijjamānampi abbohārikaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-vin06t:494_20: evaṃ tasmiṃ sāhatthikāṇattike vacīkammaṃ abbohārikanti veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:494_21: taṃ pana kevalaṃ kāyakammassa upanissayaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-vin06t:494_24: “aṅgabhāvamattameva hi sandhāya ‘sāhatthikāṇattika’nti vuttanti no takko”ti ca,
tika-vin06t:496_0: Tattha kammaṃ na taṃ cittaṃ, kammaṃ nassati khīyati.
tika-vin06t:498_0: Na yuttaṃ taṃ viruddhattā, kammamekaṃva yujjati.
tika-vin06t:500_4: sabbesu ca akiriyasikkhāpadesu na kāyaṅgacopanaṃ vā vācaṅgacopanaṃ vā,
tika-vin06t:503_1: Sappāye ārammaṇe aṭṭhatvā paṭiladdhāsevanaṃ hutvā tato paraṃ suṭṭhu dhāvatīti sandhāvati.
tika-vin06t:503_3: byāpādasahagataṃ vā hutvā visesato dhāvatīti vidhāvati.
tika-vin06t:504_1: Vaṇaṃ katvā gahetunti ettha kiñcāpi iminā sikkhāpadena anāpatti,
tika-vin06t:504_2: itthirūpassa nāma yattha āmasantassa dukkaṭanti keci.
tika-vin06t:506_3: Kintu tassa parikappāvahārakamattaṃ na dissatīti dassanatthaṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:506_5: tasmā disvā gacchanto “paduddhāreneva kāretabbo”ti idaṃ tattha duvuttanti vuttaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin06t:506_6: “Sāṭakatthiko sāṭakapasibbakameva gahetvā bahi nikkhamitvā sāṭakabhāvaṃ ñatvā ‘pacchā gaṇhissāmī’ti evaṃ parikappetvā gaṇhati,
tika-vin06t:506_8: Yadā bahi ṭhatvā ‘sāṭako aya’nti disvā gacchati,
tika-vin06t:506_11: pubbabhāge avahārakkhaṇe na dissatīti na so parikappāvahāro,
tika-vin06t:506_15: Ayaṃ tāvāti sace upacārasīmantiādi yāva theravādo mahāaṭṭhakathānayo,
tika-vin06t:506_16: tattha keci panātiādi na gahetabbaṃ theravādattā yuttiabhāvato,
tika-vin06t:506_17: na hi sāhatthike evaṃvidhā atthasādhakacetanā hoti.
tika-vin06t:507_0: Kusasaṅkāmanakaraṇe sace paro “nāyaṃ mama santako”ti jānāti,
tika-vin06t:507_1: itarassa hatthato muttamatte pārājikāpatti khīlasaṅkāmane viya.
tika-vin06t:507_4: Evaṃ sante pañcakāni saṅkarāni hontīti upaparikkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:508_1: Parānuddayatāyāti ettha parānuddayatāya koṭippattena bhagavatā kasmā “anāpatti petapariggahe tiracchānagatapariggahe”ti vuttanti ce?
tika-vin06t:508_3: Yassa hi parikkhārassa ādāne rājāno coraṃ gahetvā na hananādīni kareyyuṃ,
tika-vin06t:508_4: tasmimpi nāma samaṇo gotamo pārājikaṃ paññapetvā bhikkhuṃ abhikkhuṃ karotīti mahājano bhagavati pasādaññathattaṃ āpajjitvā apāyupago hoti.
tika-vin06t:508_6: na ca sakkā ñātunti rukkhādīhi pāpabhīruko upāsakajano paṭimāgharacetiyabodhigharavihārādīni akatvā mahato puññakkhandhato parihāyeyya.
tika-vin06t:508_7: “Rukkhamūlasenāsanaṃ paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ nissāya pabbajjā”ti vuttanissayā ca anissayā honti.
tika-vin06t:508_8: Parapariggahitasaññino hi bhikkhū rukkhamūlapaṃsukūlāni na sādiyissantīti,
tika-vin06t:508_10: sappadaṭṭhakāle chārikatthāya rukkhaṃ aggahetvā maraṇaṃ vā nigaccheyyuṃ,
tika-vin06t:508_11: acchinnacīvarādikāle sākhābhaṅgādiṃ aggahetvā naggā hutvā titthiyaladdhimeva suladdhi viya dīpentā vicareyyuṃ,
tika-vin06t:508_12: tato titthiyesveva loko pasīditvā diṭṭhiggahaṇaṃ patvā saṃsārakhāṇuko bhaveyya,
tika-vin06t:508_13: tasmā bhagavā parānuddayatāya eva “anāpatti petapariggahe”tiādimāhāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:509_1: Aparampi bhāgaṃ dehīti “gahitaṃ viññattisadisattā neva bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ na pārājika”nti likhitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:509_3: “Sace pana sāmiko vā tena āṇatto vā ‘aparassa sahāyabhikkhussa bhāgaṃ esa gaṇhāti yācati vā’ti yaṃ aparabhāgaṃ deti,
tika-vin06t:510_1: Khādantassa bhaṇḍadeyyanti corassa vā sāmikassa vā sampattassa dinnaṃ sudinnameva kira.
tika-vin06t:510_3: na hi katipayānaṃ anussāhatāya saṅghikamasaṅghikaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:510_5: theyyacittena paribhuñjato avahāro hotī”ti vuttattā tadubhayamekaṃ.
tika-vin06t:510_6: Chaḍḍitavihāre upacārasīmāya pamāṇaṃ jānituṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin06t:510_7: ayaṃ pana bhikkhu upacārasīmāya bahi ṭhatvā ghaṇṭipaharaṇādiṃ katvā paribhuñjati khādati,
tika-vin06t:510_11: āgatānāgatānaṃ santakattāti “cātuddisassa saṅghassa demī”ti dinnattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:510_13: Tathā hi bahi ṭhito lābhaṃ na labhati bhagavato vacanenāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:511_1: “Matasūkaro”ti vacanato tameva jīvantaṃ bhaṇḍadeyyanti katvā dātuṃ na labhati.
tika-vin06t:511_5: na hi sakkā “ettakā sūkarā madditvā gatā gamissantī”ti jānitunti?
tika-vin06t:511_6: Yattake sāmikānaṃ dinne te “dinnaṃ mama bhaṇḍa”nti tussanti,
tika-vin06t:511_9: atikkantasūkaramūlaṃ datvā kiṃ opāto khaṇitvā dātabboti?
tika-vin06t:511_11: Atha kiṃ codiyamānassa ubhinnaṃ dhuranikkhepena pārājikaṃ hotīti? Na hoti,
tika-vin06t:511_13: eseva nayo aññesupi evarūpesūti no takkoti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:511_14: “Tadaheva vā dutiyadivase vā maddanto gacchatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:511_18: Mūlavatthucchedanti “sabbasenāsanaṃ ete issarā”ti vacanato itare anissarāti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:512_2: Adhippāyaṃ ñatvāti ettha yassa dānaṃ paṭiggaṇhantaṃ bhikkhuṃ,
tika-vin06t:512_3: bhāgaṃ vā sāmikā na rakkhanti na daṇḍenti,
tika-vin06t:512_4: tassa dānaṃ appaṭicchādetvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti idha sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin06t:512_6: Ayameva bhikkhu issaroti yattha so icchati,
tika-vin06t:512_10: “Garubhaṇḍaṃ hotī”ti vatvā “tiṇamattaṃ pana na dātabba”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:512_16: Idaṃ pana sikkhāpadaṃ “rājāpimesaṃ abhippasanno”ti vacanato lābhaggamahattaṃ,
tika-vin06t:516_1: Tīhi suddhenāti ettha tīhīti nissakkavacanaṃ vā hoti,
tika-vin06t:516_4: Tathā duccaritamalehi visamehi papañcehītiādinā nayena sabbakilesattikehi bodhimaṇḍe eva suddhenāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:517_6: parassa vā attabhāve chandarāgappahānakaraṃ vicchindanakaraṃ dhammakathaṃ katheti.
tika-vin06t:517_13: Asubhanti asubhanimittassa āvibhāvāya paccupaṭṭhānāya vitthārakathāsaṅkhātaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bhāsabhīti attho.
tika-vin06t:517_14: Tesaṃyeva ādimajjhapariyosānānaṃ dasahi lakkhaṇehi sampannaṃ kilesacorehi anabhibhavanīyattā jhānacittaṃ mañjūsaṃ nāma.
tika-vin06t:518_1: yasmiṃ vāre paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ ekacittakkhaṇikaṃ uppajjati,
tika-vin06t:518_3: gahetvā tassa paṭhamajjhānassa appanāpaṭipādikāya khippādibhedāya abhiññāya adhigatāya kiccanipphattiṃ
tika-vin06t:518_7: Tattha ādicittato paṭṭhāya yāva paṭhamajjhānassa uppādakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-vin06t:518_11: Lakkhīyati etenāti lakkhaṇanti katvā “visuddhipaṭipattipakkhandane”tiādinā pubbabhāgo lakkhīyati,
tika-vin06t:519_0: Pāribandhakatoti nīvaraṇasaṅkhātapāribandhakato visuddhattā gotrabhupariyosānaṃ pubbabhāgajavanacittaṃ “cittavisuddhī”ti vuccati.
tika-vin06t:519_1: Tathā visuddhattā taṃ cittaṃ majjhimaṃ samādhinimittasaṅkhātaṃ appanāsamādhiṃ tadatthāya upagacchamānaṃ
tika-vin06t:519_3: Evaṃ paṭipannassa tassa tattha samathanimitte pakkhandanaṃ tabbhāvūpagamanaṃ hotīti katvā “tattha cittapakkhandana”nti vuccati.
tika-vin06t:519_4: Evaṃ tāva paṭhamajjhānuppādakkhaṇe eva āgamanavasena paṭipadāvisuddhi veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:519_5: Evaṃ visuddhassa appanāppattassa puna visodhane byāpārābhāvā ajjhupekkhanaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:519_6: Samathappaṭipannattā puna samādhāne byāpārābhāvā ca samathappaṭipannassa ajjhupekkhanaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:519_7: Kilesasaṃsaggaṃ pahāya ekantena upaṭṭhitattā puna ekattupaṭṭhāne byāpārāsambhavato ekattupaṭṭhānassa ajjhupekkhanaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:519_8: Tattha jātānanti tasmiṃ citte jātānaṃ samādhipaññānaṃ yuganaddhabhāvena anativattanaṭṭhena nānākilesehi vimuttattā.
tika-vin06t:519_9: Saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ vimuttirasenekarasaṭṭhena anativattanekasabhāvānaṃ tesaṃ dvinnaṃ upagataṃ tajjaṃ
tika-vin06t:519_10: tassāruppaṃ tadanurūpaṃ vīriyaṃ tathā cittaṃ yogī vāheti pavattetīti katvā tadupagavīriyavāhanaṭṭhena
tika-vin06t:519_11: ca visesabhāgiyabhāvattā āsevanaṭṭhena ca sampahaṃsanā hotīti attho veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:519_12: Apicettha “anantarātītaṃ gotrabhucittaṃ ekasantativasena pariṇāmentaṃ paṭipajjati nāmā”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:519_13: Tattha hi pariṇāmentaṃ paṭipajjatīti etāni vacanāni atītassa na sambhavanti,
tika-vin06t:519_14: yañca tadanantaraṃ likhitaṃ “appanāsamādhicittaṃ upagacchamānaṃ gotrabhucittaṃ tattha pakkhandati nāmā”ti.
tika-vin06t:519_16: “paṭipattikkhaṇe eva atīta”nti vuttattā “gotrabhucittaṃ tattha pakkhandatī”ti vacanameva virujjhatīti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:519_17: “Ekacittakkhaṇikampi lokuttaracittaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkarotī”ti vuttattā “ekacittakkhaṇikassāpi jhānassa etāni dasa lakkhaṇānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:519_22: taṃ tesaṃ tiṇṇampi kalyāṇakatāya samannāgatattā tividhakalyāṇakatañca.
tika-vin06t:519_25: tasmā cittassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvena sampannattā adhiṭṭhānasampannaṃ nāmāti.
tika-vin06t:520_0: Addhamāsaṃ paṭisallīyitunti ettha ācariyā evamāhu “bhikkhūnaṃ aññamaññavadhadassanasavanasambhave satthuno
tika-vin06t:520_1: sati tassa upaddavassa abhāve upāyājānanato ‘ayaṃ asabbaññū’ti hetupatirūpakamahetuṃ vatvā dhammissarassāpi
tika-vin06t:520_2: tathāgatassa kammesvanissariyaṃ asambujjhamānā asabbadassitamadhiccamohā bahujanā avīciparāyanā bhaveyyuṃ,
tika-vin06t:520_3: tasmā so bhagavā pageva tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aññamaññaṃ vadhamānabhāvaṃ ñatvā tadabhāvopāyābhāvaṃ pana suvinicchinitvā
tika-vin06t:520_4: tattha puthujjanānaṃ sugatilābhahetumevekaṃ katvā asubhadesanāya vā rūpasaddadassanasavanehi nippayojanehi
tika-vin06t:520_7: avassaṃ paññāpitabbāya tatiyapārājikapaññattiyā vatthāgamadassanato ca attano sabbadassitaṃ parikkhakānaṃ
tika-vin06t:520_8: pakāsento viya tamaddhamāsaṃ veneyyahitanipphattiyā phalasamāpattiyā avakāsaṃ katvā viharitukāmo ‘icchāmahaṃ,
tika-vin06t:520_15: bhavissantī”ti idaṃ parato “ye te bhikkhū avītarāgā,
tika-vin06t:520_16: tesaṃ tasmiṃ samaye hoti eva bhayaṃ,
tika-vin06t:520_19: idañca bhagavato asubhakathārammaṇappayojanena na sametīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:520_21: Sakena kāyena aṭṭīyantānampi tesaṃ ariyamaggena appahīnasinehattā khīṇāsavānaṃ viya maraṇaṃ paṭicca abhayaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin06t:520_22: bhayañca pana asubhabhāvanānuyogānubhāvena mandībhūtaṃ anaṭṭīyantānaṃ viya na mahantaṃ hutvā cittaṃ mohesi.
tika-vin06t:520_23: Apāyupage te satte nākāsīti evamattho veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:520_25: yasmā tesaṃ tasmiṃ samaye hoti eva bhayaṃ,
tika-vin06t:520_28: tasmā “tena kho pana samayena bhagavā asubhakathaṃ kathetī”tiādi vuttanti.
tika-vin06t:521_0: Atha vā sakena kāyena aṭṭīyantānampi tesaṃ hoti eva bhayaṃ,
tika-vin06t:521_1: mahānubhāvā vītarāgāti khīṇāsavānaṃ mahantaṃ visesaṃ dasseti,
tika-vin06t:521_3: yato evaṃvidhānampi avītarāgattā bhayaṃ hotītipi dasseti.
tika-vin06t:521_5: Tenedaṃ dīpeti “taṃ tathā āgataṃ asihatthaṃ vadhakaṃ passitvā tadaññesampi hoti eva bhayaṃ,
tika-vin06t:521_6: pageva tesanti katvā bhagavā paṭhamameva tesaṃ asubhakathaṃ kathesi,
tika-vin06t:521_10: so “tesu kira bhikkhūsu kenacipi kāyavikāro vā vacīvikāro vā na kato,
tika-vin06t:521_11: sabbe satā sampajānā dakkhiṇena passena nipajjiṃsū”ti iminā aṭṭhakathāvacanena sameti.
tika-vin06t:522_1: “Ayaṃ kira laddhī”ti vacanaṃ “māradheyyaṃnātikkamissatī”ti vacanena virujjhatīti ce?
tika-vin06t:522_3: Ayaṃ bhikkhū aghātento māravisayaṃ atikkamissati akusalakaraṇato ca.
tika-vin06t:522_4: Ghātento pana māradheyyaṃ nātikkamissati balavattā kammassāti sayaṃ mārapakkhikattā evaṃ cintetvā pana “ye na matā,
tika-vin06t:522_5: te saṃsārato na muttā”ti attano ca laddhi,
tika-vin06t:522_6: tasmā taṃ tattha ubhayesaṃ magge niyojentī evamāha,
tika-vin06t:522_7: teneva “mārapakkhikā mārena samānaladdhikā”ti avatvā “mārassā nuvattikā”ti vuttā.
tika-vin06t:522_10: tasmā evaṃ cintetvāpi attano laddhivasena evamāhā”ti keci likhanti.
tika-vin06t:522_12: attano attano ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ santike uddesādiṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-vin06t:524_3: Yesaṃ evamassa “bhagavatā ācikkhitakammaṭṭhānānuyogapaccayā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ jīvitakkhayo āsī”ti,
tika-vin06t:524_5: Kevalaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pubbe katakammapaccayāva jīvitakkhayo āsi,
tika-vin06t:524_6: idaṃ pana kammaṭṭhānaṃ tesaṃ kesañci arahattappattiyā,
tika-vin06t:524_10: kesañci sugatiyaṃ uppattiyā upanissayo ahosīti sātthikāva me asubhakathā,
tika-vin06t:524_13: aññaṃ pariyāyaṃ ācikkhatū”ti ānandena yācitattā aññaṃ pariyāyaṃ ācikkhāmi,
tika-vin06t:524_15: evaṃ ayampi kho bhikkhaveti yojanā veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:524_19: aparabhāge pana assāsapassāsapabhavanimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā upaṭṭhātīti ca tathā vuttā.
tika-vin06t:525_0: Asubhe pavattaṃ asubhanti vā pavattaṃ bhāvanākammaṃ asubhakammaṃ,
tika-vin06t:525_1: tadeva aññassa punappunaṃ uppajjanakassa kāraṇaṭṭhena ṭhānattā asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin06t:525_2: ārammaṇaṃ vā asubhakammassa padaṭṭhānaṭṭhena ṭhānanti asubhakammaṭṭhānanti idha asubhajjhānaṃ,
tika-vin06t:525_5: Ārammaṇasantatāyāti anukkamena santakālaṃ upādāya vuttakāyadarathappaṭipassaddhivasena nibbuto.
tika-vin06t:525_16: evaṃ santepi “ubhopi jhānā vuṭṭhitasseva gahetabbā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:526_0: Tathābhāvapaṭisedhano cāti soḷasavatthukassa titthiyānaṃ natthitāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:526_1: Sabbapaṭhamānaṃ pana catunnaṃ padānaṃ vasena lokiyajjhānameva tesaṃ atthi,
tika-vin06t:526_10: Mohacaritassa araññaṃ anukūlaṃ mahāaraññe cittaṃ na saṅkuṭati,
tika-vin06t:526_16: ujukāyaṃ paṇidhānena assāsapassāsānaṃ pavattanasukhaṃ “parimukhaṃ sati”nti iminā ārammaṇapariggahūpāyaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin06t:526_18: Etassa vibhaṅge “assasati passasatī”ti avatvā “sato kārī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:526_20: na sesānī”ti ca “dīghaṃassāsavasenāti alopasamāsaṃ katvā”iti ca “ekatthatāya avikkhepa”nti ca “asambhogavasena
tika-vin06t:526_21: pajānato”ti ca “tena ñāṇenā”ti ca “pajānatoti vuttañāṇenā”ti ca “satokārīti satisampajaññāhikārī”ti ca
tika-vin06t:526_25: Tāluṃ āhacca nibbāyanato kira potako sampatijātova khipitasaddaṃ karoti,
tika-vin06t:526_27: Ekenākārenāti assāsavasena vā passāsavasena vā evaṃ ānāpānassatiṃ bhāvayato kāye kāyānupassanāsatikammaṭṭhānabhāvanā sampajjati.
tika-vin06t:527_14: gaṇanaṃ pahāya phuṭṭhaṭṭhānameva manasi karontassa kevalaṃ upekkhāva saṇṭhāti.
tika-vin06t:527_15: Cattāro vaṇṇāti “pattassa tayo vaṇṇā”tiādīsu viya cattāro saṇṭhānāti attho.
tika-vin06t:528_13: “Atthato tathā tathā pavattadhammā upadhāraṇasamādhānasaṅkhātena sīlanaṭṭhena sīlanti vuccantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:528_14: Tathā “ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā sikkhā”ti etthāpi cetanāsīlameva,
tika-vin06t:528_21: Etena nānāvajjanappavattidīpanato nānājavanavārehipi sikkhati nāmāti dīpitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:528_23: Ñāṇuppādanādīsūti ettha ādisaddena yāva pariyosānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:528_29: Te hi ‘paṭhamajjhānaṃ labhitvā nānāsane nisīditvā dutiyatthāya vāyāmato upacāre vitakkavicāravasena oḷārikacittappavattikāle
tika-vin06t:528_32: ekāsanapaṭilābhe ca uparūpari cittappavattiyā santabhāvato paṭhamato dutiyassupacāre sukhumataṃ vadantī”’ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:529_0: Vipassanāyaṃ panāti catudhātuvavatthānamukhena abhiniviṭṭhassa ayaṃ kamo,
tika-vin06t:529_3: na ito aññanti dassanaṃ sandhāya “sakalarūpapariggahe”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:529_5: Pubbe vuttanayenāti sabbesaṃyeva pana matena apariggahitakāletiādinā.
tika-vin06t:530_4: Jāṇuke gahetvā ṭhānaṃ viya iñjanāti ānamanādīnaṃ āvibhāvatthamuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:530_5: Yathārūpehi ānamanādi vā kampanādi vā hoti,
tika-vin06t:530_10: Assāsapassāsānaṃ vūpasantattā ānāpānassatisamādhissa bhāvanā na hoti.
tika-vin06t:530_14: Iti kirāti evametaṃ tāva vacananti tadetaṃ.
tika-vin06t:530_16: “sato assasati sato passasatī”ti padāni patiṭṭhapetvā dvattiṃsapadāni cattāri catukkāni veditabbāni.
tika-vin06t:531_0: Appaṭipīḷananti tesaṃ kilesānaṃ anuppādanaṃ kiñcāpi cetiyaṅgaṇavattādīnipi atthato pātimokkhasaṃvarasīle
tika-vin06t:531_4: satthā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeti uddisati pātimokkhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:531_5: yāva na idhekacce āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā saṅghe pātubhavantī”ti ettha anadhippetattā “ābhisamācārika”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:532_2: Pañcasandhikaṃ kammaṭṭhānanti ettha jhānampi nimittampi tadatthajotikāpi pariyatti idha kammaṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
tika-vin06t:533_5: “Dolāphalakassa ekapasse eva ubho koṭiyo majjhañca passatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:535_1: saṅgītito paṭṭhāya aṭṭhakathāya anāgatattā tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:535_2: “Mayhaṃ tārakarūpaṃ nu kho upaṭṭhātī”tiādiparikappe asatipi dhātunānattena etāsaṃ dhātūnaṃ uppatti viya kevalaṃ bhāvayato tathā tathā upaṭṭhāti.
tika-vin06t:535_3: “Na nimitta’nti vattuṃ na vaṭṭati sampajānamusāvādattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:536_5: Nimitte hi cittaṃ ṭhapentova nānākāratañca vibhāveti,
tika-vin06t:536_6: assāsapassāse vā sakaṃ cittaṃ nibandhatīti vuccati.
tika-vin06t:537_0: Aṭṭhakathāsu paṭikkhittanti āsannabhavaṅgattāti kāraṇaṃ vatvā sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāsu paṭikkhittaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:537_2: sattame vā appanāya sati maggavīthiyaṃ phalassa okāso na hoti, tasmā.
tika-vin06t:537_4: lokiyappanāpi hi appanāvīthimhi lokuttarena samānagatikāvāti paṭiladdhajjhānopi bhikkhu diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthāya
tika-vin06t:537_10: Tato paraṃ appanāya ādhārabhāvaṃ na gacchati.
tika-vin06t:537_12: pañcamaṃ vā gacchati thale ṭhitaghaṭo viya javanānamantare ṭhitattāti kira ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:538_0: Puthuttārammaṇāni anāvajjitvā jhānaṅgāneva āvajjanaṃ āvajjanavasī nāma.
tika-vin06t:538_4: Teneva “paccavekkhaṇavasī pana āvajjanavasiyā eva vuttā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:538_5: Samāpajjanavasī nāma yattakaṃ kālaṃ icchati tattakaṃ samāpajjanaṃ,
tika-vin06t:538_7: “Adhiṭṭhānavasiyā vuṭṭhānavasino ayaṃ nānattaṃ adhiṭṭhānānubhāvena javanaṃ javati,
tika-vin06t:538_8: vuṭṭhānānubhāvena pana adhippetato adhikaṃ javatī”tipi vadanti.
tika-vin06t:538_9: Apica pathavīkasiṇādiārammaṇaṃ āvajjitvā javanañca javitvā puna āvajjitvā tato pañcamaṃ jhānaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:538_11: Bhagavato pana āvajjanasamanantarameva jhānaṃ hotīti sabbaṃ anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:539_8: ekassa vā ārammaṇasaddassa lopo daṭṭhabboti ca mama takko vicāretvāva gahetabbo.
tika-vin06t:540_0: Tato paraṃ tīsu catukkesu dve dve padāni ekamekaṃ katvā gaṇetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:540_1: Samathena ārammaṇato vipassanāvasena asammohato pītipaṭisaṃvedanamettha veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:540_4: Tattha hi yena mohena taṃ dukkhaṃ paṭicchannaṃ,
tika-vin06t:540_6: tassa vihatattā vā evaṃ pavatte ñāṇe yathāruci paccavekkhituṃ icchiticchitakāle samatthabhāvato vā dukkhādīsu tīsu asammohato ñāṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:540_7: Nirodhe ārammaṇato taṃsampayuttā pītipaṭisaṃvedanā asammohato na sambhavati mohappahānābhāvā,
tika-vin06t:540_10: Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti tadārammaṇassa paṭisaṃviditattāti ettha adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:541_6: Maggena asammohasaṅkhātavipassanākiccanipphattito maggopi abhiññeyyādiārammaṇaṃ karonto viya vutto.
tika-vin06t:541_16: Vipassanāmaggapaccavekkhaṇakālesupi pavattaassāsamukheneva sabbaṃ dassitaṃ upāyakusalena bhagavatā.
tika-vin06t:544_3: “Sutvā bhuñjantī”ti ettha viya sañcicca voropetukāmassa sañciccapadaṃ voropanapadassa ussukkaṃ,
tika-vin06t:544_4: sañcetanā ca jīvitā voropanañca ekassevāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:544_6: payogopi icchitabbo evāti dassetuṃ vuttānīti kira upatissatthero.
tika-vin06t:544_9: tasmā byañjane ādaraṃ akatvā attho dassito.
tika-vin06t:544_13: Attasaṅkhātānañhi arūpānaṃ khandhavibhaṅge viya idha oḷārikasukhumatā anadhippetā.
tika-vin06t:544_18: Tena sajīvakova manussaviggahopi nāma hotīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:544_19: Ettha mātukucchisminti manussamātuyā vā tiracchānamātuyā vā.
tika-vin06t:545_0: “Itthiṃ hane ca mātaraṃ, purisañca pitaraṃ hane;
tika-vin06t:546_0: Mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hantvā, na tenānantaraṃ phuse;
tika-vin06t:548_1: Ekabhavapariyāpannāya hi cittasantatiyā paṭisandhicittaṃ paṭhamacittaṃ nāma.
tika-vin06t:548_3: Aññathā anamatagge saṃsāre paṭhamacittaṃ nāma natthi vinā anantarasamanantaranatthivigatapaccayehi cittuppattiyā abhāvato.
tika-vin06t:548_5: Ayaṃ sabbapaṭhamo manussaviggahoti kiñcāpi imaṃ jīvitā voropetuṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin06t:548_6: taṃ ādiṃ katvā santatiyā yāva maraṇā uppajjanakamanussaviggahesu aparimāṇesu “sabbapaṭhamo”ti dissati.
tika-vin06t:548_7: Yadā pana yo manussaviggaho pubbāpariyavasena santatippatto hoti,
tika-vin06t:548_9: Santatiṃ vikopento hi jīvitā voropeti nāma.
tika-vin06t:548_10: Ettha ca nānattanaye adhippete sati “sabbapaṭhamo”ti vacanaṃ yujjati,
tika-vin06t:548_13: tasmā “sabbapaṭhamo”ti vacanaṃ na yujjatīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:548_15: Yasmā pana santati nāma anekesaṃ pubbāpariyuppatti vuccati,
tika-vin06t:548_18: aññathā “santatiṃ vikopetī”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ na sijjhati.
tika-vin06t:548_19: Kiñcāpi ettha “santatiṃ vikopetī”ti vacanato santatipaccuppannameva adhippetaṃ,
tika-vin06t:548_21: tathāpi yasmā santatipaccuppanne vikopite addhāpaccuppannaṃ vikopitameva hoti,
tika-vin06t:548_22: addhāpaccuppanne pana vikopite santatipaccuppannaṃ vikopitaṃ hotīti ettha vattabbaṃ natthi.
tika-vin06t:548_24: tasmā tadeva sandhāya ‘santatiṃ vikopetī’ti idaṃ vuttanti veditabba”nti āha.
tika-vin06t:548_25: “Santatiṃ vikopetī”ti vacanato pakatiyā āyupariyantaṃ patvā maraṇakasatte vītikkame sati anāpatti vītikkamapaccayā santatiyā akopitattā.
tika-vin06t:548_26: Vītikkamapaccayā ce āyupariyantaṃ appatvā antarāva maraṇakasatte vītikkamapaccayā āpatti,
tika-vin06t:548_30: ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso”ti vacanato vā cetanākkhaṇe eva pārājikāpatti ekantākusalattā,
tika-vin06t:549_2: Attano paṭipakkhena samannāgatattā samanantarassa paccayaṃ hontaṃ yathā pure viya ahutvā dubbalassa.
tika-vin06t:550_0: Ītinti sattavidhavicchikādīni yuddhe ḍaṃsitvā māraṇatthaṃ vissajjenti.
tika-vin06t:550_6: kujjhitvā olokite paresaṃ kāye visamaraṇaṃ vā ḍāhuppādanaṃ vā payogo nāma.
tika-vin06t:551_4: Tassa duṭṭhena manasānupakkhite so ca gabbho sā ca iddhīti ubhayampi saheva nassati,
tika-vin06t:551_7: “tesaṃ mataṃ gahetvā ‘thāvarīnampi ayaṃ yujjatī’ti vutte tikavasena paṭisedhitabbanti apare”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:551_8: Sāhatthikanissaggiyapayogesu sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāya sattamāya sahuppannakāyaviññattiyā sāhatthikatā veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:551_9: Āṇattike pana sattahipi cetanāhi saha vacīviññattisambhavato sattasatta saddā ekato hutvā ekekakkharabhāvaṃ
tika-vin06t:551_10: gantvā yattakehi akkharehi attano adhippāyaṃ viññāpeti,
tika-vin06t:551_17: Tato paraṃ atisañcaraṇe kammabaddhātibahuttaṃ veditabbaṃ sati paraṃ maraṇe.
tika-vin06t:551_19: Atthasādhakacetanā yasmā ettha ca dutiyapārājike ca labbhati,
tika-vin06t:565_0: Abhidhamme na sabbatthi, tattha sā niyatā siyā.
tika-vin06t:577_0: Mato sutto pabuddho vā, kusalo vadhako siyā.
tika-vin06t:579_0: Siyā tathā gato siddho, sahatthā vadhakacetanā”ti.
tika-vin06t:580_0: Yāni pana bījautukammadhammacittaniyāmāni pañca aṭṭhakathāya ānetvā nidassitāni,
tika-vin06t:580_1: tesu ayamatthasādhakacetanā yogaṃ gacchatīti maññe “ayaṃ atthasādhakacetanāniyamo natthī”ti cetanānaṃ
tika-vin06t:580_4: tena sabbepi yathāsambhavaṃ kammacittaniyāme bhajanti gacchantīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:580_6: idha pana saṅkappapade atthato “maraṇasaññī maraṇacetano maraṇādhippāyo”ti evaṃ avibhūtattā vibhatto,
tika-vin06t:580_9: Nayidaṃ vitakkassa nāmanti na vitakkasseva nāmaṃ,
tika-vin06t:581_2: Anuddesike kammassārammaṇaṃ so vā hoti, añño vā.
tika-vin06t:581_3: Ubhayehīti kiñcāpi paṭhamappahāro na sayameva sakkoti,
tika-vin06t:581_4: dutiyaṃ labhitvā pana sakkonto jīvitavināsanahetu ahosi,
tika-vin06t:581_8: “cetanā nāma dāruṇāti garuṃ vatthuṃ ārabbha pavattapubbabhāgacetanā pakatisabhāvavadhakacetanā,
tika-vin06t:582_3: evaṃ ghāhehī’ti pāḷiyā sametīti ācariyena gahito”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:582_12: na pana āṇāpako dīghādīsu aññataraṃ mārehīti adhippāyo”ti vadanti kira.
tika-vin06t:582_13: “Attho pana cittena ekaṃ sandhāyapi aniyametvā āṇāpetī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:582_15: āṇāpako muccatī”ti vuttaṃ yathādhippāyaṃ na gatattā.
tika-vin06t:582_16: “Evaṃ dīghādivasenāpi cittena aniyamitassevāti yuttaṃ viya dissatī”ti aññatarasmiṃ gaṇṭhipade likhitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:582_18: okāsassa niyamitattāti ettha okāsaniyamaṃ katvā niddisanto tasmiṃ okāse nisinnaṃ māretukāmova hoti,
tika-vin06t:582_20: Tasmā okāsena saha attano jīvitindriyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin06t:582_21: tena attanā mārāpito paro eva mārāpito. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin06t:582_22: Sayaṃ rasso ca tanuko ca hutvā pubbabhāge attānaṃ sandhāya āṇattikkhaṇe “dīghaṃ rassaṃ thūlaṃ balavantaṃ
tika-vin06t:582_23: mārehī”ti āṇāpentassa cittaṃ attani tassākārassa natthitāya aññassa tādisassa jīvitindriyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:583_8: Mūlaṭṭhena āpajjitabbāpattiyā hi tassa okāso aparicchinno,
tika-vin06t:583_11: mūlaṭṭho ācariyo pubbe āpannadukkaṭena saha thullaccayampi āpajjati. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:583_13: Idaṃ pana dukkaṭathullaccayaṃ vadhako ce tamatthaṃ na sāveti āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:583_19: Yadi evaṃ kasmā pāṭhe na vuttanti ce?
tika-vin06t:583_20: Vadhako pana ‘sādhu karomī’ti paṭiggaṇhitvā taṃ na karoti.
tika-vin06t:583_22: kimassa dukkaṭāpattī’ti sañjātakaṅkhānaṃ tadatthadīpanatthaṃ ‘mūlaṭṭhassa āpatti thullaccayassā”’ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:583_24: mūlaṭṭhassa ca āpatti thullaccayassā”ti vuttaṃ na silissati,
tika-vin06t:584_0: Visakkiyadūtapadaniddese “vattukāmatāya ca kicchenettha vatvā payojanaṃ natthīti bhagavatā na vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:584_3: ācariyena āṇattena buddharakkhitena tadatthe saṅgharakkhitasseva ārocite kiñcāpi yo “sādhū”ti paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin06t:584_7: Teneva “āṇāpakassa ca vadhakassa ca āpatti pārājikassā”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:584_8: taṃ pana mūlaṭṭhena āpajjitabbadukkaṭaṃ “mūlaṭṭhassa anāpattī”ti iminā aparicchinnokāsattā na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:585_0: Avisaṅkete “mūlaṭṭhassa āpatti thullaccayassā”ti vuttattā visaṅkete āpatti dukkaṭassāti siddhanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:585_2: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti idaṃ pana dukkaṭaṃ vadhakasseva.
tika-vin06t:585_3: So hi paṭhamaṃ āṇāpakaṃ buddharakkhitaṃ pārājikāpattiṃ pāpetvā sayaṃ jīvitā voropetvā āpajjissatīti kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ “so taṃ jīvitā voropeti,
tika-vin06t:585_4: āṇāpakassa ca vadhakassa ca āpatti pārājikassā”ti na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:585_6: “yato pārājikaṃ paññatta”nti pubbe vuttanayattā ca taṃ na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:585_8: āpatti sabbesaṃ pārājikassā”ti hi pubbe vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:585_9: Ettha pubbe ācariyantevāsikānaṃ vuttadukkaṭathullaccayāpattiyo paṭhamameva anāpannā pārājikāpattiyā āpannattā.
tika-vin06t:585_10: Tathāpi vadhakassa pārājikāpattiyā tesaṃ pārājikabhāvo pākaṭo jātoti katvā “āpatti sabbesaṃ pārājikassā”ti ekato vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:585_12: vadhakassa ca āpatti pārājikassā”ti ettha. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:585_14: So hi paṭhamaṃ dukkaṭāpattiṃ āpajjitvā pacchā pārājikaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:585_15: Yadi pana antevāsikā kevalaṃ ācariyassa garukatāya sāsanaṃ ārocenti sayaṃ amaraṇādhippāyā samānā pārājikena anāpatti.
tika-vin06t:585_17: imassatthassa sādhanatthaṃ dhammapadavatthūhi migaluddakassa bhariyāya sotāpannāya dhanuususūlādidānaṃ nidassanaṃ vadanti eke.
tika-vin06t:585_19: tasmā suttañca aṭṭhakathañca anulometīti no takkoti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:585_21: itthannāmo itthannāmaṃ pāvadatū”ti ettha avisesetvā vuttattā vācāya vā ārocetu,
tika-vin06t:586_0: Idāni imasmiṃyeva adhikāradvaye anugaṇṭhipade vuttanayo vuccati –
tika-vin06t:586_4: Yadi pana so vajjhamaraṇāmaraṇesu avassamaññataraṃ karoti,
tika-vin06t:586_8: mūlaṭṭhassa āpatti thullaccayassā”ti adhikārato “mūlaṭṭhassa āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vuttameva hoti.
tika-vin06t:586_11: “Mūlaṭṭhassa āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti hi vutte mūlaṭṭhasseva vasena niyamitattā “paṭiggaṇhantassa dukkaṭaṃ hotī”ti na ñāyati.
tika-vin06t:586_13: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti hi aniyametvā vutte sakkā ubhayesaṃ vasena dukkaṭe yojetuṃ.
tika-vin06t:586_14: Tasmā eva hi aṭṭhakathācariyehi adhikāraṃ gahetvā “saṅgharakkhitena sampaṭicchite mūlaṭṭhasseva dukkaṭanti veditabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:586_18: tassa pana pārājikadukkaṭesu aññataraṃ bhaveyyāti ayamattho dīpito,
tika-vin06t:586_23: na ca paṭikkhitto “paṭiggaṇhantassa āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti pāḷiyā abhāvato,
tika-vin06t:586_24: paṭiggaṇhanapaccayā vadhakassa dukkaṭaṃ siyāti nayaṃ dātuṃ “mūlaṭṭhassā”ti pāḷiyaṃ avuttattā “taṃ paṭiggaṇhantassevetaṃ dukkaṭa”nti yaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:586_28: Kasmā pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ anuttānaṃ paṭiggaṇhanapaccayā vadhakassa dukkaṭaṃ avatvā mūlaṭṭhasseva vasena dukkaṭaṃ vuttanti ce?
tika-vin06t:586_30: “Saṅgharakkhitena sampaṭicchite paṭiggaṇhanapaccayā tassa dukkaṭa”nti hi vutte anantaranayena sarūpena
tika-vin06t:586_31: vuttattā idhāpi mūlaṭṭhassa thullaccayaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttameva hotīti āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:586_32: Iti taṃ evaṃ āpannaṃ thullaccayaṃ uttānanti taṃ avatvā paṭiggaṇhantassa dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:586_33: Anuttānattā aṭṭhakathāyanti imaṃ aniṭṭhaggahaṇaṃ nivāretuṃ “mūlaṭṭhassevetaṃ dukkaṭa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:586_34: Ācariyena hi vuttanayena paṭiggaṇhantassa dukkaṭampi uttānameva.
tika-vin06t:586_35: Uttānañca kasmā amhākaṃ khantīti vuttanti ce?
tika-vin06t:586_37: “Piṭakattayādīsu appaṭihatabuddhiyopi ācariyā sarūpena pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāyañca avuttattā evarūpesu nāma ṭhānesu evaṃ paṭipajjanti,
tika-vin06t:586_38: kimaṅgaṃ pana mādisoti suhadayā kulaputtā anāgate vuttanayamanatikkamitvā saṅkaradosaṃ vivajjetvā vaṇṇanāvelañca
tika-vin06t:586_40: Ayaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāya vā avuttattā evarūpesu nāma pāṭho ācariyena pacchā nikkhittattā kesuci potthakesu na dissatīti katvā sabbaṃ likhissāma.
tika-vin06t:586_41: Evaṃ sante paṭiggahaṇe āpattiyeva na siyā,
tika-vin06t:586_49: tassa tassa tappaccayā āpattiyevāti ayamettha amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin06t:587_3: tathāpi tattha paramparāya sutvā maratūti adhippāyena ullapantassa uddese sati uddiṭṭhassa maraṇena āpatti pārājikassa,
tika-vin06t:587_4: asati yassa kassaci maraṇena āpatti pārājikassa.
tika-vin06t:587_5: “Itthannāmo sutvā me vajjhassa ārocetū”ti uddisitvā ullapantassa visaṅketatā dūtaparamparāya vuttattā veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:587_12: “Yo koci mama vacanaṃ sutvā taṃ māretū”ti ullapati,
tika-vin06t:587_16: visaṅketattā na pārājikanti evaṃ yathāsambhavo veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:588_3: aggimhi pakkhipitvā vā pageva muccatīti atthato vuttameva hoti.
tika-vin06t:588_4: Yesaṃ hatthato mūlaṃ gahitanti yesaṃ ñātakaparivāritānaṃ hatthato mūlaṃ tena bhikkhunā gahitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:588_5: potthakasāmikahatthato pubbe dinnamūlaṃ puna gahetvā tesaññeva ñātakādīnaṃ datvā muccati,
tika-vin06t:588_7: Anugaṇṭhipade pana “sacepi so vippaṭisārī hutvā sīghaṃ tesaṃ mūlaṃ datvā muccatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:588_10: Potthakasāmikahatthato dhane gahite potthake adinnepi muccanato.
tika-vin06t:588_13: Sace potthakaṃ sāmikānaṃ datvā mūlaṃ na gaṇhāti,
tika-vin06t:588_15: Sace potthakaṃ mūlaṭṭhena diyyamānaṃ “taveva hotū”ti appeti,
tika-vin06t:588_18: yathā cetiyaṃ vā paṭimaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ setuṃ vā kiṇitvā gahitampi kārakassevetaṃ puññaṃ,
tika-vin06t:588_24: Parena hi katasatthaṃ labhitvā upanikkhipantassa pārājikanti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:588_25: Evaṃ parena likhitampi potthakaṃ labhitvā yathā vajjho taṃ passitvā marati,
tika-vin06t:588_27: Cetiyādīti etamanidassanaṃ karaṇapaccayaṃ hi taṃ kammaṃ idaṃmaraṇapaccayanti evaṃ ācariyena vicāritaṃ.
tika-vin06t:588_28: Mama pana cetiyādinidassaneneva sopi attho sādhetabbo viya paṭibhāti.
tika-vin06t:589_0: Tattakā pāṇātipātāti “ekāpi cetanā kiccavasena ‘tattakā’ti vuttā satipaṭṭhānasammappadhānānaṃ catukkatā viyā”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:589_2: “Kataṃ mayā evarūpe āvāṭe khaṇite tasmiṃ patitvā maratū”ti adhippāyena vadhako āvāṭappamāṇaṃ niyametvā sace khaṇi,
tika-vin06t:589_4: Idāni khaṇitabbaṃ sandhāya ettakappamāṇassa aniyamitattā “ekasmimpi kudālappahāre”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:589_8: Vajjhesu ekassa jīvitindriye ālambite sabbesamālambitameva hoti.
tika-vin06t:589_9: Ekassa maraṇepi na tassa sakalaṃ jīvitaṃ sakkā ālambituṃ na uppajjamānaṃ, uppannaṃ,
tika-vin06t:589_14: Pacchimakoṭiyā ekacittakkhaṇe purejātaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ taṃ jīvitamālambaṇaṃ katvā sattamajavanapariyāpannacetanāya
tika-vin06t:589_15: opakkame kate atthato tassa sattassa sabbaṃ jīvitindriyamālambitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:589_18: evameva pubbabhāge “bahūpisatte māremī”ti cintetvā sanniṭṭhānakāle visapakkhipanādīsu ekaṃ payogaṃ sādhayamānā
tika-vin06t:589_19: vuttappakāracetanā tesu ekassa vuttappakāraṃ jīvitindriyaṃ ālambaṇaṃ katvā uppajjati,
tika-vin06t:589_20: evaṃ uppannāya panekāya sabbepi te māritā honti tāya eva sabbesaṃ maraṇasiddhito,
tika-vin06t:589_23: Tattha ekāya cetanāya bahūnaṃ maraṇe akusalarāsi kathanti ce?
tika-vin06t:589_24: Visuṃ visuṃ maraṇe pavattacetanānaṃ kiccakaraṇato. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin06t:589_26: tasmā tāsu yāya kāyaci dinnāya paṭisandhiyā itarā sabbāpi “tato balavatarakusalapaṭibāhitā ahosikamma”ntiādikoṭṭhāsaṃ bhajanti,
tika-vin06t:589_28: Aparāpariyavedanīyāpi viya taṃ paṭibāhitvā kusalacetanā paṭisandhiṃ deti,
tika-vin06t:589_29: tathā ayampi cetanā anantarabhave eva paṭisandhidānādivasena tāsaṃ kiccalesakaraṇato ekāpi samānā “rāsī”ti vuttā.
tika-vin06t:589_30: Tāya pana dinnāya paṭisandhiyā atitikkho vipāko hoti.
tika-vin06t:590_4: Atha vā “sabbathāpi anuddissevā”ti vacanato ettha maratūti adhippāyasambhavato “uttarituṃ asakkonto marati pārājikamevā”ti suvuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:590_6: opapātikamanusso ca nibbattitvā ṭhitaniyameneva “uttarituṃ na sakkā”ti cintetvā maratīti pārājikacchāyā na dissati,
tika-vin06t:590_8: So hi uttarituṃ asakkonto punappunaṃ patitvā marati,
tika-vin06t:590_9: tena pātopi tassa siddho hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:590_13: Vadhakacetanā ca “aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo,
tika-vin06t:590_14: rūpajīvitindriyaṃ mātughātikammassa pitughātikammassa arahantaghātikammassa ruhiruppādakammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
tika-vin06t:590_17: na ca sā cetanā “aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo,
tika-vin06t:590_19: Rūpajīvitindriyaṃ mātughātikammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo”ti vacanato anāgatārammaṇā hoti.
tika-vin06t:590_21: evaṃ sante vadhakacetanāya kiṃ ārammaṇanti ce?
tika-vin06t:590_22: Yassa kassaci idha jīvanakasattassa paccuppannaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ.
tika-vin06t:590_25: Yathā kiṃ “yathākkamena ṭhite satta jane ekena kaṇḍena vijjhitvā māremī”ti pubbabhāge cintetvā sanniṭṭhānakāle
tika-vin06t:590_26: tesu ekassa jīvitamārammaṇaṃ katvā kaṇḍaṃ vissajjeti,
tika-vin06t:590_27: kaṇḍo taṃ virajjhitvā itare cha jane māreti,
tika-vin06t:590_28: evaṃ santepi ayaṃ pāṇātipātī eva hoti,
tika-vin06t:590_29: evamidhāpi “yo kocī”ti vikappentassa vadhakacetanā yassa kassaci jīvitārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattati,
tika-vin06t:590_34: Ayameva hettha ācariyaparamparāgatā yutti vinicchayakathāti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:591_0: Patanarūpaṃ pamāṇanti ettha yathā mātuyā patitvā parivattaliṅgāya matāya so mātughātako hoti,
tika-vin06t:591_11: tathā idhāpi patanarūpavasena thullaccayaṃ ekasantānattāti ayaṃ paṭhamatheravāde yutti.
tika-vin06t:591_14: atha kho ahetukapaṭisandhikattā akusalavipākassa “vāmena sūkaro hotī”ti ettha vuttayakkhānaṃ paṭisandhi viya sabbarūpānaṃ sādhāraṇattā,
tika-vin06t:591_15: amanussajātikattā ca tiracchānarūpena mate maraṇarūpavasena pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin06t:591_16: vatthuvasena lahukāpattiyā parivattanā hoti eva tatthajātakarukkhādichedanapācittiyaparivattanaṃ viya.
tika-vin06t:591_19: Pārājikassa pana manussajātiko yathā tathā vā patitvā yathā tathā vā maratu,
tika-vin06t:594_0: Gaṇṭhipade pana “dutiyavāde puthujjanassa patitvā arahattaṃ patvā marantassa vasena vutto”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:594_3: Yakkhapetarūpena matepi eseva nayoti thullaccayanti attho.
tika-vin06t:594_5: Pahāraṃ laddhāti sattānaṃ māraṇatthāya katattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:595_0: 177. Sādhu suṭṭhu maratūti vacībhedaṃ karoti. Visabhāgarogoti sarīraṭṭho gaṇḍapīḷakādi.
tika-vin06t:596_4: Heṭṭhā vuttanayena sāhatthikāṇattikanayañhettha yojetvā kāyavācācittato samuṭṭhānavidhi dassetabbo.
tika-vin06t:599_1: Maraṇatthikāva hutvāti imassa kāyassa bhedena saggapāpanādhippāyattā atthato maraṇatthikāva hutvā evaṃadhippāyino
tika-vin06t:599_2: maraṇatthikā nāma hontīti attano maraṇatthikabhāvaṃ ajānantā āpannā pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin06t:599_3: Na hi te “attano cittappavattiṃ na jānantī”ti vuccanti.
tika-vin06t:599_9: Heṭṭhimabhāge hi kismiñci vijjamāne vali paññāyati.
tika-vin06t:600_3: Pubbepi attanā laddhapiṇḍapātato paṇītapaṇītaṃ dento tatthapi attakāriyaṃ adāsi.
tika-vin06t:600_4: Asañciccāti ettha aññaṃ ākaḍḍhantassa aññassa patane sabbena sabbaṃ abhisandhi natthi.
tika-vin06t:600_5: Na maraṇādhippāyassāti paṭigho ca payogo ca atthi,
tika-vin06t:600_10: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā tathārūpāya pāḷiyā bhavitabba”nti vadanti. No ce,
tika-vin06t:600_15: Vemā nāma tesaṃ khādanadaṇḍakānaṃ heṭṭhā ca upari ca tiriyaṃ bandhitabbadaṇḍā”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:600_17: Hatthappatto viya dissati “tassa vikkhepo mā hotū”ti upacchindati.
tika-vin06t:600_18: Visesādhigamaṃ byākaritvā tappabhavaṃ sakkāraṃ lajjīyanto āhāraṃ upacchindati sabhāgānaṃ byākatattā.
tika-vin06t:601_2: Sā hi anuññātattā katāpi akatā viyāti akataviññatti.
tika-vin06t:601_4: bhante yenattho’ti evaṃ akataṭṭhāne viññatti akataviññattī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:601_5: Titthiyabhūtānaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ sahatthā dātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin06t:601_9: “Yadā tesaṃ attho bhavissatī”ti ābhogaṃ katvā vā.
tika-vin06t:601_10: “‘Vejjakammaṃ vā na hotī’ti vacanato yāva sattamo kulaparivaṭṭo,
tika-vin06t:602_5: “Pūjaṃ akāsī’ti vuttattā sayaṃ gahetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:604_1: anāmaṭṭhaṃ na vaṭṭatīti aṅgulantare thokaṃ bhattaṃ gahetvā patte bhattaṃ sabbaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin06t:604_4: Piturājā damiḷassa parājito rohaṇe soḷasavassāni vasitvā mittāmaccaparivuto “rajjaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti āgantvā
tika-vin06t:604_5: antarāmagge appamattakassa kāraṇā ekaṃ amaccaṃ ghātāpesi.
tika-vin06t:604_6: Sesā bhayena palāyantā araññe antarāmagge corehi viluttā hambugallakavihāraṃ gantvā tattha cātunikāyikatissatthero
tika-vin06t:604_7: tesaṃ saṅgahaṃ katvā puna ānetvā rañño dassesi,
tika-vin06t:604_8: tehi saddhiṃ rajjaṃ gahetvā rājā hambugallakatissattherassa abhayagirivihāraṃ akāsi.
tika-vin06t:605_1: Corasamīpaṃ pesento “vāḷayakkhavihāraṃ pesetī”ti iminā sadiso. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:605_3: Taḷākādīsu macchādiggahaṇatthaṃ kevaṭṭaṃ aññāpadesena “taḷākatīraṃ gacchā”ti pahiṇantassa pāṇātipātena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:606_4: “Imaṃ chinditvā sīghaṃ gantvā saṅghassa pattacīvaraṃ dassāmī”ti kusalacittenapi chindituṃ na vaṭṭati ananuññātattā.
tika-vin06t:607_3: Tasmā “bhikkhurakkhaṇatthaṃ aññassa bhikkhussa vaṭṭatī’ti vattabbamettha natthī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:607_4: Yadi evaṃ acchinnacīvarassa naggabhāvappaṭicchādanatthaṃ bhūtagāmapātabyatā bhagavatā anuññātā,
tika-vin06t:607_7: na ca rukkho vā chinditabbo”tiādi na vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-vin06t:607_11: ariyapuggalesupi sattā naggiyaṃ passitvā appasādaṃ katvā nirayūpagā bhavissanti,
tika-vin06t:607_19: jīvitapariccajanaṃ passitvā vā “aho dukkaraṃ kata”nti pasādameva labheyyunti attano na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:607_22: Gaṇṭhipade pana “jīvitatthāya rukkhaṃ chindantassa attasinehavasena chindanato akusalattā na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:607_25: opāte vā patitesu aññena aññassatthāya rukkhachedanādi kātuṃ vaṭṭati, kasmā?
tika-vin06t:608_1: Tīhi mārite pana visaṅketanti ettha tīsu ekena māritepi “khettameva otiṇṇattā pārājika”nti vuttattā tayopi ekato hutvā mārenti ce, āpajjati,
tika-vin06t:608_3: “Paricchedātikkame pana sabbattha visaṅketaṃ hotī”ti vuttattā dvinnaṃ balaṃ gahetvā tatiyo ce māreti āpajjati viya dissati,
tika-vin06t:608_5: “Dve mārentū”ti vutte ekena vā dvīhi vā mārite pārājikanti “dvinnaṃ pahārānaṃ maraṇe sati dve māritā nāma honti,
tika-vin06t:612_1: Catutthe vaggu ca sā modayati ca satteti vaggumudā.
tika-vin06t:612_3: tassa vaggu ca sā pasannasuddhataraṅgasamiddhattā sukhumā cāti attho jīvitavaggutthanitā jīvitatthanti nīluppalantiādīsu viya.
tika-vin06t:612_4: Madassāti ca bahukhajjabhojjapānādisamiddhā nadī chaṇadivasesūti nirutti veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:612_5: Vaggu parisuddhāti lokena sammatāti kira attho.
tika-vin06t:613_1: Vaṇṇavā vaṇṇavanto vaṇṇavantānītipi sijjhati kira bahuvacanena.
tika-vin06t:615_1: Padabhājane “tisso vijjā”ti vuttattā arūpāvacarajjhānāni paṭikkhittānīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:615_6: tasmā eva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vijjāsīsena padabhājanaṃ vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:617_1: Anāgate uppajjanakarāgādīnaṃ kāraṇattā rāgādayova nimittaṃ nāma.
tika-vin06t:617_2: Tissannañca vijjānaṃ aññataraṃ sandhāya “vijjānaṃ lābhīmhī”ti bhaṇati,
tika-vin06t:617_5: taṃkhaṇattā uttarimanussadhammappavatti na hotīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:617_10: tāva vipassanāñāṇassa lābhīmhī’ti vadanto yadi lokuttaraṃ sandhāya vadati,
tika-vin06t:617_13: “Avisesenāpi vadato pārājikaṃ vuttanti lokuttaraṃ sandhāya vadato ‘pārājika’nti vattuṃ yujjati.
tika-vin06t:617_14: Yathā kiṃ ‘vijjānaṃ lābhīmhī’ti bhaṇantopi pārājikamevā’ti vuttaṭṭhāne vatthuvijjādīnaṃ sambhavepi tāsaṃ anadhippetattā pārājikaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:617_16: Na sakkā aññaṃ pamāṇaṃ kātunti attano guṇamārocetukāmo lokiyena sammissaṃ atthapaṭisambhidaṃ vadato pārājikanti pamāṇaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin06t:617_19: tasmā vijjānidassanaṃ idha anidassanaṃ sāsane vatthuvijjādīnaṃ vijjāvidhānābhāvā.
tika-vin06t:617_20: Bhagavatā vibhattakhettapade vā tesaṃ pariyāyavacanānaṃ anāmaṭṭhattā na sakkā aññaṃ pamāṇaṃ kātu”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:617_21: “Paṭisambhidānaṃ lābhīmhī’ti vutte pariyāyena vuttattā thullaccayaṃ yutta”nti vadanti,
tika-vin06t:617_23: Vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbanti “yo te vihāre vasatī”tiādīhi saṃsandanato pariyāyavacanattā thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:617_24: “Nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjāmī’ti vā ‘lābhīmhāhaṃ tassā’ti vā vadatopī”ti vuttavacanampi “sace panassevaṃ hotī”tiādivacanampi atthato ekameva,
tika-vin06t:617_25: sopi hi attano visesaṃ ārocetumeva vadati.
tika-vin06t:617_29: tasmā pārājikaṃ āpajjituṃ yuttaṃ viyā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:617_31: tasmā pariyāyena vuttattā na hotī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin06t:618_1: taṃ pana yasmā maggena vinā natthi.
tika-vin06t:618_6: tasmā “rāgā me cittaṃ vinīvaraṇa”ntiādīni vadato pārājikamevāti.
tika-vin06t:618_12: samāpanno”tiādinā vuttattā “atītattabhāve sotāpannomhī”ti vadatopi hotūti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:618_16: Atītattabhāvo hi pariyāyena vuttattā “thullaccaya”nti vuttanti ācariyā.
tika-vin06t:619_5: samāpannoti imesaṃ kiñcāpi atthato kālaviseso natthi,
tika-vin06t:623_1: tena “viññattipathamatikkamitvā ṭhito bhikkhu dibbāya sotadhātuyā sutvā jānāti,
tika-vin06t:623_3: Jhānaṃ kira samāpajjinti ettha so ce “esa bhikkhu attano guṇadīpanādhippāyena evaṃ vadatī”ti jānāti,
tika-vin06t:626_3: sakkā puthujjanena adhivāsetu’nti vatthunā saṃsanditvā gahetabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:629_1: Dukkara āgāra āvaṭakāma abhirativatthūsu “yadi ullapanādhippāyo bhaveyya,
tika-vin06t:629_6: Yānena vā iddhiyā vā gacchantopi pārājikaṃ nāpajjatīti padasā gamanavaseneva katikāya katāya yujjati.
tika-vin06t:629_7: “Apubbaṃacarimaṃ gacchantoti hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā aññamaññassa hatthaṃ gaṇhanto viya gacchanto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:629_8: Uṭṭhetha etha gacchāmāti evaṃ sahagamane pubbāparā gacchantopi nāpajjatīti ācariyassa takko.
tika-vin06t:629_9: Vasantassāti tathā vasanto ce upāsakena dissati,
tika-vin06t:630_0: 228. Idhāti “ko nu kho”tiādinā vutte pañhākamme. Dhammadhātu sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ.
tika-vin06t:631_2: Tasmā antarābhavabhūtā ekā eva jātīti paṭivijjhatīti attho.
tika-vin06t:633_3: lambiādayo ca cattāro paṭhamapārājikaṃ āpannā evāti katvā kuto catuvīsatīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:633_5: Mātughātakādayo hi cattāro idhānupasampannā eva adhippetā,
tika-vin06t:633_7: yasmā ekena pariyāyena methunadhammapaṭisevino na honti,
tika-vin06t:633_9: “Ekakammaṃ ekuddeso samasikkhatā”ti evaṃ vuttasaṃvāsassa abhabbatāmattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “yathā pure tathā pacchā”ti.
tika-vin06t:638_2: “yo pana bhikkhū”ti kārako idha kasmā na niddiṭṭhoti? Abhi-
tika-vin06t:638_6: vaṇādīsu thullaccayavatthūsu ca upakkamantassa sukkavissaṭṭhiyā satipi na saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin06t:638_9: Tasmā tadatthadassanatthaṃ idha kārako na niddiṭṭho,
tika-vin06t:638_10: aññathā “yo pana bhikkhu sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ āpajjeyyā”ti kārake niddiṭṭhe “ceteti na upakkamati muccati,
tika-vin06t:638_12: “Sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā aññatra supinantā”ti bhumme niddiṭṭhepi sova virodho āpajjati,
tika-vin06t:638_13: tasmā tadubhayavacanakkamaṃ avatvā “sañcetanikā sukkavissaṭṭhi aññatra supinantā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:638_14: Tattha nimittatthe bhummavacanābhāvato hetutthaniyamo na kato hoti.
tika-vin06t:638_15: Tasmiṃ akate sañcetanikā sukkavissaṭṭhi aññatra supinantā saṅghādisesāpatti,
tika-vin06t:638_16: upakkame asati anāpattīti ayamattho dīpitoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:639_1: Sañcetanikāti ettha paṭhamaviggahena upasaggassa sātthakatā dassitā,
tika-vin06t:639_11: tasmā pana ṭhānā cutamatte hotū”ti gaṇṭhipade likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:639_15: nimitte upakkamaṃ katvā sukkaṃ ṭhānā cāvetvā puna vippaṭisāravasena dakasotorohaṇaṃ nivāretuṃ adhivāsemīti.
tika-vin06t:639_16: Tato bahi nikkhamante adhivāsetuṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin06t:639_17: tathāpi adhivāsanādhippāyena adhivāsetvā antarā dakasotato uddhaṃ nivāretuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya “anikkhante vā”ti vuttaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:639_18: Ṭhānā cutañhi avassaṃ dakasotaṃ otaratīti aṭṭhakathādhippāyo gaṇṭhipadādhippāyena sameti.
tika-vin06t:639_21: tato “bahi nikkhante vā anikkhante vā”ti vacanaṃ virujjheyya.
tika-vin06t:639_22: Yasmā pana tamhā tamhā sarīrapadesā cutaṃ avassaṃ dakasotaṃ otarati,
tika-vin06t:639_26: Mocanassādena nimitte upakkamato sukkaṃ bahutarampi sarīrapadesā cutaṃ tattha tattha laggāvasesaṃ yattakaṃ ekā khuddakamakkhikā piveyya,
tika-vin06t:639_29: Tattakassa bahi nikkhamanaṃ asallakkhento “ceteti upakkamati na muccati,
tika-vin06t:639_30: āpatti thullaccayassā”ti vacanato thullaccayanti saññāya desentopi na muccati,
tika-vin06t:639_31: passāvampi vaṇṇataṃ passitvā vatthikosagatassa picchilatāya vā ñatvā saṅghādisesato vuṭṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:639_34: tesampi dakasotorohaṇaṃ nimitte upakkamananti ayaṃ dutiyo vinicchayo sādhāraṇato ettha,
tika-vin06t:640_0: Ṭhānā cutañhi avassaṃ dakasotaṃ otaratīti katvā “ṭhānā cāvanamattenevettha āpatti veditabbā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:640_3: anotiṇṇe ṭhānā cutaṃ nāma na hotīti vīmaṃsitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:640_4: Ābhidhammikattā therassa “sukkavissaṭṭhi nāma rāgasamuṭṭhānā hotī”ti kathāvatthuṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā sambhavo cittasamuṭṭhāno,
tika-vin06t:640_6: ekadesaṃ aṅgajāte pakkhipī”ti vacanato utusamuṭṭhāno ca dissati,
tika-vin06t:640_9: anavakāso yaṃ arahato asuci mucceyyā”ti vacanato.
tika-vin06t:640_10: Parūpāhāraṭṭhakathāyaṃ “atthi tassa āsayoti tassa sukkassa uccārapassāvānaṃ viya patiṭṭhānokāso atthī”ti canato tassa āsayoti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:640_13: kāyo”ti tidhā sukkassa ṭhānaṃ pakappenti ācariyā.
tika-vin06t:641_2: Pahīnavipallāsattāti ettha yaṃ kiñci supinantena sekkhaputhujjanā passanti,
tika-vin06t:641_8: aliko vāti katvā tañce sandhāya vuttaṃ siyā,
tika-vin06t:641_13: apassantopi hi passanto viya asuṇantopi suṇanto viya amunantopi munanto viya hoti.
tika-vin06t:641_17: Kammanimittagatinimittabhūtāni hi rūpanimittādīni bhavaṅgassa ārammaṇāni honti eva.
tika-vin06t:642_3: So hi rukkhasākhato patanabhayā abhikkhaṇaṃ ummīlati ca supati ca.
tika-vin06t:642_4: Manussā kiñcāpi punappunaṃ ummīlanti subyattataraṃ paṭibuddhā viya passanti,
tika-vin06t:642_5: atha kho paṭibuddhānaṃ punappunaṃ bhavaṅgotaraṇaṃ viya supinakālepi tesaṃ bhavaṅgotaraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:642_7: “Bhavaṅgacittena hi supatī”ti vacanato bhavaṅgotaraṇaṃ karajakāyassa nirussāhasantabhāvūpanissayattā “niddā”ti vuccati.
tika-vin06t:642_8: Sā karajakāyassa dubbalabhāvena supinadassanakāle bhavaṅgato uttaraṇe satipi nirussāhasantabhāvappattiyā “pavattatī”ti ca vuccati,
tika-vin06t:642_10: karajakāyassa nirussāhasantasabhāvappattito ca tannissitaṃ hadayavatthu na suppasannaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:642_12: Teneva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “svāyaṃ dubbalavatthukattā cetanāya paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhituṃ asamattho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:643_0: Gaṇṭhipade pana “dubbalavatthukattāti supine upaṭṭhitaṃ nimittampi dubbala”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:643_5: avatthukāya dubbalabhāvo na yujjati cetanāya avatthukāya bhāvanāpabhāvāyātirekabalasabbhāvato.
tika-vin06t:643_6: Bhāvanābalasamappitañhi cittaṃ arūpampi samānaṃ atibhāriyampi karajakāyaṃ gahetvā ekacittakkhaṇeneva brahmalokaṃ pāpetvā ṭhapeti.
tika-vin06t:643_7: Tappaṭibhāgaṃ anappitampi kāmāvacaracittaṃ karajakāyaṃ ākāse laṅghanasamatthaṃ karoti,
tika-vin06t:643_10: yena cittasseva ānubhāvoti paññāyeyya cittānubhāvena vā laddhāsevanādikiriyāvisesanibbattidassanato,
tika-vin06t:643_15: Yato dhammasaṅgahe upādāyarūpapāḷiyaṃ uddesārahaṃ na jātaṃ.
tika-vin06t:643_16: Anindriyattā hi taṃ kāyindriyassa anantaraṃ na uddiṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:643_17: vatthurūpattā ca avatthurūpassa jīvitindriyassa anantarampi na uddiṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:643_18: tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ “tassa asuppasannattā tannissitā ca cittappavatti asuppasannā hotī”ti,
tika-vin06t:643_23: Yasmā appaṭibuddhopi paṭibuddhaṃ viya attānaṃ maññatīti.
tika-vin06t:643_26: tāya samannāgato satto bhavaṅgato uttiṇṇo supinaṃ passati,
tika-vin06t:643_28: so sutto appaṭibuddho hotīti ayamattho sādhito hoti.
tika-vin06t:644_3: Yasmā pana niddākkhaṇe na paṭibuddho nāma hoti,
tika-vin06t:644_9: Aññathā ayaṃ neva sutto na paṭibuddho,
tika-vin06t:644_12: nāgasenattheravacanaṃ yutti cāti sabbaṃ aññamaññasaṃsanditaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:644_19: imassa phalabhūto karajakāyassa akalyatā’pacalāyikāsupi niddāviseso kāraṇopacārena “kapimiddha”nti pavuccati.
tika-vin06t:645_0: Yaṃ taṃ āpattivuṭṭhānanti ettha yena vinayakammena tato vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:645_2: Avayave samūhavohārena vāti ettha sākhacchedako rukkhacchedakoti vuccatītiādi nidassanaṃ,
tika-vin06t:645_4: Na ca mayāti vīmaṃsanapadassa tassa kiriyaṃ sandhāya,
tika-vin06t:645_5: mocane ca sanniṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya muccanapakatiyā cāti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:646_4: Supantassa cāti idaṃ kapimiddhapareto viya bhavaṅgasantatiṃ avicchinditvā supantaṃ sandhāya vuttanti,
tika-vin06t:647_3: Vālikāya vā “hatthikāmaṃ nassatī”ti ettha viya “āpatti tva”nti sabbattha pāṭho.
tika-vin06t:647_6: aṅgajātaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti āgatattā “vacīkamma”ntipi vattuṃ yuttaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin06t:647_7: Evaṃ sante aññaṃ “evaṃ karohī”ti āṇattiyāpi āpatti siyāti saṅkaraṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:651_2: “Vipariṇatena cittena mātugāmena saddhi”nti imināssa vāyāmo dassito.
tika-vin06t:651_8: “Kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjeyyā”ti imināssa vāyamato phassapaṭivijānanā dassitā hoti.
tika-vin06t:651_9: Vāyamitvā phassaṃ paṭivijānanto hi samāpajjati nāma.
tika-vin06t:651_14: Otiṇṇo vipariṇataṃ cittaṃ kūpādiṃ viya satto.
tika-vin06t:651_15: Atha vā “rāgato uttiṇṇo bhavissāmī”ti bhikkhubhāvaṃ upagato,
tika-vin06t:651_16: tato uttiṇṇādhippāyato vipariṇatena cittena hetubhūtena tameva rāgaṃ otiṇṇo.
tika-vin06t:651_19: Etena mātugāmassa sārattatā vā hotu virattatā vā,
tika-vin06t:651_21: na bhikkhunīnaṃ kāyasaṃsagge viya ubhinnaṃ sārattatāya payojanaṃ atthi.
tika-vin06t:652_15: kintu “kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjeyyā”ti padaṃ uddharitvā “ajjhācāro vuccatī”ti ubhinnampi padānaṃ sāmaññabhājanīyattā,
tika-vin06t:652_16: samāpajjitabbābhāve samāpajjanābhāvena “so atthato ajjhācāro hotī”ti vuttaṃ siyā.
tika-vin06t:653_0: “Hatthaggāhaṃ vā”ti ettha hatthena sabbopi upādinnako kāyo saṅgahito,
tika-vin06t:653_2: Veṇiggahaṇena anupādinnako abhinnasantāno kesalomanakhadantādiko kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhāno gahitoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:653_3: Tenevāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “anupādinnakenapi kenaci kesādinā upādinnakaṃ vā anupādinnakaṃ vā phusantopi saṅghādisesaṃ āpajjatiyevā”ti.
tika-vin06t:653_6: Phassassa appaṭivijānanato duvaṅgasampattiyā dukkaṭa”nti iminā pāḷiaṭṭhakathānayena virujjhatīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:653_11: attano ca kāyapariyāpannānaṃ kesādīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ phuṭṭhabhāvaṃ phusitvā taṃ sādiyanaṃ phassaṃ paṭivijānāti nāma,
tika-vin06t:653_15: anupādinnakena vā kāyena bhikkhuno upādinnakakāye phuṭṭhe pasannakāyindriyo ce hoti,
tika-vin06t:653_17: teneva phassaṃ paṭivijānāti nāma so hoti.
tika-vin06t:653_20: timiravātena upahatakāyo vā tassa kāyaviññāṇaṃ nuppajjati.
tika-vin06t:653_21: Na ca tena phassaṃ paṭivijānāti nāma,
tika-vin06t:653_22: kevalaṃ sevanādhippāyena vāyamitvā kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjanto phassaṃ paṭivijānāti nāma manoviññāṇena,
tika-vin06t:653_23: tena vuttaṃ “kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjeyyāti imināssa vāyamato phassapaṭivijānanā dassitā”ti.
tika-vin06t:653_24: Aparopi bhikkhu mātugāmassa kāyapaṭibaddhena vā nissaggiyena vā phuṭṭho kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppādentena phassaṃ paṭivijānāti nāma,
tika-vin06t:653_26: Aparo vatthaṃ pārupitvā niddāyantaṃ mātugāmaṃ kāyasaṃsaggarāgena vatthassa uparibhāge saṇikaṃ phusanto
tika-vin06t:653_27: vatthantarena nikkhantalomasamphassaṃ appaṭivijānantopi sevanādhippāyo kāyena vāyamitvā phassaṃ paṭivijānāti nāma,
tika-vin06t:653_33: evaṃ duviññeyyādhippāyato ca mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ phassapaṭivijānanaṃ aṅgantveva na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:653_35: yaṃ bhikkhu saṅghādisesaṃ āpajjitvāpi nakhena lomena saṃsaggo diṭṭho,
tika-vin06t:653_36: na ca me lomaghaṭṭanena kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ,
tika-vin06t:653_37: timiravātathaddhagatto cāhaṃ na phassaṃ paṭivijānāmīti anāpannasaññī siyāti na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:653_39: na ca phassaṃ paṭivijānātī”ti ca etesaṃ padānaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayaṃ dassetvā so paññāpetabbo.
tika-vin06t:653_40: Ettāvatā na tadatthajānanatoti kāraṇaṃ vitthāritaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:655_1: “Rattaṃ cittaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetaṃ vipariṇata”nti kiñcāpi sāmaññena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:655_3: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vuttattā kāyasaṃsaggarāgeneva rattanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:655_4: Tathā “mātugāmo nāma manussitthī”ti kiñcāpi avisesena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:655_5: atha kho avinaṭṭhindriyāva manussitthī idhādhippetā “matitthiyā kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajji…pe…
tika-vin06t:655_7: “Manussitthī”ti ettāvatā siddhe “na yakkhī na petī na tiracchānagatā”ti vacanaṃ avinaṭṭhindriyāpi na sabbā manussaviggahā itthī idha manussitthī nāma.
tika-vin06t:655_8: Yakkhiādayo hi attano jātisiddhena iddhivisesena ijjhantiyo manussaviggahāpi hontīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:655_9: Tāsu yakkhī thullaccayavatthu hoti vinītavatthūsu yakkhiyā kāyasaṃsaggena thullaccayassa vuttattā.
tika-vin06t:655_14: Vibhaṅge pana “manussitthī ca hoti manussitthisaññī”ti pāḷiyā abhāvena “itthī ca hoti yakkhisaññī”tiādivacane sati yakkhiādīnaṃ anitthitāpasaṅgato,
tika-vin06t:655_15: “itthī ca hoti itthisaññī”tiādimhi yakkhiādīnaṃ antokaraṇe sati tāsaṃ saṅghādisesavatthubhāvappasaṅgato ca yakkhiādayo na vuttāti veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:655_19: ‘Itthī ca hoti tiracchānagatasaññīti tiracchānagatā ca hoti itthisaññī’tiādivāresupi pākatikatiracchānagatova adhippeto,
tika-vin06t:655_21: Teneva duṭṭhullavācāattakaāmapāricariyasikkhāpadesu manussapurisapaṭisaṃyuttavārā viya tiracchānapaṭisaṃyuttavārāpi nāgatā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:655_24: tasmā amanussitthī amanussapaṇḍako amanussapuriso tiracchānagatitthī tiracchānagatapaṇḍako manussāmanussatiracchānagataubhatobyañjanakā
tika-vin06t:655_37: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “nāgamāṇavikāyapi supaṇṇamāṇavikāyapi kinnariyāpi gāviyāpi dukkaṭamevā”ti vuttattā tadeva pamāṇato gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:656_2: tiracchānagatassa nisinnaparisāya pātimokkhaṃ uddisitabba”nti ettha “tiracchānagatoti yassa upasampadā
tika-vin06t:656_3: paṭikkhittā”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā tiracchānagatamanussaviggaho pākatikatiracchānagatato visiṭṭho,
tika-vin06t:656_4: tathā yakkhapetatiracchānagatamanussaviggahānaṃ “tiracchānagatassa ca dukkhuppattiyaṃ apica dukkaṭamevā”ti
tika-vin06t:656_6: na maraṇarūpa”nti ettha āpattivisesavacanato ca “ubhato avassute yakkhassa vā petassa vā paṇḍakassa vā
tika-vin06t:656_7: tiracchānagatamanussaviggahassa vā adhakkhakaṃ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati,
tika-vin06t:656_8: āpatti thullaccayassā”ti sāmaññena vacanato ca so visiṭṭhoti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:656_9: Visiṭṭhattā ca tiracchānagatamanussaviggahitthiyā kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjantassāti viseso hoti,
tika-vin06t:656_15: Itthī ca hoti tiracchānagato ca ubhinnaṃ itthisaññīti idha āgatattā purisaliṅganiddeso na yujjati,
tika-vin06t:656_17: tiracchānagatamanussaviggahitthiyā pāḷiyaṃ anāgatāyapi dukkaṭameva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattāti imassa vacanassa kāraṇacchāyā pariyesitabbāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:656_20: Idha tiracchānagatapurisapaṇḍakitthiyo tissopi ekato sampiṇḍetvā “tiracchānagato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:657_0: Tattha ca manussaviggahāmanussaviggahesu itthipaṇḍakapurisasaññitā yathāsambhavaṃ veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:657_4: Aññathā purisaṃ obhāsantassa ca anāpattīti paṇḍakaṃ obhāsantassa ca thullaccayanti mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:657_9: tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttameva pamāṇanti dvinnametesaṃ vādānaṃ yattha yutti vā kāraṇaṃ vā atirekaṃ dissati,
tika-vin06t:658_0: Tattha pāḷiyaṃ āgatavāragaṇanā tāva evaṃ saṅkhepato veditabbā –
tika-vin06t:658_1: itthimūlakā pañca vārā paṇḍakapurisatiracchānagatamūlakā ca pañca pañcāti vīsati vārā ekamūlakā,
tika-vin06t:658_5: Ekekasmiṃ vīsatike ekekamūlavāraṃ gahetvā kāyena kāyapaṭibaddhavārā tayo vuttā.
tika-vin06t:658_9: evaṃ kāyapaṭibaddhena kāyapaṭibaddhavārepi nissaggiyena kāyavārepi nissaggiyena kāyapaṭibaddhavārepi
tika-vin06t:658_10: nissaggiyena nissaggiyavārepi tayo tayo vārā vuttā,
tika-vin06t:658_12: Evaṃ channaṃ tikānaṃ vasena aṭṭhārasa vārā āgatāti sarūpato vuttā,
tika-vin06t:658_14: Tato paraṃ mātugāmassa sārattapakkhe kāyena kāyanti ekamekaṃ vaḍḍhetvā pubbe vuttā aṭṭhārasa vārā āgatāti ekavīsati vārā sarūpena āgatā,
tika-vin06t:658_16: Tato paraṃ āpattānāpattidīpakā cattāro sevanādhippāyamūlakā cattāro mokkhādhippāyamūlakāti dve catukkā āgatā.
tika-vin06t:659_2: tena yasmā āmasanādīni chupanapariyosānāni dvādasapi padāni gahitāni,
tika-vin06t:659_3: tasmā paduddhāraṃ akatvā “āmasanā parāmasanaṃ chupana”nti āha.
tika-vin06t:659_5: “Chupana”nti hi vutte parāmasanampi visuṃ ekattaṃ bhaveyyāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:659_6: Itthī ca hoti itthisaññī cāti imasmiṃ paṭhamavāre eva dvādasapi āmasanādīni yojetvā dassitāni.
tika-vin06t:659_7: Tato paraṃ ādimhi dve padānīti cattāri padāni āgatāni,
tika-vin06t:659_9: Nissaggiyena kāyavārādīsu pana sabbākārena alābhato āmasanamevekaṃ āgataṃ, netarāni.
tika-vin06t:659_12: Gaṇṭhipadesu pana “purimanayenevāti rajjuvatthādīhi parikkhipane”ti ca pacchā “purimanayenevāti sammasanā
tika-vin06t:659_13: hotī”ti ca “veṇiggāhe āpattiyā paññattattā lomaphusanepi saṅghādiseso”ti ca “taṃ pakāsetuṃ upādinnakena
tika-vin06t:660_1: “Sadisaṃ aggahesī”ti vutte tādisaṃ aggahesīti garukaṃ tattha kārayeti attho,
tika-vin06t:660_10: “Kāyasaṃsaggarāgaṃ vā sārattaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti virattaṃ mātaraṃ gaṇhi,
tika-vin06t:660_12: Ettha mahāsumattheravādena thullaccayaṃ “kāyaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti kāyappaṭibaddhaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin06t:660_15: bhikkhu ca naṃ itthiyā kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati,
tika-vin06t:660_18: etthapi saṅghādisesova khāyati “nīlaṃ ghaṭṭessāmī’ti kāyaṃ ghaṭṭeti,
tika-vin06t:660_20: Ettha pana “na pubbabhāge kāyasaṃsaggarāgattā”ti anugaṇṭhipade kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:660_21: Keci pana “garukāpattibhayena ‘nīlameva ghaṭṭessāmī’ti vāyāmanto kāyaṃ ghaṭṭeti,
tika-vin06t:660_22: pubbabhāge tassa ‘kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ ghaṭṭessāmī’ti pavattattā dukkaṭena bhavitabba”nti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:662_10: Suvaṇṇena saddhiṃ yojetvā pacitvāti suvaṇṇarasaṃ pakkhipitvā pacitvā.
tika-vin06t:665_0: “Bhesajjatthāya pana vaṭṭatī”ti vacanato mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayekadesopi anuññāto hotīti tattha tattha adhippāyaṃ ñatvā vibhāvetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:668_1: Tatiye tayo saṅghādisesavārā tayo thullaccayavārā tayo dukkaṭavārā tayo kāyapaṭibaddhavārāti dvādasa vārā sarūpena āgatā.
tika-vin06t:668_2: Tattha tayo saṅghādisesavārā dutiyasikkhāpade vuttāti tiṇṇaṃ vīsatikānaṃ ekekamūlā vārāti veditabbā,
tika-vin06t:668_3: tasmā idha visesāti paṇṇāsa vārā saṃkhittā honti,
tika-vin06t:668_4: aññathā itthī ca hoti vematiko sāratto ca,
tika-vin06t:668_5: bhikkhu ca naṃ itthiyā vaccamaggaṃ passāvamaggaṃ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati…pe…
tika-vin06t:668_7: Itthī ca hoti paṇḍakapurisasaññī tiracchānagatasaññī sāratto ca,
tika-vin06t:668_8: bhikkhu ca naṃ itthiyā vaccamaggaṃ passāvamaggaṃ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati akkosatipi,
tika-vin06t:668_10: Paṇḍako ca hoti paṇḍakasaññī sāratto ca,
tika-vin06t:668_11: bhikkhu ca naṃ paṇḍakassa vaccamaggaṃ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati,
tika-vin06t:668_12: āpatti thullaccayassāti evamādīnaṃ āpattiṭṭhānānaṃ anāpattiṭṭhānatā āpajjeyya,
tika-vin06t:668_14: paṇḍake itthisaññissa dukkaṭanti dīpetuṃ “itthī ca paṇḍako ca ubhinnaṃ itthisaññī āpatti saṅghādisesena
tika-vin06t:668_15: dukkaṭassā”ti vuttattā “paṇḍake paṇḍakasaññissa thullaccaya”nti vuttameva hoti,
tika-vin06t:668_18: Tathā “itthī ca hoti vematiko sāratto ca,
tika-vin06t:668_19: bhikkhu ca naṃ itthiyā vaccamaggaṃ passāvamaggaṃ ṭhapetvā adhakkhakaṃ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati…pe…
tika-vin06t:668_21: Tathā “itthī ca hoti vematiko sāratto ca,
tika-vin06t:668_22: bhikkhu ca naṃ itthiyā kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati…pe…
tika-vin06t:668_24: Kāyappaṭibaddhavārattikaṃ viya nissaggiyavārattikaṃ labbhamānampi āpattivisesābhāvato na uddhaṭaṃ.
tika-vin06t:668_25: Kāyappaṭibaddhavārattike pana dinnanayattā tampi tadanulomā vārā ca uddharitabbā.
tika-vin06t:670_3: Sīsaṃ na etīti akkosanaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin06t:670_6: imehi tīhi ghaṭite eva saṅghādiseso vaccamaggapassāvamaggānaṃ niyatavacanattā,
tika-vin06t:670_21: vepurisikāsīti etāneva padāni sakalasarīrasaṇṭhānabhedadīpakāni suddhāni saṅghādisesaṃ na janenti sakalasarīrasāmaññattā,
tika-vin06t:670_25: Ubhatobyañjanāsīti vacanaṃ pana purisanimittena asaṅghādisesavatthunā missavacanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:670_29: kathaṃ animittāsītiādipadāni na saṅghādisesaṃ janentīti eke,
tika-vin06t:670_32: “methunupasaṃhitāhi saṅghādiseso”ti mātikāya lakkhaṇassa vuttattā ca methunupasaṃhitāhipi obhāsane paṭivijānantiyā saṅghādiseso,
tika-vin06t:671_0: 287. Hasantoti yaṃ uddissa bhaṇati, sā ce paṭivijānāti, saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin06t:676_2: sesā sattapaññāsa vārā thullaccayadukkaṭāpattikāya saṃkhittāti veditabbā,
tika-vin06t:676_3: tato aññataro asambhavato idha na uddhaṭo.
tika-vin06t:677_6: Evaṃ cattāri padāni dvinnaṃ viggahānaṃ vasena yojitānīti apare vadantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:678_1: Etesu sikkhāpadesu methunarāgena vītikkame sati saṅghādisesena anāpatti.
tika-vin06t:678_3: Methunadhamma”nti idaṃ kevalaṃ methunadhammassa vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:678_9: Yā mādisaṃ sīlavanta”nti ca vuttattāti eke.
tika-vin06t:678_12: Gaṇṭhipade pana “imasmiṃ sikkhāpadadvaye kāyasaṃsagge viya yakkhipetīsu duṭṭhullattakāmavacane thullaccaya’nti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:681_0: 297. Ahamhi duggatāti ahaṃ amhi duggatā. Ahaṃ khvayyoti ettha ayyoti bahuvacanaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:685_0: Taṃ kiriyaṃ sampādessatīti avassaṃ ārocentiyā ce ārocetīti attho.
tika-vin06t:685_4: Taṃ “mātādīnampi vadato visaṅketo natthī”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanato nippayojanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:685_6: Māturakkhitaṃ brūhīti pesitassa gantvā mātāpiturakkhitaṃ vadato tassa tassā māturakkhitabhāvepi sati visaṅketameva, kasmā?
tika-vin06t:685_7: “Piturakkhitādīsu aññataraṃ vadantassa visaṅketa”nti vuttattā itarathā ādi-
tika-vin06t:685_9: Ekaṃ dasakaṃ itarena dasakena yojetvā pubbe sukkavissaṭṭhiyaṃ vuttanayattā māturakkhitāya mātā attano dhītusantikaṃ pahiṇatīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:687_1: Catutthe anāpattīti ettha pana “paṭiggaṇhāti na vīmaṃsati na paccāharati,
tika-vin06t:687_3: āgacchanto visaṃvādetī’ti anāpattipāḷiyāpi bhavitabbanti dassanatthaṃ vutta”nti vadanti,
tika-vin06t:689_4: Kiñcāpi ettha “itthī nāma manussitthī na yakkhī na petī na tiracchānagatā,
tika-vin06t:689_5: puriso nāma manussapuriso na yakkho”tiādi natthi,
tika-vin06t:689_6: tathāpi kāyasaṃsaggādīsu “manussitthī”ti itthīvavatthānassa katattā idhāpi manussitthī evāti paññāyati.
tika-vin06t:689_12: “Lekhaṃ netvā paṭilekhaṃ ārocitassāpi sañcarittaṃ natthi sañcarittabhāvamajānantassā”ti vadanti,
tika-vin06t:692_10: tathāpi yaṃ vatthuvasena appaṃ hutvā agghavasena mahā haritālahiṅgulikādi,
tika-vin06t:693_0: 344. So kirāti isi. Tadā ajjhagamā tadajjhagamā.
tika-vin06t:694_11: “kārayamānenā”ti hi byañjanaṃ “karontenā”ti vutte vilomitaṃ hoti atadatthattā.
tika-vin06t:694_14: Evaṃ sante ‘karontena vā kārāpentena vā’ti vacanato karontenāpi parehi vippakataṃ vattabbanti ce,
tika-vin06t:694_17: “Āyāmato ca vitthārato cā”ti avatvā vikappatthassa vā-
tika-vin06t:694_18: saddassa gahitattā ekatobhāgepi vaḍḍhite āpatti eva.
tika-vin06t:694_20: “‘Catuhatthavitthārā’ti vacanena ‘tiriyaṃ tihatthā vā’ti vacanampi sameti ‘yattha pamāṇayutto’tiādisanniṭṭhānavacanāsambhavato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:694_21: Pamāṇato ūnatarampīti vitthārato catupañcahatthampi dīghato anatikkamitvā vuttapamāṇameva desitavatthu.
tika-vin06t:694_23: Pamāṇātikkantā kuṭi eva pamāṇātikkantaṃ kuṭiṃ kareyyāti vuttattā.
tika-vin06t:695_4: akaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ vā dhammagandhikā hatthapādacchindanakā gandhikā”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:695_5: Dvīhi balibaddehīti heṭṭhimakoṭiyā kira vuttato āvijjituṃ na sakkā chinnāvaṭattā,
tika-vin06t:695_13: Tasminti dvārabandhane vā vātapāne vā ṭhapite.
tika-vin06t:695_14: Paṭhamamevāti ettha pattakāle evāti kira dhammasiritthero.
tika-vin06t:695_16: Purimena lepassa aghaṭitattā dutiyena vattasīsena katattā ubhinnampi anāpatti.
tika-vin06t:695_18: “karoti vā kārāpeti vā”ti vacanato āpatti ubhinnaṃ sati attuddesikatāya,
tika-vin06t:695_20: Heṭṭhimappamāṇasambhave sati sabbamattikāmayaṃ kuṭiṃ karoto āpatti dukkaṭena saṅghādisesoti ācariyassa takko.
tika-vin06t:696_1: Chattiṃsa catukkāni nāma adesitavatthukacatukkaṃ desitavatthukacatukkaṃ pamāṇātikkantacatukkaṃ pamāṇikacatukkaṃ
tika-vin06t:696_6: saṅghādiseso”ti mātikāyaṃ avisesena vuttattā sārambhaaparikkamanepi saṅghādisesovāti micchāgāhavivajjanatthaṃ āpattibhedo dassito,
