tika-vin06t:696_8: Vibhaṅge evaṃ avatvā kimatthaṃ mātikāyaṃ dukkaṭavatthu vuttanti ce?
tika-vin06t:696_12: itarasmiṃ “sārambhe ce bhikkhu vatthusmiṃ aparikkamane”ti evaṃ ānisaṃsavasena āgatattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:696_20: atthi anārambhaṃ aparikkamananti bahuvidhattā vatthu desetabbaṃ anārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ,
tika-vin06t:696_24: Vatthudesanāya hi garukāpattipaññāpanahetuttā akataviññatti gihīnaṃ pīḷājananena attadukkhaparadukkhahetubhūto
tika-vin06t:696_25: ca sārambhabhāvoti ete vatthudesanāpadesena upāyena parivajjitā honti.
tika-vin06t:696_26: Na hi bhikkhu akappiyakuṭikaraṇatthaṃ gihīnaṃ vā pīḷānimittaṃ sārambhavatthu.
tika-vin06t:696_27: Kuṭikaraṇatthaṃ vā vatthuṃ desentīti paṭhamameva sādhitametaṃ.
tika-vin06t:698_4: “Kukkuṭacchikagehaṃ vaṭṭatīti vatvā puna chadanaṃ daṇḍakehītiādinā nayena taṃ dassentehi tiṇapaṇṇacchadanākuṭikāva vuttā.
tika-vin06t:698_5: Tattha chadanaṃ daṇḍakehi dīghato tiriyañca jālaṃ viya bandhitvā tiṇehi vā paṇṇehi vā chādetuṃ ullittādibhāvo chadanameva sandhāya vuttoti yuttamidaṃ.
tika-vin06t:698_6: Tasmā mattikāmayaṃ bhittiṃ vaḍḍhāpetvā upari ullittaṃ vā avalittaṃ vā ubhayaṃ vā bhittiyā ghaṭitaṃ karontassa
tika-vin06t:698_13: “Āpatti kārukānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dukkaṭāna”ntiādimhi so suṇātichakkampi labbhati.
tika-vin06t:698_19: “Kuṭiṃ karothā”ti avisesena vuttaṭṭhāne pana āṇāpakassāpi saṅghādiseso acittakattā sikkhāpadassa.
tika-vin06t:699_0: Ahañca vasissāmīti ettha parassa yassa kassaci uddiṭṭhassa abhāvā āpatti eva “karontassa vā”ti niyamitattā,
tika-vin06t:699_3: Anugaṇṭhipade pana ahañca vasissāmīti ettha yo “mayhaṃ vāsāgārañca bhavissatī”ti icchati,
tika-vin06t:699_7: tasmā “ubhayaṃ sametī”ti vatvā ca “vinayavinicchaye āgate garuke ṭhātabba”nti vacanato mahāpaccarivādato itaro pacchā vattabboti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:699_11: bhojanasālādīnampi atthāya iminā katattā saṅkarā jātā. Yathā –
tika-vin06t:699_15: idaṃ uposathāgāra”nti vibhajitvā katepi āpatti eva.
tika-vin06t:699_17: tasmā “pacchā vutto”tiādinā atīva papañcitaṃ. Kiṃ tena.
tika-vin06t:699_18: “Attanā vippakataṃ attanā ca parehi ca pariyosāpetī”tiādinā nayena aparānipi catukkāni yathāsambhavaṃ yojetvā dassetabbāni,
tika-vin06t:705_7: kenaci kevalo navalokuttaradhammoti evaṃ visuṃ visuṃ yathāsambhavaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:706_1: “Ye te bhikkhū suttantikā”tiādivacanato dharamānepi bhagavati piṭakattayaparicchedo atthīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:706_2: Dhammakathikāti ābhidhammikā ratiyā acchissantītiādi āyasmato dabbassa nesaṃ tiracchānakathāya ratiniyojanaṃ viya dissati,
tika-vin06t:706_6: tato nesaṃ sāmaññā cāvanañca parivajjanto evaṃ cintesīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:706_9: “Sādhakatamaṃ karaṇa”nti evaṃ vutte karaṇattheyeva tatiyāvibhattīti attho.
tika-vin06t:707_4: “Bhariyaṃ viya maṃ ajjhācaratī”ti vadantiyā balavatī codanā.
tika-vin06t:707_5: Tena hīti ettha yathā chupanamatte vippaṭisārīvatthusmiṃ kāyasaṃsaggarāgasambhavā apucchitvā eva saṅghādisesaṃ paññāpesi,
tika-vin06t:707_6: tatheva pubbevassā dussīlabhāvaṃ ñatvā vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:708_0: Atha appaṭiññāyāti “ayyenamhi dūsitā”ti imaṃ paṭiññaṃ vinā eva tassā pakatidussīlabhāvaṃ sandhāya nāsitā,
tika-vin06t:708_2: Abhayagirivāsinopi attano suttaṃ vatvā “tumhākaṃ vāde thero kārako”ti vadanti, kasmā?
tika-vin06t:708_8: “Sakāya paṭiññāya nāsethā”ti vutte pana apārājikāpi attano vacanena nāsetabbā jātāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:708_9: Mahāvihāravāsinopi attano suttaṃ vatvā “tumhākaṃ vāde thero kārako”ti ca vadanti. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:708_10: “Sakāya paṭiññāya nāsethā”ti hi vutte paṭiññāya bhūtatā āpajjati “nāsethā”ti vacanato.
tika-vin06t:709_8: “Catunnaṃ aññatarenā”ti pātimokkhuddese eva āgate gahetvā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:709_9: itaresaṃ aññatarenāpi anuddhaṃsentassa saṅghādisesovāti no takkoti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:709_14: sutaparisaṅkitaṃ vā diṭṭhādīhi codite vā codāpite vā sīsaṃ eti eva amūlakena coditattā.
tika-vin06t:709_18: “Asuddho hoti puggalo aññataraṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpanno,
tika-vin06t:709_19: tañce asuddhadiṭṭhi samāno anokāsaṃ kārāpetvā cāvanādhippāyo vadeti,
tika-vin06t:709_24: Diṭṭhassa hoti pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjanto nāma asuddho puggalo hoti,
tika-vin06t:709_25: “aññatarasmiṃ asuddhadiṭṭhi samāno tañce codeti ‘suto mayā pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpannosī’ti,
tika-vin06t:709_26: āpatti vācāya vācāya saṅghādisesassā”ti vacanato purimanayenāpatti.
tika-vin06t:709_28: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato pacchimanayena saṅghādisesena āpattīti dve pāḷinayā aññamaññaṃ viruddhā viya dissanti,
tika-vin06t:709_31: Aṭṭhakathācariyā tāvāhu “samūlakena vā saññāsamūlakena vā codentassa anāpatti,
tika-vin06t:709_32: amūlakena vā pana saññāamūlakena vā codentassa āpattī”ti.
tika-vin06t:709_34: dassanasavanaparisaṅkanamūlena samūlakena vā tadabhāvena amūlakenāpi saññāsamūlakena vā codentassa anāpatti,
tika-vin06t:709_35: dassanādimūlābhāvena amūlakena vā tabbhāvena samūlakenāpi saññāamūlakena vā codentassa āpatti,
tika-vin06t:710_0: Pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjantotiādimhi dassanamūlena samūlakenāpi “suto mayā”ti vacanato saññāamūlakena vā codeti,
tika-vin06t:710_2: Tadatthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ “diṭṭhe vematiko”tiādi vārā vuttāti veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:711_2: Evamevaṃ pana tadatthadīpanatthaṃ te vārā vuttā.
tika-vin06t:711_3: Tattha hi “adiṭṭhassa hotī”tiādivārā amūlakena codentassa āpatti hotīti dassanatthaṃ vuttā.
tika-vin06t:711_4: “Diṭṭhe vematiko”tiādinā saññāamūlakena codentassa āpatti hotīti dassanatthaṃ vuttā.
tika-vin06t:711_8: yathā asuddhaṃ puggalaṃ anokāsaṃ kārāpetvā codentassa dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin06t:711_10: tathā asuddhadiṭṭhikopi asuddhaṃ asuddhadiṭṭhi amūlakena codeti, āpatti.
tika-vin06t:711_12: anāpattīti taṃ sanniṭṭhānaṃ yathā “anāpatti suddhe asuddhadiṭṭhissa asuddhe asuddhadiṭṭhissā”ti iminā saṃsandati,
tika-vin06t:712_2: tasmā ukkaṭṭhanaye vidhiṃ sandhāya therena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:712_5: tesaṃ sutvā bhikkhū eva vicāretvā tassa paṭiññāya kārenti.
tika-vin06t:712_6: Ko ettha dosoti idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:712_7: Tatiyena titthiyānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvāpi bhikkhū eva vicārenti,
tika-vin06t:712_8: tasmā na koci na labhatīti evaṃ sabbaṃ sametīti apare”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:713_5: Yā vacīghosārammaṇassa sotadvārappavattaviññāṇasantānassa anantaraṃ uppannena upaladdhapubbasaṅketena manodvāraviññāṇena viññāyati,
tika-vin06t:713_6: yassā viññātattā tadattho paramattho vā aparamattho vā tatiyavāraṃ uppannena manoviññāṇena viññāyatīti nāmādīhi chahi byañjanehi pāḷiyā pakāsitā,
tika-vin06t:713_10: adhikaraṇe pavattattā ca adhikaraṇo mañcaṭṭhe mañcopacāro viyāti ca.
tika-vin06t:713_20: Pubbe vuttasamathehīti “yaṃ adhikicca samathā vattantī”ti vuttasamathehīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:713_23: Na hi vivādādīnaṃ paṇṇatti adhikaraṇaṭṭhoti paṇṇattiṃ adhikicca samathā na pavattanti,
tika-vin06t:713_24: tasmā na tassā adhikaraṇīyatāti na vivādādīnaṃ paṇṇatti adhikaraṇaṭṭhoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:723_1: Sutādīnaṃ abhāvena amūlakattanti ettha yo disvāpi “diṭṭhosi mayā”ti vattuṃ asakkonto attano diṭṭhaniyāmeneva “sutosi mayā”ti vadati.
tika-vin06t:723_3: idha pana yo pubbe sutvā anāpatti,
tika-vin06t:723_4: pacchā taṃ vissaritvā suddhadiṭṭhi eva samāno vadati,
tika-vin06t:723_10: Tena vematikova nassarati sammuṭṭho nāmāti āpajjati,
tika-vin06t:724_4: Asūriyaṃ passati kaññāti ettha yathā kaññā sūriyaṃ na passatīti bhavati,
tika-vin06t:724_5: evaṃ “anokāsaṃ kāretvā”ti vutte okāsaṃ na kāretvāti hoti.
tika-vin06t:727_1: Veḷuvaneyevāti idaṃ tehi vuttavelaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:727_2: “Pubbe mayaṃ āvuso sutena avocumhā”ti “amhehi sā ussāhitā kupitehi anattamanehī”tiādivacanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:727_3: aññabhāgassa idanti manussabhikkhubhāvato aññabhāgassa tiracchānachagalakabhāgassa idaṃ chagalakajātaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin06t:727_4: Aññabhāgo vā assa atthīti so tiracchānachagalakabhāvasaṅkhāto aññabhāgo assa chagalakassa atthīti svāyaṃ chagalako aññabhāgiyaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ nāma.
tika-vin06t:728_2: paṭhamaṃ panettha nibbacanaṃ jātipadatthotivādīnaṃ matena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:728_5: Tabbiparītakattā byattākati jātiyo tu padattho iti imassa suttassa vasena dutiyaṃ nibbacanaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:728_9: Na hi taṃ nāmaṃ kacchapalomaṃ viya anādhāranti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:728_10: Taṃ pana chagalakassa dabboti dinnanāmaṃ “deso”ti vuccati.
tika-vin06t:728_11: Tasmā theraṃ amūlakenātiādinā aññampi vatthuṃ therassa lissati silissati vohāramatteneva,
tika-vin06t:728_15: tasmā “kañcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāyā”ti uddharitvā “dasa lesā jātileso”tiādi vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:728_19: Kañcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāyāti dabboti nāmaṃ upādāyāti ayamattho aṭṭhuppattivaseneva āvibhūto,
tika-vin06t:728_22: Na hi mettiyabhūmajakānaṃ viya sabbesampi chagalakameva aññabhāgiyaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:728_24: na ca mettiyabhūmajakā viya sabbepi nāmalesamattameva upādiyanti.
tika-vin06t:728_26: tasmā aniyamattā ca yathāvuttanayena na vibhattaṃ.
tika-vin06t:728_27: Kiñca bhiyyo tathā vutte chagalakasseva aññabhāgiyatā sambhavati,
tika-vin06t:728_32: yena sova dassitoti evaṃ micchāgāhappasaṅgato ca tathā na vibhatto.
tika-vin06t:729_2: Adhikaraṇassāti manussassa vā amanussassa vā tiracchānagatassa vāti evaṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:729_3: Evañhi vutte manussādīnaṃyeva jātilesādayo vuttā honti,
tika-vin06t:729_4: aññathā catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ te āpajjanti “adhikaraṇassa kañci desaṃ lesamatta”nti sāmivacanaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ uddiṭṭhattāti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:729_7: Niyame ca sati jātiyā ādhāro jāti,
tika-vin06t:729_11: yena adhikaraṇasaṅkhyaṃ gaccheyyāti āpajjatīti adhikaraṇassāti padaṃ abhājetabbameva bhaveyyāti na uddharitabbaṃ siyā,
tika-vin06t:729_15: Jānitabbā ca vinayadharehi yasmā aññathā parivāre “vivādādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ vivādādhikaraṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:729_16: bhajatī”tiādinā nayena anāgataṭṭhāne “kasmā”ti vutte kāraṇaṃ na paññāyeyya,
tika-vin06t:729_17: tasmā tesaṃ tabbhāgiyatā ca aññabhāgiyatā ca jānitabbā vinayadharehi.
tika-vin06t:729_18: Tāsu hi viññātāsu vivādādhikaraṇaṃ vivādādhikaraṇaṃ bhajati. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:729_20: Itaraṃ na bhajati aññabhāgiyattāti sukhakāraṇato paññāyanti,
tika-vin06t:729_24: tasmā taṃ adhikaraṇapariyāpannampi samānaṃ visuṃ vuttaṃ “āpattaññabhāgiyaṃ vā hotī”ti.
tika-vin06t:729_25: Adhikaraṇapariyāpannattā ca “adhikaraṇaññabhāgiyaṃ vā”ti ettha vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:729_27: mātikāyaṃ āgatattā ca paṭhamaṃ aññabhāgiyatā vuttā,
tika-vin06t:729_31: tasmā “adhikaraṇaṃ tabbhāgiyaṃ hotī”ti evaṃ uddesaṃ akatvā “kathaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ adhikaraṇassa tabbhāgiyaṃ hotī”ti pucchāpubbaṅgamaniddeso kato.
tika-vin06t:729_32: Tatthāpi āpattādhikaraṇassa aññabhāgiyatā kiñcāpi pārājikena anuddhaṃsibhādhikārattā pārājikānaṃyeva vasena vuttā,
tika-vin06t:729_34: Yā ca sā codanā “asuko nāma bhikkhu saṅghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hotī”tiādikā,
tika-vin06t:729_36: dubbhāsite saṅghādisesadiṭṭhi hotī”ti evamādikā vinaye apakataññutāya,
tika-vin06t:730_3: Tattha jhānādivatthuvisabhāgatāyapi sabhāvasarikkhatāya uttarimanussadhammapārājikāpatti tasseva tabbhāgiyāva hoti.
tika-vin06t:730_5: kiccādhikaraṇañca pāṭekkaṃ catubbidhampi vuttaññabhāgiyaṃ na jātaṃ,
tika-vin06t:730_6: tasmā tadaññabhāgiyatāya viditāya tabbhāgiyatā pāriyesayuttiyā avuttāpi sijjhatīti katvā “aññabhāgiyameva paṭhamaṃ niddiṭṭha”ntipi vattuṃ yujjati.
tika-vin06t:730_7: Ekaṃsena tabbhāgiyaṃ na hotīti sarikkhavasena arahattaṃ āpatti anāpattīti vivādasabbhāvato abyākatabhāvena vivādādhikaraṇassapi aññabhāgiyaṃ siyā,
tika-vin06t:730_12: Ayaṃ pana vatthusabhāgatāyapi sati āpattisabhāgatā sarikkhatoti no takkoti ca,
tika-vin06t:730_13: ekasmimpi hi vatthusmiṃ āpattibhedo hotīti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:731_2: Taṃ nissāyāti pubbeva hi saṃvidhāya saṅgho kammaṃ karoti.
tika-vin06t:731_3: Atha vā purimaṃ purimanti parivāsaukkhepaniyādīni saṅghakammāni nissāya abbhānaosāraṇādi uppannanti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:732_0: 394. Atthato ekaṃ, tasmā desassa atthamavatvā “leso”tiādi vuttaṃ kira.
tika-vin06t:733_1: Savatthukaṃ katvāti puggalassa upari āropetvā khattiyādibhāvena ekajātikopi dīgharassakāḷakodātādīnaṃ diṭṭhasutaparisaṅkitānaṃ vasena aññabhāgiyatā,
tika-vin06t:733_2: dīghaṃ khattiyaṃ ajjhācarantaṃ disvā rassādikhattiyapaññattiyā ādhārabhāvato jātilesena codeti,
tika-vin06t:733_3: ekaṃ vā khattiyaṃ ajjhācarantaṃ disvā tato visiṭṭhaññabhāgabhūtaṃ khattiyaṃ jātilesaṃ gahetvā “khattiyo
tika-vin06t:733_6: diṭṭhādayo ca jātināmādīnaṃ vatthubhūtattā adhikaraṇa”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:733_8: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “khattiyajātipaññattiyā ādhāravasena adhikaraṇatā ca veditabbā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:733_9: Tampi nāmagottato aññissā nāmagottapaññattiyā nāma kassaci abhāvato na sabbasādhāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin06t:733_12: Tattha dīghādino vā diṭṭhādino vāti ettha dīghāditā,
tika-vin06t:733_14: yo cuditako itarassa viseso yato aññoti vuccati.
tika-vin06t:734_2: Teneva ante taṃ dassentena “bhikkhu saṅghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:734_3: Āpattilesopi kimatthaṃ jātilesādayo viya na vitthāritoti ce?
tika-vin06t:735_4: “Leso nāma āpattibhāgo”ti vuttattā āpattibhāvaleso vuttoti veditabbo,
tika-vin06t:735_5: tasmā pārājikāpattito aññabhāgiyassa āpattipaññattiyā ādhāraṇaṭṭhena “adhikaraṇa”nti saṅkhyaṃ gatassa
tika-vin06t:735_6: saṅghādisesādino āpattinikāyassa āpattibhāvalesaṃ gahetvā codanā āpattilesacodanāti veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:736_1: Anāpatti tathāsaññī codeti vā codāpeti vāti āpattaññabhāgiyacodanāyameva,
tika-vin06t:736_6: Vuttañhi “tattha idha ca āpattaññabhāgiyacodanāya tathāsaññinopi anāpattī”ti.
tika-vin06t:737_0: Aññābhāgiyasikkhaṃ yo, neva sikkhati yuttito. Gacche vinayaviññūhi, aññabhāgiyatañca
tika-vin06t:742_7: Dasahi lesehi uddissa kataṃ samaṇā paribhuñjanti,
tika-vin06t:742_9: garahapaccayā loko vā apuññaṃ ariyūpavādaṃ pasaveyya,
tika-vin06t:742_12: Attano atthāya vātiādinā paresaṃ atthāya kate kappiyabhāvaṃ dassetvā bhikkhūnañca aññesañca atthāya kate
tika-vin06t:743_0: Yaṃ yaṃ hītiādi tassa kāraṇassa dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:743_1: Puna pañcannaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ atthāya kataṃ na kappatīti vuttanti kira dhammasiritthero.
tika-vin06t:743_2: Gaṇṭhipade “bhikkhūnameva suddhānaṃ atthāya kataṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:743_4: bhikkhūnaṃyeva atthāyāti iminā ‘bhikkhūnampi datvā mayaṃ bhuñjissāmā’ti katampi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:743_5: Puna ‘pañcasu ekaṃ uddissakataṃ itaresaṃ na kappatī’ti dassanatthaṃ ‘pañcasu hi sahadhammikesūtiādi vutta’nti vadantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:743_6: Aññatarasmiṃ pana gaṇṭhipade “amhākanti ca rājayuttādīnanti ca vutte vaṭṭatīti vatvā ‘tumhāka’nti avatvā
tika-vin06t:743_7: ‘petakiccatthāyāti vuttepi vaṭṭatī’ti ca dassetvā sabbattha vuttānaṃ,
tika-vin06t:743_15: ‘Sace petakiccatthāyāti vuttaṭṭhāne bhikkhūnaṃ bhojanaṃ sandhāya karontī’ti vadanti mahāaṭṭhakathāyañca
tika-vin06t:743_16: ‘tasmiṃ vāre ca na tumhākanti vutte vaṭṭatī’ti vuttattā.
tika-vin06t:743_18: maṅgalādīnaṃ vā atthāya katepi eseva nayo’ti pubbe vuttatthavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:743_20: ‘Kappiyamaṃsassa hi paṭiggahaṇe āpatti natthī’ti vacanena akappiyapaṭiggahaṇe āpattīti āpannaṃ,
tika-vin06t:744_2: Āpattibhayā katā lajjīhīti ettha āpattibhayena avassaṃ ārocentīti dassanatthaṃ “lajjī rakkhissatī”ti
tika-vin06t:744_4: Alajjissapi anārocentassa āpattiyeva “ye passanti ye suṇantī”ti vacanato.
tika-vin06t:745_3: Odissa anuññāto nāma ummattakakhittacittavedanaṭṭādiko “anāpatti ādikammikassā”ti ariṭṭhasikkhāpade āgatattā atthīti ce?
tika-vin06t:745_6: So vuccatīti tattha āgatopi sakammabyāvaṭopi evaṃ vuccati.
tika-vin06t:745_7: Etenupāyenāti asamanubhāsantassa ca ādikammikassa ca vuttatthavasena.
tika-vin06t:746_0: Tivaṅgikanti ettha vācāya eva paṭinissajjantassa oṭṭhacalanādikāyaviññatti hoti,
tika-vin06t:746_2: Vacībhedaṃ kātuṃ asakkontassa kāyavikāraṃ karontassa anāpattiyā bhavitabbaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:746_8: evaṃ santepi vikāraṃ akatvā citteneva vissajjentassa anāpattiyā bhavitabbanti? Taṃ na, kasmā?
tika-vin06t:746_9: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kāyavikāraṃ vā vacībhedaṃ vā akarontasseva pana āpajjanato akiriya”nti hi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:746_11: tasmā cittañca nāma viññattipaṭibaddhaṃ evāti visuṃ aṅgabhāveneva vuttattā jānitabbanti ce? Taṃ na,
tika-vin06t:746_13: tasmā cittena vissajjentassāpi āpatti viya dissati,
tika-vin06t:752_2: Ekato ussāreti ca giḷitato ṭhapeti ca.
tika-vin06t:752_3: Ekapaṃsuthupakanadīsaṅkhaṃ dīghamūlakapaṇṇasevālaṃ sevālaṃ daṇḍisipippariṃ paṇakaṃ pesiṭṭhiṃ nissāreti.
tika-vin06t:752_4: Tilabījakanti sukhumamūlapaṇṇakaṃ hutvā udakapiṭṭhe pattharikaṃ udakapappaṭakaṃ nissāreti.
tika-vin06t:753_3: “Kiṃ pubbepi mayaṃ evarūpaṃ karomātiādinā ekūnavīsatī”ti mahāpaccariyaṃ kira vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:756_3: Gāmañhi sandhāya parato “na assajipunabbasukehi bhikkhūhi kīṭāgirismiṃ vatthabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:757_2: Vedhimaṃ aññena kenaci pupphaṃ vedhetvā kataṃ.
tika-vin06t:757_3: Kaṇṭakampi bandhitunti ettha “sayaṃ vijjhanatthaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:757_8: Dhammarajju cetiyaṃ vā bodhiṃ vā pupphappavesanatthaṃ āvijjhitvā baddharajju.
tika-vin06t:757_10: Aṃsabhaṇḍikaṃ pasibbake pakkhittasadisattā vedhimaṃ na jātaṃ,
tika-vin06t:757_11: tasmā “sithilabaddhassa antarantarā pakkhipituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:757_15: “Geṇḍukharapattadāmānaṃ paṭikkhittattā celādīhi katadāmampi na vaṭṭati akappiyānulomattā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:758_2: “Sāriyo nāma rutasunakhā siṅgālakammakuruṅgakeḷipane ṭhitā”ti kira pāṭho.
tika-vin06t:760_1: “Gāme vā na vasitabba”nti imināva tasmiṃ gāme aññattha na vasitabbanti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:760_7: taṃ vihāraṃ ṭhapetvā aññasmiṃ vasituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin06t:760_9: “Gāme vā na vasitabba”nti vacanena yasmiṃ gāme kuladūsanakammaṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin06t:760_10: tasmiṃ vihārepi vasituṃ na labbhatīti āpannaṃ,
tika-vin06t:760_12: tena tasmiṃ gāme aññasmiṃ vasituṃ labbhatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:760_13: “Tasmiṃ vihāre vasantenā”ti iminā tasmiṃ gāme aññattha vasantena sāmantagāme piṇḍāya carituṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:760_14: Sāmantavihārepīti sāmantavihāro nāma tasmiṃyeva gāme tassa vihārassa sāmantavihāro ca tassa gāmassa sāmantavihāro cāti ubhayaṃ vuccati,
tika-vin06t:760_15: etena tasmiṃ gāme aññattha vasantena tasmiṃ gāme piṇḍāya na caritabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:760_18: tassa sāmantagāme kuladūsakavihārassa sāmantavatthuvihāre vasantena tasmiṃ gāmepi carituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:760_22: “Na nagare caritu”nti vuttattā aññasmiṃ vihāre tasmiṃ gāme vasituṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpitaṃ hotīti eke.
tika-vin06t:761_3: Tasseva na kappatīti ettha yāguādīni ānetvā “dadantū”ti icchāvasena vadati ce,
tika-vin06t:761_5: kevalaṃ pana suddhacittena attānaṃ vā paresaṃ vā anuddisitvā “ime manussā dānaṃ datvā puññaṃ pasavantū”ti
tika-vin06t:761_6: vadantassa tasseva na kappati yāguādīnaṃ paccayapaṭisaṃyuttakathāya uppannattā.
tika-vin06t:761_7: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyampi “pañcannampi sahadhammikāna”nti visesetvā avuttattā atthato sayamevāti apare.
tika-vin06t:766_4: vacanasāmaññato vuttaṃ duṭṭhullasāmaññato duṭṭhullārocanappaṭicchādanasikkhāpadesu pārājikavacanaṃ viya.
tika-vin06t:766_5: Tasmā “cakkhussa raheneva pana paricchedo kātabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:766_8: “alaṃkammaniyeti sakkā hoti methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitu”nti vacanato ca rahonisajjassādo cettha methunasannissitakileso,
tika-vin06t:766_11: Keci pana “tañca labbhatīti vacanassa dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:766_12: tena dutiye vuttā viññū paṭibalā gahitā hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:766_14: saddo “tena so bhikkhu kāretabbo vā”ti yojetabbo,
tika-vin06t:766_18: Tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “paṭijānamānova tena so bhikkhu kāretabbo…pe…
tika-vin06t:766_20: Tasmā eva pāḷiyaṃ tadatthadvayadassanatthaṃ “sā ce evaṃ vadeyyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:766_22: sesaṃ bhaṇantīti vādīnaṃ vādo paṭisedhito hoti.
tika-vin06t:766_24: Rakkheyyāsīti mama visesaṃ kassaci nāroceyyāsīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:767_1: “Sā ce evaṃ vadeyya ‘ayyassa mayā sutaṃ nisinnassa mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsentassā”’ti,
tika-vin06t:767_3: na adhippetañhetaṃ idha sotassa raho nādhippetoti katvāti ce?
tika-vin06t:767_5: na pana nālaṃkammaniyaṭṭhāne methunanti dassanatthaṃ vuttanti veditabbanti.
tika-vin06t:767_7: tathā “sā ce evaṃ vadeyya ‘ayyassa mayā sutaṃ mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantassā”’ti etampi idha labbhati,
tika-vin06t:767_9: Kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ idhāpi dutiyāniyatādhikāre pārājikāpattiñca parihāpetvā duṭṭhullavācāpattiyā vuttattā
tika-vin06t:767_12: Gaṇṭhipade ca “idha sikkhāpade methunakāyasaṃsaggarahonisajjānamevāgatattā cakkhussarahova pamāṇa”nti likhitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:767_18: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamapārājikasadisānevā”ti vuttattāpi duṭṭhullavādo na sundaro “tadahujātā”ti vuttattāti.
tika-vin06t:770_1: Dutiye kesuci potthakesu “na heva kho pana paṭicchannaṃ āsanaṃ hoti āsana”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:770_5: Yadi evaṃ “mātugāmo nāma viññū paṭibalā”ti kimatthaṃ vuttanti?
tika-vin06t:770_6: Ayameva hi mātugāmo dvinnampi kāyasaṃsaggaduṭṭhullavācānaṃ ekato vatthubhūto,
tika-vin06t:770_9: na itarassāti katvā duṭṭhullavācameva sandhāya tassā vatthuṃ dassento evamāha.
tika-vin06t:771_1: yathā paṭhame anadhippetāpi duṭṭhullavācā sambhavavisesadassanatthaṃ vuttā,
tika-vin06t:771_3: kasmā na tassa vasena cakkhussa raho gahetabboti?
tika-vin06t:771_8: Appaṭicchanne sati kathaṃ cakkhussa rahoti ce? Dūrattā.
tika-vin06t:771_9: Paṭhame kasmā itthisatampi anāpattiṃ na karoti,
tika-vin06t:771_16: Tasmā na methunassa mātugāmo dutiyo hoti.
tika-vin06t:771_19: Tathā “āyasmā udāyī tā itthiyo vihāraṃ pekkhāpetvā tāsaṃ itthīnaṃ vaccamagga”nti ettha “yā pana tā itthiyo hirimanā,
tika-vin06t:771_20: tā nikkhamitvā bhikkhū ujjhāpentī”ti vacanato duṭṭhullassa mātugāmo dutiyo hotīti siddhanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:771_21: Ubhayatthāpi ummattakādikammikānaṃ anāpattīti tesaṃ pāṭekkaṃ nidāne āgataṃ,
tika-vin06t:771_23: Anugaṇṭhipade pana “acelakavagge rahopaṭicchannāsanasikkhāpade ‘viññū puriso dutiyo hotī’ti imassa anurūpato
tika-vin06t:771_24: ‘itthīnaṃ satampi anāpattiṃ na karotī’ti vutta”nti ca,
tika-vin06t:771_26: acelakavagge appaṭicchannāsanasikkhāpadassa ca anāpattivāre ‘yo koci viññū puriso dutiyo’ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:771_27: Imesaṃ anurūpato vuttanti veditabba”nti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:774_2: idaṃ aniyatakaṇḍaṃ nippayojanaṃ apubbābhāvatoti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:774_4: Ettha hi “sā ce evaṃ vadeyya ‘ayyo mayā diṭṭho nisinno mātugāmassa methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto’ti,
tika-vin06t:774_7: nisajjāya kāretabbo”tiādinā āpattiyā garukāya lahukāya ca ropanakkamalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-vin06t:774_16: tasmā garukalahukānaṃ majjhe eva uddisitabbanti arahati ubhayāmissakattā.
tika-vin06t:774_20: tasmā garukānaṃ eva anantaraṃ uddiṭṭhātipi eke.
tika-vin06t:774_24: “Paṭicchanne āsane alaṃkammaniye”ti okāsaniyamato hi tabbiparīte okāse idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ na vikappitanti micchāgāho hoti,
tika-vin06t:774_33: paṭicchannepi vā nisinnāya vātapānakavāṭachiddādīhi nikkhantakesādiggahaṇena kāyasaṃsaggo labbhatīti evamādayopi nayā vitthārato veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:774_34: “Bhikkhupātimokkhe āgatanayattā bhikkhunīpātimokkhe idaṃ kaṇḍaṃ parihīnanti veditabba”nti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:774_42: kāyaṃ vā tadatthāya upasaṃhareyyā”ti vacanato sādiyanampi,
tika-vin06t:774_46: tathā “rattandhakāre appadīpe paṭicchanne okāse ekenekā santiṭṭheyya vā sallapeyya vā”ti vacanato duṭṭhullavācāpi
tika-vin06t:774_47: pācittiyavatthukanti katvā tāsaṃ aññathā aniyatakaṇḍassa avattabbatāpattitopi na vuttanti tesaṃ adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:780_5: Taṃ pana adhiṭṭhitassapi anadhiṭṭhitassapi nāmaṃ “ekarattampi ce bhikkhu ticīvarena vippavaseyyā”tiādīsu ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhitassa nāmaṃ.
tika-vin06t:780_10: “Bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ ticīvaraṃ anuññātaṃ hotī”ti ettha adhiṭṭhitameva.
tika-vin06t:780_15: Tena vuttaṃ “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū atirekacīvaraṃ dhāressantī”tiādi.
tika-vin06t:781_9: taṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”’nti evaṃ bhagavā paripuṇṇaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññāpesi.
tika-vin06t:781_11: tato paṭṭhāya bhikkhū idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine dasāha…pe…
tika-vin06t:781_14: Tathāpi kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ “dasāhaparamanti ayamettha anupaññattī”ti ettakaṃyeva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:781_15: tasmā “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti vacanaṃ na paññatti,
tika-vin06t:781_18: anupaññattivatthumhi vā kathinādhikāro dissatīti yathāvuttanayova sāroti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:781_19: Athāpi siyā “kathinassuppattikālato paṭṭhāya bhagavato vacanaṃ anupaññattibhāvena vutta”nti.
tika-vin06t:781_22: Apica yathāvuttanayadīpanatthaṃ idha taṃ vacanaṃ paṭhamapaññattikāle avatvā pacchā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:781_23: Ettha sādhitattā dutiyatatiyesu pacchā vuttapaṭhamapaññattīsu evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:781_24: Aññathā tatthapi taṃ vacanaṃ pacchā vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-vin06t:781_25: Anugaṇṭhipade pana “pacchā vuttabhāvaṃ sandhāya niṭṭhitacīvarasmintiādīsu anupaññattī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:781_28: Dasamaṃ vā navamaṃ vāti ettha bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:782_2: tasmā “naṭṭhaṃ vā vinaṭṭhaṃ vā daḍḍhaṃ vā cīvarāsā vā upacchinnā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:782_12: Tampi ubbhatasmiṃ kathine dasāhaparamaṃ kālaṃ dhāretabbanti attho na gahetabbo.
tika-vin06t:782_14: ubbhatasmiṃ kathine ekadivasampi parihāraṃ na labbhati.
tika-vin06t:782_17: tasmāpi na taṃ sandhāya dhāretabbanti vuttanti veditabbaṃ asambhavato.
tika-vin06t:783_1: tassa bhikkhuno cīvaraṃ naṭṭhādīsu aññataraṃ yadi bhaveyya,
tika-vin06t:783_5: Ayaṃ panattho ‘naṭṭhaṃ vā’tiādinā nayena vuttacīvarānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ cīvare asati gahetabbo,
tika-vin06t:783_9: Kasmā pana katacīvaraṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetanti na vuttanti ce?
tika-vin06t:783_11: Naṭṭhavinaṭṭhacīvarādīnaṃ dhāraṇassa abhāvato katacīvarameva idhādhippetanti pākaṭaṃ.
tika-vin06t:783_13: Yathā paṭhamāniyate methunakāyasaṃsaggarahonisajjānamevāgatattā sotassa raho atthuddhāravasena vuttoti pākaṭo,
tika-vin06t:783_14: tasmā ‘cakkhussa raho itarasmiṃ atthe adhippeto’ti na vutto.
tika-vin06t:783_16: ‘Kataṃ vā hotī’ti idaṃ na vattabbaṃ, kasmā?
tika-vin06t:783_21: akappiyakatañca ‘imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmī’tiādinā nayena adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:783_24: evaṃ sante ticīvaraṃ dasāhaṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyanti kathaṃ paññāyatīti ce?
tika-vin06t:783_28: ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetu’nti vuttattā idhāpi ‘atirekacīvaraṃ nāma anadhiṭṭhita’nti ettakameva vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-vin06t:783_29: Yasmā ‘kataṃ vā hotī’ti vacanena idhādhippetacīvarena saddhiṃ sesampi dasāhaparamato uttari dhāretuṃ
tika-vin06t:783_30: na labbhatīti anujānanto ‘atirekacīvaraṃ nāma anadhiṭṭhitaṃ avikappita’nti āha.
tika-vin06t:783_35: Itarathā ekāhātikkamepi nissaggiyaṃ hoti ‘yo pana, bhikkhu,
tika-vin06t:783_38: Na ticīvarato aññampi cīvaraṃ dasāhaparamaṃ dhāretabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:783_46: dasāhaparamaṃ dhāretabbanti idañcimassa sādhanatthaṃ vuttavacanañca parato idheva vuttavicāraṇāya yathāvuttayuttiyā ca virujjhatīti na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:784_1: “sve kathinuddhāro bhavissatī”ti ajja uppannacīvaraṃ tadaheva anadhiṭṭhahantassa aruṇuggamane nissaggiyaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:784_6: Yathā atthatakathino saṅgho atthatadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva ubbhārā ekadivasāvasesepi kathinubbhāre ānisaṃsaṃ labhati,
tika-vin06t:784_12: evameva atthatadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva ubbhārā anadhiṭṭhitaṃ avikappitaṃ vaṭṭati anuññātadivasabbhantarattā.
tika-vin06t:784_14: ubbhatadivasato paṭṭhāya dasāhaparamaṃ kālaṃ uppannacīvaraṃ parihāraṃ labhati,
tika-vin06t:784_19: Antokathinepi ekādase aruṇuggamane nissaggiyappasaṅgaṃ “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti ayaṃ anupaññatti vāretvā ṭhitā,
tika-vin06t:784_20: na ca te divase adivase akāsīti.
tika-vin06t:784_21: Tathā tatiyakathine ca vicāritaṃ “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine bhikkhuno paneva akālacīvaraṃ
tika-vin06t:784_22: uppajjeyyā’ti vadantena bhagavatā yaṃ mayā heṭṭhā paṭhamasikkhāpade ‘dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabba’nti
tika-vin06t:784_26: “‘kālepi ādissa dinnaṃ etaṃ akālacīvara’nti vacanato kathinubbhārato uddhaṃ dasāhaparihāraṃ na labhatīti dīpitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:784_27: tehi saddhiṃ puna kathinubbhārato uddhaṃ pañca divasāni labhatīti pasaṅgopi ‘niṭṭhitacīvara…pe…
tika-vin06t:784_28: khippameva kāretabba’nti akālacīvarassa uppattikālaṃ niyametvā vuttattā vārito hoti.
tika-vin06t:784_29: Tadubhayena kathinabbhantare uppannacīvaraṃ kathinubbhārato uddhaṃ ekadivasampi parihāraṃ na labhatīti siddhaṃ hotī”ti ca.
tika-vin06t:784_30: Tasmā duvidhampetaṃ vicāraṇaṃ sandhāya amhehi “idheva vuttavicāraṇāya yathāvuttayuttiyā ca virujjhatīti na gahetabba”nti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:785_1: “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti idaṃ bhummaṃ kiṃ cīvarassa uppatti niyameti,
tika-vin06t:785_6: pacchimakattikamāse eva ubbhatasmiṃ kathine uppannacīvaraṃ tato paṭṭhāya dasāhaṃ dhāretabbaṃ aniṭṭhitepi tasmiṃ māseti āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:785_8: antokathine uppannacīvaraṃ ubbhatepi dasāhaparamaṃ dhāretabbanti āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:785_20: Yena vā adhippāyena bhagavatā idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin06t:785_25: Tatthāpi “cīvaraṃ uppajjeyyā”ti avatvā “akālacīvaraṃ uppajjeyyā”ti visesanena ubbhatepi kathine kālacīvaraṃ atthīti dīpeti. Kiñcetaṃ?
tika-vin06t:785_27: teneva tattha “anatthate kathine ekādasamāse uppanna”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:785_29: Yañca tattha “kālepi ādissa dinnaṃ etaṃ akālacīvaraṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:785_31: Ādesavasena “akālacīvara”nti laddhasaṅkhyampi kāle uppannattā kālaparihāraṃ labhati,
tika-vin06t:785_32: pagevānādesanti ayaṃ paṭhamo vikappo uppattiniyame vuttadosābhāvameva upatthambheti.
tika-vin06t:785_33: Tathā ādesavasena akālacīvarasaṅkhyaṃ gataṃ cīvarakāle uppannattā cīvarakālato paraṃ dasāhaparihāraṃ na labhati,
tika-vin06t:785_34: pagevānādesanti ayaṃ dutiyo dhāraṇaniyame vuttadosābhāvameva upatthambheti.
tika-vin06t:785_35: Yadi evaṃ ādesavasena akālacīvarassa akālacīvaratā kimatthikāti ce?
tika-vin06t:785_36: Saṅghuddesikassa tassa atthatakathinassapi bhikkhusaṅghassa sādhāraṇabhāvatthikāti veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:786_1: Evaṃ gaṇanupagattā akālacīvarasaṅkhayāpaṭilābhānubhāvena “ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti vacanāpekkhassa anissaggiyattā
tika-vin06t:786_2: tadanulomattā “kālacīvarassapī”ti evaṃ sabbathā catubbidhaṃ ettha vacananti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:786_3: Apica atthi ekaccena kathinuddhārena ubbhate kathine uppannaṃ ekaccassa bhikkhuno kālacīvaraṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:786_7: Taṃ dvinnaṃ vasena ubbhate uppannaṃ ṭhapetvā itaresaṃ aññatarena ubbhate uppannanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:786_11: Tathā atthi ekaccena kathinuddhārena ubbhate kathine uppannaṃ sabbassapi akālacīvarameva hoti.
tika-vin06t:786_13: Tathā atthi ubbhatasmiṃ kathine uppannaṃ ṭhapetvā vassānassa pacchime māse uppannaṃ.
tika-vin06t:786_14: Tathā atthi ubbhatasmiṃ kathine uppannaṃ akālacīvaraṃ,
tika-vin06t:786_17: Evaṃ puggalakālabhedato bahuvidhattā uppannassa “ubbhatasmiṃ kathine uppanna”nti na vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:786_18: Anekaṃsikattā imampi atthavikappaṃ dassetuṃ “ubbhatasmiṃ kathineti bhikkhuno kathinaṃ ubbhataṃ hotī”ti.
tika-vin06t:786_21: “Eva”nti vacanena vacanabhedo tattha natthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:787_2: Na hi yattakaṃ saṅghāṭi adhiṭṭhānupagaṃ pacchimaṃ,
tika-vin06t:787_3: tattakaṃ antaravāsakādi adhiṭṭhānupagaṃ pacchimaṃ hoti adhiṭṭhānassa bahuvidhattā.
tika-vin06t:787_4: Na evaṃ vikappanāya bhedo tassā ekavidhattāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:787_5: “Ekādase aruṇuggamane nissaggiya”nti antimaṃ ṭhapetvā tato purimatarasminti attho veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:787_8: tenevāha accekacīvarasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “chaṭṭhito paṭṭhāya pana uppannaṃ anaccekacīvarampi paccuddharitvā
tika-vin06t:787_10: Imaṃyeva nayaṃ sandhāya “accekacīvarassa anatthate kathine ekādasadivasādhiko māso,
tika-vin06t:787_12: tato paraṃ ekadivasampi parihāro natthī”ti tatthevāha.
tika-vin06t:787_13: Imasmiṃ naye siddhe anaccekacīvaraṃ dvādasāhe na labhatīti siddhameva hoti.
tika-vin06t:787_15: anāpattī”ti ettha accekacīvarasadise aññasmiṃ anadhiṭṭhiteti siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:787_17: Vassikasāṭikañca avassikasāṭikabhāvaṃ patvā ekādasamāse parihāraṃ labhatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:788_5: “Anadhiṭṭhite adhiṭṭhitasaññī nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti idamekassa tikapācittiyassa ādipadadīpanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:788_7: tasmā ettha aṭṭhasu tikacchedesu ekaṃ vitthāretvā itaresaṃ ekekamādipadaṃ vitthārehvā dve dve bhagavatāva
tika-vin06t:788_8: saṅkhittattāti bahūsupi tikacchedesu sambhavantesu eko eva vuccati,
tika-vin06t:788_10: Dukkaṭavāresu pana ekaṃ dukkaṭaṃ vitthāretvā sesāni satta tatheva saṅkhittāni.
tika-vin06t:789_2: Taṃ atirekacīvaraṃ yathāsakaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ antodasāhaṃ adhiṭṭheti vā vikappeti vā vissajjeti vā attano
tika-vin06t:789_3: dhammatāya nassati vā vinassati vā ḍayhati vā añño vā taṃ acchinditvā gaṇhāti vissāsanto vā gaṇhāti pācittiyato anāpatti.
tika-vin06t:789_4: Dukkaṭato pana siyā āpatti siyā anāpatti saññābhedena.
tika-vin06t:789_5: Antimānaṃ panettha dvinnaṃ padānaṃ vasena anacchinne acchinnasaññī nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin06t:789_6: Avissāsaggāhe vissāsaggāhasaññī nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyantiādikā dve tikapācittiyā,
tika-vin06t:789_9: dasāhaparamaṃ aruṇaṃ atikkamitvā tassa divasabhāge adhiṭṭhahatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:790_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ito garukatarānītiādimhi ayaṃ codanāpubbaṅgamo vinicchayo –
tika-vin06t:790_1: gaṇṭhipade panassa ito nissaṭṭhacīvaradānato garukampi ñattidutiyakammaṃ yathā apalokanena karonti,
tika-vin06t:790_3: Yadi evaṃ parivāre kammavaggassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ñattikammampi ekaṃ ñattiṃ ṭhapetvāva kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:790_8: Niyamaṃ pana yathā dvinnaṃ pārisuddhiuposatho vinā ñattiyā hoti,
tika-vin06t:790_13: Ekadevedaṃ ñattikammaṃ apalokanenāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti sādhananti veditabbanti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:790_15: Ñattikammaṃ ekaṃ ñattiṃ ṭhapetvāva kātabba”nti pāḷiyā āgataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:790_17: lesato āharitvā vuttanti katvā etaṃ apalokanenāpi vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin06t:791_1: Esa nayoti aññesaṃ cīvaresu upacikādīhi khāyitesu mamapi khāyitānītiādi.
tika-vin06t:792_1: Ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātunti ettha ticīvaraṃ ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhātabbayuttakaṃ,
tika-vin06t:792_2: yaṃ vā ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhātuṃ avikappetuṃ anujānāmi,
tika-vin06t:792_3: tassa adhiṭṭhānakālaparicchedābhāvato sabbakālaṃ icchantassa adhiṭṭhātuṃyeva anujānāmi,
tika-vin06t:792_5: Sati pana paccaye yadā tadā vā paccuddharitvā vikappetuṃ vaṭṭatīti “anāpatti antodasāhaṃ adhiṭṭheti,
tika-vin06t:792_8: Vatthañhi katapariyositaṃ antocatumāse vassānadivasaṃ ādiṃ katvā antodasāhe adhiṭṭhātuṃ anujānāmi,
tika-vin06t:792_9: catumāsato uddhaṃ attano santakaṃ katvā ṭhapitukāmena vikappetuṃ anujānāmīti attho.
tika-vin06t:792_11: “Ticīvaraṃ pana parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vāde pana sati tathārūpapaccaye vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:792_12: Yathā sati paccaye vikappetuṃ vaṭṭatīti sādhitametaṃ,
tika-vin06t:792_23: tasmā ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvā dūre ṭhitampi adhiṭṭhātabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:792_24: Sāmantavihāro nāma yattha tadaheva gantvā nivattituṃ sakkā.
tika-vin06t:792_25: Rattivippavāsaṃ rakkhantena tato dūre ṭhitaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:792_27: Keci “cīvaravaṃse ṭhapitaṃ añño parivattitvā nāgadante ṭhapeti,
tika-vin06t:792_28: taṃ ajānitvā adhiṭṭhahantassapi ruhati cīvarassa sallakkhitattā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:792_35: anadhiṭṭhitassa ekadesabhūtaṃ anadhiṭṭhitasaṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti hi lakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-vin06t:793_7: tasmā tīṇipi cīvarāni paccuddharitvā “imāni cīvarāni parikkhāracoḷāni adhiṭṭhāmī”ti adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti attho.
tika-vin06t:793_9: “Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhūnaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hoti ticīvaraṃ,
tika-vin06t:793_10: attho ca hoti parissāvanehipi thavikāhipī”ti etasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ “anujānāmi,
tika-vin06t:793_15: na dve vā tīṇi vāti paṭikkhepābhāvato vikappanupagapacchimappamāṇāni,
tika-vin06t:793_16: atirekappamāṇāni vā parissāvanādīni parikkhārāni kappantīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:793_17: Yadi evaṃ “yaṃnūnāhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cīvare sīmaṃ bandheyyaṃ mariyādaṃ ṭhapeyya”nti vacanavirodhoti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:793_23: Tato “tena kho pana samayena saṅghassa uccāvacāni cīvarāni uppannāni honti.
tika-vin06t:793_24: Atha kho bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi ‘kiṃ nu kho bhagavatā cīvaraṃ anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin06t:793_30: sambahule bhikkhū cīvarehi ubbhaṇḍite sīsepi cīvarabhisiṃ karitvā khandhepi cīvarabhisiṃ karitvā kaṭiyāpi cīvarabhisiṃ karitvā āgacchante,
tika-vin06t:793_32: yepi kho te kulaputtā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye sītālukā sītabhīrukā,
tika-vin06t:793_34: yaṃnūnāhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cīvare sīmaṃ bandheyyaṃ mariyādaṃ ṭhapeyyaṃ ticīvaraṃ anujāneyya”nti cīvaraṃ anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin06t:793_36: Chabbaggiyā pana micchā gahetvā bahūni parihariṃsu.
tika-vin06t:793_44: na tameveka”nti vadantena yā pubbe ticīvarādhiṭṭhānasaṅkhātā cīvare sīmābaddhā,
tika-vin06t:793_49: atirekacīvaraṃ vikappetu”nti anujānantena vināpi divasaparicchedena atirekacīvarapariharaṇakkamo dassitoti dvepi tāni nidhānamukhānīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:793_55: puna pariharituṃ asakkontena paccuddharitvā parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:793_56: na tveva āditova idaṃ vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:793_57: “Yathā ticīvaraṃ pariharituṃ asakkontassa gilānassa vippavāsasammuti anuññātā,
tika-vin06t:793_58: agilānassapi sāsaṅkasikkhāpade tassa antaraghare nikkhepo ca,
tika-vin06t:793_63: Tatheva dvinnampi sammukhāparammukhāvikappanānaṃ parasantakattā vikappanapaccaye asati ‘parikkhāracoḷa’nti
tika-vin06t:793_65: yato tadadhippāyaññū evaṃ vadantī”ti mahāpaccariyampi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:793_67: Abaddhasīmāyaṃ dupparihāranti vikappanādiatthāya upacāraṃ atikkamitvāpi gamanasambhavato.
tika-vin06t:794_0: Vassikasāṭikā anatirittappamāṇāti tassā ukkaṭṭhaparicchedassa vuttattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:794_2: amhākaṃ senāsanassa upari attharitabba”ntiādinā dinnaṃ nādhiṭṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:794_3: “idaṃ tumhāka”nti dinnaṃ sayaṃ adhippetaṃva adhiṭṭhātabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:794_10: imaṃ mātuyā’ti vibhajantena adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ natthīti apare”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:795_1: Tato paraṃ ācariyānaṃ tattha tattha yuttivicāraṇā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:795_14: suppaṭicchanno antaraghare gamissāmī’ti vacanato yattakena pamāṇena parimaṇḍalatā,
tika-vin06t:795_15: suppaṭicchannatā ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttakkamena sampajjatī”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:796_4: Itaresu pana ekaccasmiṃ ācariyavāde neva paricchedo atthi.
tika-vin06t:796_10: anatthate kathine hemantānaṃ paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya atthate kathine gimhānaṃ paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin06t:797_1: “rajakehi dhovāpetvā setaṃ kārāpentassāpi adhiṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānamevā”ti vacanato arajitepi adhiṭṭhānaṃ ruhati,
tika-vin06t:797_2: tena sūcikammaṃ katvā rajitvā kappabinduṃ datvā adhiṭṭhātabbanti niyamo na kātabboti? Vuccate,
tika-vin06t:797_5: tambabhāvaṃ vā patto adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahati,
tika-vin06t:797_6: na ca pana tādiso adhiṭṭhānaṃ upagacchati,
tika-vin06t:798_1: vikappetabbaṃ vikappetīti evaṃ savisesaṃ katvā avacanaṃ “na vikappetu”nti iminā viruddhaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin06t:798_13: na vikappetabbānī”ti ca anekakkhattuṃ vacanena suṭṭhu daḷhaṃ katvā “sabbāni cīvarāni adhiṭṭhātabbāni,
tika-vin06t:798_15: tasmā ubhopi te viruddhā viya dissanti,
tika-vin06t:798_16: khandhake eva ca “vassikasāṭikaṃ vassānaṃ cātumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ tato paraṃ vikappetu”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:798_17: Tadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vassikasāṭikā anatirittappamāṇā nāmaṃ gahetvā vuttanayeneva cattāro vassike māse adhiṭṭhātabbā,
tika-vin06t:798_19: Idañca viruddhaṃ viya dissati aññamaññaṃ hemante paccuddhārasambhavato,
tika-vin06t:798_21: Tathā idha “anāpatti antodasāhaṃ adhiṭṭheti vikappetī”ti vacanappamāṇato sabbattha vikappanāya appaṭisiddhabhāvo
tika-vin06t:798_22: veditabboti aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ parivāravacanena viruddhaṃ viya dissati,
tika-vin06t:798_26: Parivāraṭṭhakathāyañca vuttaṃ “na vikappetabbānīti adhiṭṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya na vikappetabbānī”ti.
tika-vin06t:798_28: vassikasāṭikādīni ca attano attano adhiṭṭhānakhette na akāmā vikappetabbānīti attho,
tika-vin06t:799_1: yadi evaṃ “nava cīvarāni nādhiṭṭhātabbānī”ti ca vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:799_5: parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetu”nti ettha sabbattha adhiṭṭhāne paṭisedhādassanato,
tika-vin06t:799_6: vikappanāya adassanato ca “tato para”nti dvīsveva paricchedadassanato ca “nava cīvarāni adhiṭṭhātabbāni,
tika-vin06t:799_13: akāle uppannaṃ anadhiṭṭhahantassa dasāhātikkame āpattisambhavato ca.
tika-vin06t:799_14: Tattha yaṃ kāle uppannaṃ appahontepi dasāhe kālātikkame āpattikaraṃ,
tika-vin06t:799_20: atirekacīvaraṃ dhāreyya nissaggiya”nti imāya paṭhamapaññattiyā vasena vutto,
tika-vin06t:800_0: Yathā ca nissajjitabbavatthumhi asati yathāpāḷiṃ avatvā kevalaṃ āpatti eva desetabbā,
tika-vin06t:800_1: yathā ca vassikasāṭikanissajjane kevalaṃ pariyiṭṭhamatte yathāpāḷiṃ avatvā yathāsambhavaṃ nissajjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:800_11: Icchāya hi sati “paccuddharitvā vippavāsasukhatthaṃ vikappanāya okāso dinno hoti,
tika-vin06t:800_12: dasāhātikkame ca anāpattī”ti vacanato vikappetuṃ anujānāmīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:800_13: Tathā vassikasāṭikā akāmā adhiṭṭhātuṃ dasāhātikkame āpattisambhavato.
tika-vin06t:800_20: tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tato paraṃ paccuddharitvā vikappetabbā”ti.
tika-vin06t:801_12: Aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ idaṃ sanniṭṭhānaṃ “kattikapuṇṇamadivase paccuddharitvā pāṭipadadivase vikappetabbā”ti.
tika-vin06t:801_13: Vuttañhetaṃ parivāraṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kattikapuṇṇamāsiyā pacchime pāṭipadadivase vikappetvā ṭhapitaṃ vassikasāṭikaṃ nivāsento hemante āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:801_14: Kurundiyaṃ pana ‘kattikapuṇṇamadivase apaccuddharitvā hemante āpajjatī’ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:801_18: Tattha kurundinayo pacchā vuttattā sārato daṭṭhabbo,
tika-vin06t:801_20: Nivāsento hi gimhepi orenaddhamāsaṃ āpajjati eva.
tika-vin06t:802_0: “Kattikapuṇṇamadivase apaccuddharitvā tasmiṃyeva divase avikappento pacchimapāṭipadadivase apaccuddhārapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati, na,
tika-vin06t:802_2: Evaṃ sati hemante pattamatte adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatīti āpajjati,
tika-vin06t:802_5: chiddabhāvenāti imehi navahi kāraṇehi vijahatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:802_9: chiddabhāvena pana ticīvarasseva sabbaṭṭhakathāsu adhiṭṭhānavijahanassa vuttattā.
tika-vin06t:802_10: Tasmā hemantassa paṭhamadivase apaccuddhārapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin06t:802_12: “Vikappetu”nti vacanato tato adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatīti paññāyati.
tika-vin06t:802_13: Na hi kattikapuṇṇamāsiyā pacchime pāṭipadadivase avikappetvā hemante āpajjatīti vuttanti adhippāyo,
tika-vin06t:802_14: yasmā taṃ apaccuddhārapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ hemantassa paṭhamaaruṇakkhaṇe eva āpajjati,
tika-vin06t:802_18: tañca kho samaye uppannaṃ ce, nāsamaye.
tika-vin06t:802_19: Tathā ca sādhitaṃ apaccuddhaṭaṃ na nissaggiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:802_21: tasmā kattikapuṇṇamadivase eva paccuddharaṇañca vikappanañca kattabbanti siddhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:802_22: ettha ca yathā atirekacīvaraṃ dasame divase vikappentena dasāhaparamaṃ dhāritaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:802_24: tathā kattikapuṇṇamāya vikappentena vassānaṃ cātumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhitañca hoti,
tika-vin06t:802_25: tato paraṃ anāpattikhette eva vikappanā ca hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:802_31: avikappanāya āpajjatī”ti dukesu dve dukāni vattabbāni siyuṃ.
tika-vin06t:802_33: Vikappanakhette hi vassikasāṭikādīnaṃ adhiṭṭhānena vinayātisāradukkaṭaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:802_37: vikappanādisambhavato ca vikappanāya āpajjatīti natthi sabbattha vikappanāya appaṭisiddhattā,
tika-vin06t:802_38: tasmā tāni dukāni “na labbhantī”ti na vuttāni. Etthāha –
tika-vin06t:802_39: yā sā “atthāpatti hemante āpajjatī”ti vacanappamāṇato dukkaṭāpatti sādhitā,
tika-vin06t:802_42: Kattikapuṇṇamāya paccuddhaṭaṃ sañcicca avikappayato dukkaṭena saha punadivase nissaggiyaṃ,
tika-vin06t:802_54: tasmā “paccuddharaṇaṃ vattamatta”ntivādo etthāpi sambhavatīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:802_57: tasmā vassānadivasattā sādhiṭṭhānāvasā paccuddharīyatīti na paccuddhāro vattamattaṃ,
tika-vin06t:802_58: tasmā “tato para”nti yāva puṇṇamā adhippetā siyā.
tika-vin06t:802_60: tathā “vassānamāsātikkamenāpi ābādhavūpasamenāpī”ti idampi avassaṃ paccuddharitabbatāya vuttaṃ siyā.
tika-vin06t:802_61: Evañca sati idha samantapāsādikāya tadavacanena sameti.
tika-vin06t:802_62: Aññathā idhapi taṃ vattabbaṃ siyāti yathāvuttova vidhi ettha sambhavati,
tika-vin06t:802_65: Yasmā pana sā vassānātikkamena adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati,
tika-vin06t:807_0: “Tuyhaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti vutte vināpi “mayhaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti vacanena sudinnaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:807_5: Taṃ pana vatthu na kassaci hoti.
tika-vin06t:807_11: na hi tassetaṃ vinayakammanti ettha vinayakammassatthāya ce gaṇhāti,
tika-vin06t:807_16: Tathā anapekkho hutvā parassa vissajjetvā puna tena dinnaṃ vā tassa vissāsanto vā paribhuñjati, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:807_18: Te eva “mahantaṃ vā khuddakaṃ karotī”ti ettha “ticīvare dīghato vidatthi anatikkamitvā chinditvā karoti,
tika-vin06t:807_20: Evarūpesu ṭhānesu porāṇācariyānaṃ kathāmaggaṃ suṭṭhu ācariyakulasevanāya sañjānitvā tena saṃsanditvā
tika-vin06t:807_21: sato sampajāno hutvā sotūnañca cittaṃ avimohetvā kathetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:810_17: Gutte eva hi vihāre nikkhipitvā bahi gantuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:810_18: nāgutte”ti vuttattā apaññattepi kathine “te bhikkhū aggaḷaguttivihāre ṭhapethā”ti vatvā sabhāgānaṃ hatthe
tika-vin06t:810_19: cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā santaruttarena gāmappavese laddhakappiyā janapadacārikaṃ pakkāmiṃsūti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:811_6: Māsaṃ vā atirekaṃ vā yāva gamane saussāho,
tika-vin06t:811_9: Puna sammutidānakiccaṃ natthīti sace dvādasannaṃ vassānaṃ accayena añño rogo hoti, vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:811_10: upasampadakammaṃ viya yāvajīvaṃ ekāsammuti vaṭṭatīti ca.
tika-vin06t:812_0: “Kataṃ vā hotī”tiādi imasmiṃ sikkhāpade na vattabbaṃ, kasmā?
tika-vin06t:812_1: Karaṇapalibodhe upacchinnepi anadhiṭṭhitacīvarato vippavāsapaccayā āpattiyā asambhavato,
tika-vin06t:812_2: tasmā “niṭṭhitacīvarasminti bhikkhuno cīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhitaṃ hotī”ti ettakameva vattabbanti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:813_1: Avippavāsalakkhaṇavavatthāpanatthanti ettha “antogāme cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā antogāme vatthabba”ntiādivacanato avippavāsalakkhaṇaṃ vavatthāpitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:813_8: tesu aniviṭṭhaṃ ekakulassa vā nānākulassa vā aparikkhittameva hoti,
tika-vin06t:813_11: tasmā tattha parikkhepādivasena adassetvā abbhantaravasena vutto.
tika-vin06t:813_14: Aññathā “sattho ekūpacāro nānūpacāro”tiādi uddesavirodho siyā vibhaṅge adassitattā,
tika-vin06t:813_15: tasmā satthassa purato ca pacchato ca sattabbhantarā,
tika-vin06t:813_18: Tathā rukkhamūlassa yattha majjhanhike kāle chāyā pharati,
tika-vin06t:813_26: udosite ca vuttaparicchedova aṭṭādīsūti katvā saṃkhittaṃ.
tika-vin06t:813_28: padaṃ puna uddhaṭaṃ satthavibhaṅgena adhikārassa pacchinnattā.
tika-vin06t:813_30: Vihāre sambhavantampi tattha pacchinnattā na uddhaṭaṃ.
tika-vin06t:813_32: tasmā “ekakulassa nānākulassā”ti iminā gāmādīnaṃ cuddasannaṃ cīvaranikkhepaṭṭhānānaṃ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇabhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:813_35: nānākulassa ca aparikkhittesu gāmādīsu parihāraviseso kiñcāpi natthi,
tika-vin06t:813_44: “Taṃ pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvāti vacanato ākāsepi aḍḍhateyyaratanappamāṇe doso natthī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:814_6: Attano nikkhittaṭṭhāne anikkhittattā vīthihatthapāso na rakkhati,
tika-vin06t:814_10: hatthapāsā vā na vijahitabba”nti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:814_11: “Hatthapāseyeva aruṇaṃ uṭṭhapetabba”nti niyamitattā jānituṃ na sakkāti ce?
tika-vin06t:815_3: Ajjhokāse aparisaṅkitampi cīvaraṃ atirekasattabbhantare nikkhittaṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:815_6: “Nadīparihāro ca labbhatī”ti vacanato udakukkhepasīmāyaṃ parihāro labbhatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:819_3: Sace adhiṭṭhāti na ruhatī”ti vatvā upasampadāpekkhānampi diguṇameva saṅghāṭiṃ datvā upasampādenti,
tika-vin06t:819_5: Bhagavatā hi “chinnakaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ chinnakaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ chinnakaṃ antaravāsaka”nti paṭhamaṃ anuññātaṃ.
tika-vin06t:819_6: Tato “aññatarassa bhikkhuno ticīvare kariyamāne sabbaṃ chinnakaṃ nappahoti.
tika-vin06t:819_8: Dve acchinnakāni ekaṃ chinnakaṃ nappahotī”ti imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ “anujānāmi,
tika-vin06t:819_20: “chinnakaṃ diguṇaṃ nappahotī”ti vacanābhāvato cāti sanniṭṭhānamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:820_1: Tesaṃ adhiṭṭhānābhāvato “adhiṭṭhitenevā”ti vattabbaṃ hotūti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:820_7: Yasmā pana bhikkhūnaṃyeva bhagavatā adhiṭṭhānavasena nava cīvarāni anuññātāni,
tika-vin06t:820_10: Tasmā tesaṃ cīvaraniyamābhāvā na taṃ dhutaṅgaṃ anuññātaṃ gahaṭṭhānaṃ viya,
tika-vin06t:820_11: tasmā tassa samādānavidhāne avacanato ca sanniṭṭhānamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:821_0: Sāsaṅkasammatoti kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ sāsaṅkasikkhāpade visuṃ aṅgāni na vuttāni,
tika-vin06t:821_10: Tattha bahigāmepi gāmasīmaṃ okkamitvā vasitvā pakkamantassa anāpatti,
tika-vin06t:821_13: tattha sattameti ayaṃ imesaṃ dvinnaṃ viseso.
tika-vin06t:821_15: idha vuttanayena ca siddhattā na vuttāni.
tika-vin06t:821_24: Evaṃ santepi tattha yathāvuttaaṅgasampattiyā sati tattha vuttanayeneva nissajjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:821_25: Hemante vā gimhe vā nissajjati ce?
tika-vin06t:821_26: Idha vuttanayenāpi nissajjituṃ vaṭṭatīti ñāpanatthaṃ catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ na visesitanti no takkoti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:821_28: Dvayena ūnamāsaṃ hutvā “dasāhātikkanta”nti vatvā māsātikkantanti eke.
tika-vin06t:822_8: Tathā hi “cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā santaruttarena janapadacārikaṃ pakkamantī”ti evamādīsu ticīvarameva. “Na,
tika-vin06t:822_11: santaruttaraparamaṃ tato cīvaraṃ sādhitabba”nti evamādīsu yaṃkiñci,
tika-vin06t:822_14: saṅghāṭi dātabbā, handa te, āvuso, saṅghāṭi,
tika-vin06t:822_19: taṃ sabbaṃ kariyamānaṃ kadā niṭṭhānaṃ gacchissati,
tika-vin06t:822_22: Udositasikkhāpadassa nippayojanabhāvappasaṅgato ticīvaravippavāse tecīvarassa āpattīti eke.
tika-vin06t:822_23: Tatthetaṃ vuccati na hoti āpatti paccuddhārādisiddhito.
tika-vin06t:822_27: antoaruṇe vissajjentassa ca yāva añño nādhiṭṭhāti,
tika-vin06t:822_29: Aññathā sattabbhantarena vippavāsassāti vippavāsato yathārutaṃyeva sati vippavāse vippavāsato avippavāse sati avippavāsatoti.
tika-vin06t:825_5: taṃ cīvaraṃ pacchā labbhatu vā mā vā,
tika-vin06t:826_2: cīvarāsā vā upacchinnātiādimhi tīsu cīvaresu aññataraṃ kataṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:826_5: ubbhatasmiñca kathine samaye vā hemantassa samaye vā akālacīvaraṃ uppajjeyya,
tika-vin06t:826_10: “Anatthate kathine ekādasamāse uppanna”nti vacanato aparakattikā atthate vā anatthate vā samayova.
tika-vin06t:826_14: “Ādissa dinna”nti idaṃ idha alabbhamānampi atthuddhāravasena vuttaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ dutiyanissaggiye sesaṃ akālacīvaraṃ viya.
tika-vin06t:826_15: Tattha hi bhikkhunisaṅghassa “sampattā bhājentū”ti evaṃ ādissa dinnameva “akālacīvaraṃ kālacīvara”nti adhiṭṭhahitvā bhājentiyā nissaggiyaṃ.
tika-vin06t:826_16: Tathā hi tattha yathā “akālacīvaraṃ nāma anatthate kathine ekādasamāse uppannaṃ,
tika-vin06t:826_17: atthate kathine sattamāse uppanna”nti idaṃ atthuddhāravasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:826_19: Yadi evaṃ “ekapuggalassa idaṃ tuyhaṃ damhīti dinna”nti idaṃ kimatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:826_22: Yathā saṅghassa ādissa dinnaṃ atthatakathinehi eva bhikkhūhi abhājanīyattā akālacīvaraṃ nāma jātaṃ,
tika-vin06t:826_24: Evaṃ santepi kassaci siyā “ādissa dinnampi dasāhameva parihāraṃ labhatī”ti.
tika-vin06t:826_26: Paṭhamakathine “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti idañhi niratthakanti.
tika-vin06t:826_27: Anubbhatasmimpi hi kathine dasāhaparamameva dhāretabbanti viññātattā anādissa dinnameva sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ siyāti ce?
tika-vin06t:826_28: Evaṃ santepi anādissa dinnampi anatthatakathinānaṃ aparakattikāya dasāhameva parihāraṃ labhati “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:827_0: Anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ “paṭhamasikkhāpade sabbacīvarānaṃ yāvadatthacīvaravasena kathinamāsabbhantare dasāhātikkamepi anāpatti parihārassa dinnattā.
tika-vin06t:827_1: Yathā kathinamāsabbhantare ādissa dinnamakālacīvaraṃ kālacīvaraparihārameva labhati,
tika-vin06t:827_3: Tasmā evaṃ ‘niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine bhikkhuno paneva cīvaraṃ uppajjeyyā’tiādinā
tika-vin06t:827_4: sikkhāpade siddhepi anatthatakathinānaṃ pacchimakattikamāsaṃ anujānantena ‘akālacīvaraṃ uppajjeyyā’ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:827_5: Evañhi avutte akālacīvaraṃ nāma ‘anatthate kathine ekādasamāse uppanna’nti na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-vin06t:827_6: Evañhi vacanato anatthatakathinānaṃ atthatakathinānaṃ viya sabbacīvarānaṃ pacchimakattikamāse dasāhātikkame nissaggiyaṃ na hotī”tiādi.
tika-vin06t:828_1: yaṃ pana mayā “paṭhamakathine dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabba”nti anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin06t:828_3: na antoti ayamattho dīpito hoti. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin06t:828_4: Atirekacīvarassa dasāhaparihārato uddhaṃ āpajjitabbāpattiṃ “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:828_5: kathine”ti anupaññattiyā kathinabbhantare vāretvā tato uddhaṃ uppannesu dasāhātikkame āpajjitabbāpattiṃ
tika-vin06t:828_8: etaṃ akālacīvaraṃ nāmā”ti vacanato kathinubbhārato uddhaṃ dasāhaparihāraṃ na labhatīti dīpitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:828_9: tehi saddhiṃ puna kathinubbhārato uddhaṃ pañca divasāni labhatīti pasaṅgopi “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā
tika-vin06t:828_10: ubbhatasmiṃ kathine bhikkhuno paneva akālacīvaraṃ uppajjeyya…pe…
tika-vin06t:828_11: khippameva kāretabba”nti akālacīvarassa uppattikālaṃ niyametvā vuttattā nivārito hoti,
tika-vin06t:828_12: tadubhayena kathinabbhantare uppannacīvaraṃ kathinubbhārato uddhaṃ ekadivasampi parihāraṃ na labhatīti siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:829_1: ācariyā pana evaṃ vadeyyuṃ “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine bhikkhuno paneva akālacīvaraṃ
tika-vin06t:829_2: uppajjeyyā”ti ettha “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti vadanto evaṃ viññāpeti “etthantare
tika-vin06t:829_6: kintu paṭhame dasāhaṃ anujānitvā tasmiṃ appahonte sace paccāsā atthi,
tika-vin06t:829_7: tameva vaḍḍhetvā māsaṃ anujānanto imampi atthavisesaṃ dīpeti akālacīvaraṃ nāma sammukhībhūtena bhājetabbantipi dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:829_8: Taṃ pana “ākaṅkhamānena bhikkhunā paṭiggahetabba”nti iminā sikkhāpadena vaḍḍhetvā vuttanti,
tika-vin06t:830_0: “Khippameva kāretabbanti dasāhā kāretabba”nti idaṃ pana pahonakabhāve purimasikkhāpadalakkhaṇenāti dīpetuṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:830_1: tasmā “evaṃ sīghanti vā lahunti vā”tiādinā avatvā “dasāhā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:830_3: anatthate pana kathine kathanti vutte anatthatassa paṭikkhepataṃ dassetīti vutto apassanto vighātaṃ āpajjatīti.
tika-vin06t:830_4: Ekatiṃse aruṇuggamane nissaggiyanti mahantenapi paccāsācīvarena saha ghaṭitampi tabbhāvaṃ anupatitvā nissaggiyaṃ hoti sati pacchimappamāṇasambhave,
tika-vin06t:830_9: Pubbaparicchedaṃ atikkantaṃ ghaṭitaṃ puna aññaparicchedaṃ labhatīti eke,
tika-vin06t:830_11: Aññatarasmiṃ gaṇṭhipade pana “saṅghassa vā idaṃ akālacīvaranti uddissa dinna’nti ettha saṅghassa dinne āpatti nāma natthi,
tika-vin06t:830_14: Saṅghato vā uppajjeyyāti anena siddhattā adhikamevā”ti ca “saṅgho cīvarāni labhissati gaṇo vā’tiādināpi pāṭho atthī”ti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:830_15: Gaṇṭhipade kosallatthaṃ pana mayā sabbaṃ likhitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:833_3: Tattha nāma tvanti tattha tayā katakamme evaṃ akattabbe sati dhovāpissasi nāma.
tika-vin06t:833_4: Atha vā so nāma tvanti attho.
tika-vin06t:833_5: Ubhatosaṅghe upasampannāti bhikkhūnaṃ santike upasampadāya paṭikkhittattā tadanupasaṅgabhayā evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:833_6: “Purāṇacīvara”nti ettha purāṇabhāvadīpanatthameva “sakiṃ nivatthampi sakiṃ pārutampī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:833_7: tasmā “cīvaraṃ nāma channaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ vikappanupagaṃ pacchima”nti vacanassa okāso na jātoti eke.
tika-vin06t:833_12: Jātippamāṇāvacanato yaṃ kiñci purāṇavatthaṃ dhovāpentassa nissaggiyameva,
tika-vin06t:833_13: teneva “anāpatti cīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ parikkhāraṃ dhovāpetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:833_17: Teneva kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne cīvaraparicchedo na vuttoti eke,
tika-vin06t:833_24: Rajitvātiādi pana vinayavidhidassanatthaṃ vuttanti mama takko.
tika-vin06t:833_26: evaṃ vematikañātikavāresu cāti nava catukkāni honti. Etthāha –
tika-vin06t:833_27: ekavāraṃ dhovitvā dhovanesu dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā puna “duddhota”nti maññamānā dhovati,
tika-vin06t:833_29: dutiyavāraṃ avuttā dhovati nāma hotīti? Vuccate –
tika-vin06t:833_31: puna dhovantī avuttā dhovati nāmāti yujjati. No ce,
tika-vin06t:833_33: Bhikkhussa liṅgaparivattane ekatoupasampannāya vasena āpatti sākiyānīnaṃ viya.
tika-vin06t:834_3: Bhikkhūnaṃ santike aṭṭhavācikāya upasampannāya pākaṭattā taṃ avatvā sākiyāniyova vuttā apākaṭattā.
tika-vin06t:838_3: kurundiyañca vuttanti ettha rattibhāge dhammakathikassa bhikkhuno bahūsu cīvaresu mahājanena pasādadānavasena
tika-vin06t:838_4: paṭikkhittesu punadivase “upāsakānaṃ pasādadānāni etānī”ti suddhacittena gaṇhantassa doso natthi,
tika-vin06t:838_5: “bhikkhunīhipi dinnāni idha santī”ti ñatvā gaṇhato doso.
tika-vin06t:838_6: Taṃ acittakabhāvenāti bhikkhunīhi dinnabhāvaṃ ñatvā bahūsu tassā cīvarassa ajānanenāti attho.
tika-vin06t:838_7: Paṃsukūlaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvāti “bhikkhunīhi nu kho dinnaṃ siyā”ti avikappetvā “paṃsukūlaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti gaṇhantassa vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:838_9: “acittakabhāvenā”ti vacanena “yathā tathā gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti uppathova paṭisedhitoti apare.
tika-vin06t:838_14: yathā “paṃsukūlaṃ gaṇhissatīti ṭhapitaṃ kāmaṃ bhikkhunisantakampi avikappetvā paṃsukūlaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:838_15: tathā dhammakathikassa bhikkhuniyā dinnampi apaññāyamānaṃ vaṭṭatīti,
tika-vin06t:838_22: na taṃ tassā santakaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:838_25: Idaṃ pubbeva “bhikkhunīnaṃ cīvara”nti jānitvāpi paṃsukūliko gahetuṃ labhati tadā tassā asantakattā.
tika-vin06t:838_27: Maṃsaṃ dadantena tathāgatena sallekhato kappiyampi bhuttaṃ nissaggiyaṃ cīvaramāha yo maṃsaṃ kathanti sayamādiseyyāti.
tika-vin06t:839_3: Assāmikampi hi paṃsukūlaṃ aññissā hatthato gaṇhāti,
tika-vin06t:839_4: na vaṭṭati “aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ paṭiggaṇheyyā”ti vuttalakkhaṇasambhavato.
tika-vin06t:839_8: tathā kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyañca “aññātikāya hatthato gahaṇa”nti aṅgaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:839_14: sāmaṇerassa santakaṃ aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato gaṇhantassa ca anāpatti evaṃ yathāvuttalakkhaṇāsambhavatoti eke,
tika-vin06t:839_15: teneva “ekatoupasampannāya cīvaraṃ paṭiggaṇhātī’ti avatvā ‘hatthato paṭiggaṇhāti aññatra pārivattakā,
tika-vin06t:839_17: tasmā aññātikāya santakampi ekatoupasampannāya hatthato paṭiggaṇhantassa dukkaṭa”nti vadanti,
tika-vin06t:840_1: Ko pana vādo pattatthavikādīsūti anadhiṭṭhātabbesu bahūsu paṭalesu.
tika-vin06t:840_3: Adhiṭṭhānupagesu vā tesaṃ parikkhārattā bhisichaviyā viya anāpatti.
tika-vin06t:840_4: Kiṃ paṭaparissāvanaṃ parikkhāraṃ na hotīti? Hoti,
tika-vin06t:840_5: kintu taṃ kira nivāsanādicīvarasaṇṭhānattā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:840_6: Tasmā idha nivāsanādicīvarasādhanaṃ vikappanupagapacchimaṃ cīvaraṃ nāma.
tika-vin06t:840_10: aññātikāya hatthato gahaṇanti tīṇeva aṅgāni avatvā aparikkhāratāti catutthamaṅgaṃ vattabbanti ce?
tika-vin06t:840_15: “Aññaṃ parikkhāra”nti uddharitvā “pattatthavikādiṃ yaṃkiñcī”ti vuttattā vikappanupagampi pattatthavikādiṃ gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:840_16: “paṭaparissāvanampī”ti vuttaṭṭhāne ca “cīvaraṃ nāma vikappanupagapacchima”nti vacanato paṭaparissāvanaṃ cīvarameva,
tika-vin06t:840_18: “Ko pana vādoti nigamanavacanampi sādhaka”nti keci vadanti,
tika-vin06t:843_3: “aññātako moghapurisā”ti vacanena pavāritopi adātukāmo aññātako appavāritaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:844_2: na bhañjitabbanti anacchinnānaṃ cīvarānaṃ attano santakānaṃ atthitāya,
tika-vin06t:844_13: “Sace pana etesaṃ vuttappakārānaṃ gihivatthādīnaṃ bhisichavipariyantānaṃ kiñci na labbhati,
tika-vin06t:844_14: tena tiṇena vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādetvā āgantabba”nti aṭṭhakathāvacanato.
tika-vin06t:845_0: Na tāva therānaṃ dātabbānīti na tāva attano ruciyā dātabbāni,
tika-vin06t:845_6: ‘Yehi kehici vā acchinnaṃ hotī’ti hi vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:845_7: Ācariyo pana evaṃ vadati “attano ruciyāpi dātuṃ labhantī”ti.
tika-vin06t:845_8: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “paribhogajiṇṇaṃ vā’ti ettha ca ‘acchinnacīvarānaṃ ācariyupajjhāyādīnaṃ attanā
tika-vin06t:845_9: tiṇapaṇṇehi paṭicchādetvā dinnacīvarampi saṅgahaṃ gacchatī’ti vattuṃ yujjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:845_12: “kehici vā acchinna”nti ettha vuttalesato dutiyalesassa avisesabhāvappasaṅgatoti.
tika-vin06t:845_13: Atha kimatthaṃ “na tāva therānaṃ dātabbānī”ti vuttanti ce?
tika-vin06t:845_16: tato tāni theruddissakāni sākhāpalāsāni sayaṃ paridahitvā vināpi therāṇattiyā attano ruciyā dātabbāni,
tika-vin06t:845_17: bhūtagāmapātabyatāya pācittiyaṃ na hoti satthunāpi anuññātattā.
tika-vin06t:845_19: taṃ kappiyameva sandhāya vuttanti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:845_37: Ayaṃ ekevādo yutto “santaruttaraparamaṃ tato cīvaraṃ sāditabba”nti hi vacanato,
tika-vin06t:845_38: tasmā santaruttare sati vikappanupagapacchimaṃ viññāpentassa paṭilābhena nissaggiyaṃ.
tika-vin06t:845_39: Yadi evaṃ “viññāpetvā paṭilabheyya nissaggiya”nti sikkhāpadena bhavitabbanti ce? Tanna,
tika-vin06t:845_42: Yathā hi “tikkhattuṃ methunaṃ dhammaṃ abhiviññāpesī”ti vutte pavattesīti attho,
tika-vin06t:845_43: tathā idhāpi “cīvaraṃ viññāpeyyā”ti viññattiyā pavatteyya uppādeyyāti attho.
tika-vin06t:846_4: tasmā ayuttaparibhogena aparibhuñjitvā yuttaparibhogavasena paribhuñjato jiṇṇaṃ paribhogajiṇṇaṃ nāma.
tika-vin06t:846_5: Tassa sabhāgānaṃ acchinnakāle dānampi yuttaparibhoge eva saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:846_7: vācentānaṃ ācariyānaṃ matanti dhammasiritthero āhā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:847_1: Nisīdituṃ vā nipajjituṃ vā na labhatīti yathāsukhaṃ na labhatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:847_7: Aññathā “ñātake ñātakasaññī”ti iminā siddhattā na niccaṃ sesaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:847_13: Na pavāritaggahaṇena ñātakaggahaṇaṃ hotīti imassa atthavisesassa dassanatthaṃ “ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:847_14: Tathā hi aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā appavāritāya ca cīvaraṃ aññatra pārivattakā paṭiggaṇhantassa āpatti.
tika-vin06t:847_15: Ñātikāya pana pavāritāya ca vissāsaṃ gaṇhāti, anāpatti.
tika-vin06t:847_18: Ñātakānañca ekaccānaṃ purāṇacīvaraṃ nāma dātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:847_23: na dutiyādīhīti ayaṃ vinaye dhammatā veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:850_2: Hatthena paggahetvā ṭhatvā sālāyaṃ pasāretabbadussaṃ pasārentīti codanā.
tika-vin06t:850_4: So hi adhiṭṭhahitvā ṭhapitaparikkhāracoḷādīsu santesupi ticīvare acchinne santaruttaraparamaṃ viññāpetvā gahetuṃ labhati.
tika-vin06t:850_5: Aññathāpīti “pamāṇikaṃ ticīvaraṃ parikkhāracoḷavasena adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjato tasmiṃ naṭṭhe bahūnipi gahetuṃ labhati,
tika-vin06t:850_7: tasmā taṃ vibhāganti “ticīvarikassa taṃ vibhāganti attho,
tika-vin06t:850_10: aññathāti ito vuttaggahaṇaparicchedato aññenā”ti ettakameva vadati.
tika-vin06t:850_13: sace dve vā ekaṃ vā naṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:850_18: sāsaṅkasikkhāpadavasena vā taṃsammutivasena vā tatiyassa alābhena vā.
tika-vin06t:851_2: Taṃ micchā gahetvā ñātakādiṭṭhāne taduttari gaṇhantassa āpattīti ce?
tika-vin06t:851_5: Ettha ca pavāritā nāma acchinnakālato pubbe eva pavāritā,
tika-vin06t:851_10: Te hi acchinnakāraṇā naṭṭhakāraṇāva denti nāma.
tika-vin06t:851_11: Apica yathā piṭṭhisamaye satuppādaṃ katvā ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānato vassikasāṭikaṃ nipphādentassa tena sikkhāpadena nissaggiyaṃ,
tika-vin06t:851_12: tathā idhāpi ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānepi acchinnanaṭṭhakāraṇā na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:851_13: tasmā “aṭṭhakathāsu pamāṇameva vaṭṭatī’ti vuttavacanameva pamāṇa”nti dhammasiritthero āha,
tika-vin06t:851_15: Yasmā idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ taduttari viññāpentassa paññattaṃ,
tika-vin06t:851_16: tasmiñca “aññātako gahapati vā gahapatānī vā”ti mātikāya pāḷi,
tika-vin06t:851_20: tasmā tividhāyapi pāḷiyā na sametīti ayuttameva,
tika-vin06t:851_21: tasmā kevalaṃ sallekhameva sandhāya vuttanti apare.
tika-vin06t:851_22: Upari kāṇamātāsikkhāpade aṭṭhakathāsu pana “tesampi pātheyyapaheṇakatthāya paṭiyattato pamāṇameva vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:851_24: na tattha ca idha ca nānākaraṇaṃ paññāyati,
tika-vin06t:851_25: tasmā therassa laddhi sundarā viya mama khāyati,
tika-vin06t:851_27: Yasmā panidaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ aññassatthāya viññāpanavatthusmiṃyeva paññattaṃ,
tika-vin06t:851_32: Evarūpesu gahapatipaṭisaṃyuttasikkhāpadesu kiñcāpi “gahapati nāma yo koci agāraṃ ajjhāvasatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:851_33: tathāpi pañca sahadhammike ṭhapetvā avasesā ca sikkhāpaccakkhātako ca titthiyo ca veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:854_5: “Tassa na imesaṃ sukarā acchādetunti attho”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:854_6: “Pubbe appavārito”ti vacanato tasmiṃ khaṇe pavāritopi appavāritova hotīti.
tika-vin06t:857_2: kevalaṃ aṭṭhuppattivasena paññattaṃ bhikkhuniyā rahonisajjasikkhāpadaṃ viya.
tika-vin06t:857_3: Evaṃ sante tanti anāropetabbaṃ bhaveyya vināpi tena tadatthasiddhito,
tika-vin06t:857_10: Na hi buddhā appayojanaṃ vācaṃ nicchārenti,
tika-vin06t:857_20: Iminā atthavisesena ko panañño atirekattho dassitoti?
tika-vin06t:857_21: Porāṇagaṇṭhipade tāva vuttaṃ “ekasmimpi vatthusmiṃ ubhinnaṃ pīḷā kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti ayamatirekattho dassito”ti.
tika-vin06t:863_0: Apicetaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ taṃjātikesu sikkhāpadesu sabbesupi gahetabbavinicchayassa nayadassanappayojananti veditabbaṃ. Āha ca –
tika-vin06t:868_5: bahūnaṃ vā sādhāraṇaṃ ekameva cīvaraṃ aññatra pārivattakā paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin06t:868_9: Tathā aññesupi evarūpesu sikkhāpadesu nayo netabbo.
tika-vin06t:868_14: Atha ñātikā paṭhamaṃ thokaṃ dhovitvā ṭhitā,
tika-vin06t:868_20: Aññātikāya ca ñātikāya ca aññātikasaññī, vematiko,
tika-vin06t:868_23: Tathā aññātikāya ca ñātikāya ca santakaṃ cīvaraṃ ubhohi ekato diyyamānaṃ paṭiggaṇhantassa,
tika-vin06t:868_24: aññātikāya eva hatthato paṭiggaṇhantassa ca nissaggiyameva.
tika-vin06t:868_26: Atha ubhosu aññātikādisaññī vuttanayeneva nissaggiyadukkaṭādiāpattibhedagaṇanā veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:868_29: saddena pana aneke aññātikā viññattāviññattapuggalagaṇanāya dukkaṭaṃ. Eko deti,
tika-vin06t:871_3: kālena kappiya”nti ito pubbe eva rūpiyapaṭiggahaṇasikkhāpadassa paññattattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:871_4: Aññathā āyasmā upanando maṃsassa cetāpannaṃ ekampi kahāpaṇaṃ hatthena paṭiggaṇhanto tato mahantataraṃ cīvaracetāpannaṃ kathaṃ na paṭiggaṇhissati,
tika-vin06t:872_1: “Āgatakāraṇaṃ bhañjatī”ti vuttattā nanu puna codetuṃ na labhatīti eke.
tika-vin06t:872_3: cīvaraṃ na labhissati paṭisanthārassa katattāti eke.
tika-vin06t:872_4: Codanālakkhaṇaṃ na hotīti katvā vuttanti eke.
tika-vin06t:872_18: dhammadesanasikkhāpade vuttaparicchedāya ekāya vācāya dve ṭhānāni bhañjati,
tika-vin06t:872_20: “Yatthā”ti vutte attano eva santikaṃ gantabbanti vuttaṃ viya hoti.
tika-vin06t:872_23: Mūlaṃ asādiyantenāti mūlassa akappiyabhāve sati asādiyantena.
tika-vin06t:872_26: Sace evaṃ vutte akappiyaṃ dassetīti katvā cittena akappiyaṃ icchantova mukhena kappiyaṃ niddisati “cīvaraṃ me dethā”ti,
tika-vin06t:873_1: cittena sādiyantopi mukhena kappiyavohārena ce voharati “kahāpaṇārahena,
tika-vin06t:873_5: Kañci sassuṭṭhānakaṃ bhūmipadesaṃ sandhāya “sīmaṃ demāti vadanti,
tika-vin06t:873_7: “vihārassa demā”ti vutte “paṭikkhipituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vacanato ca.
tika-vin06t:873_8: Anugaṇṭhipade pana vuttaṃ “saṅghaṃ sandhāya ‘vihārassa demā’ti dinnaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin06t:873_18: kenaci pariyāyena jātarūparajataṃ sāditabbaṃ pariyesitabbanti vadāmī’ti vacanenapi na virujjhati.
tika-vin06t:873_19: Kappiyavacanapaccayā dāyako sayameva kattabbayuttakaṃ jānissatīti adhippāyato dāyakena etassa adhippāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:873_20: ñatvā kappiyakārakassa hatthe ṭhapitaṃ bhikkhussa santakameva hotī”ti.
tika-vin06t:873_24: Tenevāha “athāpi ‘mama taḷākaṃ vā pokkharaṇiṃ vā saṅghassa dammī’ti vutte ‘sādhu, upāsaka,
tika-vin06t:873_25: saṅgho pānīyaṃ pivissatī’tiādīni vatvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati evā”ti.
tika-vin06t:873_26: Aññathā khettaṃ sandhāya bhikkhuno khettapaṭibaddhavacanāni sīmāvacanena kappantīti āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:873_27: Avihārassa ca bhikkhussa rūpiyaṃ dassetvā “idaṃ vihārassa dammī”ti vutte attano atthāya diyyamānaṃ jānantenāpi taṃ appaṭikkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:873_29: kahāpaṇādibhāvameva vā jānantameva sandhāya tathāvoharantassa ca anāpattīti āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:873_32: kenaci pariyāyenā”ti nippadesato vuttattā na sakkā lesaṃ oḍḍetunti no takko,
tika-vin06t:873_35: na kathetabba”nti vacanato yathāvuttasāmiciyā akaraṇe anāpatti dukkaṭassāti dasseti.
tika-vin06t:874_0: “Aññātakaappavāritesu viya paṭipajjitabba”nti vacanato yathāvuttasāmicimpi na katvā ce nipphādeti,
tika-vin06t:874_14: mahāpaccariyaṃ vutta”nti vacanato apabbajitānaṃ antamaso mātāpitūnampi atthāya sampaṭicchantassa dukkaṭamevāti dasseti.
tika-vin06t:875_0: Sabbattha sampaṭicchanaṃ nāma “uggaṇheyya vā uggaṇhāpeyyavā upanikkhittaṃ vā sādiyeyyā”ti evaṃ vuttalakkhaṇameva.
tika-vin06t:875_5: idaṃ sabbampi dassetuṃ “sace panā”ti vitthāro āraddho.
tika-vin06t:875_7: na vaṭṭatī”ti vacanato appaṭikkhittaṃ vihārassa dinnaṃ sādituṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:875_8: Tathā therassa “mātuyā demā”tiādinā vuttepi paṭiggahaṇe āpatti pācittiyameva.
tika-vin06t:875_9: Sāpattiko hotīti ettha kāya āpattiyā sāpattiko hotīti?
tika-vin06t:875_16: paṇāmento anatisāro”ti ettha na sammāvattantaṃyeva apaṇāmentassa dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ. Yathāha – “na ca,
tika-vin06t:875_25: āpattiṃ āpajjatī”ti vuttattā na yuttanti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:875_27: tasmā “na sammāvattanto paṇāmetabbo”ti vuttattā anāpattikā katāti.
tika-vin06t:875_30: “Kappiyabhaṇḍampi akappiyamevāti taḷākato nipphannadhaññena parivattetvā laddhaṃ gorasampi na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:876_3: Dubbinibbhogaṃ hotīti idaṃ parato “tasseva akappiyaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:876_6: Idañhi bhikkhussa payogavasena ādito paṭṭhāya uppannena missanti.
tika-vin06t:876_8: Khale vā ṭhatvā rakkhatīti “idaṃ vā ettakaṃ vā mā gaṇha,
tika-vin06t:876_10: idha puñjaṃ karohī”ti evamādinā vā payogena ce rakkhati,
tika-vin06t:876_16: Rūpiyapaṭiggahaṇasikkhāpade “dvāraṃ pidahitvā rakkhantena vasitabba”nti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:876_19: Heṭṭhā “sassaṃ katvā āharathā”ti vattuṃ pana na vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin06t:876_24: Sace dāyakā vā saṅghassa gāmakhettārāmādiṃ keṇiyā gahitamanussā vā tattha kuṭumbino “ime saṅghassa kahāpaṇā āhaṭā”ti vadanti,
tika-vin06t:876_29: tasmā “saṅghassa kappiyakārake vā guttaṭṭhānaṃ vā ācikkhathā”ti vatvā tehi sampāditaṃ kenaci akattabbatāya
tika-vin06t:876_30: “iminā sappiṃ āharāhī”ti vicāreti niṭṭhāpetvā itaresaṃ kappiyaṃ parato pattacatukke catutthapatto viya.
tika-vin06t:876_31: Vuttañhi tattha “ime kahāpaṇe gahetvā imaṃ dehī’ti kahāpaṇe dāpetvā gahito,
tika-vin06t:876_32: ayaṃ patto etasseva bhikkhuno na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:876_39: mūlassa sampaṭicchitaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya imassa vuttattā pattacatukke dutiyatatiyapattā viya,
tika-vin06t:876_40: teneva vuttaṃ sayaṃkārivāre “na kappatī”ti ettakameva vattabba’nti.
tika-vin06t:883_1: Kosiyakārakoti ettha kosaṃ karontīti “kosakārā”ti laddhavohārānaṃ pāṇakānaṃ kosato nibbattaṃ kosiyaṃ nāma.
tika-vin06t:883_6: Attanā ca parehi ca vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpetītiādicatukkampi sambhavantaṃ na dassitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:883_8: yadidaṃ ekasmiṃ tike vā catukke vā dassite itaraṃ sambhavantampi na vuccatīti.
tika-vin06t:886_1: Suddhakāḷakānanti ettha yathā paṭhame “ekenapi kosiyaṃsunā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:886_2: tathā idha “ekenapi aññena amissetvā”ti vacanābhāvato aññehi missabhāve satipi apaññāyamānarūpakaṃ “suddhakāḷaka”micceva vuccatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:889_1: “Dhārayitvā dve tulā ādātabbā”ti vacanato yathā tulādhāraṇāya kāḷakā adhikā na honti,
tika-vin06t:889_2: tathā kāḷakānaṃ dve bhāvā gahetabbā ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena.
tika-vin06t:889_6: Mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “ekassapi kāḷakalomassa atirekabhāve nissaggiya”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:889_8: acittakattā pana sikkhāpadassa pubbe tulāya dhārayitvā ṭhapitesu ekampi lomaṃ tattha pateyya nissaggiyanti adhippāyoti no takko.
tika-vin06t:889_11: Na hi lomaṃ gaṇetvā tulādhāraṇā karīyati.
tika-vin06t:889_14: “Gocariyaodātesu ekameva diguṇaṃ katvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin06t:892_1: Navaṃ nāma karaṇaṃ upādāyāti idaṃ ādikaraṇato paṭṭhāya vassagaṇanaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:892_2: Karitvā vāti vacanaṃ niṭṭhānadivasato paṭṭhāyāti dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:892_3: Dhāretabbanti vacanaṃ pana paribhogato paṭṭhāyāti dīpeti,
tika-vin06t:892_4: yasmā laddhasammutikassa gatagataṭṭhāne channaṃ channaṃ vassānaṃ oratova katāni bahūnipi honti,
tika-vin06t:892_5: tasmā aññaṃ navanti kiṃ katato aññaṃ,
tika-vin06t:892_8: tesu aññataraṃ dukkataṃ vā paribhogajiṇṇaṃ vā puna kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:892_9: tañca kho vināpi purāṇasanthatassa sugatavidatthiṃ appaṭisiddhapariyāpannattā.
tika-vin06t:892_15: satiyāpi sammutiyā aññaṃ navaṃ na vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo?
tika-vin06t:892_17: niṭṭhānadivasato paṭṭhāya channaṃ channaṃ vassānaṃ paricchedo veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:892_18: Tattha ca sattame vasse sampatte chabbassāni paripuṇṇāni honti.
tika-vin06t:892_24: Tañca kho paribhuttaṃ vā hotu aparibhuttaṃ vā,
tika-vin06t:892_26: Yasmā “navaṃ nāma karaṇaṃ upādāya vuccatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:892_27: tasmā channaṃ vassānaṃ parato tameva pubbakataṃ dukkatabhāvena,
tika-vin06t:892_32: tadeva aññaṃ navaṃ nāma hoti karaṇaṃ upādāya,
tika-vin06t:892_34: Aññathā “navaṃ nāma karaṇaṃ upādāyā”ti iminā na koci viseso atthi.
tika-vin06t:892_45: “Navaṃ nāma karaṇaṃ upādāya vuccatī”ti vutte atirekacīvarassa uppatti viya paṭilābhenassa uppatti navatā āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:892_50: tasmā navaṃ nāma karaṇameva upādāya vuccati,
tika-vin06t:892_52: Orena channaṃ vassānaṃ attano anuppannattā “nava”nti saṅkhyaṃ gataṃ,
tika-vin06t:892_55: tathā kareyya vā kārāpeyya vāti ca na hoti. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:895_3: Tattha kiñcāpi “evaṃ bhanteti kho te bhikkhū”ti bahuvacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:895_4: tathāpi te bhikkhū bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā idha tesu bhikkhūsu koci bhagavantaṃ nāssudha upasaṅkamati aññatra ekenāti attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin06t:895_5: Taṃ suggāhaṃ ekāhaṃ bhante bhagavantaṃ varantiādīsu viya,
tika-vin06t:895_7: yathāsukhaṃ maṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamantūti dassanatthāya upasaṅkamantu.
tika-vin06t:896_4: Kiṃ sabbepi te cīvaraṃ na bujjhantīti ce?
tika-vin06t:896_15: Evaṃ sante siddhā santhate cīvarasaññitā kambalasīsena uṇṇāmayasāmaññato.
tika-vin06t:896_20: pubbeva tattha acīvarasaññino eteti katvā tattha cīvarasaññitāya tadubhayaṃ na yujjatīti.
tika-vin06t:896_25: aññathā “cīvaraṃ nāma channaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññatara”nti ettāvatā siddhaṃ “vikappanupagaṃ pacchima”nti na vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:897_0: Apica santhate cīvarasaññitā na kevalaṃ tesaṃyeva,
tika-vin06t:897_1: aññesampi anubandhati eva “purāṇasanthataṃ nāma sakiṃ nivatthampi sakiṃ pārutampī”ti vacanato.
tika-vin06t:897_4: Apica evaṃ santepi santhate cīvarasaññitā anubandhati eva.
tika-vin06t:897_5: Khandhake hi “nisīdanaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetu”nti ca,
tika-vin06t:897_6: parivāre “nava cīvarāni adhiṭṭhātabbānī”ti ca nisīdanasikkhāpade “dasā vidatthī”ti ca idha “nisīdanaṃ nāma sadasaṃ vuccatī”ti ca vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:897_7: aṭṭhakathāyañcassa “santhatasadisaṃ santharitvā ekasmiṃ ante sugatavidatthiyā vidatthimattapadese dvīsu ṭhānesu phāletvā tisso dasā karīyanti,
tika-vin06t:897_8: tāhi dasāhi sadasaṃ nāma vuccatī”ti ca “nisīdanaṃ vuttanayena adhiṭṭhātabbameva,
tika-vin06t:897_11: tasmā nisīdanaṃ nāma navannaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:897_15: Tasmiṃ siddhe siddhā santhate cīvarasaññitāti attho. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:898_1: kathaṃ adasameva santhataṃ cīvarasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati.
tika-vin06t:898_5: Asanthatapariyāpannattā orena ca channaṃ vassānaṃ vināpi sammutiṃ,
tika-vin06t:898_11: Tañca na niyamato “purāṇasanthataṃ nāma sakiṃ nivatthaṃ sakiṃ pārutampī”ti vuttattāti.
tika-vin06t:898_13: na ettha kāraṇaṃ pariyesitabbaṃ vinayapaññattiyā anaññavisayattā.
tika-vin06t:899_1: ādito “tīṇi santhatāni pana vinayakammaṃ katvā paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭantī”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanato tāni akappiyānīti siddhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:899_2: bhagavatā ca khomādīni cha anuññātānīti koseyyaṃ kappiyanti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:899_3: Evaṃ sante suddhakoseyyampi cīvaraṃ kappiyaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-vin06t:899_9: tasmā na santhataṃ cīvaraṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin06t:900_1: kasmā panettha “santhataṃ pana bhikkhunā”ti sikkhāpadaṃ apaññāpetvā “nisīdanasanthata”nti paññattanti?
tika-vin06t:900_2: Cīvarasaññitāya santhatānaṃ ujjhitattā tesaṃ acīvarabhāvadassanatthaṃ tathā paññattanti vuttaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:900_3: tasmā te bhikkhū dhutaṅgabhedabhayā tāni ujjhitvā terasāpi dhutaṅgāni samādiyiṃsu,
tika-vin06t:900_6: tato nesaṃ evaṃ hoti “nisīdanacīvarasaṇṭhānampetaṃ nisīdanasanthataṃ no anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin06t:900_8: Tato santhate nesaṃ cīvarasaññitā na bhavissatīti tadatthaṃ bhagavatā nisīdanasanthatanti paññattanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:903_1: Addhānamaggappaṭipannassāti iminā pakatiyā dīghamaggappaṭipannassa uppannānipi tiyojanaparamameva haritabbāni,
tika-vin06t:903_4: Teneva vāsādhippāyassa paṭippassaddhagamanussāhattā “appaṭipanno”ti saṅkhyaṃ gatassa anāpattīti siddhā.
tika-vin06t:903_5: Imasmiṃ atthavikappe hi bhikkhuno paneva eḷakalomāni uppajjeyyuṃ…pe…
tika-vin06t:903_6: asantepi hārake addhānaṃ maggappaṭipannassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyanti yojanā veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:903_7: Ākaṅkhamānena bhikkhunā paṭiggahetabbānīti attano santakānaṃyeva tiyojanātikkame āpattiṃ dasseti.
tika-vin06t:903_8: Tena anākaṅkhamānena parasantakāni paṭiggahitāni atirekatiyojanaṃ harantassa anāpatti siddhā.
tika-vin06t:903_11: Porāṇagaṇṭhipade ca “aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ harāpento gacchati ce,
tika-vin06t:903_13: tasmā dve bhikkhū tiyojanaparamaṃ patvā aññamaññassa bhaṇḍaṃ parivattetvā ce haranti,
tika-vin06t:903_20: tena haritepi āpattiyevā”ti ekaṃsato na vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:903_24: “aññassa yāne vā bhaṇḍe vā ajānantassa pakkhipitvā tiyojanaṃ atikkāmeti,
tika-vin06t:903_26: atha ubhopi ekato ekaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ harāpenti,
tika-vin06t:903_28: Anissaggiyanti yuttiyā virujjhati “tiyojanaparamaṃ sahatthā haritabbāni asante hārake”ti avisesena ca pāḷi vuttā.
tika-vin06t:903_30: Sacetanopi eḷakalomabhāvaṃ vā “ahamidaṃ harāmī”ti vā “maṃ esa idaṃ harāpetī”ti vā jānanājānanavasena duvidho hoti.
tika-vin06t:903_31: Tattha acetano nāma hārako nadīsoto vā nāvā vā assāmikayānaṃ vā hoti.
tika-vin06t:903_33: Tattha “maṃ esa idaṃ harāpetī”ti ettakaṃ jānantaṃ manussaṃ vā tiracchānagataṃ vā aññaṃ harāpeti,
tika-vin06t:903_38: “aññassa yāne vā bhaṇḍe vā ajānantassā”ti vacanato pana sacetanova hārako tattha adhippetoti paññāyati,
tika-vin06t:903_39: so ca eḷakalomabhāvañca “idaṃ harāmī”ti ca jānanto nādhippeto.
tika-vin06t:903_45: “Ajānantassa pakkhipitvā”ti pāḷiyaṃ “esa harāpetī”ti vā “idaṃ ṭhānaṃ atikkamāpetī”ti vā jānantassa yāne
tika-vin06t:903_46: vā bhaṇḍe vā pakkhipitvā tiyojanaṃ atikkamāpeti,
tika-vin06t:904_1: tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sāmikassa ajānantassevā”ti idaṃ “maṃ esa harāpetī”ti evaṃ ajānantaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:904_2: “Sāreti codeti anubandhāpetī”ti idaṃ “maṃ esa idaṃ ṭhānaṃ atikkamāpetī”ti evaṃ jānantaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:904_5: Atha sāraṇādīhi anatikkamitvā attano ruciyā atikkamati āpatti eva bhikkhuno hetukattubhāvāsambhavato.
tika-vin06t:905_4: saddaṃ gahetvā asante eva hārake nissaggiyaṃ,
tika-vin06t:905_5: sati pana hārake na tena harāpentassa nissaggiyanti ayaṃ dutiyo attho.
tika-vin06t:905_7: attano vā dhanenā”ti iminā kiñcāpi acittakamidaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ,
tika-vin06t:905_8: saṅghādito pana attanā ākaṅkhamānena paṭiggahitasseva eḷakalomassa tiyojanātikkame āpatti,
tika-vin06t:905_9: na ajānato appaṭiggahitassa cīvarādīsu kutoci laggassa atikkamaneti dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:905_10: Anugaṇṭhipade pana “kambalassa upari nipajjitvā gacchantassa sace ekampi lomaṃ cīvare laggaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:905_12: taṃ kambalassa paṭiggahitattā attano icchāya paṭiggahitameva hotīti yuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:905_22: Acittakattā cāti bhikkhuno ussāhānurūpaṃ lomānaṃ tiyojanātikkamanato vināpi payogacittena haraṇacittena āpajjati evāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:905_23: Sā anāpatti pāḷiyā na sametīti anto pana payogena tiyojanaparamaṃ atikkamitattā anāpatti.
tika-vin06t:905_24: “Tiyojanaṃ haratī”ti iminā tiyojanaṃ padasā netukāmopi antotiyojane pade pade dukkaṭaṃ nāpajjatīti dasseti,
tika-vin06t:905_25: taṃ yuttaṃ “tiyojanaṃ vāsādhippāyo gantvā tato paraṃ haratī’ti vacanassatthitāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:905_26: Punapi vuttaṃ “aññaṃ harāpetīti ‘idaṃ harissāmī’ti saussāhameva aññaṃ harāpetīti attho.
tika-vin06t:905_29: Sace pana “agacchante yāne vā”tiādinā nayena vuttattā haraṇādīhi janitaussāhānaṃ hatthiādīnaṃ ‘idaṃ karissāmā’ti
tika-vin06t:905_30: vā ‘harissāmā’ti vā ābhoge janite eva anāpatti,
tika-vin06t:905_31: na ajaniteti upatissatthero āhā”ti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:905_32: Parivattetvā ṭhapiteti dvinnampi bahi nikkhipitattāti upatissatthero.
tika-vin06t:905_33: Bahisīmāya ṭhapitaṃ bhaṇḍikaṃ anto antosīmāyaṃ ṭhapitaṃ bahi karoto anāpattīti keci,
tika-vin06t:909_1: Kiñcāpi purāṇacīvaradhovanasikkhāpade cīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā “aññaṃ parikkhāraṃ dhovāpetī”ti anāpattivāre vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:909_2: Imassa pana sikkhāpadassa uppannakālato paṭṭhāya eḷakalomadhovāpanādinā āpattīti eke.
tika-vin06t:909_23: anāpattī”ti aniṭṭhappasaṅgato anāpatti evāti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:909_24: akatabhaṇḍassa suddhalomassa vijaṭāpanaṃ ito vā dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:909_25: Udakādidhovanavasena piṇḍetvā ṭhitānaṃ vijaṭāpanaṃ labbhatīti ce?
tika-vin06t:909_27: na ca taṃ yuttaṃ “aparibhuttaṃ dhovāpetī”ti vacanato.
tika-vin06t:909_33: Na hi ettha “purāṇāni eḷakalomāni dhovāpeyya vā”ti vacanaṃ atthi purāṇacīvarasikkhāpade viya.
tika-vin06t:909_47: anāpattī”ti vacanappamāṇato anāpatti evāti ce? Na,
