tika-vin06t:909_49: “Aparibhuttaṃ dhovāpetī”ti vacanameva hi taṃ aparibhuttaṃ santhataṃ vijaṭāpentassa anāpattīti dīpeti ce?
tika-vin06t:912_2: “Muttā maṇi veḷuriyo saṅkho’tiādi pana kiñcāpi rājasikkhāpade ‘na vaṭṭatī’ti pasaṅgato vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:912_3: sarūpato pana āpattidassanavasena sakaṭṭhānepi vattumāraddha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:912_6: na hi tāni idha pāḷiyaṃ dissantīti imassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttāni,
tika-vin06t:912_11: Pāḷiyaṃ pana sarūpato “cīvaracetāpannaṃ nāma hiraññaṃ vā suvaṇṇaṃ vā muttā vā maṇi vā”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:912_13: Muttāmaṇiggahaṇena cettha tajjātiyaggahaṇaṃ siddhamevāti nāgato imassa paṭhamameva paññattattā.
tika-vin06t:912_14: Yadi evaṃ idha anāgatattā kataraṃ nesaṃ sakaṭṭhānanti?
tika-vin06t:913_4: Tesu ca dasasu ratanesu rajatajātarūpadvayaṃ idha nissaggiyavatthu,
tika-vin06t:913_6: Idha ca siddhattā eva ratanasikkhāpadassa anāpattivāre “ratanasammataṃ vissāsaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin06t:913_19: tasmā na āmakamaṃsaṃ sutte āgatampi dukkaṭavatthu hoti,
tika-vin06t:913_20: tathāpi attano paribhogatthāya paṭiggahaṇe dukkaṭamevāti no takkoti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:913_23: Kappiyañca akappiyañca nissāya ṭhitanti ettha taṃ sayaṃ aparibhogārahaṃ hutvā tadagghanakaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin06t:913_26: guttaṭṭhānācikkhanassa kappiyattā ca kappiyaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:913_27: ‘Idaṃ gaṇhā’tiādinā vadantassa akappiyattā akappiyaṃ nissāya ṭhita”nti ca.
tika-vin06t:913_29: kiṃ na passasīti chekatare imeva kahāpaṇe”tiādivacanassa kappiyattā kappiyaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:913_30: “Idaṃ gaṇhā”ti vutte dubbicāritattā attano akappiyattā tato āgataṃ akappiyaṃ nissāya ṭhitameva hoti.
tika-vin06t:913_31: “Idaṃ gaṇhā’ti vutte tena gahite ‘uggaṇhāpeyya vā’ti vuttavidhiṃ na pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin06t:913_32: kevalaṃ dubbicāritattā tasseva taṃ akappiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:913_33: mūlapaṭiggahaṇassa suddhattā parato pattacatukke tatiyapatto viyāti ca evaṃ upatissatthero vadatī”ti anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:913_36: Dubbicāraṇāya sati akappiyaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ hotīti no takkoti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:913_37: “Evaṃ saṅghagaṇādīnampi atthāya pariccattepi tena samānagatikattā ṭhapetvā āpattivisesa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:914_2: “Upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapetvāti sace so upāsako ‘atibahuṃ etaṃ hiraññaṃ,
tika-vin06t:914_3: idaṃ bhante ajjeva na vināsetabba’nti vatvā sayaṃ upanikkhepadese ṭhapeti,
tika-vin06t:914_5: etaṃ upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapetvā tato laddhaṃ udayaṃ paribhuñjanto saṅgho paccaye paribhuñjati nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:915_2: Evaṃ aṅgasampannopi aparabhāge lobhavasena vā aññena vā kāraṇena sace nimittaṃ katvā pāteti,
tika-vin06t:915_7: ṭhānanisajjādivasena nivāsādhippāye sati paribhoge paribhoge paccavekkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:915_14: Ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:915_19: “Sati paccaye”ti vacanato nāyaṃ viseso labbhatīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:915_22: Sannidhisikkhāpade hi “anāpatti yāvakālikaṃ yāvakālaṃ nidahitvā bhuñjati.
tika-vin06t:915_23: Yāmakālikaṃ yāme nidahitvā bhuñjatī”ti ettha vacanappamāṇato yāmakālikaṃ na purebhatte,
tika-vin06t:915_26: na rattiyaṃ yāmameva nidahitvā bhuñjantassa anāpattīti aniṭṭhappasaṅgo.
tika-vin06t:915_28: sattāhakālikaṃ sattāhaṃ nidahitvā bhuñjatī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:915_32: katthaci na hotīti vacanāniyamato āpattiyāpi aniyamo siyā.
tika-vin06t:915_41: anāhāratthāya gaṇhantassa āpattisambhavato itaraṃ āhāratthāya gaṇhantassa viya,
tika-vin06t:916_1: tena vuṭṭhānampi desanā eva nāma hotīti.
tika-vin06t:916_2: “Paṭiggaṇhātī”ti avatvā “paṭisevatī”ti vuttattā paṭiggahaṇe pana satiṃ akatvā paribhoge karontassa anāpatti.
tika-vin06t:916_13: Yathādānameva gahitattāti ettha “attano hatthena ce deti,
tika-vin06t:916_15: “atirekabhāgaṃ gahetvā punadivase attano atthāya uddhaṭabhāgaṃ tattheva dāpeti,
tika-vin06t:916_22: “Alabbhamānāya sāmaggiyā anāpatti sambhoge saṃvāse”ti iminā upasampadakkhandhakavacanalesena.
tika-vin06t:917_1: Assatiyā dinnanti ettha “assatiyā dinnaṃ nāma apariccattaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:917_2: tasmā dussante baddhakahāpaṇādīni satiṃ paṭilabhitvā dāyakā ce puna gaṇhanti,
tika-vin06t:917_4: Tena akappiyabhaṇḍena te ce dāyakā sappiādīni kiṇitvā saṅghassa denti,
tika-vin06t:917_6: Bhikkhunā hi ‘vatthaṃ gaṇhāmī’ti vatthasaññāya eva gahitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:917_8: Idañca sikkhāpadaṃ attano atthāya uggahaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:917_9: na ca tena taṃ attano atthāya paresaṃ vā atthāya gahitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:917_10: Atha te dāyakā no ce āgantvā gaṇhanti,
tika-vin06t:917_11: dāyake pucchitvā attano atthāya ce pariccattaṃ,
tika-vin06t:917_12: saṅghe nissajjitvā āpatti desetabbā. No ce,
tika-vin06t:917_15: Āpattidesanāya hi sati rūpiyaṃ paṭiggahitanti siddhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:917_16: tasmiṃ siddhe “tato uppannaṃ tassapi kappatī”ti idaṃ na yujjatīti.
tika-vin06t:917_18: vatthuṃ anissajjitvā āpatti desetabbāti na yujjati.
tika-vin06t:917_22: aññathā sabbattha “rūpiya”nti padaṃ niratthakaṃ hoti vināpi tena tadatthasiddhito.
tika-vin06t:917_25: vatthagatampi rūpiyaṃ theyyacittena gaṇhanto padavārena kāretabbo.
tika-vin06t:917_26: Aṭṭhakathāyañca “rūpiye arūpiyasaññīti suvaṇṇādīsu kharapattādisaññī”ti vuttaṃ “rūpiyaṃ paṭiggaṇhātī”ti vacanavasena.
tika-vin06t:918_1: teneva hi “imasmiṃ gehe idaṃ laddhanti sallakkhetabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:918_3: vimatiyā ca sati nissaggiyameva “rūpiye vematiko”tiādi vacanatoti.
tika-vin06t:918_6: Dussante baddhakahāpaṇādi assatiyā dinnaṃ vatthasaññāya paṭiggahitañca,
tika-vin06t:918_7: tato na rūpiyaṃ dinnañca hoti paṭiggahitañcāti.
tika-vin06t:918_10: Tato uppannaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍañca sabbesaṃ kappatīti imassa vidhānantaradassanatthaṃ “apica puññakāmā”tiādīti no takkoti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:921_5: nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ garukassa cetāpitattā”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanato ca pana anukkaṭṭhaparicchedopettha labbhatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:921_6: Satthuvaṇṇo ca kahāpaṇo ca tato ye caññe vohāraṃ gacchantīti evamettha samuccayo veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:921_7: Imasmiṃ pana sikkhāpade “nānappakārakaṃ nāma katampi akatampi katākatampī”ti ettha vibhattānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:921_8: rūpiyārūpiyānañca dvinnaṃ vasena pañca tikā vuttā,
tika-vin06t:921_9: aṭṭhakathācariyehi tadanulomato eko tiko dassitoti sabbe cha honti.
tika-vin06t:922_1: aññasmiṃ sikkhāpade ekasmiṃ tikacchede dassite satipi sambhave itare na dassīyanti,
tika-vin06t:922_6: Atha ca rūpiyassa vibhaṅge “ye vohāraṃ gacchantī”ti ante vuttattā satthuvaṇṇādayo vaḷañjanupagā evāti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:922_7: Tato avaḷañjanupagehi jātarūparajatehi vohārena na nissaggiyanti āpajjati,
tika-vin06t:922_8: tasmā taṃ āpajjanatthanti dassentena “katena kataṃ cetāpetī”tiādayo tikā vuttāti,
tika-vin06t:922_9: evaṃ sante rūpiyavibhaṅge “ye ca vohāraṃ gacchantī”ti na vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:922_10: tasmiṃ pade avutte avaḷañjanupagāpi saṅgahaṃ gatāva hontīti katādīhi tikattayassa vattabbapayojanaṃ na bhavissatīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:922_12: “Ye vohāraṃ gacchantī”ti vacanenapi kamuka kathala kaṃsabhājana sāṭakādiparivattanassapi rūpiyasaṃvohārabhāvappasaṅgo evāti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:922_14: tasmā ubhayenapi yadetaṃ katākatādibhedaṃ pākatikarūpiyaṃ yañca kahāpaṇamāsakasaṅkhepaṃ,
tika-vin06t:922_16: ubhayampetaṃ idha ca anantarātītasikkhāpade ca rūpiyaṃ nāmāti adhippetatthasiddhi hoti,
tika-vin06t:923_1: ettha hi yathāvuttappabhedaṃ nissaggiyavatthu rūpiyaṃ nāma,
tika-vin06t:923_2: sesaṃ dukkaṭavatthupi kappiyavatthupi na rūpiyanti arūpiyaṃ nāma hotīti katvā “arūpiye arūpiyasaññī pañcannaṃ
tika-vin06t:923_3: sahadhammikānaṃ anāpattī”ti idaṃ na ekaṃsikaṃ āpajjati dukkaṭavatthumhi dukkaṭāpajjanato.
tika-vin06t:923_4: Idha vacanappamāṇato nissaggiyavatthuto aññaṃ antamaso muttādipi arūpiyameva nāma.
tika-vin06t:923_5: Tattha pañcannaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ anāpattīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:923_7: Tattha hi “muttā vā maṇi vā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:923_8: tasmā muttādi akappiyaṃ dukkaṭavatthūti ca siddhaṃ nissaggiyavatthūsu abhāvā.
tika-vin06t:923_9: Evaṃ sante “arūpiye arūpiyasaññī pañcannaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ anāpattī”ti suddhakappiyabhaṇḍaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:923_11: Tato aññattha pana “arūpiye rūpiyasaññī”tiāditikadukkaṭe ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dassitatike ca sabbaṃ arūpiyaṃ nāmāti veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:923_14: Kasmā na pāḷiyaṃ so vuttoti ce?
tika-vin06t:923_16: Tasmiñhi tike vutte kappiyavatthunopi arūpiyachaḍḍanakasammuti dātabbāti āpajjati,
tika-vin06t:923_17: tassa vasena rūpiyachaḍḍanakasammuti eva na vattabbāti? Na,
tika-vin06t:923_19: tasmā rūpiye rūpiyasaññī kappiyavatthuṃ cetāpeti pattacatukke tatiyapattaṃ viya,
tika-vin06t:923_21: nissaṭṭhaṃ pana aññesaṃ kappati tatiyapatto viya.
tika-vin06t:923_22: Atha sampaṭicchitarūpiyena cetāpitaṃ hoti dutiyapatto viya,
tika-vin06t:923_23: taṃ vināpi sammutiyā yo koci bhikkhu chaḍḍeti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:923_24: Tato paraṃ “sace tattha āgacchati ārāmiko vā”tiādinā vuttanayeneva paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:923_25: Tattha “rūpiye”ti vā “arūpiye”ti vā sabbattha bhummappatte attano santakaṃ,
tika-vin06t:923_28: iminā suddhāgamena kappiyakārakassa hatthe kappiyaṃ nissāya ṭhitena saṃvohāro vāritoti.
tika-vin06t:924_2: aparāparaparivattane imināti ettha ekasmiṃ eva vatthusmiṃ dvinnaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ vasena ekato āpatti vuttā,
tika-vin06t:924_5: Parassa rūpiyaggahaṇaṃ parivattananti rūpiye aggahite tassa abhāvato imināva āpatti,
tika-vin06t:924_7: Musāvādena musā vadantassāpi hi omasavādeneva āpatti.
tika-vin06t:924_9: eseva nayoti etassa yuttiṃ dassento “yo hi aya”nti āha.
tika-vin06t:925_0: Vaḍḍhiṃ payojentassāti ettha idaṃ gahetvā sati māse,
tika-vin06t:925_8: Tassapi paribhoge mūlassa kappiyakaraṇūpāyo ce na hoti,
tika-vin06t:925_9: kappiyaṃ ācikkhitabbanti yathā pāḷiyā cettha kappiyakaraṇūpāyo,
tika-vin06t:925_12: tathā saṅghādiatthāya gahitepi eso vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:925_13: Ime kira paṭhamadutiyapatte yāva gahaṭṭhena parivatteti,
tika-vin06t:925_16: Anugaṇṭhipade pana “saṅghasantakaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ vikkiṇitvā āgatakahāpaṇānipi paṭiggahaṇaṃ mocetvāva sampaṭicchitabbāni,
tika-vin06t:925_17: tasmā kappiyakārako ce imāni tāni kahāpaṇānīti vadati,
tika-vin06t:928_4: “Kayitañca hoti vikkayitañcā”ti etesaṃ padānaṃ viparītato “attano bhaṇḍa”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:933_1: Bahū patte sannicayanti ettha sannicayanti bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ,
tika-vin06t:933_2: bahū patte vā gahetvā sannicayaṃ karissantīti attho.
tika-vin06t:937_2: “Byañjanassa mattā nāma odanato catuttho bhāgo”ti brahmāyusuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā ālopassa catutthabhāgaṃ byañjanaṃ anurūpanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:937_3: “Bhikkhuniyā pattasannicayassa vāritattā tadanulomato bhikkhūnampi dutiyo vārito”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:937_6: So hi kathinakkhandhake nicayasannidhi viya ekopi punadivase “sannicayo”ti vuccati.
tika-vin06t:937_8: tasmā dve patte adhiṭṭhātuṃ na labhati.
tika-vin06t:938_1: “Pākassa hi ūnattā pattasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchatī”ti vacanato adhiṭṭhitapattopi kharapākena setattā adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:938_3: tasmā paṭhamapākānaṃ eva ūnattā pattasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati,
tika-vin06t:938_4: tasmiṃ sati aññaṃ viññāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:938_6: rājiyā vā hi sati tehi adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatīti vijahite nāyaṃ paṭisedho,
tika-vin06t:939_0: Evaṃ pattakārako mūlaṃ labhitvāti ettha pacitvā ṭhapitadivasato paṭṭhāya.
tika-vin06t:942_1: Bahū patte viññāpentīti ekamekaṃ viññāpentā bahū bhikkhū bahū patte viññāpenti,
tika-vin06t:942_2: bahū vā bhikkhū patte viññāpentīti attho. “Na,
tika-vin06t:942_6: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ ūnapañcabandhanena samūhataṃ hoti na hotīti?
tika-vin06t:942_10: tasmā taṃ “paṭilābhena nissaggiyo hotī”ti iminā samūhataṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:942_11: Aññathā sadukkaṭaṃ nissaggiyaṃ āpajjati anāpattivāravirodho ca.
tika-vin06t:942_12: Yā kāci pana akataviññatti ananuññātakāle dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin06t:945_1: “Sā ahosi suvaṇṇamālā”ti vacanato ṭhapetvā sahadhammike aññesaṃ yathāsukhaṃ rūpiyaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭati uggaṇhāpetuṃ,
tika-vin06t:946_1: “Yesaṃ maṃsaṃ kappatī”ti vacanena yesaṃ maṃsaṃ na kappati,
tika-vin06t:946_10: Khādiṃsūti “vikāle kevalaṃ navanītameva khāditukāmena dadhitakkagatāni apanetabbāni,
tika-vin06t:946_11: pacitukāmassa sāmaṃpākaṃ na hotīti therassa adhippāyo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:946_12: “Khayaṃ gamissatī”ti vacanato khīraṃ pakkhipitvā pakkasappi vikāle kappatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:946_20: sattāhātikkantehipi katatelaṃ katadivasato paṭṭhāya sattāhaṃ vaṭṭatīti chāyā dissati,
tika-vin06t:947_1: Avasakasaṭe yasmā khīrādīni pakkhipitvā telaṃ pacanti,
tika-vin06t:947_5: Vasāya saddhiṃ pakkattā na vaṭṭatīti ce? Vadatha, bhante,
tika-vin06t:947_13: Tathā ucchu vā raso vā sakasaṭo yāvakāliko,
tika-vin06t:948_3: Tesu cāyaṃ udakasambhedo garukaṃ lahukaṃ karoti,
tika-vin06t:948_6: udakasambhedo pana tāni ambapānādisamaññaṃ datvā lahukāni yāmakālikāni karoti.
tika-vin06t:948_7: “Phāṇitaṃ nāma ucchumhā nibbattanti ucchurasaṃ upādāyā”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanato ucchuraso sattāhakālikoti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:948_8: Tattha “udakasambhedo taṃ yāmakālikaṃ karotī”tiādiṃ bahuṃ vatvā yojitā.
tika-vin06t:949_2: ucchurasa”nti anuññātattā guḷodakaṃ viya ucchurasasāmaññato udakena asambhinnopi agilānassa vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:949_5: Keci panāhu “phāṇitaṃ nāma ucchumhā nibbatta’nti vacanato,
tika-vin06t:949_10: ucchurasa’nti visuṃ anuññātattā asambhinnopi agilānassa vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:949_11: Keci “vuttanayena visuṃ anuññātattā eva sambhinno vā asambhinno vā yāmakālikova,
tika-vin06t:949_13: Keci “guḷodakaṃ viya so duvidhopi sattāhakālikoyevā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:950_1: phāṇitānumatiyāyeva ucchurasānumatiyā siddhito visuṃ “ucchurasa”nti uddharitvā anumati niratthikāti āpajjati,
tika-vin06t:950_2: tathā “ucchuraso nikasaṭo pacchābhattaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti aṭṭhakathāpi niratthikā.
tika-vin06t:950_7: Kālabhedaṃ anapekkhitvā rasādhikāre otiṇṇattā vuttoti ce?
tika-vin06t:950_9: Pacchābhattaṃ vaṭṭanakarasādhikārattā na vattabbanti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:950_10: evañhi vutte tadaññaraso viya ayampi pacchābhattameva vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:950_12: Tato paraṃ aparibhogattā “pacchābhattaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttanti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:950_14: Na so pasaṅgo ābhidosikassāpi ucchurasassa pākena phāṇitādibhāvappasaṅgato.
tika-vin06t:950_18: Phāṇitaṃ nāma ucchumhā nibbattanti madhukatālanāḷikeraphāṇitādito ukkaṭavatthuto nissaggiyavatthuphāṇitassa visesavacanaṃ,
tika-vin06t:950_19: tenetaṃ paññāyati “nissaggiyavatthubhūtaṃ idha phāṇitaṃ nāma ucchumhā nibbattameva,
tika-vin06t:950_22: na taṃ sabbaṃ phāṇitameva nāmāti sādhitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:950_23: Teneva khandhake phāṇitaṃ paṭhamaṃ anujānitvāva pacchā ucchuraso anuññāto,
tika-vin06t:951_0: Ucchurasaṃ upādāya apakkā vātiādimhi pana yesaṃ laddhi “ucchuraso yāmakāliko”ti.
tika-vin06t:951_1: “Te apakkā vāti sāmaṃ bhikkhunā apakkā vā.
tika-vin06t:951_2: Avatthukapakkā vāti vinā vatthunā pakkā vā”ti atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti,
tika-vin06t:951_3: taṃ na yuttaṃ “ucchurasaṃ upādāyā”ti imassa vacanassa payojanābhāvappasaṅgato,
tika-vin06t:951_6: Sāmaṃ apakkassa ucchurasassa tesaṃ attanomatiyā phāṇitabhāvasiddhito ca parato “purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitena
tika-vin06t:951_8: tattha “aparissāvitaucchurasena sayaṃkataṃ nirāmisameva vaṭṭatī”ti vacanaṃ yaṃ tattha kasaṭaṃ sāmapākaṃ na janeti,
tika-vin06t:951_10: tasmā paṭiggahetuṃ na vaṭṭati vikāleti porāṇā.
tika-vin06t:951_11: “Koṭṭitaucchuphāṇitaṃ ‘rajanapākaṃ viya oḷārikaṃ savatthukapakkaṃ nāma hotī’ti saññāya purebhattameva vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:951_16: Atthameva dassetuṃ mahāpaccariyaṃ tathā vuttanti upatissatthero āha kira.
tika-vin06t:952_1: “Āhāratthaṃ pharituṃ samatthānī”ti khandhake “yaṃ bhesajjañceva assa bhesajjasammatañca lokassa,
tika-vin06t:953_2: Kasāvapakkhepamattena hi tāni attano sabhāvaṃ pariccajitāni honti,
tika-vin06t:953_8: Adhiṭṭhānampi mukhāruḷhiyā vuttaṃ “imaṃ navanītaṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti avattabbato.
tika-vin06t:954_1: Paribhuñjituṃ pana na vaṭṭatīti vissāsābhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:954_7: Tasmā ubhinnaṃ santakaṃ cīvaraṃ aññatarena sammukhībhūtena adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:954_12: sakabhāvaṃ na upetī”ti iminā etaṃ sadisaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin06t:954_13: ābhidhammikagaṇānaṃ dinnaṃ viya ca na hoti. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:954_19: na ca dve tayo bhikkhū “ekato vassissāmā”ti karonti,
tika-vin06t:954_26: tasmā taṃ cīvaraṃ dvīsu sammukhībhūtena ekena adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:954_27: Kiñcāpi ettha payogo na dissati samānaparikkhārānaṃ dvinnaṃ adhiṭṭhānapayogābhāvato,
tika-vin06t:954_28: tathāpi samānasabbabhaṇḍakānaṃ dvinnaṃ telādi yena paṭiggahitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:954_32: Ettha pattacīvarañhi attano santakabhāvaṃ upagatameva anadhiṭṭhahantassa kālātikkame āpatti,
tika-vin06t:954_33: sattāhakālikaṃ pana parasantakasādhāraṇampi paṭiggahitaṃ paṭiggāhakassa kālātikkame āpattikaraṃ.
tika-vin06t:954_39: Idañca kālātikkantampi nissajjitvā pacchā laddhaṃ kappati.
tika-vin06t:954_40: Pattacīvaraṃ pana taṃ tassa vinayakammanti kappatīti.
tika-vin06t:954_48: Eko ce pattacīvaraṃ dasame divase itarassa deti.
tika-vin06t:954_49: Tato paṭṭhāya so dasa divase pariharituṃ labhati,
tika-vin06t:954_50: na tathā sattāhakālikanti sabbathā upaparikkhiyamānaṃ sarikkhaṃ nakkhamatīti na taṃ sārato daṭṭhabbanti ācariyassa takko.
tika-vin06t:954_51: “Vinayakammavasena pana anissajjitvā sahasā virujjhitvā kassaci pariccattampi puna paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:954_54: taṃ idha ṭhitena bhikkhunā ekassa vantena cittena cattaṃ katvā anapekkhitvā āpattiṃ desetvā tassa vissāsena puna gahetvā adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:954_57: “Dvinnaṃ santakaṃ ekena paṭiggahitaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ sattāhātikkame āpattiṃ na karoti,
tika-vin06t:954_58: paribhuñjituṃ pana dvinnampi na vaṭṭatī”ti ca “parasantakaṃ paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitepi eseva nayo”ti ca keci vadanti.
tika-vin06t:954_59: Dukkaṭavatthubhūtaṃ sappiādi nissajjitabbaṃ puna paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti vidhānaṃ na dissatīti.
tika-vin06t:957_1: “Ekameva katvā”ti vacanena vassikasāṭikalakkhaṇena ñātakānampi satuppādaṃ karontena ekameva gahetabbanti dhammasiritthero.
tika-vin06t:957_2: Catubbidhaṃ khettanti ettha kiñcāpi tividhaṃ dissati,
tika-vin06t:957_11: adhiṭṭhānakhettena pacchimena purimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ gāho hoti,
tika-vin06t:957_13: Karaṇakhettena pana ekasseva purimassa gāho hotīti.
tika-vin06t:957_14: Ettha pana kiñcāpi karaṇakhettanivāsanakhettānaṃ kālato nānattaṃ natthi,
tika-vin06t:957_18: kathaṃ panettha nānattaṃ natthīti paññāyatīti ce? Pāḷito,
tika-vin06t:957_19: “aḍḍhamāso seso gimhānanti katvā nivāsetabba”nti hi pāḷi,
tika-vin06t:958_2: Samantapāsādikāyaṃ pana katthaci potthake “jeṭṭhamūlapuṇṇamāsiyā pacchimapāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva kāḷapakkhuposatho,
tika-vin06t:958_14: “Māso seso gimhānanti vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesitabba”nti ettakameva hi vuttaṃ, na,
tika-vin06t:958_15: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ayameko addhamāso pariyesanakhettañceva karaṇakhettañcā”ti vuttattāti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:958_27: “Māso seso gimhānanti addhamāso seso gimhāna”nti ettha iti-
tika-vin06t:958_29: Parato āpattikhettadassanato itarassa anāpattikhettabhāvo dassitova hoti.
tika-vin06t:958_31: pakatiyā vassikasāṭikadāyakā nāma saṅghassa vā puggalassa vā apavāretvā anusaṃvaccharaṃ dentā,
tika-vin06t:959_2: cha māse parihāraṃ labhatī”ti vacanato antovassepi yāva vassānassa pacchimadivasā akatā parihāraṃ labhatīti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:959_5: “Cha māse parihāraṃ labhatī”ti vacanena akatā labhatīti siddhameva,
tika-vin06t:959_10: evaṃ kathinabbhantare uppannacīvarampi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva paṭipajjitabba”nti anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:959_14: “Yadi nappahoti yāva kattikapuṇṇamā parihāraṃ labhatī”ti vacanaṃ appahontassa yāva kattikapuṇṇamā tāva parihārakhettaṃ,
tika-vin06t:959_15: tato paraṃ ekadivasopi na hotīti dīpeti,
tika-vin06t:959_16: tasmā appahonakabhāvena akatāva yāva kattikapuṇṇamā parihāraṃ labhati,
tika-vin06t:959_18: Tathā tadeva vacanaṃ kataparihāraṃ na labhatīti dīpeti,
tika-vin06t:960_3: tasmā eva “antodasāhe vā tadaheyeva vā adhiṭṭhātabbā’ti ca sāmaññato na vattabbaṃ gimhadivasānaṃ adhiṭṭhānakhettabhāvappasaṅgato”ti.
tika-vin06t:960_7: paṭhamadivase ca laddhā niṭṭhitā vassikasāṭikā dasāhātikkantāpi vassūpanāyikadivasaṃ adhiṭṭhānakhettaṃ appattattā na ca tāva nissaggiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:961_0: Antodasāhe adhiṭṭhātabbāti idaṃ na avisesena etasmiṃ antare gimhadivasepi adhiṭṭhātabbanti imamatthaṃ dīpetuṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:961_4: na khettanti katvā dasāhaṃ atikkamitabbanti dīpetuṃ vuttaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:961_6: tasmā akhettadivasepi gaṇetvā khette eva “antodasāhe adhiṭṭhātabbā”ti vuttaṃ hotīti.
tika-vin06t:964_4: “Cīvara”nti vuttattā “acīvaraṃ acchindantassa na nissaggiya”nti vuttameva hoti.
tika-vin06t:964_5: “Datvāti datvā vā dāpetvā vā”ti kiñcāpi padabhājanaṃ yujjati,
tika-vin06t:964_6: aññassa pana santakaṃ aññassa bhikkhuno dāpetvā taṃ sayaṃ vā acchindeyya,
tika-vin06t:964_7: teneva vā acchindāpeyyāti aniṭṭhappasaṅgabhayā na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:964_8: atthato pana attano santakaṃ aññena saddhivihārikādinā dāpetvā,
tika-vin06t:964_9: aññassa santakaṃ vā tassa vissāsā dāpetvā taṃ acchindeyya vā acchindāpeyya vā nissaggiyanti veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:964_11: Yadi evaṃ “cajitvā dinnaṃ acchinditvā gaṇhanto bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo”ti idaṃ kinti ce?
tika-vin06t:964_12: Sakasaññāya aggahetvā aññāya theyyāya gaṇhantaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:964_13: teneva vuttaṃ “sakasaññāya gahitattā panassa pārājikaṃ natthī”ti,
tika-vin06t:964_15: tassa vā vissasanto gaṇhātī”ti vacanatopi taṃ siddhameva.
tika-vin06t:964_16: Ettāvatā tāvakālikaṃ katvā dinnaṃ acchindantassa anāpatti sādhitā hoti.
tika-vin06t:964_17: “Amhākaṃ santike upajjhaṃ gaṇhissatī”tiādivacanaṃ sāmaṇerassa dānaṃ dīpeti,
tika-vin06t:964_19: Pāḷiyaṃ upasampanne tikapācittiyaṃ viya anupasampanne tikadukkaṭampi āgatanti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:964_21: Anupasampannakāle evaṃ datvā aññassa santike upasampannaṃ disvā kupito ce acchindati,
tika-vin06t:964_22: upasampannasseva vā “sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya tumhākaṃ santike upasampajjissāmī”ti vadantassa datvā puna acchindati ce,
tika-vin06t:965_6: taṃ āṇattiyā bahuttā “sabbāni gaṇhā”ti vadantassa gāhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:965_14: vacīkammaṃ pana kevalaṃ acchindāpentasseva “dehī”ti balakkārena gaṇhatopi veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:965_15: taṃ na yuttaṃ “anāpatti so vā detī”ti vacanato.
tika-vin06t:965_18: ubhayattha attano ruciyā dānaṃ sandhāya vuttattā,
tika-vin06t:965_20: “Bhikkhussa sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā’ti pāḷivacanato ca mātikāṭṭhakathāya aṅgavavatthāne ‘upasampannatā’ti
tika-vin06t:965_21: vuttattā ca ubhayattha dānaharaṇesu bhikkhubhāvo icchitabboti dīpetī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin06t:965_23: Anupasampannassa cīvaraṃ datvā taṃ upasampannakāle acchindantassa anāpattippasaṅgato.
tika-vin06t:965_24: “Anupasampannassa cīvaraṃ vā aññaṃ vā parikkhāraṃ datvā…pe…
tika-vin06t:965_25: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato dukkaṭaṃ tattha hotīti ce?
tika-vin06t:965_27: dānakāle eva upasampannatā pamāṇanti asiddhametaṃ aṭṭhakathāya vā pāḷiyā vā yuttito vā,
tika-vin06t:965_29: Anupasampannassa cīvaraṃ datvā tasseva anupasampannakāleyeva cīvaraṃ acchindantassa dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin06t:965_30: upasampannakāle vā datvā anupasampannakāle acchindantassa dukkaṭanti tassa vacanassa idaṃ vikappantarañca sambhavati,
tika-vin06t:965_31: tasmā vikappantarassa sambhavato ca na yuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:965_32: yasmā anupasampannakāle datvā upasampannakāle acchindantassa visuṃ dukkaṭaṃ na paññattaṃ,
tika-vin06t:965_33: tasmā purāṇacīvaradhovāpanādisikkhāpadesu viya aparabhāge upasampannatā cettha pamāṇaṃ,
tika-vin06t:965_34: tasmā “upasampannatā”ti aṅgesu vuttattā ca taṃ na yuttanti attho.
tika-vin06t:968_2: mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “cīvaratthāya sāmaṃ viññattaṃ sutta”nti avatvā kevalaṃ “cīvaratthāya viññāpitasutta”nti
tika-vin06t:968_3: aṅgesu vuttattā aññena cīvaratthāya viññattaṃ suttampi saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:968_6: tathāpi “sāmaṃ vāyāpeyyā”ti attano atthāya vāyāpeyyāti evaṃ sambandho,
tika-vin06t:968_9: tasmā sāmaṃ viññattaṃ suttanti aññaviññattaṃ kappiyaṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin06t:968_17: “Paṭilābhenāti vacanena vāyāpetvā ṭhapessāmītiādi ekasmiṃ antogadhaṃ hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:971_1: Visiṭṭhaṃ kappañca tassa vacanena visiṭṭhaṃ katañca pamāṇaṃ,
tika-vin06t:974_5: te pana bhikkhū tassa vacanassa atthaṃ micchā gahetvā accekacīvaraṃ nikkhipantā cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmesuṃ.
tika-vin06t:974_12: avibhattaṃ pana saṅghikattā na kassaci nissaggiyaṃ karoti.
tika-vin06t:975_0: Apica “accekacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā nikkhipitu”nti iminā sāmaññavacanena vassūpanāyikadivasato paṭṭhāya,
tika-vin06t:975_1: piṭṭhisamayato paṭṭhāya vā yāva pavāraṇā nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati eva saṅghikattā,
tika-vin06t:975_7: catutthavasse vā “pavāraṇāya gaṇhathā”tiādinā dinnampi nikkhipitvā yathādānameva gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:975_9: Tāni cīvarakālasamayātikkame na nissaggiyānīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:975_11: Yasmā ayaṃ samayo “kālepi ādissa dinna”nti ettha “kālo”ti āgato,
tika-vin06t:975_13: tasmā idha tesaṃ ekatthatādassanatthaṃ ekato “cīvarakālasamayo”ti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:975_14: Mātikāyaṃ panettha tādisaṃ cīvaraṃ attano santakabhāvaṃ upagataṃ puggalikaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:975_16: Attano kuṭiyā vassaṃvutthassa bhikkhuno hi dātuṃ alabhanto antovasse eva dānakiccaṃ pariniṭṭhāpetvā gacchati,
tika-vin06t:975_18: Tasmā idaṃ accekacīvaraṃ atthi uppannakālato paṭṭhāya saṅghassa vā puggalassa vā santakabhāvaṃ upagacchantaṃ,
tika-vin06t:975_20: atthi uppannakālato paṭṭhāya anupagantvā vassaṃvutthakāleyeva puggalassa vā saṅghassa vā upagacchantaṃ,
tika-vin06t:975_22: atthi samaye dinnampi puggalassa santakabhāvaṃ anupagacchantaṃ,
tika-vin06t:975_25: Idaṃ atirekasaṃvaccharampi nikkhipituṃ labhati attano santakabhāvaṃ anupagatattā,
tika-vin06t:975_26: tasmā “dasāhānāgata”nti ito aññaṃ sandhāya vuttanti siddhametanti.
tika-vin06t:975_27: Dasāhato puretaraṃ labhitvā yāva pavāraṇā nikkhipituṃ na labhati,
tika-vin06t:975_32: Saññāṇaṃ katvā nikkhipitabbakaṃ pana parassa dātabbatāya sakabhāvaṃ anupagataṃ,
tika-vin06t:975_35: na ca taṃ imasmiṃ atthe nissaggiyaṃ hoti saṅghassa nissaggiyābhāvato,
tika-vin06t:975_39: tato “sallakkhetvā sukhaṃ dātuṃ bhavissatī”ti iminā hi parassa santakabhāvo dassito.
tika-vin06t:976_0: “Tato paraṃ ekadivasampi parihāro natthīti dasāhaparamato uddhaṃ anupagatattā”ti likhitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:976_1: ito samayato uddhameva dasāhassa anupagatattā samayato paraṃ dasāhaṃ na labhatīti kirassa adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:976_2: “Etaṃ parihāraṃ labhatiyevā”ti ettha “ekādasamaṃ aruṇaṃ cīvaramāse uṭṭhetī”ti kāraṇaṃ likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:976_3: Anugaṇṭhipade pana “anadhiṭṭhahitvā ekādasadivase nikkhipituṃ labhatī’ti vadanto bhagavā itarampi anaccekacīvarādiṃ anujānāti,
tika-vin06t:976_8: atthate kathine dasadivasādhikā pañcamāsā”ti iminā sameti,
tika-vin06t:976_12: Imassa nayassa vasena “pañcamito paṭṭhāya uppannassa cīvarassa nidhānakālo dassito hotī”ti pāṭho yujjati.
tika-vin06t:976_14: tassa vasena “kāmañcesa dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabbanti imināva siddho,
tika-vin06t:976_15: aṭṭhuppattivasena pana apubbaṃ viya atthaṃ dassetvā sikkhāpadaṃ ṭhapita”nti ayaṃ pāṭho yujjati.
tika-vin06t:976_21: “dasāhānāgata”nti pāḷiyā saṃsandanato ca ettha gaṇṭhipadaladdhipi pāḷiyā sameti.
tika-vin06t:977_1: Yasmā pavāraṇādivase aruṇuggamane bhikkhu vassaṃvuttho hoti,
tika-vin06t:977_2: tasmā iminā dasamena ahena saddhiṃ chaṭṭhito paṭṭhāya navadivasā dasa ahānīti dasāhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:977_6: Yathā aparakattikapuṇṇamāya vassikasāṭikaṃ paccuddharitvā vikappento “cātumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ tato paraṃ vikappetu”nti vuccati,
tika-vin06t:977_12: Paṭhamakathinena siddhattā”ti porāṇaṭṭhakathāgaṇṭhipadesu vuttattā tato upari “accekacīvara”nti vuccati,
tika-vin06t:977_19: “Bhikkhū accekacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmentī”ti ettha ettikā eva hi aṭṭhuppatti.
tika-vin06t:977_20: Tathā hi parivāre “kismiṃ vatthusmi”nti ārabhitvā ettakameva vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:977_22: itaraṃ atikkāmetabbanti dassanatthaṃ idaṃ paññattanti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:977_25: “kāmañcesa dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabbanti imināva siddho”tiādivacanavirodhato ca yathāvuttavacanāsambhavato ca.
tika-vin06t:978_1: Dasāhena saha kattikapuṇṇamā “anāgatā”ti hi vutte dasāhato aññā sā puṇṇamāti āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:978_4: na hi attanāva attano yogo sambhavati, anāgata-
tika-vin06t:978_6: Āgatā sampattā eva hi sā puṇṇamā.
tika-vin06t:978_7: Cīvarasamayassa anantarattā ekībhāvaṃ anāgatattā anāgatāyevāti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:978_15: sā ca puṇṇamā na kadāci samayabhāvaṃ pāpuṇātīti ayuttameva.
tika-vin06t:978_16: “Tato paraṃ vikappetu”nti pana vacanaṃ piṭṭhisamayaṃ gahetvā ṭhitattā sambhavati.
tika-vin06t:978_17: Apica pavāraṇāyaṃ aruṇe ca uṭṭhite sā puṇṇamā cīvarasamayaṃ ekāhānāgatā evāpajjati pubbe sahayogapattattā.
tika-vin06t:978_18: Evaṃ sante ekībhāvagatāpi sā cīvarasamayaṃ anāgatā eva jātāti sabbadā na tathāviggahakaraṇavacanatthaṃ kocideva vacanato dīpetīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:979_2: Pañcamiyañhi pure aruṇaṃ uppannaaccekacīvarassa dasadivasādhiko māsoyeva paripūroti katvā tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:979_3: Apica tassā pañcamiyā divasabhāgopi sampattāya rattiyā “hiyyo”ti vuccati,
tika-vin06t:979_7: “Evaṃ sante ‘chaṭṭhito paṭṭhāyā’ti vuttapaṭhamapāṭhassa vasena ‘anaccekacīvarampi paccuddharitvā ṭhapitaṃ
tika-vin06t:979_8: ticīvarampi etaṃ parihāraṃ labhatiyevā”’ti ca “dasadivasādhiko māso”tiādi ca yaṃ likhitaṃ. Taṃ na,
tika-vin06t:979_9: “pañcamito paṭṭhāyā”ti pāṭhe sajjiteva etena pariyāyena yathāvuttaatthasambhavato,
tika-vin06t:979_13: “Pavāraṇāmāsassa juṇhapakkhapañcamito paṭṭhāyā”ti pāṭhe sajjite etena pariyāyena yathāvutto uppannassa cīvarassa nidhānakālo dassito hoti,
tika-vin06t:979_15: “Chaṭṭhito paṭṭhāyā”ti ca “kāmañcesa dasāhaparama”ntiādi ca yaṃ likhitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:979_17: tasmā ekādasadivasaṃ parihāraṃ labhatīti katvā ācariyena “pañcamito paṭṭhāyā”ti likhāpito kira.
tika-vin06t:979_18: “Pavāraṇāmāsassa juṇhapakkhachaṭṭhito paṭṭhāya pana uppannaṃ anaccekacīvarampi paccuddharitvā ṭhapitaṃ
tika-vin06t:979_19: ticīvarampi etaṃ parihāraṃ labhatiyevāti pāṭho”ti ca “accekacīvarassa anatthate kathine ekādasadivasādhiko māso,
tika-vin06t:979_20: atthate kathine ekādasadivasādhikā pañcamāsāti pāṭho”ti ca ettha papañcenti,
tika-vin06t:982_1: “Tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaranti idaṃ ticīvare eva ayaṃ vidhi,
tika-vin06t:982_3: “Atirekachārattaṃ vippavasantī”ti tasmiṃyeva senāsane vāso na vippavāsoti katvā vuttaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:982_5: Ettha kiñcāpi “āraññakaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima”nti vacanato atirekatopi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:983_3: “Siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno kocideva paccayo tena cīvarena vippavāsāyā”ti vacanato.
tika-vin06t:983_5: “puna gāmasīmaṃ okkamitvā vasitvā pakkamatī”ti anāpattivāre anuññātattā.
tika-vin06t:983_6: Yadi evaṃ “yojanappamāṇe na labhatī”ti idaṃ kinti?
tika-vin06t:983_18: “Anāpatti puna gāmasīmaṃ okkamitvā vasitvā pakkamatī”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:983_19: Gāmasīmā nikkhamitvā kittakaṃ kālaṃ vasitvā pakkamitabbanti ce?
tika-vin06t:983_21: tasmā aṭṭhamo aruṇo nibaddhāvāse vā gantabbaṭṭhāne vā uṭṭhetabboti eke.
tika-vin06t:983_30: Sace antarā navamaggapātubhāvena vā navagāmasannivesena vā,
tika-vin06t:983_32: Tadaheva cīvaraṃ gahetabbaṃ vā paccuddharitabbaṃ vā.
tika-vin06t:983_38: gāmasīmāyaṃ avasitvā pacchimappamāṇayutte ṭhāne vasitvā pakkamitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:983_41: Porāṇagaṇṭhipade “yathāvuttasenāsane vasantenāpi chārattameva cīvaraṃ gāme nikkhipitabbanti adhippāyena
tika-vin06t:983_42: aññaṃ antochārattampi aññampi vasato āpattiyevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:986_1: Dethāvuso amhākanti ettha akataviññatti hoti na hotīti? Hoti,
tika-vin06t:986_2: yadi evaṃ aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadassa ca imassa ca kiṃ nānākaraṇanti?
tika-vin06t:986_9: Evaṃ sante idaṃ taṃ antokatvā ṭhitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:986_10: tasmā dvinnampi aṅgasampattiyā sati kena bhavitabbanti?
tika-vin06t:986_20: Ettha paṭhamo vādo ayutto katvāpi okāsaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ,
tika-vin06t:986_22: Yadi evaṃ tattha aṅgesu “anaññapariṇatatā”ti vattabbanti ce?
tika-vin06t:986_35: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti etthāpi “aññasaṅghassa aññapuggalassā”ti na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:986_37: āpatti dukkaṭassā’ti ettha ca ‘attanopī’ti kiñcāpi na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:986_39: Taṃ pana idha attano pariṇāmanādhikārattā imassa sikkhāpadassa na vuttanti eke.
tika-vin06t:986_40: Tatuttarisikkhāpade “aññassatthāyā”ti padaṃ viyāti eke. Taṃ na,
tika-vin06t:989_3: Aññassa pariṇataṃ attano vā parassa vā pariṇāmeyya dukkaṭanti,
tika-vin06t:989_4: tasmā aññātakaviññattiādīsu vuttāpattisambhavato idha pariṇatadvaye “attano”ti padaṃ na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:989_6: avutte panetesu vuttāpattīnaṃ yathāgamamaññatarā ca idha avuttasiddhi dukkaṭañcāti dve āpattiyo ekato
tika-vin06t:989_7: hontīti vinayadharānaṃ anavasesañāṇassa okāso kato hotīti.
tika-vin06t:1001_1: Vādakkhittoti ettha avisesena vādajappavitaṇḍasaṅkhāto tividhopi kathāmaggo “vādo” icceva vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:1001_2: Tesu “titthiyehi saddhi”nti vacanato ṭhapetvā vādaṃ “sesā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1001_4: tathā pubbe kiñci vacanaṃ paṭijānitvā pacchā avajānāti.
tika-vin06t:1001_5: Evaṃ vā aññathā vā aññenaññaṃ paṭicarati.
tika-vin06t:1001_6: Evaṃ pavatto sampajānamusā bhāsaṃ paṭissuṇitvā asaccāyanto saṅketaṃ katvā visaṃvādento evaṃ so vādakkhitto
tika-vin06t:1001_7: samāno pācittiyavatthuñca paripūrento vicaratīti evamadhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:1001_8: Attano vādeti ettha “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti paṭhamamāraddhe attano vāde.
tika-vin06t:1001_11: “Nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sukha”nti vuttattā pana taṃ na dukkhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1001_13: Ayaṃ paravādī “yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā”ti suttaṃ dassetvā siddhantaṃ sambhametvā “virodhi viruddho”ti vuttaṃ
tika-vin06t:1001_14: dosaṃ āropessatīti tasmiṃ paṭhamavāde kañci dosaṃ sallakkhento āropite vā dose anāropite vā “nāyaṃ mama
tika-vin06t:1001_16: “anattā iti nicchayā”ti ca suttaṃ disvā tassa paṭhamavādassa niddosataṃ sallakkhetvā “mameva ayaṃ vādo”ti tameva pacchā paṭijānāti.
tika-vin06t:1001_17: Evaṃ tattha yathāvuttamānisaṃsaṃ sallakkhento taṃ paṭijānitvā yadi anattā sabbe dhammā,
tika-vin06t:1002_1: saddo sabhāvavācīti evaṃ āropite vā dose anāropite vā dosoti sallakkhetvā “nāyaṃ mama vādo”ti tameva paṭhamavādaṃ pacchā avajānāti.
tika-vin06t:1002_2: Atha so paravādī sapakkhaṃ paṭisedhe paṭijānanattāpanayanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1002_3: Paṭijānāti patyāssa iti vacanato “paṭiññā aññā so nāma te niggaho”ti vutto.
tika-vin06t:1002_4: Sabhāvātirittaṃ atthaṃ paṭisedhādhippāyato sabhāvato atirittaṃ bālaparikappitamattānaṃ sandhāya “anattā sabbe dhammā”ti me paṭiññātakathā,
tika-vin06t:1002_5: sā ca tadavatthāyevāti na me taṃ paṭiññātattāpanayanaṃ atthi,
tika-vin06t:1002_6: “nāyaṃ mama vādo”ti avajānanaṃ pana sabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ attānaṃ sandhāya “anattā sabbe dhammā”ti na vadāmīti
tika-vin06t:1002_7: adhippāyena katanti iminā aññena kāraṇena taṃ pubbe paṭiññātattāpanayanaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicchādeti.
tika-vin06t:1002_9: saddassa sabhāvavācittā”ti idaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca tena pubbe paṭiññātattāpanayanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin06t:1002_10: Tamaññakāraṇaṃ pacchā dassitena aññena kāraṇena paṭicchādetīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:1003_0: Yasmā na kevalaṃ yathādassitanayena so atthameva avajānāti,
tika-vin06t:1003_3: tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “jānitabbato”ti paṭhamaṃ kāraṇaṃ vatvā paravādinā “yadi jānitabbato aniccaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1003_4: nibbānaṃ te aniccaṃ siyā”ti vutte “na mayā ‘jānitabbato’ti kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1003_6: taṃ tayā badhiratāya aññena sallakkhitantiādīni vadatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:1003_8: “Avajānitvā puna paṭijānanto taṃ avajānanaṃ iminā paṭicchādeti nāmā”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1004_0: 2. Jānitvā jānantassa cāti jānitvā vā jānantassa vāti atthadvayaṃ dīpetīti.
tika-vin06t:1005_4: taṃsamuṭṭhāpikā cetanāti ubhayaṃ vuttanti mātikāyaṃ ubhinnaṃ saṅgahitattā.
tika-vin06t:1005_5: Vibhaṅge taṃ vacanaṃ yasmā vinā viññattiyā natthi,
tika-vin06t:1005_7: “Evaṃ vadato vacana”nti lokavohārena vatvā paramatthato dassento “taṃsamuṭṭhāpikā vā cetanāti vutta”nti ca vadati.
tika-vin06t:1006_2: anena vā upacārajjhānavasena na mayā abyāvaṭo mato,
tika-vin06t:1006_3: “na mayā pavanto paṭo diṭṭho”tiādiṃ bhaṇantassa ca paramatthasuññataṃ upādāya eva “itthiṃ na passāmi,
tika-vin06t:1006_4: na ca purisa”nti bhaṇantassa ca na musāvādo.
tika-vin06t:1010_1: “Puna are patteti puna taṃ ṭhānaṃ parivaṭṭetvā āgate aññasmiṃ are”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1010_3: Puna areti puna tasmiṃyeva are bhūmiṃ patteti atthoti keci,
tika-vin06t:1010_11: Dhanañca naṃ alābhesīti yathā so dhanaṃ alabhi,
tika-vin06t:1011_13: Vītarāgatādīhi akkosantopi kileseheva kira akkosati nāma,
tika-vin06t:1011_14: tathā “sotāpanno”ti akkosanto āpattiyā akkosati nāmāti eke.
tika-vin06t:1012_0: 16. Sabbattha vadetīti uddeso. Bhaṇatīti vitthāro. Vadetīti vā iminā paraviññāpanaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:1013_6: ukkaṭṭhena ukkaṭṭha”nti jātyādīsu ekekasmiṃ catudhā catudhā dassitauddesakkamassa nidassanaṃ “eva”nti iminā karoti.
tika-vin06t:1013_7: “Hīnena hīnaṃ vadetī”ti vuttaṭṭhāneyeva hi “evaṃ vadetī”ti vutte so ākāro nidassito hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:1013_8: Aññathā aññāpadesena so ākāro na sambhavatīti āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:1013_13: “Santi idhekacce caṇḍālā”tiādinā hi aniyamaniddesena caṇḍālaṃ vā acaṇḍālaṃ vā sandhāya bhaṇantassa āpattīti aniyamattho sambhavatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:1013_14: Yadi evaṃ ettakameva vattabbaṃ tāvatā pubbe dassitauddesakkamanidassanasiddhitoti? Na,
tika-vin06t:1013_15: “vadetī”ti iminā ayojite “eva”nti pade imaṃ nāma ākāraṃ dassetīti anavabodhato.
tika-vin06t:1013_16: Aññāpadesanayepi paraviññāpaneyeva dukkaṭapācittiyaṃ viyāti niyamanapayojanaṃ vā “vadetī”ti padanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1013_17: Atha vā attano samīpe ṭhatvā aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ āṇāpento hīnena hīnaṃ vadeti bhaṇati,
tika-vin06t:1013_19: Sace sayaṃ hīno hīnena hīnaṃ caṇḍālaṃ…pe…
tika-vin06t:1013_20: pukkusaṃ “pukkuso”ti bhaṇati āpatti vācāya vācāya pācittiyassa,
tika-vin06t:1013_23: Aññathā “vadeti bhaṇatī”ti etesaṃ aññataraṃ ubhayattha anaññāpadesavāraaññāpadesavāresu,
tika-vin06t:1013_24: visesena vā aññāpadesavāresu niratthakaṃ āpajjati vināyeva tena vacanasiliṭṭhatāsambhavato.
tika-vin06t:1013_25: Attato pāḷiyaṃ avuttattā panettha “sāṇattika”nti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1013_27: Asammukhā vadantassa dukkaṭaṃ “sammukhā pana sattahipi āpattikkhandhehi vadantassa dukkaṭa”nti andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā.
tika-vin06t:1016_4: Tiṇṇampi bhikkhubhāvatoyeva nipajjanato “bhikkhūnaṃ pesuññe”ti bahuvacanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin06t:1017_2: pukkusoti bhaṇatī”ti vatvā pesuññaṃ upasaṃharatīti yojanā.
tika-vin06t:1017_4: Ettha anupasampannavāro labbhamānopi na uddhaṭo omasavāde dassitanayattā,
tika-vin06t:1017_6: Tathā hi ante tīṇi dukkaṭāni dassitāni.
tika-vin06t:1017_7: Tāni pana dassento bhagavā yasmā “upasampannassa sutvā upasampannassa pesuññaṃ upasaṃharatī”ti vuttānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1017_8: dvinnaṃ padānaṃ aññataravipallāsavasena vā ubhayavipallāsavasena vā pācittiyanti katvā dvepi tāni ekato
tika-vin06t:1017_10: tasmā sabbapaṭhamaṃyeva “upasampanno upasampannassa sutvā upasampannassa pesuññaṃ upasaṃharati,
tika-vin06t:1017_12: “Dvīsu panetesu yasmā pārājikaṃ ajjhāpannopi upasampanno tādisaṃyeva upasampannaṃ khuṃsetukāmo omasati,
tika-vin06t:1017_15: tasmā ‘upasampanno’ti idaṃ ādipadaṃ sabbattha vutta”nti keci vadanti,
tika-vin06t:1017_18: tasmā kevalaṃ mātikāyaṃ bhikkhupadābhāvatoyeva “bhaṇati upasaṃharatī”ti padānaṃ kārakaniddesābhāve asambhavato eva taṃ ādipadaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1017_21: na bhedādhippāyassā”ti upasaṃharaṇāpekkhaṃ sāmivacanaṃ tuṇhībhūtassa vacanappayojanābhāvato,
tika-vin06t:1020_1: Sabbametaṃ padaso dhammo nāmāti ettha dhammo nāma buddhabhāsitoti evaṃ sambandho.
tika-vin06t:1020_7: Gāthābandhepi ca esa nayoti ekameva akkharaṃ vatvā ṭhānaṃ labbhati eva.
tika-vin06t:1020_8: “Evaṃ me suta”ntiādisuttaṃ bhaṇāpiyamāno ekāraṃ vatvā tiṭṭhati ce,
tika-vin06t:1021_3: Kiñcāpi apalāladamanampi sīlupadesopi bhagavato kāle uppanno,
tika-vin06t:1021_4: atha kho tesu yaṃ yaṃ buddhavacanato āharitvā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1021_5: taṃ tadeva āpattivatthu hotīti viññāpanatthaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vadantī”ti vacanehi sithilaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin06t:1021_6: Buddhavacanato āharitvā vuttassa bahulatāya tabbahulanayena tesu āpatti vuttā,
tika-vin06t:1021_9: Sace ācariyo ṭhito nisinnānaṃ pāṭhaṃ deti,
tika-vin06t:1021_10: “na ṭhito nisinnassa dhammaṃ desessāmī”ti vuttāpattiṃ nāpajjatīti eke.
tika-vin06t:1021_11: Tesampi pāṭhadānaṃ dhammadesanato na aññanti taṃ na yuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1022_0: “Ubho atthaṃ na jānanti, ubho dhammaṃ na passare;
tika-vin06t:1023_0: Yo cāyaṃ mantaṃ vāceti, yo cādhammenadhīyatī”ti. ;
tika-vin06t:1024_2: Sekhiyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “dhammaparicchedo panettha padasodhamme vuttanayena veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1024_3: tasmā ayameva dhammo sabbattha dhammapaṭisaṃyuttasikkhāpadesu veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:1024_4: Yadi evaṃ saṅkhārabhāsādivasena cittadhammaṃ desentassa sekhiyavasena anāpatti siyā,
tika-vin06t:1024_8: Ayañhi tattha adhippāyo “bāhirakaganthasaṅkhātampi mantaṃ ucce āsane nisinnassa vācetuṃ me bhikkhave amanāpaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1024_12: amanāpaṃ nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa mantaṃ vācetuṃ,
tika-vin06t:1024_14: dhammaṃ desetu”nti hi ayaṃ pāḷi yathāvuttameva adhippāyaṃ dīpeti, na aññaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1024_15: Teneva “mantaṃ vācetuṃ dhammaṃ desetu”nti vacanabhedo kato.
tika-vin06t:1025_0: Mayā saddhiṃ mā vadātiādimhi pana anugaṇṭhipade evaṃ vutto “sace bhikkhu sāmaṇerena saddhiṃ vattukāmo,
tika-vin06t:1025_1: tathā sāmaṇeropi bhikkhunā saddhiṃ vattukāmo sahasā opāteti,
tika-vin06t:1025_2: ‘yebhuyyena paguṇaṃ ganthaṃ bhaṇantaṃ opātetī”tiādīsu viya anāpatti,
tika-vin06t:1025_3: na hi ettāvatā bhikkhu sāmaṇerassa uddisati nāma hoti.
tika-vin06t:1025_6: Sace tattha vicāretvā paṭikkhittaṃ siyā āpatti,
tika-vin06t:1025_9: atha kho naṃ ‘ekato mā vadā’ti paṭikkhipitvāpi ekato vadanto āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:1025_10: Avattukāmassa sahasā virajjhitvā ekato vadantassa anāpatti,
tika-vin06t:1025_11: tena vuttaṃ ‘mayā saddhiṃ mā vadāti vutto yadi vadati,
tika-vin06t:1025_13: Tathāpi ācariyānaṃ matimanuvattantena evarūpesu ṭhānesu yathāvuttanayeneva paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:1025_16: Sace tattha anāpattiavacanaṃ na sambhavati ayamaṭṭhānattā”ti.
tika-vin06t:1026_1: “mayā saddhiṃ mā vadā”ti vutto yadi vadati,
tika-vin06t:1026_4: Atha sāmaṇerena byattatāya “mayā saddhiṃ mā vadā”ti vutto bhikkhu abyattatāya vadati,
tika-vin06t:1026_8: Sace bhikkhu evaṃ “mayā saddhiṃ mā vadā”ti vatvā tena saddhiṃ sayaṃ vadati,
tika-vin06t:1026_11: Yadi etaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ kiriyākiriyaṃ bhaveyya, yuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1026_13: Mahāpaccariyaṃ imināva adhippāyena “mayā saddhiṃ mā vadā”ti vuttaṃ siyā.
tika-vin06t:1026_14: Na hi sāmaṇerassa kiriyā idha pamāṇanti,
tika-vin06t:1026_15: imasmiṃ pana adhippāye vutte atiyuttaṃvāti attho.
tika-vin06t:1026_17: Kiñcāpi “yañca padaṃ yañca anupadaṃ yañca anvakkharaṃ yañca anubyañjanaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1026_22: akkharakkharāya āpatti pācittiyassā”ti idameva dvayaṃ yojitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1026_28: “Akkharānubyañjanasamūho pada”nti ca vuttattā padamattameva vattabbaṃ tena anupadādittayaggahaṇatoti ce?
tika-vin06t:1026_30: Padena vācento hi pade vā anupade vā anubyañjane vā āpattiṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:1026_32: Akkharena vācento pana padādīsu aññatarasmiṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:1026_33: Na hi “varo varaññū varado varāharo”tiādimhi paṭhamaṃ va-
tika-vin06t:1026_45: Idañhi vacanaṃ ekasmiṃ pade ekā āpattīti dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:1026_46: “Rūpaṃ aniccanti vuccamāno rūti opātetī”ti vacanato sakalaṃ pādaṃ vācentassa paṭhamaakkharamatte ekato vutte āpattīti siddhanti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:1026_48: tasmā rūti opātetīti vattuṃ asambhavato rū-
tika-vin06t:1026_49: kārassa yathāvuttadhammapariyāpannabhāvasiddhito taṃ avatvā kevalaṃ akkharāya vācentassa yathāvuttadhammapariyāpannaakkharabhāvadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:1026_51: vacanasiliṭṭhatāvasena vā anubyañjane vedanāvacanaṃ viyāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1029_6: taṃ tesampīti upajjhāyādīnaṃ santikaṃ agantvā sahaseyyaṃ kappeyyāti pāṭhaseso.
tika-vin06t:1030_1: “Anupasampanno nāma bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso’ti vuttattā mātugāmo anupasampannoti catuttharattiyaṃ mātugāmo
tika-vin06t:1030_6: Dutiyasikkhāpade mātugāmo nāmāti manussitthiṃyeva gahetvā yakkhī petī tiracchānagatā pārājikavatthubhūtā na gahitā tesu dukkaṭattā.
tika-vin06t:1030_8: atha kasmā paṭhamasikkhāpade pācittiya”nti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1030_10: tassatthaṃ dīpetuṃ andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “bhūmiyaṃ vinā jagatiyā pamukhaṃ sandhāya kathita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1030_14: “Tīṇi ca divasāni dukkaṭakhette vasitvā catutthe divase sahaseyyāpattipahonake sayati,
tika-vin06t:1033_1: “Atha kho te manussā”ti ca “te addhikā”ti ca pāṭho.
tika-vin06t:1033_4: Paṇḍake pāḷiyaṃ dukkaṭassa vuttattā “ubhatobyañjanehi mūlāpattīti dissatī”ti,
tika-vin06t:1033_5: “animittādayo itthiyovā”ti ca vadanti ubhatobyañjanake vuttaṃ viya.
tika-vin06t:1033_7: anupādinnapakkhe ṭhitattā pana idha āpattiṃ na karoti.
tika-vin06t:1036_1: “Viññū paṭibalā”ti vacanato aviññū itthiyāpi desentassa anāpatti.
tika-vin06t:1036_2: Idha yakkhīādayo manussitthī viya anoḷārikattā dukkaṭavatthukā jātā.
tika-vin06t:1036_3: Tiracchānagatamanussaviggahitthiyā paṭibalatāya vuttattā itarāpi dukkaṭavatthuyevāti eke.
tika-vin06t:1036_5: “Aṭṭhakathādipāṭhaṃ ṭhapetvā damiḷādinā yathāruci kathetuṃ labhati kirā”ti likhitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1036_7: tathā purisaviggahaṃ gahetvā ṭhitena yakkhādinā saddhiṃ ṭhitassa mātugāmassa dhammaṃ desento dukkaṭaṃ anāpajjitvā kasmā pācittiyamāpajjatīti ce?
tika-vin06t:1039_4: Te ariyamissakā na hontīti dvepi ekasadisānīti mama takko.
tika-vin06t:1039_7: “Sabbepi bhūtaṃ bhagavāti puthujjanaariyānaṃ uttarimanussadhammassa ārocitattā ‘bhūta’nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1039_8: na attano uttarimanussadhammaṃ sandhāyāti apare”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1043_1: “Teneva hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocesī”ti pāṭho sampatipāṭho sundaro.
tika-vin06t:1044_1: Tattha “kamma”nti vuttaajjhācārepi pariyāpannattā taṃ tassa daṇḍakammavatthu.
tika-vin06t:1047_5: Suddhacittāti kiñcāpi “evaṃ pavaṭṭite pathavī bhijjissatī”ti jānanti,
tika-vin06t:1047_9: Keci “sabbacchannādīsu upaḍḍhe dukkaṭassa vuttattā sace dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1047_12: idha pana jātapathavī ca ajātapathavī cāti dveyeva vatthūni,
tika-vin06t:1047_13: tasmā dvinnaṃ ekena bhavitabbanti na yuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1048_1: Aggiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti ettha ettāvatā usumaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin06t:1048_3: Evaṃ sati pathaviyā aggimhi kate dūratopi bhūmi uṇhā hoti,
tika-vin06t:1048_9: Aḍahitepi “adaḍḍhāya pathaviyā aggiṃ ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā attanā pātanāyeva doso patite upadāheti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1053_4: “Ākoṭesi chindīti ca vacanato rukkhadevatānaṃ hatthāni chijjanti,
tika-vin06t:1054_4: Sova kukkuṭo maṃsimakkhitoti ayameva hi parihāro.
tika-vin06t:1054_9: “samūlapatto eva hi bhūtagāmo nāmā”ti kāraṇaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1054_12: Na hi tato añño bhūtagāmo uppajjatī”ti dvidhāpi likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1054_19: “yesaṃ rukkhānaṃ sākhā ruhatīti vacanato yesaṃ na ruhati,
tika-vin06t:1054_20: tesaṃ sākhāya kappiyakaraṇakiccaṃ natthīti siddha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1055_2: Tassa āṇattiyā karontenāpi sāmaṇerādinā “kappiya”nti vatvāva aggiparijitaṃ kātabbanti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1055_3: Aggiparijitādīni viya kappiyattā abījanibbaṭṭabījānipi “pañcahi samaṇakappehī”ti ettha paviṭṭhāni,
tika-vin06t:1055_11: “Ucchuṃ kappiyaṃ karissāmīti dāruṃ vijjhatī”ti vacanato kappiyaṃ kātabbaṃ sandhāya viraddheti vuttaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:1055_12: ācariyā pana “kappiyaṃ kāretabbaṃ sandhāya kappiyanti sitthādiṃ kāreti,
tika-vin06t:1055_14: tassa kāraṇaṃ vadantā kātuṃ vaṭṭanabhāveneva virajjhitvā katepi kappiyaṃ jātaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1055_22: Nāḷe vā baddhapupphakalāpe nāḷasmiṃ katepi vaṭṭati tasmiṃ pupphassa atthitāyā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1059_2: na paneso kahāpaṇotiādīsu anāropite dukkaṭena musāvādapācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1060_1: Adhammena vā vaggena vā na kammārahassa vāti ettha “mayi vutte maṃ vā aññaṃ vā saṅgho adhammena vā kammaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1060_4: aññassa vā kammaṃ karissatī”ti na kathetīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1064_6: Saṅghenāti sabbena saṅghena kammavācāya assāvetvā “taveso bhāro”ti kevalaṃ āropitabhāro. Kevala-
tika-vin06t:1064_9: Abhūtena khīyanakassa ādikammikassa kathaṃ anāpattīti ce?
tika-vin06t:1064_11: Musāvāde āpattiyeva dve pācittiyo vuttā viya dissanti pubbapayoge rukkhādichindanādīsu viya,
tika-vin06t:1067_1: “Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hotī”ti vacanato,
tika-vin06t:1067_3: ekā anupaññattī”ti vacanato ca idha atthi anupaññattīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1067_7: imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyāthā”tiādinā pana paññattiṭṭhānaṃ na paññāyati,
tika-vin06t:1067_13: Paṭhamapaññattiyaṃ vuttanayeneva vattabbato avisesattā na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1067_19: Yasmā ubhayampi ekaṃ kālokāsaṃ ekato katvā “ajjhokāse”ti vuttanti dīpento bhagavā “anujānāmi,
tika-vin06t:1067_22: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “yattha ca yadā ca santharituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:1067_24: Hemantakālassa anāpattisamayattā idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ nidānānapekkhanti siddhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1067_30: tañca kho yattha himavassena senāsanaṃ na temeti,
tika-vin06t:1067_32: tañca kho akālameghādassaneyevāti ayaṃ viseso “aṭṭha māse”ti ca “avassikasaṅkete”ti ca etesaṃ dvinnaṃ padānaṃ sāmatthiyatopi siddho.
tika-vin06t:1068_2: Cammādinā onaddhako vā navavāyimo vā na sīghaṃ vinassati.
tika-vin06t:1068_5: Saṅghikamañcādimhi kāyaṃ phusāpetvā viharituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dhammasiritthero.
tika-vin06t:1071_2: lajjī hotī’ti vuttattā alajjiṃ āpucchitvā gantuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1071_3: Pāṭhe “kenaci palibuddhaṃ hotī”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “palibuddha”nti ca senāsanaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1074_3: Anugaṇṭhipade “aññaṃ attharaṇādi akappiyattā na vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1074_4: “Mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā vihāre vā vihārūpacāre vā’ti imināpi saṃsandanatthaṃ ‘kiñcāpi vutto,
tika-vin06t:1075_1: Anāpucchitvāpi gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti asatiyā gacchatopi anāpatti,
tika-vin06t:1075_2: āpucchanaṃ pana vattaṃ sañcicca anāpucchato vattabhedadukkaṭattā.
tika-vin06t:1075_4: saṅghikasenāsane vā puggalikaseyyaṃ attharitvā gacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ yuttaṃ viya. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:1078_2: Pāde dhovitvātiādimhi pavisantassa vā pādadhovanapāsāṇato yāva mañcapīṭhaṃ passāvatthāya nikkhamantassa vā yāva passāvaṭṭhānanti yojanā kātabbā.
tika-vin06t:1078_3: Evaṃ sante “passāvatthāya nikkhamantassa vā”ti na vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1078_6: Tathā hi mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “pavisantassa pādadhovanapāsāṇato yāva mañcapīṭhaṃ nikkhamantassa mañcapīṭhato yāva passāvaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1078_10: passāvaṭṭhānato ca mañcapīṭha”nti katthaci potthake pāṭho,
tika-vin06t:1078_14: nikkhamantassa tato paṭṭhāya yāva passāvaṭṭhānaṃ vaccakuṭicaṅkamaṭṭhānanti iminā atthena yathā saṃsandati,
tika-vin06t:1082_2: “Nikkhamā”ti vacanaṃ sutvāpi attano ruciyā nikkhamati, anāpatti;
tika-vin06t:1088_6: Ālokaṃ karotīti ālokaṃ sandheti pidhetīti sandhi eva ālokasandhināmakā honti.
tika-vin06t:1089_2: Chadanūparīti ettha paṭhamaṃ tāva ekavāraṃ aparisesaṃ chādetvā puna chādanadaṇḍake bandhitvā dutiyavāraṃ tatheva chādetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1089_3: “Tatiyavāracatutthavāre sampatte dve magge adhiṭṭhahitvā tatiyamaggaṃ āṇāpetvā pakkamitabba”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1090_0: Porāṇā pana “paṭhamavāreyeva tayo magge adhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:1090_7: channevāpi anekaso pariyāyassa tatiyasseva adhiṭṭhānanti no sametīti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:1090_9: “dve chadane”ti ca “tatiyavārato paṭṭhāya evaṃ chādāpehī’ti āṇāpetvā pakkamitabba”nti ca upatissatthero vadati kira.
tika-vin06t:1097_1: Kathānusārenāti yo bhikkhunovādakatthiko kiṃsīlo kiṃsamācāro katarakulā pabbajitotiādi kathānusārenāti attho.
tika-vin06t:1098_4: Chabbaggiyā hi keci vīsativassāpi atthi atirekavīsativassāpīti iminā imaṃ majjhimabodhikāle paññattanti viññāyati.
tika-vin06t:1098_5: “Sīlavā hotī”ti vatvā tassa catubbidhattā idha adhippetasīlameva dassetuṃ “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1098_16: Pañhaṃ kathetunti “pañhaṃ puṭṭho kathetī”ti ettha bhikkhuniyā puṭṭhena “na jānāmī”ti na sakkā kathetuṃ.
tika-vin06t:1099_3: “Dhammadesanāpattimocanatthaṃ panā”ti vacanato mātugāmaggahaṇena sabbattha bhikkhunīsaṅgahaṃ gacchatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1099_4: Bhikkhuniggahaṇena pana mātugāmo tiriyaṃ taraṇasikkhāpade saṅgahito,
tika-vin06t:1099_9: Ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vandite dosābhāvato bahūsu ekāya vandite vaṭṭatīti ce?
tika-vin06t:1099_14: Na nimantitā hutvā gantukāmāti nimantitā hutvā gantukāmā bhikkhū idha nādhippetā,
tika-vin06t:1099_18: Kiñcāpi “ovādadāyakā bhikkhū”ti vacanato ovādadāyakeheva sabhikkhuko āvāso hoti,
tika-vin06t:1099_20: tathāpi asati bhikkhunovādake ovādasaṃvāsānaṃ atthāya yācanatthāya avassaṃ gantabbattā aññehipi bhikkhūhi sabhikkhukopi sabhikkhuko evāti veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:1099_25: etarahi pana bhikkhuniyo cātuddasiyaṃyeva gantvā “kadā ayya uposatho”ti pucchanti.
tika-vin06t:1099_26: “Jāyāyo vā jāriyo vā”ti adhippāyena vuttaṃ kira.
tika-vin06t:1099_30: Ekato āgatānaṃ vasena “tāhī”ti bahuvacanaṃ vuttanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:1099_31: “Ekā bhikkhunī vā bahū bhikkhunī vā bahūhi bhikkhunupassayehi ovādatthāya pesitā”ti vacanassa vitthāro
tika-vin06t:1099_33: “Bhikkhunisaṅgho ca ayya bhikkhuniyo cā’tiādi nānāupassayehi pesitāya vacana”nti ca “aparipuṇṇasaṅghapuggalanānāvāsadutiyavacanavasena
tika-vin06t:1099_36: tatthāpi yācanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā punadivase yena paṭiggahitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1099_37: tena “natthi koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato”tiādi vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1099_42: Sace sammato vā ovādapaṭiggāhako vā pātimokkhaṃ uddisati,
tika-vin06t:1102_8: Yamā ca te manasā katatra netvāti.
tika-vin06t:1102_9: Yathā pāto siyā pāto bhavaṃ pātova udakato uggantvā ṭhitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1102_13: Atha vā aṅgīrasaṃ buddhaṃ padumaṃva virocamānaṃ sūriyaṃva tapantaṃ passa buddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1102_14: Yathā pāto siyā phullamavītagandhaṃ kokanudasaṅkhātaṃ padumaṃ passasi,
tika-vin06t:1102_16: Ubhayeneva hi bhagavato kanti dīpitāti katvā dīpitaguṇasubhaṃ buddhaṃ sakkatvā taṃ kantiṃ pūjeyya.
tika-vin06t:1103_2: “Abhabbo tva”ntiādivacanato anukampāvasena saddhivihārikādiṃ saṅghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍhāpentassa anāpatti viya dissati.
tika-vin06t:1103_3: Abhabbo hi thero sañcicca taṃ kātuṃ,
tika-vin06t:1103_5: Therena sikkhāpadapaññattito pubbe katanti mama takko.
tika-vin06t:1106_1: “Ekarattampi vasantī”ti vacanato yattha rattiyaṃ na vasanti,
tika-vin06t:1106_3: Yadi evaṃ saṅketaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ovadituṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1106_4: “Tato addhayojaneyeva sabhikkhuko āvāso icchitabbo”ti na vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1106_5: Bhikkhunovādako ce addhayojanaṃ gantvā ovaditukāmo hoti,
tika-vin06t:1109_2: “sammatena vā saṅghena vā bhāraṃ katvā ṭhapito”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanato ca aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgato sammatena vā vippavasitukāmena “yāvāhaṃ āgamissāmi,
tika-vin06t:1109_3: tāva te bhāro hotū”ti yācitvā ṭhapito,
tika-vin06t:1109_4: tassābhāvato saṅghena vā tatheva bhāraṃ katvā ṭhapito aṭṭhahi garudhammehi ovadituṃ labhati,
tika-vin06t:1109_7: pācittiya”nti pageva bhāraṃ katvā aṭṭhapitaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1109_9: anugaṇṭhipade pana imaṃ nayaṃ paṭikkhipitvā “natthi kocī”tiādinā “etarahi ovādako asammato bhikkhunovādako
tika-vin06t:1109_10: nāmā”ti vatvā “yaṃ pana andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ ‘upasampannaṃ saṅghena kammavācāya asammataṃ,
tika-vin06t:1109_13: bhikkhusaṅghassa ca karotha phāsuvihāranti evaṃ yācitvā ṭhapito bhikkhusaṅghaṃ āpucchitvā,
tika-vin06t:1109_17: Porāṇagaṇṭhipade pana “asammato gāmaṃ ovādatthāya āgatānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā paṭivacanaṃ dento saṅghānumatiyā,
tika-vin06t:1109_23: pātimokkhuddesako vā “pāsādikena sampādetū”ti vacanamattena bhikkhunovādako nāma hoti.
tika-vin06t:1109_27: yaṃ vuttaṃ gaṇṭhānugaṇṭhipadesu “asammato nāma asammatabhāvena ‘bahussuto tvaṃ ovadāhī’ti saṅghena bhāraṃ katvā ṭhapito”ti.
tika-vin06t:1109_29: Anugaṇṭhipadeyeva “abhayagirivāsī vadatīti sutvā sammatena vā āṇatto ovadituṃ labhatīti dhammasiritthero pacchā anujānātī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1109_36: ṭhapetvā bālaṃ gilānaṃ gamikaṃ avasesehi ovādaṃ gahetu”nti ayaṃ pāḷi virujjheyya. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin06t:1109_39: ovādo na paccāharitabbo”ti canato sammatāsammatabhāvena natthi kocīti “pāsādikena sampādetū”ti vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-vin06t:1109_40: vadanto ca idha paṭhamena āpattiyā kāretabbo hotīti.
tika-vin06t:1109_43: Imassa ca bhikkhunovādakatte imassa khīyanena dukkaṭaṃ siyā,
tika-vin06t:1109_45: tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ayamettha bhikkhunovādako nāmā”ti avuttattā tathā bhāraṃ katvā ṭhapito ovadituṃ labhatiyeva,
tika-vin06t:1115_1: Vañcetvāti “tava ñātikāyā”ti avatvā “ekissā bhikkhuniyā”ti ettakameva vatvā,
tika-vin06t:1115_2: te hi “ekissā”ti vacanaṃ sutvā aññātikāya santakasaññino sibbesuṃ.
tika-vin06t:1115_3: Imasmiṃ sikkhāpade “cīvaraṃ nāma channaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvara”nti ettakameva pāḷi,
tika-vin06t:1115_4: tena vuttaṃ “cīvaranti yaṃ nivāsetuṃ vā pārupituṃ vā”tiādi.
tika-vin06t:1119_7: “Yebhuyyena tathā sanniveso hotīti katvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1119_10: tato uddhaṃ addhayojanalakkhaṇasampattaṃ nāma hotīti gahetabba”nti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1119_18: amagge bhikkhunupassayādimhi na sambhavatiyeva manussānaṃ antaragharādimhi maggasaṅkhepagamanato,
tika-vin06t:1119_23: Sesaaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “etthantare saṃvidahitepi bhikkhuno dukkaṭa”nti āgatattā na sameti.
tika-vin06t:1123_7: sikkhamānāya sāmaṇeriyā anāpattī”ti ca na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1124_1: “Lokassādamittasanthavavasena keḷipurekkhārā saṃvidahitvā”ti vuttattā akusalacittaṃ lokavajjanti vattabbanti?
tika-vin06t:1124_4: Porāṇagaṇṭhipade ca “tīṇi cittāni tisso vedanā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1124_10: abyākatacitto vā hoti kilamathavasena niddāyantoti ticittāni gahitānīti veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:1128_9: Porāṇagaṇṭhipade pana “yasmā devadatto pakatiyā tattha bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ bhuñjati,
tika-vin06t:1128_10: tasmā imaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ nidānaṃ katvā idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññatta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1136_3: taṃ mayaṃ na jānāmāti sanniṭṭhānassa karaṇavasena “kukkuccāyanto”ti vuccati.
tika-vin06t:1136_4: Yathā hi āyasmā upāli nayaggāhena “anāpatti āvuso supinantenā”ti āha,
tika-vin06t:1136_5: tathā theropi “anāpatti gilānassā”ti kasmā na paricchindatīti?
tika-vin06t:1136_9: Paṭhamapārājikasikkhāpade paripuṇṇaṃ katvā paññatteyeva hi so thero “anāpatti supinantenā”ti āha “aññatra supinantā”ti vuttapadānusārenāti.
tika-vin06t:1136_10: Yasmā odissa ayāvadattheva dāyakānaṃ pīḷā natthi,
tika-vin06t:1137_1: “Antarāmagge ekadivasa’nti ekaṃyeva sandhāya vutta”nti ca “eseva nayoti vuttanayameva dassetuṃ gantvā
tika-vin06t:1137_2: paccāgacchanto hītiādimāhā”ti ca “suddhacitto hutvā pakatigamaneva bhuñjituṃ labhatī”ti ca “agilānassa
tika-vin06t:1140_2: Eko puttenāti ekassekaṃ bhattaṃ “ahaṃ aññena nimantito”ti na vuccati.
tika-vin06t:1140_4: gaṇabhojanaṃ hotī”ti vuttattā cattāro upāsakā cattāro bhikkhū visuṃ visuṃ nimantetvā hatthapāse ṭhitānaṃ ce denti,
tika-vin06t:1140_7: “Viññattito pasavane gaṇassa ekato gahaṇe iminā sikkhāpadena āpatti,
tika-vin06t:1140_15: Ekato gaṇhantīti gahitabhattāpi aññe yāva gaṇhanti,
tika-vin06t:1141_2: atha kasmā pāḷiyaṃ “gaṇabhojanaṃ nāma yattha cattāro…pe…
tika-vin06t:1141_9: Nimantanavaseneva pana gaṇabhojanassa vuttattā “nimantitā bhuñjantīti vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1141_10: “Aññataraṃ bhojanaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantī”ti pana na vuttaṃ aṭṭhuppattiyaṃyeva pākaṭattā.
tika-vin06t:1141_14: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “gaṇassa yato paṭiggahitāhārabhojanahetu pācittiya”nti.
tika-vin06t:1141_19: Parivattananti suttaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ suttaparivattanaṃ karoti,
tika-vin06t:1141_24: pacchā gaṇabhojanasikkhāpade paññatte bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin06t:1142_1: “Dve tayo ekatoti yepi akappiyanimantanaṃ sādiyitvā”tiādivacanena akappiyanimantanapaccayā eva anāpatti,
tika-vin06t:1142_7: Tāni cāti yehi bhojanehi visaṅketo natthi, tāni.
tika-vin06t:1142_10: Tattha tattha gantvāti rathikādīsu bhikkhusamīpe gantvā.
tika-vin06t:1146_1: “Vikappetvā gaṇhāhī”ti etthāhu porāṇattherā “bhagavato sammukhā avikappetvā gehato nikkhamitvā rathikāya aññatarassa bhikkhuno santike vikappesi,
tika-vin06t:1146_2: vikappentena pana ‘mayhaṃ bhattapaccāsaṃ itthannāmassa dammī’ti vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1146_3: itarena vattabbaṃ ‘tassa santakaṃ paribhuñja vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karohī”’ti.
tika-vin06t:1146_4: Pañcasusahadhammikesūti sammukhā ṭhitassa sahadhammikassa yassa vikappetukāmo,
tika-vin06t:1146_5: taṃ sahadhammikaṃ adisvā gahaṭṭhassa vā santike,
tika-vin06t:1146_6: sayameva vā “pañcasu sahadhammikesu itthannāmassa vikappemī”ti vatvā bhuñjitabbanti eke,
tika-vin06t:1146_7: evaṃ sati thero tasmiṃyeva nisinnova tathā vācaṃ nicchāretvā paṭiggaṇhātīti takko dissati.
tika-vin06t:1146_11: tathāpi mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tasmā yo bhikkhu pañcasu sahadhammikesu aññatarassa ‘mayhaṃ bhattapaccāsaṃ
tika-vin06t:1146_12: tuyhaṃ dammī’ti vā ‘vikappemī’ti vā evaṃ sammukhā vā ‘itthannāmassa dammī’ti vā ‘vikappemī’ti vā evaṃ
tika-vin06t:1146_13: parammukhā vā”ti vacanato sahadhammikassa santike eva vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1146_19: tathāpi therassa kukkuccuppattikāraṇena bhattena so nimantitoti veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:1146_20: Aññathā parato “dve tayo nimantane ekato bhuñjatī”ti vacanena,
tika-vin06t:1147_3: na dātabba”nti vacanato aparabhāge akappiyanimantanena natthi payojanaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1147_4: pubbabhāgeyeva akappiyanimantanena payojananti svepi bhante āgaccheyyāthāti ettha kataraṃ akappiyanimantanaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1147_8: Tattha “svepi bhante”ti ettha yathā vacanamattaṃ aggahetvā akappiyanimantanakkamena attho gahito,
tika-vin06t:1147_9: tathā “piṇḍāya caritvā”ti etthāpi antarā akappiyanimantanena laddhabhattaṃ sandhāya vuttanti attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin06t:1147_11: bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti dinnampi akappiyanimantanena laddhaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin06t:1147_14: Aññathā mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “gaṇabhojane vuttanayeneva pañcahi bhojanehi nimantitassa…pe…
tika-vin06t:1147_17: tato paṭhamanimantitaṃ ādāya gato parassa parassa nimantanakadāyakassa bhojaneti atthaparidīpanato nimantanato
tika-vin06t:1147_21: tassa bhojanato parassa bhojane”ti ettakaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-vin06t:1147_22: pāḷiyaṃ vā “nimantanena ekatobhuñjatī”ti ettakaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-vin06t:1148_0: Gaṇṭhipade pana “piṇḍāya caritvā laddhabhattaṃ kasmā bhuñjituṃ na labhatīti ce?
tika-vin06t:1148_1: ‘Paramparabhojanaṃ nāma pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena bhojanena nimantito,
tika-vin06t:1148_2: taṃ ṭhapetvā pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjati,
tika-vin06t:1148_4: Yadi evaṃ niccabhattādikampi na vaṭṭatīti āpajjatīti niccabhattādi odissakanti ce? Taṃ na,
tika-vin06t:1148_6: saṅghato laddhassa vā pāto pacanakayāgu ce ghanā hoti, tassāpi,
tika-vin06t:1148_7: ekakuṭikaṃ gāmaṃ upanissāya viharato bhikkhācariyavasena labhitabbaniccabhattassa ca akappiyabhāvappasaṅgato.
tika-vin06t:1148_8: Tattha bhikkhācariyavasena laddhaṃ na kappati nimantanakānaṃ appasādāvahanatoti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:1148_10: Khādanīyampi hi parassa khāditvā bhuttattā nimantanabhojanaṃ abhuñjanto appasādaṃ karoti eva,
tika-vin06t:1148_13: Apica heṭṭhā vuttanayena saddhiṃ idha vuttanayena saṃsanditvā yaṃ yaṃ khamati,
tika-vin06t:1148_14: taṃ taṃ gahetabbanti sabbopi kesañci ācariyānaṃ vinicchayo.
tika-vin06t:1148_15: Ācariyassa pana vinicchayo ante āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin06t:1148_16: “Khīraṃ vā rasaṃ vā pivato amissampīti adhippāyo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1149_1: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “āpattī”ti vacanena kurundiyaṃ “vaṭṭatī”ti vacanaṃ viruddhaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin06t:1149_14: yathādhammo kāretabbo”ti vacanato ca nimantetvā vā pavedetu animantetvā vā,
tika-vin06t:1149_15: paṭhamagahitanimantanassa bhikkhuno paṭhamanimantanabhojanato aññaṃ yaṃ kiñci parasantakaṃ bhojanaṃ paramparabhojanāpattiṃ karoti.
tika-vin06t:1149_18: nimantanato paṭhamaṃ nibaddhattā pana niccabhattādi parasantakampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:1152_11: Porāṇagaṇṭhipade panevaṃ vuttaṃ “ekena vā anekehi vā dvattipattapūresu gahitesu tesaṃ anārocanena vā sayaṃ vā jānitvā yo aññaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin06t:1152_14: catūsu vā paviṭṭhesu ekena ce dvepattapūrā gahitā,
tika-vin06t:1152_15: dutiye dve gaṇhante paṭhamo ce na nivāreti,
tika-vin06t:1152_29: āsannaāsanasālāgatā vā sace visabhāgehi ānītaṃ na paṭiggaṇhanti,
tika-vin06t:1152_33: “Dvattipattapūrā’ti vacanato pacchiādīsu adhikampi gaṇhato anāpattī”ti keci vinayadharamānino vadanti,
tika-vin06t:1152_35: ācariyā pana “pacchiādīsupi ukkaṭṭhapattassa pamāṇavasena dvattipattapūrā gahetabbā.
tika-vin06t:1156_3: ito aññaṃ na lacchatīti kira attho.
tika-vin06t:1157_1: “Asanaṃ paññāyatī”ti eteneva “bhuttāvī”ti etassa siddhattā visuṃ atthasiddhi natthi.
tika-vin06t:1157_6: “Pavāraṇaṃ pana janetiyevāti visuṃ sitthaṃ vodakaṃ karonti,
tika-vin06t:1157_8: Yāguṃ vā pivanto paṭhamaṃ udakaṃ pivati, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:1157_9: Avasiṭṭhaṃ heṭṭhāsitthaṃ pavāraṇaṃ na janetī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1158_2: na pavāretī”ti vuttattā paracaṅkamacchādayo pakkhipitvā pakkayāguṃ pivanto sace aññaṃ tādisaṃyeva paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin06t:1158_14: Yathā hi saṅghato uddhaṭapiṇḍaṃ dussīlo deti,
tika-vin06t:1158_23: maṃsañca rasañca maṃsarasanti āpajjanato ‘maṃsarasa’nti vutte paṭikkhepato hoti,
tika-vin06t:1158_24: maṃsassa rasaṃ maṃsarasanti viggaho nādhippeto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1158_29: tena vuttaṃ parato “idañca karambakena na samānetabba”ntiādi,
tika-vin06t:1158_30: tasmā “taṃ abhiharitvā kañjiyaṃ gaṇhathā’ti vadantaṃ paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin06t:1158_31: pavāraṇā na hotī”ti ca “missakayāguṃ gaṇhathā’ti avuttattā ‘sammissitaṃ visuṃ katvā detī’ti vuttattā”ti ca vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1158_32: yasmā yāgumissakanti ettha padadvaye pavāraṇārahassa nāmaggahaṇaṃ natthi,
tika-vin06t:1158_33: tasmā tatra ce yāgu bahutarā vā hoti samasamā vā,
tika-vin06t:1158_38: Tesaṃ ubhinnampi tattha bhinnasaññattāti takko ācariyassa.
tika-vin06t:1158_39: Bhattamissake pavāraṇārahassa nāmassa sabbhāvato sabbadā pavāreti eva.
tika-vin06t:1158_41: Visuṃ katvā detīti yathā bhattasiṭṭhaṃ na patati,
tika-vin06t:1158_42: tathā gāḷhaṃ hatthena pīḷetvā parissāvetvā deti.
tika-vin06t:1159_0: Akappiyakatanti ettha “kappiyaṃ akārāpitehi kadalipphalādīhi saddhiṃ atirittaṃ kappiyaṃ kārāpetvāpi taṃ
tika-vin06t:1159_2: Amissakarasattā puna tāni kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā aññasmiṃ bhājane ṭhapetvā atirittaṃ kāretvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:1159_4: “Bhuttāvinā ca pavāritena āsanā vuṭṭhitena kata”nti vacanato bhuttāvinā appavāritena āsanā vuṭṭhitena kattabbanti siddhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1159_5: tasmā “pātova addhānaṃ gacchantesu dvīsu eko pavārito avuṭṭhito tattha nisīdati,
tika-vin06t:1159_6: so itarena piṇḍāya caritvā laddhaṃ bhikkhaṃ attanā abhutvāpi ‘alametaṃ sabba’nti kātuṃ labhati evā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1159_7: taṃ sukkapakkhe “bhuttāvinā kataṃ hotī”ti imināva siddhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1159_8: tasmiṃ pakkhe attano sattaṅgāni na pūrenti,
tika-vin06t:1159_12: “Pavāritena āsanā avuṭṭhitenevā”ti imaṃ pana atthavikappaṃ dīpetuṃ “sattaṅgāni vuttānī”tipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:1159_13: So puna kātuṃ na labhati paṭhamaṃ katassa puna teneva kattabbappasaṅgato.
tika-vin06t:1159_16: Atha sova paṭhamo puna kattukāmo hoti,
tika-vin06t:1159_17: aññasmiṃ bhājane pubbe akataṃ kātuṃ labhati.
tika-vin06t:1159_21: Imamevatthaṃ sandhāya “yena yaṃ paṭhamaṃ kappiyaṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin06t:1159_22: tameva so puna kātuṃ na labhati,
tika-vin06t:1159_24: Tattha tanti taṃ paṭhamaṃ katanti attho.
tika-vin06t:1159_25: Pesetvā kāretabbanti ettha anupasampanno ce gato,
tika-vin06t:1159_26: tatraṭṭhena ekena bhikkhunā paṭiggāhetvā aparena kāretabbanti tattha ekova evameva kātuṃ na labhatīti.
tika-vin06t:1159_27: “Yaṃ kiñci gilānaṃ uddissā’tiādivacanato vihārādīsu gilānassa pāpuṇanakoṭṭhāsampi gilānātirittaṃ nāma,
tika-vin06t:1160_2: Vacīkammaṃ vācāya “atirittaṃ karotha bhante”ti akārāpanenāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1167_0: Koṭṭhaṃ jaraṭṭhaṃ vuccati. Gaṇṭhi muhukulamudu vicayattha vajamuju vaduḷavi.
tika-vin06t:1168_4: Āluva kaḷi taḍḍhiaḷi alasa kaṭissala namedati mera.
tika-vin06t:1170_7: Bhūmiyaṃ jātaloṇīti ettha loṇīnāmassa sādhāraṇattā “bhūmiya”nti visesetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1170_9: “Dīpavāsino vadantī”ti sithilaṃ katvā kasmā vuttanti ce?
tika-vin06t:1175_1: Ettha hiṅgujatu nāma pattasākhā pacitvā kātabbā.
tika-vin06t:1178_5: āpatti dukkaṭassāti evaṃ sannidhikataṃ yaṃ kiñci yāvakālikaṃ vā yāmakālikaṃ vā ajjhoharitukāmatāya gaṇhantassa
tika-vin06t:1178_9: tasmā veditabbametaṃ “attano kāle gahitaṃ ajja paṭiggahita’nti vutta”nti.
tika-vin06t:1179_5: bhesajjasikkhāpade uggahitakaṃ nādhippetanti yuttaṃ attano kālātikkamanamattena tattha āpattippasaṅgato.
tika-vin06t:1179_6: Ettha na yuttaṃ attano kālātikkamanamattena āpattippasaṅgābhāvato.
tika-vin06t:1179_8: tasmā anugaṇṭhipadamatena ajja uggahetvā punadivase bhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:1180_1: attanā bhuñjitukāmo ajja uggahetvā punadivase bhuñjati,
tika-vin06t:1180_3: Sāmaṇerādīnaṃyeva atthāya uggahetvā gahitaṃ punadivase paṭiggahetvā bhuñjanto āpattiyā na kāretabboti.
tika-vin06t:1180_6: sace belaṭṭhasīso viya dutiyatatiyādidivasatthāya ajja paṭiggahetvā sāmaṇerādīnaṃ gopanatthāya deti,
tika-vin06t:1180_7: tassa punadivase ajjhoharaṇatthaṃ paṭiggahaṇe āpatti dukkaṭassāti sambhavati.
tika-vin06t:1180_9: punadivase patitaṃ kacavaraṃ disvā vimativasena vā paṭiggaṇhato paṭiggahaṇatova āpatti dukkaṭassāti sambhavati.
tika-vin06t:1180_14: Yo pana ekappahāreneva dvepi pāde atikkāmeti,
tika-vin06t:1180_17: Ettha paṭiggahitabhāvaṃ avijahantameva sannidhiṃ janetīti dhammasiritthero,
tika-vin06t:1180_23: Itarathā kapālena pītā sappiādayopi sattāhātikkame āpattiṃ janeyyunti.
tika-vin06t:1180_28: Sāmisena mukhena ajjhoharato dveti “hiyyo paṭiggahitayāmakālikaṃ ajja purebhattaṃ sāmisena mukhena ajjhoharato dve pācittiyānī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1180_29: Ajja paṭiggahitaṃ yāvakālikampi hi yāmātikkantapānakena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sannidhiṃ karoti.
tika-vin06t:1181_1: Sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ āhāratthāyāti kālepi dukkaṭameva sannidhiṃ anāpajjanatoti keci.
tika-vin06t:1181_2: Tadahu paṭiggahitaṃ tadahu purebhattaṃ vaṭṭatīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:1181_4: Bhesajjasikkhāpade purebhattaṃ yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjanaṃ vuttanti ce?
tika-vin06t:1185_1: Mahānāmasikkhāpadena kāretabboti saṅghavasena pavārite bhesajjatthāya sappiādipañcakaṃ viññāpeti ce,
tika-vin06t:1185_2: tattha “na bhesajjena karaṇīyena bhesajja”nti ettha saṅgahaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin06t:1188_10: tathā ākiritvā apanentānaṃ patitathevepi abhihaṭattā nevatthi doso”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1188_15: Tehi kāyasaṃsagge kāyapaṭibaddhenāpi tappaṭibaddhenāpi thullaccayāpatti dassitā evāti attho.
tika-vin06t:1188_18: taṃ dullikhitaṃ satipi male puna paṭiggahetabbakiccābhāvato.
tika-vin06t:1189_1: Mūlapaṭiggahaṇameva vaṭṭatīti ettha “macchikavāraṇatthanti vuttattā ‘abhuñjanatthāyāpi paṭiggahetvā gahite vaṭṭatī”’ti ye vadanti,
tika-vin06t:1189_2: te vattabbā “sīsamakkhanatelaṃ paṭiggahetvā ‘idaṃ sīsamakkhana’nti anābhogeneva sattāhaṃ atikkāmentassa kiṃ nissaggiyaṃ bhaveyyā”tiādi,
tika-vin06t:1189_3: suttādhippāyo pana evaṃ gahetabbo “macchikavāraṇatthaṃ bījantassa tasmiṃ laggarajādimhi patte patite
tika-vin06t:1189_4: sukhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ sakkā’ti saññāya pubbe paṭiggahitabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1189_5: Parivattanakathāyaṃ “amhākaṃ taṇḍulesu khīṇesu etehi amhākaṃ hatthagatehi sāmaṇerasantakehipi sakkā patiṭṭhapetu’nti
tika-vin06t:1189_9: tathā “paṇḍito esa sāmaṇero pattaparivattanaṃ katvā dassati,
tika-vin06t:1189_10: mayameva ca imassa vissāsena vā yācitvā vā bhuñjissāmā”ti citte sati bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati katepi parivattaneti ca āpannaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1189_15: tato laddhaṃ khāditumpi vaṭṭatī”ti vacanena siddhova.
tika-vin06t:1189_16: Ādhārake patto ṭhapito hoti yathāpaṭiggahitabhāve nirālayo.
tika-vin06t:1189_19: “Attano pana khīraṃ mukheneva pivantassa anāpattīti dassetuṃ vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1190_1: ‘taṃ thoka’nti vā aññena vā kāraṇena vadati,
tika-vin06t:1190_4: Attanā paṭiggahetvā pakkhipitabbaṃ vinayavidhiṃ akatvā dukkaṭanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:1190_7: Evañhi tattha vuttaṃ bhūmiyaṃ vā bhājane vā phalaṃ vā yaṃ kiñci āmisaṃ vā yāvajīvikampi appaṭiggahitakaṃ ajānanto āmasati,
tika-vin06t:1190_10: tasmā imassa matena bhikkhu bhikkhussa sace patte appaṭiggahite piṇḍaṃ ṭhapeti,
tika-vin06t:1190_12: Ayamevattho “sace attano vā bhikkhūnaṃ vā yāgupacanakabhājane…pe…
tika-vin06t:1190_13: nirāmisaṃ katvā paribhuñjitabba”nti vacanena saṃsanditvā kathetabbo.
tika-vin06t:1195_0: 269. Vighāsādānaṃ antarā pūvalābhena aññatarā paribbājikā pavisitvā ṭhitā. Dāpetīti anupasampannena.
tika-vin06t:1198_2: Uyyojakassa vijahantassa sato āpatti dukkaṭassātipi attho.
tika-vin06t:1201_1: Sabhojaneti ettha paṭhamavikappo “itthī ca puriso cā”ti iminā tatiyapadena yujjati,
tika-vin06t:1204_2: tasmā bhikkhunivaggassa dasamaṭṭhakathāyaṃ upari upanandassa “tatiyasikkhāpadenā”ti na pāṭho,
tika-vin06t:1211_0: Siyā paramparāpatti, pacchābhattaṃ na sā siyā.
tika-vin06t:1222_5: amhākañca iminā ca iminā ca attho”ti yathābhūtaṃ ācikkhitvā viññāpetuṃ gilānova labhati.
tika-vin06t:1222_9: “na bhesajjena karaṇīyena bhesajjaṃ viññāpetī’ti vacanena pācittiyanti attho”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1228_1: Navame senāparikkhepena vā parikkhepārahaṭṭhānena vā sañcaraṇaṭṭhānapariyantena vā paricchinditabbā.
tika-vin06t:1231_10: Dasame pana aṭṭhamaṅgassa dassanena dukkaṭaṃ siyāti.
tika-vin06t:1244_4: Keci “sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalamevāti vuttattā vatthuṃ jānitvā pivato akusala”nti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1244_5: Evaṃ sati “akusaleneva pātabbatāyāti na vattabba”nti vutte “sacittakapakkhameva sandhāyā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1244_6: Evaṃ sati “kusalākusalābyākatacittanti vattabba”nti vutte tampi “tabbahulanayena vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1249_2: Hasādhippāyeneva “parassa dukkhaṃ uppādessāmī”ti udakaṃ khipantassa dukkhavedanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1252_0: Ettāvatā kathaṃ kīḷā, iti kīḷāyaṃ evāyaṃ;
tika-vin06t:1258_1: “Lokavajjaṃ atikkamitvā ‘idaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyuggaho’ti vadantassa na vaṭṭatī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1258_3: yaṃ vā ariyapuggalo apaññatte sikkhāpade ajjhācarati,
tika-vin06t:1258_5: Tattha dutiyatatiyavikappo idha na adhippeto sekhiyānaṃ lokavajjattā.
tika-vin06t:1259_3: tasmā vikāle ucchuyaṭṭhiṃ khādituṃ vaṭṭati guḷaharīṭakaṃ viyā’ti evamādiko sampati nibbatto gārayhācariyavādo na gahetabbo”ti ca,
tika-vin06t:1259_4: paṇṇattivajje pana vaṭṭatīti “na pattahatthena kavāṭo paṇāmetabbo’ti imassa ‘yena hatthena patto gahito,
tika-vin06t:1259_6: itarena paṇāmetabbo’ti atthaṃ gahetvā tathā ācaranto na āpattiyā kāretabbo.
tika-vin06t:1259_7: ‘Tathā buddhabodhicetiyānaṃ pupphaṃ gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatīti tathā ācaranto”ti ca.
tika-vin06t:1264_0: 354. “Visibbanāpekkho”ti vacanato yassa apekkhā natthi, tassa anāpatti.
tika-vin06t:1275_1: Dasame yasmā nisīdanasanthataṃ cīvaranisīdanampīti ubhayampi sadasameva,
tika-vin06t:1275_2: tasmā taṃ ubhayampi ekato katvā “nisīdanaṃ nāma sadasaṃ vuccatī”ti āha.
tika-vin06t:1275_3: Tatthāpi cīvaraggahaṇena cīvaranisīdanaṃ gahitamevāti atthato santhatanisīdanameva vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:1275_4: Yadi evaṃ “nisīdanasanthataṃ nāma sadasaṃ vuccatī”ti vattabbanti? Na,
tika-vin06t:1275_6: Ettha nisīdanasanthatassa pācittiyavatthuttā itarampi pācittiyavatthumevāti veditabbaṃ tajjātikattā.
tika-vin06t:1284_0: Evaṃ ubhinnaṃ nānattaṃ, ñeyyaṃ ñāṇavatā sadāti.
tika-vin06t:1287_4: puna kātabbaṃ kammanti anuvādādhikaraṇe labbhanti. Anihaṭaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1290_14: no āpattiṃ āpajjati avuttattāti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:1290_15: saṃkiliṭṭhena cittena paṭicchādane vinā āpattiyā asambhavato.
tika-vin06t:1290_16: Dukkaṭavāre vattabbāpi pārājikāpattiyo paṭhamaṃ atthuddhāravasena saṅghādisesehi saha vuttattā na sakkā puna vattunti na vuttāti veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:1291_0: Yāva koṭi na chijjatīti cettha yo antamaso paṭicchādanatthaṃ aññassa ārocetu vā, mā vā,
tika-vin06t:1291_2: Tassa puna aññassa paṭicchādanatthaṃ anārocaneneva na koṭi chinnā hoti,
tika-vin06t:1291_3: kiṃ puna paṭinivattitvā vacanena payojananti na antimassa anārocanena chinnā hoti,
tika-vin06t:1291_8: evampi koṭi chinnā hotīti evaṃ no paṭibhātīti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:1291_9: Tatiyena dutiyassāti ettha “dutiyo nāma paṭhamo”ti vadantānaṃ “vatthu puggalo na vattabbo”ti vāritattā na sundaraṃ.
tika-vin06t:1291_10: Aññassa catutthassa ārocanepi na sundaraṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:1294_2: Hāyanavaḍḍhananti mātukucchismiṃ ce dvādasannaṃ māsānaṃ ūnatāya hāyanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin06t:1294_8: So hi pasūtadivasato paṭṭhāya paripuṇṇavīsativasso hoti.
tika-vin06t:1294_11: Taṃ sandhāyāti gabbhavassañca pavāretvā laddhavassañca agaṇetvā jātadivasato paṭṭhāya gaṇetvā ekūnavīsativassaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1295_1: Aññaṃ upasampādetīti upajjhāyo vā ācariyo vā hutvā upasampādeti.
tika-vin06t:1295_2: “Opapātikassa soḷasavassuddesikabhāvato puna cattāro vasse atikkamitvā upasampadā kātabbā”ti ācariyā vadantīti keci.
tika-vin06t:1298_4: Theyyasatthabhāvassa ṭhānaṃ katvā rakkhaṇīyattā sahadhammikānaṃ rakkhatiyevāti eke.
tika-vin06t:1301_1: “Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī”ti ca pāṭho atthi,
tika-vin06t:1301_3: Natthibhāvo sundaro “tena kho samayenā”ti adhikārattāti keci.
tika-vin06t:1302_1: Apicettha “viññū paṭibalā”ti vacanato appaṭibalā anāpattivatthukāti eke,
tika-vin06t:1305_4: Pubbe sañcicca āpannā sammuṭṭhā suddhasaññino antarāyikā eva.
tika-vin06t:1308_1: “Taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhenāti iminā laddhinānāsaṃvāsakataṃ dīpetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1308_2: Ticittanti ettha vipākābyākatacittena sahavāseyyaṃ kappeyyāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin06t:1308_3: Aññathā sacittakattā sikkhāpadassa kiriyābyākataṃ sandhāya na yujjati.
tika-vin06t:1311_1: Yattha te na passāmāti teti taṃ.
tika-vin06t:1311_2: Atha vā tava rūpādiṃ na passāma.
tika-vin06t:1311_5: saṅghassa ārocetvā saṅghānumatiyā pabbājetabbo”ti porāṇagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1311_10: Te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyāti ca diṭṭhi satthari asatthādidiṭṭhi na hoti.
tika-vin06t:1311_13: tasmimpi evameva paṭipajjitabbaṃ saṃvare atiṭṭhanto liṅganāsanāyeva nāsetabboti ācariyassa takko.
tika-vin06t:1318_6: “Nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti vacanena hi te bhagavato asabbaññutaṃ dīpenti.
tika-vin06t:1318_14: Tattha ye kuhakā pāpicchakā abhūtaṃ ullapitvā paṭiladdhavarabhojanāni bhuñjitvā muṭṭhassatī niddaṃ okkamitvā sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pattā,
tika-vin06t:1318_15: aññehi taṃ disvā “atthi arahato sukkavissaṭṭhī”ti vutte “mārakāyikā upasaṃharantī”ti vatvā janaṃ vañcenti.
tika-vin06t:1318_17: tepi taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā keci taṃdiṭṭhikā honti adhimānino ca.
tika-vin06t:1318_20: Tathā atthi arahato aññāṇakaṅkhāvitaraṇā nāmagottādīsu viya saccesu paravitaraṇā parehi paññattā nāmānīti adhippāyo yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbo.
tika-vin06t:1318_26: aparappaccayā satthusāsane”tiādīni suttapadāni dassetvā te sāsanapaccatthikesu niggahitaṃ niggaṇhātīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:1323_2: Viheṭhetukāmaṃ pana disvā “sace ahaṃ imaṃ māremi,
tika-vin06t:1323_3: natthi me mokkho”ti cintetvā kupito sattasaññaṃ purekkhatvā pahāraṃ deti,
tika-vin06t:1326_1: “Kāyaṃ vā kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ vā”ti vacanato kāyādīsu yaṃ uccāreti,
tika-vin06t:1326_6: Evaṃ kupitā hi kopavasena pothanāsamatthataṃ avicāretvā yaṃ kiñci hatthagataṃ paṭikkhipanti,
tika-vin06t:1326_10: Kevalaṃ uccāretukāmatāya uggiraṇamatte kate iminā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1326_16: Purimaṃ uggiraṇapaccayā pācittiyanti sadukkaṭaṃ pācittiyaṃ yujjati.
tika-vin06t:1326_19: Na ca pacchimapahāraṃ nissāya purimaṃ uggiraṇaṃ anāpattivatthukaṃ bhavitumarahatīti no takkoti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:1326_24: “Tiracchānādīnaṃ asucikaraṇādīni disvā kujjhitvāpi uggirantassa mokkhādhippāyo evā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1329_1: Upasampanne anupasampannasaññī amūlakena saṅghādisesenāti sukkavissaṭṭhikāyasaṃsaggādinā saṅghādisesāpattiyā vatthunāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1329_2: Na hi anupasampannassa saṅghādisesāpatti nāma atthi.
tika-vin06t:1332_1: Ūnavīsativasso maññeti ettha sayaṃ saññāya tathā amaññanto kukkuccuppādanatthaṃ “maññe”ti vadanto kiṃ musāvādena kāretabboti?
tika-vin06t:1332_3: na ca kevalaṃ “maññe”ti iminā niyamato aṅgasampatti hoti.
tika-vin06t:1332_5: “Udakaṃ maññe āditta”ntiādimhi paro kukkuccaṃ uppādetu vā, mā vā,
tika-vin06t:1332_6: taṃ appamāṇanti mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kukkuccuppādana”nti tassa adhippāyavasena vuttanti.
tika-vin06t:1335_2: Ekaparicchedānīti siyā kiriyā siyā akiriyāti iminā nayena ekaparicchedāni.
tika-vin06t:1335_3: Ettha kiñcāpi aññavādakapaccayāpatti kiriyā ca vihesakapaccayāpatti akiriyā ca,
tika-vin06t:1335_4: tadubhayaṃ pana ekasikkhāpadanti katvā taṃ aññavādakasaṅkhātaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ siyā kiriyā paṭhamassa vasena,
tika-vin06t:1335_5: siyā akiriyā dutiyassa vasenāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin06t:1338_1: “Dhammikānaṃ kammāna”nti vacanato ekacce bhikkhū dhammikānaṃ kammānaṃ “chandaṃ dammī”ti chandaṃ denti,
tika-vin06t:1338_7: tathā chandadānakāle akatvā pacchā adhammakammakhiyyanādipaccayā anāpattivāre vuttattā.
tika-vin06t:1338_8: Adhammena vā vaggena vā na kammārahassa vā kammakaraṇapaccayā āpattimokkhakaraṇato avisesameva tathāvacananti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:1338_15: Tathāpi adhammakammassa chando na dātabbo dente akappiyānumatidukkaṭato.
tika-vin06t:1338_16: Tattha hi yojanadukkaṭato na muccantīti no takkoti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:1341_1: Sannipātaṃ anāgantvā ce chandaṃ na deti,
