tika-vin06t:1341_5: Dinnachande saṅghamajjhaṃ pavisitvā puna gatepi chando na paṭippassambheyyāti ce?
tika-vin06t:1341_8: Pāḷiyaṃ pana dātukāmatāya hatthapāsaṃ atikkamantaṃ sandhāya vuttanti keci.
tika-vin06t:1344_2: Bhikkhūti ettha te chabbaggiyā attānaṃ parivajjayitvā “saṅgho”ti avatvā “bhikkhū”ti āhaṃsu.
tika-vin06t:1344_4: Tattha lābhoti paduddhārakaraṇaṃ idha anadhippetassapi yassa kassaci atthuddhāravasena lābhadīpanatthaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1344_8: Dinnanti ca parikkhāranti ca bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1347_3: Sabbattha āpucchitvā dātukāmaṃ yathāsukhaṃ vicāretuṃ labhati.
tika-vin06t:1353_2: tathāpi idha aññāpi devigottā na rakkhati,
tika-vin06t:1353_8: Anāpattivāre mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ aṅgabhāvena ca vuttattā abhisittabhāvovapamāṇaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1357_0: 504. “Adhivāsentu gahapatino bhatta”nti ca “me gahapatino”ti ca atthi.
tika-vin06t:1358_3: Patirūpāti “ratanasammate paṃsukūlaggahaṇaṃ vā ratane nirussukkagamanaṃ vā”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1361_1: Ahinā ḍaṭṭhavatthumhi so bhikkhu santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā gato,
tika-vin06t:1361_3: Adinnādāne vuttanayenāti gāmo gāmūpacāroti idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1364_2: Assāti pācittiyassa paṭhamaṃ bhedanakaṃ katvā pacchā desetabbattā.
tika-vin06t:1371_2: Paṭilābhena uddāletvā pācittiyaṃ desetabbanti ettha kiñcāpi paṭilābhamatteneva pācittiyanti viya dissati,
tika-vin06t:1374_1: Kiñcāpi nisīdanassa jāti na dissati ettha,
tika-vin06t:1374_3: “nava cīvarāni adhiṭṭhātabbānī”ti ettha ca pariyāpannattā cīvarajātiyevassa jātīti veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:1377_1: Yadi kaṇḍupaṭicchādi nāma adhonābhi ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalā uppannakaṇḍupīḷakādipaṭicchādikā adhippetā,
tika-vin06t:1377_2: tassa sugatassa sugatavidatthiyā dīghaso catasso vidatthiyo tiriyaṃ dveti idampi atimahantaṃ pamāṇaṃ dissati.
tika-vin06t:1377_3: Sabbo hi puriso attano attano vidatthiyā sattavidatthiko hoti,
tika-vin06t:1377_4: sugatassa ca ekāvidatthi majjhimassa purisassa tisso vidatthiyo honti,
tika-vin06t:1377_5: tasmā kaṇḍupaṭicchādi pakatipurisassa pamāṇaṃ āpajjati tiriyaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1377_10: sabbasarīragatasaṅghāṭi viya bahuguṇaṃ katvā nivāsetukāmo nivāsessatīti ayaṃ bhagavato adhippāyo siyā.
tika-vin06t:1380_2: Vassakāle keci saṅghāṭiparibhogeneva paribhuñjissantīti ayaṃ bhagavato adhippāyo siyā.
tika-vin06t:1380_5: vassikasāṭikāyo dhārentī”ti imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattattā pana aññathā puṇṇaparicchedato adhikappamāṇāyo
tika-vin06t:1380_6: te bhikkhū dhāresunti katvā etaparamatā tāsaṃ anuññātāti veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:1383_1: Tattha bhisiṃ vā bibbohanaṃ vā karotīti dīghaso bahūnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sādhāraṇatthaṃ karotīti yujjati.
tika-vin06t:1389_1: “Paṭidesetabbākāradassana”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā pāḷiyaṃ āgatavaseneva āpatti desetabbā,
tika-vin06t:1389_4: abhikkhunisaññī”tiādinā ca nayena aparepi tayo tikacchedā yojetvā dassetabbā.
tika-vin06t:1392_1: “Nimantitā bhuñjantīti pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena bhojanena nimantitā bhuñjantī”ti kiñcāpi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1392_2: atha kho akappiyanimantanena nimantitatā ettha na aṅgaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1392_3: mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ vā idha vā anāpattivāre lesābhāvato,
tika-vin06t:1392_4: tasmā “nimantitā”ti padassa attho pubbe āciṇṇavaseneva vutto.
tika-vin06t:1392_5: Aparepi tayo tikacchedā yojetvā dassetabbā padabhājane vuttattāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1392_6: Yathā tathā hi bhuñjantānaṃ tādisaṃ bhikkhuniṃ avārentānaṃ pāṭidesanīyameva.
tika-vin06t:1392_9: “Ajjhohāre ajjhohāre”ti vacanena puna “gārayhaṃ āvuso dhamma”nti ekavacanaṃ viruddhanti.
tika-vin06t:1392_15: Ekena saheva “ahaṃ āpajji”ntipi vattabbanti ekena dvīhi tīhi desetabbato,
tika-vin06t:1398_2: Yasmā aṭṭhaṅgulamattaṃ otāretvā nivatthameva nisinnassa caturaṅgulamattaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:1398_11: tañca kho alābhe eva “alābhe tiriyaṃ dvihatthappamāṇampi vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin06t:1398_16: na vatthuvijānanacittena “idamevaṃ kata”nti jānatopi āpattiyā abhāvato.
tika-vin06t:1398_19: Paññattepi sikkhāpade apaññattepi yaṃ pakatiyā vajjaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1398_30: Sañcicca vītikkamanaṃ nāma domanassikasseva hotīti dukkhavedanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1398_31: Gaṇṭhipade pana “pāṇātipātādi viya nivāsanādidoso lokagarahito na hotīti paṇṇattivajjanti phussadevatthero”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1400_1: “Ekasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā”ti ettha “gacchantopi parissayābhāvaṃ oloketuṃ labhatiyeva.
tika-vin06t:1400_3: taṃ pana “ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhatvā”ti vuttattā tādisaṃ antarāyaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1403_3: Antaraghare uccāsaddena anumodanādiṃ karontassa anāpatti kira.
tika-vin06t:1403_4: Tathā hi mahindattheropi hatthisālādīsu mahājanassa kathesi.
tika-vin06t:1404_6: ayaṃ bhikkhunupassayo”ti vacanato tāsaṃ samīpaṃ vā tāhi gahitavāsāgāraṃ vā “gacchāmī”ti gacchato yathāsukhaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:1404_7: Na hi tāvatā taṃ gharaṃ antaragharasaṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti no takkoti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:1407_0: 604. Sūpo pattappamāṇavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttākāro. Oloṇī vuccati kudhitaṃ, gorasato pūrā thūpitoti attho.
tika-vin06t:1408_1: Heṭṭhā orohatīti ettha “orohanappamāṇe sati ekadese thūpīkatepi anāpattī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1408_2: “Pattassa pana heṭṭhā ca upari ca paduminipaṇṇādīhi paṭicchādetvā odahantiyā laddhaṃ nāma vaṭṭatī”ti ca vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1408_3: Ettha “yasmā ‘samatittiko piṇḍapāto paṭiggahetabbo’ti vacanaṃ piṇḍapāto samapuṇṇo paṭiggahetabboti dīpeti,
tika-vin06t:1408_4: tasmā attano hatthagate patte piṇḍapāto diyyamāno thūpīkatopi ce hoti,
tika-vin06t:1408_7: āpatti dukkaṭassā’ti hi vacanaṃ paṭhamaṃ thūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pacchā paṭiggaṇhato,
tika-vin06t:1408_11: Payogo pana natthi aññatra pubbadesā”ti ca “samatittikanti vā bhāvanapuṃsaka”nti ca vadanti,
tika-vin06t:1411_1: Sūpodanaviññattisikkhāpade “sūpo nāma dve sūpā”ti na vuttaṃ sūpaggahaṇena paṇītabhojanehi avasesānaṃ sabbabhojanānaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1411_2: Anāpattivāre cassa “ñātakānaṃ pavāritānaṃ aññassatthāya attano dhanenā”ti idaṃ adhikaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1411_3: Katthaci potthake “anāpatti asañcicca asatiyā ajānantassa gilānassa āpadāsū”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ, taṃ na,
tika-vin06t:1411_4: “samasūpakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjissāmī”ti imassa anāpattivāre “aññassatthāyā”ti katthaci likhitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1411_6: “Mukhe pakkhipitvā puna vippaṭisārī hutvā ogilitukāmassapi sahasā ce pavisati,
tika-vin06t:1411_8: Viññattampi aviññattampi ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitaṃ sahasā anupadhāretvā gahetvā bhuñjanto ‘asatiyā’ti vuccatī”ti likhitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1414_1: “Sabbaṃ hattha”nti vacanato ekadesaṃ mukhe pakkhipantassa anāpattīti ekacce.
tika-vin06t:1415_1: Sitthāvakārake “kacavaraṃ chaḍḍentaṃ sitthaṃ chaḍḍiyyatī”ti ca “kacavaraṃ chaḍḍento”ti ca pāṭho.
tika-vin06t:1419_3: Na hi te paṭikkūlaṃ karontīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:1421_2: “Sesā sabbā dhanuvikati kodaṇḍe paviṭṭhā”ti ca likhitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1424_0: 640. Sayaṃ yānagato hutvā, yathā yānagatassa ve.
tika-vin06t:1425_0: Alaṃ vattuṃ tathā nālaṃ, sachatto chattapāṇino.
tika-vin06t:1427_7: Yā dhanayasalābhasaṅkhātā vutti vinipātena hoti samparāye apāyesu vinipātahetu hutvā pavattati.
tika-vin06t:1430_3: Dhammadesanasamuṭṭhānāni vācācittatoti ettha kāyavacīviññattibhāvato ujjagghikauccāsaddādīsu viya “kāyavācācittato”ti vattabbānīti ce?
tika-vin06t:1434_0: “Yebhuyyasikā kātabbā…pe… tiṇavatthārako kātabbo, so puggalo”ti ca likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1443_0: Yo bhikkhunīnaṃ vibhaṅgo assa, tassa saṃvaṇṇanākkamo pattoti attho.
tika-vin06t:1447_2: tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampannāti bhikkhunī”ti idaṃ pana desanāvilāsavasena vuttanti eke.
tika-vin06t:1447_4: taṃ na yuttaṃ viya dissati amhākampi buddhakāle sambhavappasaṅgato,
tika-vin06t:1447_6: Yathāha dhammapade visākhāvatthusmiṃ “tassa cīvaradānassa nissandena imaṃ mahālatāpasādhanaṃ labhi.
tika-vin06t:1447_9: Tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampannāya pana bhikkhuniyā sambhavo aññabuddhakāle kadāci siyā,
tika-vin06t:1447_12: teneva bhikkhusaṅghavasena ekatoupasampannā bhikkhuniyo vijjamānāpi tattha na vuttā.
tika-vin06t:1452_0: Atha vā puthujjanakāle ehibhikkhusaraṇagamanena upasampannova itthiliṅgapātubhāvena bhikkhunibhāve ṭhitā purisūpasampannaṃ upādāya “ehibhikkhunī”ti,
tika-vin06t:1452_1: “tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampannā bhikkhunī”ti ca saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. No ce,
tika-vin06t:1452_5: Ettha yasmā yaṃ kiñci āmisaṃ paṭiggaṇhantīnaṃ aggahatthā purisānaṃ hatthehi kadāci missībhāvaṃ gacchanti,
tika-vin06t:1452_6: vandantānaṃ vā purisānaṃ sirāni aggapādehi missitāni kadāci honti,
tika-vin06t:1452_7: kesacchedanakāle vā siraṃ purisānaṃ hatthehi missitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:1452_10: tasmā “mā atilahuṃ pārājikāpatti bhikkhunīnaṃ hotū”ti buddhā bhagavanto kāruññena pārājikakkhettaparicchedaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1453_3: “Kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjeyyā”ti avatvā pana “sādiyeyyā”ti vuttattā akiriyatopi samuṭṭhātīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1453_5: evaṃ heṭṭhā “manussitthiyā tayo magge methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpatti pārājikassā”tiādinā nayena
tika-vin06t:1453_8: āpatti pārājikassā”tiādinā nayena akiriyasamuṭṭhānatāyapi vuttattā paṭhamapārājikassāpi tabbahulanayeneva kiriyasamuṭṭhānatā veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:1453_10: Aṅgajātacalanañcettha na sārato daṭṭhabbaṃ “so ce pavesanaṃ na sādiyati,
tika-vin06t:1453_14: āpatti pārājikassā”ti ettha ṭhita na sādiyane pakatiyāpi paripuṇṇacalanattā.
tika-vin06t:1453_15: Sādiyanapaccayā hi sevanacalanañcettha na dissatevāti tabbahulanayeneva kiriyasamuṭṭhānatā gahetabbā.
tika-vin06t:1453_16: Tattha tattha aṭṭhakathāsu kasmā tabbahulanayo avuttoti ce?
tika-vin06t:1453_17: “Yo pana bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyā”ti mātikāyaṃ kiriyasamuṭṭhānassa sarūpena vuttattā tadanurūpavasena
tika-vin06t:1453_23: sesā paṇṇattivajjā”ti vutte lokavajjapaṇṇattivajjānaṃ niyamanalakkhaṇasiddhi hoti,
tika-vin06t:1453_24: tathā taṃ avatvā “yassā sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hoti,
tika-vin06t:1453_26: Sesā paṇṇattivajjā”ti vutte lokavajjavacanaṃ niratthakaṃ siyā vatthuajānanapakkhepi akusaleneva pātabbattā.
tika-vin06t:1453_28: tasmā khandhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “majjapāne pana bhikkhuno ajānitvāpi bījato paṭṭhāya majjaṃ pivantassa pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1453_31: na vuttaṃ “vatthuajānanapakkhe pāṇātipātādīnaṃ siddhikaraakusalacittuppādasadise cittuppāde satipi sāmaṇero sīlabhedaṃ nāpajjatī”ti.
tika-vin06t:1453_33: “Surādayo panime”ti vatthuṃ jānitvā pātabbatādivasena vītikkamantassa akusalassa asambhavo natthi.
tika-vin06t:1454_0: Kiñcettha yuttivacanena arahantānaṃ appavisanato sacittakācittakapakkhesu akusalaniyamoti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:1454_2: Acittakapakkhe akusalaniyamābhāvadassanatthaṃ supantassa mukhe pakkhittajalabindumiva surābinduādayo udāharitabbāti.
tika-vin06t:1454_3: Tabbahulanayena hi atthe gahite pubbenāparaṃ aṭṭhakathāya sameti.
tika-vin06t:1454_4: “Saddhiṃ pāḷiyā avisesattho parato āvi bhavissatīti apare”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1454_6: Yadi vatthujānanapakkhe vinā akusalena majjapānaṃ siyā,
tika-vin06t:1454_8: Sīlabhedavatthuvītikkamo vināpi cittena ariyānaṃ dhammatāvaseneva na sambhavatīti ce, na,
tika-vin06t:1454_10: Apica bhikkhunopi sāmaṇerassa viya surāpānaṃ sacittakameva kasmā na jātanti?
tika-vin06t:1454_21: Bhikkhussa pācittiyavatthu sāmaṇerānaṃ pārājikaṃ hoti tiracchānagatasāmaṇerānaṃ viyāti ce?
tika-vin06t:1454_22: Acittakampi majjapānādīnaṃ sāmaṇerānaṃ pārājikaṃ paññāpetabbaṃ siyā.
tika-vin06t:1454_27: Kasmā panettha surāpānameva dhammatāvasena ariyā na karontīti?
tika-vin06t:1454_28: Na kevalaṃ surāpānameva dhammatāvasena ariyā na karonti,
tika-vin06t:1454_29: pāṇesupi kodhavasena pāṇasaññitāya sīsacchedanādīni na karonti,
tika-vin06t:1454_34: tasmā eva mātikāṭṭhakathāya gaṇṭhipade lokavajjapaṇṇattivajjādhikāre “sacittakapakkheakusalanti surāpānādisaṅgahatthaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1454_39: Ettha bhikkhussa ca bhikkhuniyā ca kāyasaṃsaggabhāve sati bhikkhunī kāyaṅgamacopayamānāpi citteneva adhivāsentī āpajjati,
tika-vin06t:1454_42: evameva paṭhamapārājikepi copane sati eva āpajjati, nāsati.
tika-vin06t:1454_43: Pavesanaṃ sādiyatīti ettha pavesanasādiyanaṃ nāma sevanacittassuppādananti,
tika-vin06t:1457_0: “Kissa pana tvaṃ ayye jānaṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpanna”nti vacanato,
tika-vin06t:1457_2: ante “uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo aṭṭha pārājikā dhammā”tiādivacanato,
tika-vin06t:1457_3: parivāre “sādhāraṇapaññatti ubhatopaññattī”ti vacanato ca bhikkhunivibhaṅgaṃ patvā bhagavā sādhāraṇāni
tika-vin06t:1457_4: sikkhāpadāni bhikkhūnaṃ uppannavatthusmiṃyeva “yā pana bhikkhunī chandaso methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya
tika-vin06t:1457_5: antamaso tiracchānagatenapi pārājikā hoti asaṃvāsā”tiādinā nayena savisesampi avisesampi mātikaṃ nikkhipitvā
tika-vin06t:1457_10: Saṅgītikārakehi pana asādhāraṇapaññattiyoyeva idha vitthāritāti veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:1458_1: Tattha “aṭṭhannaṃ pārājikāna”nti idaṃ kevalaṃ saṅgītikārakānaṃyeva nayato nikkhittavacanaṃ ito pubbe chaṭṭhasattamaṭṭhamānaṃ pārājikānaṃ apaññattattā.
tika-vin06t:1458_2: Bhagavatā pana idaṃ paññāpitamādisikkhāpadampi upādāya “channaṃ pārājikāna”nti vuttaṃ siyā.
tika-vin06t:1458_3: Ito uddhaṃ paññattānipi upādāya “aṭṭhannaṃ pārājikāna”nti vacanaṃ aparabhāge uppannanti ekacce ācariyā.
tika-vin06t:1458_6: tasmā aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ matena siddhametaṃ yathāpaññattānukkamavaseneva saṅgītānīti.
tika-vin06t:1458_12: tathāpi sikkhāpadavītikkamacittaṃ domanassikameva hotīti katvā “dukkhavedana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1461_3: yo bhikkhu ukkhittakabhikkhunā samānadiṭṭhiko laddhinānāsaṃvāsako hoti,
tika-vin06t:1461_14: Tathā vibbhantepi tasmiṃ titthiyapakkantakepi sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ ṭhitepīti eke.
tika-vin06t:1461_15: Tesaṃ matena ukkhittake tathābhūtepi bhikkhunī tadanuvattikā samanubhāsitabbāvāti āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:1461_17: saṅghena sañcicca purimakāpattiṃ apanetuṃ na yuttaṃ viya khāyati.
tika-vin06t:1461_21: tassa anuvattanamattena samanubhāsitvā sāsanato cāvetabbānīti na yuttanti ce?
tika-vin06t:1464_1: “Lokassādasaṅkhātassa mittasanthavassa vasena taṃ dassetuṃ kāyasaṃsaggarāgenāti vutta”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1464_4: Taṃ na seveti tāsu na sevati.
tika-vin06t:1465_1: “Nivatthaṃ vā pārutaṃ vā”ti ettha nivatthassa vā pārutassa vā vatthassa gahaṇaṃ sādiyatīti attho.
tika-vin06t:1470_3: Akappiyaaḍḍo nāma saṅghassa vā ārāmikapuggalassa vā vatthussa kāraṇā saṅghassa vārikabhāvena sayameva vā adhikaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā “amhākaṃ eso dāso, dāsī, vāpī, khettaṃ, ārāmo,
tika-vin06t:1470_8: ayaṃ vāpī itthannāmena saṅghassa hatthe dohanatthāya dinnā.
tika-vin06t:1470_9: Ito khettato ārāmato uppajjanakacatupaccayā ito gāvito mahiṃsito ajāto uppajjanakagorasā itthannāmena
tika-vin06t:1470_10: saṅghassa dinnā”ti pucchite vā apucchite vā vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:1470_11: “Kata”nti avatvā “karontī”ti vacanena kira anenakataṃ ārabbha ācikkhitā nāma hoti.
tika-vin06t:1470_14: Kārāpetvā dātabbāti ettha sace āvudhabhaṇḍaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:1470_17: “Ticittaṃ tivedana”nti vuttattā “mānussayavasena kodhussayavasenā”ti tabbahulanayena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1473_4: Pakkantāsupīti attano parisaṃ ṭhapetvā itarāsu pakkantāsu.
tika-vin06t:1473_5: Paṇṇattiṃ ajānantā ariyāpi vuṭṭhāpentīti katvā vā kammavācāpariyosāne āpattikkhaṇe vipākābyākatasamaṅgitāvasena vā “ticitta”nti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1476_5: “Ajaṃ gāmaṃ netī”tiādīsu viya vā dvikammikaṃ katvā gāmakaṃ agamāsi ñātikulaṃ agamāsītipi yujjati.
tika-vin06t:1477_1: “Aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ atikkāmentiyā”ti vacanenapi evaṃ veditabbaṃ –
tika-vin06t:1477_2: vikālagāmappavesane dvinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃyeva vasena upacāro paricchinditabbo,
tika-vin06t:1477_3: itarathā yathā ettha parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ parikkhepaṃ viya katvā “atikkāmentiyā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1477_4: evaṃ tatthāpi “aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ atikkamantassā”ti vadeyya.
tika-vin06t:1477_5: Yasmā pana tattha parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato uttari eko leḍḍupāto upacāroti adhippeto,
tika-vin06t:1477_6: tasmā tadatthadīpanatthaṃ “aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ okkamantassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1477_9: gāmassa upacāraṃ atikkamantassa idha upacāro parikkhepo yathā bhaveyya,
tika-vin06t:1477_10: taṃ upacāraṃ paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ atikkamantassa āpatti dukkaṭassa.
tika-vin06t:1477_11: Dutiyaṃ pādaṃ atikkamantassa āpatti pācittiyassā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1477_22: Gaṇamhā ohīyamānāya araññe āpatti hoti, na gāme.
tika-vin06t:1477_23: Atha ca pana nidassanampi “sikkhāpadā buddhavarenā”ti gāthā dassitā,
tika-vin06t:1477_26: ṭhitassa cāpi tattakātiādīnaṃ parivāragāthānaṃ aṭṭhakathāhi upacārokkamanameva pāṭhoti niṭṭhaṃ gantabba”nti ca vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1478_1: teneva paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmentiyātiādimāhā”ti ettha vikālagāmappavesanasikkhāpadādīsu tadabhāvā yānena vā iddhiyā vā pavisato,
tika-vin06t:1478_6: “Parato ‘sace bhikkhunīsu mahābodhiyaṅgaṇaṃ pavisantīsu ekā bahi tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin06t:1478_7: tassā āpattī’tiādivacanato bhikkhuvihāro na kappiyabhūmīti siddhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1478_9: kāvīrapaṭṭane sārīdhammavihāro viya ca aññopi so vihāro,
tika-vin06t:1478_10: tasmā sīmabaddhasukhatthaṃ gāmantarabhāve nirantarā adhiṭṭhānatthaṃ pavisantiyā,
tika-vin06t:1478_12: Catugāmasādhāraṇattāti ettha evaṃvidhe vihāre sīmaṃ bandhantehi cattāropi te gāmā sodhetabbāti veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:1478_13: Saṃvidahitvā bhikkhuniyā vā mātugāmena vā theyyasatthena vā saddhiṃ taṃ vihāraṃ okkamantiyā catasso āpattiyo ekatova honti.
tika-vin06t:1479_0: Dutiyapāduddhāre saṅghādisesoti ettha sace dutiyo pāduddhāro kappiyabhūmiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:1479_8: Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “paratīrato nadiṃ otaritvā dassanūpacārato dārūni,
tika-vin06t:1479_15: Gāmantare pamāṇanti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ paratīrato nadiṃ otaritvā dassanūpacārato dārūni paṇṇāni sakagāmato
tika-vin06t:1479_16: thokampi taraṇavārena na vaṭṭati kira nikkhamitvā pavisituṃ.
tika-vin06t:1480_3: tasmā yā bhikkhunupassayato gāmassa indakhīlaṃ atikkamati,
tika-vin06t:1480_4: sā asante gāme gaṇamhā ohīyanāpattiṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:1480_9: Gāmato pana nikkhamantī ito paṭṭhāya āpajjatīti dassanatthaṃ “agāmakaṃ arañña”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1480_15: Itarā gāme gāme pāre pāre aruṇe aruṇe cāti veditabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1480_17: “Mahābodhiyaṅgaṇantiādi evaṃ gāmassa āsannaṭṭhānepi imaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjatīti dassanatthaṃ vutta”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1483_6: Paṭhamameva kārakasaṅghaṃ na āmantetvā balakkārenāyaṃ thullanandā taṃ bhikkhuniṃ osāresī”ti porāṇagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1483_7: tasmā kārakabhikkhūnaṃ sammukhāpi tesaṃ anumatiṃ paṭhamaṃ aggahetvā taṃ kammaṃ na paṭippassambhetabbanti siddhaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:1483_9: “Bhikkhunīpi diṭṭhāvikammaṃ kātuṃ labhatī”ti ca tattha vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1484_2: anāpattīti ettha kittāvatā asanto nāma hotīti?
tika-vin06t:1484_12: Tattha tasmiṃ āvāse asante kārakasaṅghe osāreti,
tika-vin06t:1487_1: Etaṃ na vuttanti bhikkhuniyā avassutabhāvo daṭṭhabboti etaṃ niyamanaṃ na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1487_5: Yadi hi puggalassa avassutabhāvo na pamāṇaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1487_13: Atha bhikkhunī anavassutā samānā avassutampi “anavassuto”ti saññāya tassa hatthato paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin06t:1487_15: Atha sā anavassutāpi aññaṃ anavassutaṃ vā avassutaṃ vā “avassuto”ti jānāti,
tika-vin06t:1487_17: Vuttañhetaṃ anantarasikkhāpade “kissa tvaṃ ayye na paṭiggaṇhāsīti.
tika-vin06t:1490_2: Yasmā uyyojikā na deti na paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin06t:1493_2: Ñattiyā dukkaṭathullaccayā paṭippassambhanti saṅghādisese patteti porāṇā.
tika-vin06t:1493_4: “Sutvā na vadantī”ti ettha sace jīvitabrahmacariyantarāyabhayā na vadanti, anāpatti.
tika-vin06t:1493_5: “Adhammakamme adhammakammasaññā āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vuttattā “anāpatti asamanubhāsantiyā”ti saṅghādisesaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1496_4: Vuttañhi tattha “tassa vacanassa paṭinissaggāya eva vacanīyo,
tika-vin06t:1496_6: Evaṃ sante ubhopetā āpattiyo aññamaññaṃ sabhāgatthā,
tika-vin06t:1506_1: Vatthusampattattā vā na tassā anāpannakāmatāya vā anāṇattikatāya vā akālacīvaramadaṃsu.
tika-vin06t:1506_4: Atthato hi itarampi yathādāne eva upanetabbameva.
tika-vin06t:1506_5: Gaṇṭhipade pana “ayyāya dammīti evaṃ paṭiladdhanti nissaṭṭhapaṭiladdhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1506_9: taṃ vinayakammaṃ katvāpi attanā na labhatī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1506_10: Yadi nissaṭṭhapaṭiladdhaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ siyā,
tika-vin06t:1506_11: “nissajjitabbaṃ saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā dadeyya, dadeyyuṃ,
tika-vin06t:1506_12: ayyāya dammī”ti vuttattā tīṇipetāni padāni vattabbāni siyuṃ,
tika-vin06t:1506_13: tasmā na kevalaṃ nissaṭṭhapaṭiladdhameva yathādāne upanetabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1507_1: “Akālacīvare kālacīvarasaññāya anāpattī”ti pana bhājanapaccayā āpajjitabbāpattiṃ nāpajjatīti ettakameva dīpeti,
tika-vin06t:1510_0: 744. Sakasaññāya gahitattā pācittiyaṃ, dukkaṭañca vuttaṃ. Itarathā bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1513_4: tasmā paṭhamaṃ viññattaṃ alabhitvā aññaṃ tato ūnatarampi labheyya,
tika-vin06t:1516_0: 753. “Telaṃ gopetvā sappimpi me attano kulagharā”ti kira pāṭho.
tika-vin06t:1519_5: “Itarāsaṃ pana jānitvā vassaggena pattakoṭṭhāsaṃ sādiyantīnampi na nissaggiyaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1519_6: kevalaṃ yathādāne eva tāhipi upanetabba”nti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1519_7: “Nissaṭṭhaṃ paṭilabhitvāpi yathādāne upanetabba’nti vuttattā sesāhi gahitaṃ suggahita”nti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1522_2: Tathāpi aññadatthikena attuddesikena saññācikenāti attho veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:1522_3: Ayamattho “bhikkhuniyo tena ca parikkhārena sayampi yācitvā bhesajjaṃ cetāpetvā paribhuñjiṃsū”ti imissā pāḷiyā atthena saṃsanditvā veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:1522_6: saddena saññācikena ca bhesajjaṃ cetāpetvāti imamatthaṃ dīpento “sayampi yācitvā bhesajjaṃ cetāpetvā”ti āha.
tika-vin06t:1522_7: Aññathā “tena parikkhārena bhesajjaṃ cetāpetvā sayampi yācitvā paribhuñjiṃsū”ti iminā anukkamena pāḷi vattabbā siyā.
tika-vin06t:1523_0: Padabhājane pana “saṃyācikenāti sayaṃ yācitvā”ti tasseva padassa adhippāyamattaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1523_2: “Saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇata”ntiādipadānaṃ bhājane pana sā pākaṭā.
tika-vin06t:1523_3: Aññathā saṃyācikapadena ko añño atirekattho saṅgahito siyā,
tika-vin06t:1523_4: so na dissatīti tadeva padaṃ nippayojanaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1523_7: Ettha ca saṅghassa yācanāya vasena ekato hutvā yācanāya laddhaṃ saṃyācikanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1523_9: saddena idaṃ nibbisesaṃ āpajjatīti “puggalikena saṃyācikenā”ti idañca sikkhāpadaṃ visuṃ na vattabbaṃ
tika-vin06t:1523_12: Missetvā cetāpitattā hi ekameva āpattīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:1523_14: evaṃ saṅghikamahājanikapuggalikāni missitvā cetāpane ekāpattibhāvappasaṅgato ca.
tika-vin06t:1532_1: Dasame pana “yā pana bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena puggalikena aññaṃ cetāpeyya,
tika-vin06t:1532_3: “puggalikena saṃyācikenā”ti iminā ekādasamena bhavitabbaṃ siyā yathākkamena sambhavato.
tika-vin06t:1532_4: Kāmameva cetaṃ aṭṭhuppattiyā abhāvato na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1532_8: idaṃ sabbaṃ amhākaṃ takkānusāravaseneva vuttanti katvā na sārato daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1532_9: Vicāretvā yathā niccalakāraṇaṃ disvā yaṃ vā vinayakkamakovidā anujānanti,
tika-vin06t:1535_3: Yasmā pavāritaṭṭhāne viññatti nāma na paṭisedhetabbā,
tika-vin06t:1535_4: tasmā bhagavā aññātikaappavāritaṭṭhāne dhammanimantanavasena vadeyya “yenattho”ti vuttāya “catukkaṃsaparamaṃ
tika-vin06t:1535_7: sikkhāpadena ca anāpattivāro”ti ca “akataviññattiyā catukkaṃsaparamaṃ viññāpetabba”nti ca aniṭṭhaṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin06t:1535_8: tasmā mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ cetāpetabbanti ṭhapetvā sahadhammike ca ñātakapavārite ca aññena kismiñcideva guṇena,
tika-vin06t:1535_9: parituṭṭhena ca vadeyya “yenattho”ti vuttassa “viññāpetabba”nti vuttanayena attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin06t:1535_11: Anāpatti ñātakānaṃ pavāritānanti pana sabbappakārena pavattaṃ niccapavāraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1535_14: ‘Handa sītapāvuraṇa’nti dentānaṃ pana atirekacatukkaṃsampi gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1542_2: Badarasāḷavaṃ kira badaraphalāni sukkhāpetvā cuṇṇetvā kattabbā khādanīyavikati.
tika-vin06t:1545_1: Saṃharāpeyyāti “saṃharati vā saṃharāpeti vā”ti padabhājanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1545_5: evaṃ talaghātakādimhi ca āpattibhedo pāḷiyaṃ na vutto.
tika-vin06t:1545_7: Evaṃ bhikkhussa ettha ca lasuṇe ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1549_1: Pañcame udakasuddhipaccaye satipi phassasādiyane yathāvuttaparicchede anāpatti.
tika-vin06t:1549_2: Tattha dvinnaṃ pabbānanti “dvinnaṃ aṅgulānaṃ sahapavesane ekekaaṅgulassa ekekaṃ pabbaṃ katvā dve pabbā,
tika-vin06t:1549_3: ekaṅgulappavesane dvinnaṃ pabbānaṃ upari na vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1553_5: Taṃ pubbāparaviruddhanti “punapi vutta”nti vuttaṃ vādaṃ sandhāya,
tika-vin06t:1553_6: na tato pubbe tattha vuttaṃ vādaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1553_9: na hi tena virodhaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttanti.
tika-vin06t:1553_14: Na hi karaṇe vā kārāpane vā viseso atthi āpajjane satīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:1554_1: Sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭatīti appaṭikkhipitvā “sādhū”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:1554_3: Anāmāsattā “āmakadhaññaṃ pana ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānepi na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1554_4: Anugaṇṭhipade pana “kappiyena laddhaṃ dhaññaṃ bhajjitvā bhuñjantiyā dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1554_5: Aparaṇṇepi eseva nayo”ti ca “anāpatti ābādhapaccayāti vacanato satta dhaññānipi anāmāsānīti siddhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1554_6: teneva heṭṭhā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dukkaṭavatthumhi satta dhaññānipi gahitāni anāmāsānī”ti ca vuttāni.
tika-vin06t:1554_8: yathā ñātakapavārite sandhāya “aparaṇṇaṃ viññāpetī”ti avisesena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1554_9: evaṃ “anāpatti ñātakānaṃ pavāritānaṃ aññassa atthāya viññāpeti,
tika-vin06t:1554_11: Yasmā dukkaṭavatthuttā ca anāmāsattā ca mātarampi sattavidhaṃ dhaññaṃ viññāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:1554_12: tasmā tadatthadīpanatthaṃ sattavidhaṃ dhaññaṃ sandhāya “anāpatti ābādhapaccayā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1554_15: Yathā vā pana bhikkhuniyā bhajjanādīni kārāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:1554_17: Vuttampi cetaṃ andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “aññataro bālabhikkhu kappiyaṃ ajānanto etadavoca ‘āmakadhaññaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:1554_18: Etaṃ dhaññaṃ bhajjitvā koṭṭetvā pacitvā yāgukhajjakaṃ bhattañca dethā’ti,
tika-vin06t:1554_21: Tasmā “saṅghavārikānaṃ dhaññaṃ koṭṭethā”ti ārāmikānaṃ vattuñca na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:1554_25: tvaṃ ettake”ti evamādīni pana vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti ca.
tika-vin06t:1554_26: Yaṃ pana “aviññattiyā labbhamānaṃ pana navakammatthāya sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1554_27: tampi heṭṭhā “imaṃ taḷākaṃ khettaṃ vatthuṃ vihārassa demā’ti vutte ‘sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ nayaṃ sandhāya vuttattā suvuttameva.
tika-vin06t:1554_29: Yaṃ pana heṭṭhā “tattha nissaggiyavatthuṃ attano vā saṅghagaṇapuggalacetiyānaṃ vā atthāya sampaṭicchituṃ na vaṭṭati…pe…
tika-vin06t:1554_30: dukkaṭavatthuṃ sabbesampi atthāya sampaṭicchato dukkaṭamevā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1554_33: tumhe bhante tadatthāya sampaṭicchathā”ti vutte paṭiggahetuṃ akappiyattā.
tika-vin06t:1554_34: “Idaṃ pana tādisaṃ na hotī”ti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1554_36: Dhammasiritthero panevamāha “pubbepi navakammatthāya paṭiggaho na vārito,
tika-vin06t:1561_7: ārāme ca tattha kacavaraṃ na chaḍḍetabbanti katikā ce natthi,
tika-vin06t:1564_1: Sādhukīḷitagītaṃ vāti ettha pāciṇṇagītampi sotuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:1564_2: “Gītupasañhitaṃ pana dhammaṃ sotuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1564_3: Porāṇagaṇṭhipade pana “dhammagītampi na vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā “buddhassa gāyāma vādemāti vutte sampaṭicchituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:1564_6: jātakaṃ vā vatthuṃ vā desemāti vutte ‘sādhū’ti sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1565_3: “Bhikkhunī sayampi naccituṃ vā gāyituṃ vā vādituṃ vā na labhatī”tiādi idha sikkhāpade natthi. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:1565_7: Yadi naccādīni passituṃ vā sotuṃ vā na labhati,
tika-vin06t:1565_8: pageva attanā kātunti nayato labbhamānattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1565_11: “Samuṭṭhānampi idha vuttameva aggahetvā chasamuṭṭhānavasena gahetabba”nti likhitaṃ.

tika-vin06t:1697_5: Na cātuddasiuposathaṃ pannarasiyaṃ akhettattā anuposathadivasattā pāṭipadadivasattāti ekacce ācariyā,

tika-vin06t:1697_8: Yaṃ panettha vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sace cātuddasikaṃ uposathaṃ karissāmāti nisinnā,
tika-vin06t:1697_10: Tato “pannarasiyameva ‘cātuddasikaṃ uposathaṃ karissāmā’ti nisinnā punadivase attano taṃ uposathaṃ ‘pannaraso’ti
tika-vin06t:1697_12: taṃ tesaṃ mataṃ “tathārūpapaccaye sati aññasmimpi cātuddase uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti iminā mātikāṭṭhakathāvacanena na sameti.
tika-vin06t:1697_13: Na hi tattha “aññasmimpi pannarase cātuddasikaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1697_14: Evaṃ santepi “sakiṃ pakkhassa cātuddase vā pannarase vā”ti anuññātadivase pariyāpannattā channaṃ cātuddasikānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1697_15: pacchimā pannarasī anuposathadivaso na hotīti siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:1697_19: āgantukehi āvāsikānaṃ samasamehi vā appatarehi vā anuvattitabba”nti vacanamettha niratthakaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.

tika-vin06t:1703_2: vuttānīti katvā abhidhammo buddhena bhāsito evāti dīpitaṃ hoti.
