tika-vin06t:1708_0: Giraggasamajjādīni “acittakāni lokavajjānī”ti vuttattā “nacca”nti vā “gandho”ti vā ajānitvāpi dassanena,
tika-vin06t:1708_4: Corivuṭṭhāpanādīni “corī”tiādinā vatthuṃ jānitvā karaṇe eva āpattisabbhāvato sacittakāni.
tika-vin06t:1708_6: “Idha sacittakācittakatā paṇṇattijānanājānanatāya aggahetvā vatthujānanājānanatāya gahetabbā”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1708_8: vā ‘gandho’ti vā tassa nāmavasena ajānitvā māyākārassa māyāni sīsaṭṭhiādīni paṭisaṅkhāya passantiyā,
tika-vin06t:1708_10: ‘sedagandhaṃ apanetvā buddhapūjaṃ karissāmī’ti uppannena cittena gandhaṃ vilimpetvā nahāyantiyā ca āpattisabbhāvato
tika-vin06t:1708_11: nāmena saddhiṃ nāmavasena vā vatthussa ajānanacittena acittakāni nāma.
tika-vin06t:1708_12: Na andhakāre ‘kaṭisuttamida’nti saññāya saṅghāṇiṃ gahetvā kaṭiyaṃ dhāraṇakāle,
tika-vin06t:1708_13: mattikāsaññāya ca gandhaṃ gahetvā vilimpanakāle āpattisabbhāvato ‘acittakānī’ti vattabbāni.
tika-vin06t:1708_15: teneva saṅghāṇiyā asaṅghāṇisaññāvārepi ‘āpatti pācittiyassā’ti pāḷi na vuttā.
tika-vin06t:1708_17: kaṭisuttakaṃ dhāretī’ti vacanato vināpi akusalena saṅghāṇiādīni sakkā dhāretunti siddhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1708_18: evaṃ ābādhapaccayā vināpi akusalena na sakkā suraṃ pātunti siddhaṃ ‘anāpatti ābādhapaccayā majjaṃ pivatī’ti pāḷiyā abhāvato.
tika-vin06t:1708_19: Akusalena vinā madhupuṇṇamuṭṭhiyaṃ pakkhittamajjassa ajjhoharaṇakālādīsu surāpānāpattiṃ āpajjatīti ca siddhaṃ ‘majje amajjasaññī pivati,
tika-vin06t:1708_22: kāmabhogasaññāya saddhiṃ ‘saṅghāṇī’ti ca ‘gandho’ti ca jānitvā vinā anāpattikāraṇena dhārentiyā ekantākusalattā lokavajjāni nāma vuccanti.
tika-vin06t:1708_25: Asaṃkaccikasikkhāpade “aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ okkamantiyāti pāṭho”ti ca “paṇītabhojanaviññatti,
tika-vin06t:1718_9: Tesaṃ paññattisaṅkhātānaṃ khandhānaṃ pakāsanato vaṇṇanato pabbajjakkhandhakādayo vīsati “khandhakā”ti vuttā,
tika-vin06t:1718_10: avasāne dve taṃsadisattā velāya sadisattā sīlassa velāti vacanaṃ viya.
tika-vin06t:1718_11: Apica bhāgarāsatthatāpettha yujjate tesaṃ paññattīnaṃ bhāgato ca rāsito ca vibhattattā.
tika-vin06t:1718_15: Atha vā pabbajjupasampadāpubbaṅgamattā sāsanappavesanassa tadatthasaṅgahako mahākhandhako paṭhamaṃ vutto.
tika-vin06t:1718_18: Bhagavatā pana tattha tattha uppannavatthuṃ paṭicca tathā tathā vuttāni,
tika-vin06t:1718_20: Therā pana taṃ taṃ payojanaṃ paṭicca samānajātike ekajjhaṃ katvā anukkamena sajjhāyiṃsu.
tika-vin06t:1718_21: Sesānaṃ payojanaṃ tattha tattheva āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin06t:1719_6: Yehi atthā yesaṃ padavisesānaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pakāsitā,
tika-vin06t:1719_7: tesaṃ te padavisese puna idha vadeyyāma,
tika-vin06t:1719_8: vaṇṇanāya pariyosānaṃ kadā bhave te te attheti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1719_13: Adhippāyānusandhīhītiādivacanehipi taṃ vacanaṃ sambhavatīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:1719_16: abhidhānatthena vā atthopacārena vā atthāti veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:1719_17: Saṃvaṇṇanānayoti saṃvaṇṇanā nāma avuttesu uhāpohakkamanidassanato “nayo”ti vutto.
tika-vin06t:1720_11: “So pana gāmo tadupacārena evaṃ nāmaṃ labhatī”ti vacanaṃ pana avuttasiddhanti katvā na vuttanti veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1720_14: Tattha āyasmā upālitthero na idha gāmaṃ sandhāya “uruvelāyaṃ viharatī”ti āha gocaragāmapayojanābhāvato.
tika-vin06t:1720_15: Na hi bhagavā taṃ gāmaṃ gocaraṃ katvā tadā tattha vihāsi,
tika-vin06t:1720_16: tasmā ettha vālikarāsissa samīpe bodhirukkhamūle vihāraṃ sandhāya so evamāhāti dassetukāmo aṭṭhakathācariyo evamāhāti veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1720_17: tasmā bhagavato gāmato dūratare araññe abhisambodhidīpanena dutiyuppattiṭṭhānaniyamaṃ tīhi padehi akāsi theroti veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1721_0: Bodhirukkhamūleti ettha ca bodhi vuccati abhisambodho.
tika-vin06t:1721_1: So ca atthato bhagavato catutthamaggañāṇaṃ hoti “vimokkhantikametaṃ nāma”nti paṭisambhidāvacanato.
tika-vin06t:1721_2: Kiñcāpi taṃ nāmakaraṇabhūtaṃ catutthaphalañāṇampi vattuṃ sambhavati,
tika-vin06t:1721_3: kattabbakiccānaṃ pana karaṇato taṃ catutthamaggañāṇameva ettha bodhīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1721_4: Teneva pāḷiyaṃ “tatiyavijjāya āsavānaṃ khayañāṇāyā”ti tadeva dassitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1721_7: Tattha yasmā catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ “bodhī”ti vuccati,
tika-vin06t:1721_8: tasmā sāmaññato vattukāmatādhippāyavasena “bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ idhādhippetañāṇassapi tadantogadhattā.
tika-vin06t:1721_9: Atha vā pāḷiyaṃ bhagavato ādimaggattayavacanassa vuttaṭṭhānābhāvā catutthamaggañāṇameva bhagavato uppannaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1721_10: na bhagavā sotāpannādibhāvaṃ patvā buddho jātoti samayantarappasaṅganivāraṇatthaṃ “catūsū”ti vuttaṃ ādittayassa
tika-vin06t:1721_12: “Puggalopi senāsanampi upanissayapaccayena paccayo”ti vacanato phalahetuko phalajanako rukkho phalarukkhoti
tika-vin06t:1721_17: Maggañāṇañhi kusalamūlattā bodhi ca taṃ mūlañcāti saṅkhyaṃ labheyya.
tika-vin06t:1721_19: Tena abhisambuddhadivasena saddhiṃ aṭṭhāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisinnabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin06t:1721_21: saddo tassa nisajjāsaṅkhātassa pabbajjānuyogānurūpassa pallaṅkassa aññena iriyāpathena anantariyabhāvaṃ athassa akopitabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin06t:1721_22: Vimuttisukhanti ettha vimuttiyaṃ vā sukhanti na sambhavati.
tika-vin06t:1721_23: Pañcamajjhānikattā bhagavato phalasamāpattisaṅkhātā vimutti eva anujaṅghanaṭṭhena nibbānasukhanti vimuttisukhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1722_1: Tena vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedayamāno na paṭiccasamuppādaṃ manasākāsi,
tika-vin06t:1722_3: Paṭivedhavaseneva sumanasikatassa paṭiccasamuppādassa punappunaṃ manasikaraṇaṃ gambhīrattā assādajananato,
tika-vin06t:1722_6: paṭividdhassa visayato vā manasikaraṇaṃ pana vijitadesapaccavekkhaṇaṃ viya rañño apubbaṃ pītiṃ janeti.
tika-vin06t:1722_13: Tattha ca kiñcāpi pavattimattapaccavekkhaṇā adhippetā kathaṃ paññāyatīti?
tika-vin06t:1722_24: Tattha “yato khayaṃ paccayānaṃ avedī”ti vacanena anulomo nādhippetoti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1722_27: ārammaṇato ca tassa maggassa visayato ca tattha maggo dassito.
tika-vin06t:1723_2: na hi paṭilomāpadesena niddiṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ paṭiccasamuppādo bhavitumarahatīti? Vuccate – na,
tika-vin06t:1723_6: paṭilomato ca taṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ manasākāsīti hi tattha attho.
tika-vin06t:1723_8: Paṭilome ca panetasmiṃ anukkamaniyamo anulome anukkamaniyamato siddhoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1723_9: Evaṃ sati paṭiccasamuppādassa paṭilomo nāma apaṭiccasamuppādoti siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:1723_10: Tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “nirodho hotīti anuppādo hotī”tiādi.
tika-vin06t:1723_13: paccayānañca paccayāyattupagamanena tassa uppādābhimukhabhāvadīpanato asamuppādo na sambhavati,
tika-vin06t:1723_14: tasmā apaṭiccasamuppādoti evaṃ ubhayapaṭikkhepena panassa paṭilomatā veditabbāti eke.
tika-vin06t:1723_19: Tattha hi “avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā”ti evaṃ paccayassa samucchinnapaccayabhāvavasena paccayanirodhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1723_21: Duvidho pāḷiyaṃ nirodho atthato anuppādo nāma hotīti katvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “nirodho hotīti anuppādo hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1723_22: Evaṃ sante nibbānaṃ paccayapaccayuppannānaṃ nirodhamattanti āpajjatīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:1724_0: Jhāyatoti ettha kāmaṃ lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena jhāyato bodhipakkhiyadhammā pātubhavanti,
tika-vin06t:1724_5: so samudayaṃ pajahatī”ti laddhivasena katanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1725_4: Kāmañca taṃ na kevalaṃ paccayakkhayamattaṃ karoti,
tika-vin06t:1725_8: Vuttappakārā dhammāti ettha catusaccaggahaṇaṃ paṭhamagāthāyaṃ vuttanayavipallāsena katanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1726_3: Etena dvippakārā nirodhā dassitā honti tassa anubhāvassa vasenāti attho.
tika-vin06t:1728_1: Sammodīti hitakāmatāya bhagavā tena brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ sammodi.
tika-vin06t:1728_2: Vedehi antanti ettha nibbānaṃ anto nāma.
tika-vin06t:1728_3: Vedānaṃ vā antaṃ gatattāti ettha arahattaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1731_1: Mucalindavatthumhi etamatthanti idāni vattabbamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1731_3: “Abyāpajjaṃ sukhaṃ loke”ti iminā paṭhamamaggaṃ dasseti tena sattesu māraṇavasena uppajjanakabyāpādappahānasiddhito.
tika-vin06t:1731_5: Maggī hi puggalo avasiṭṭhabyāpādatanuttavasena pāṇabhūtesu saṃyato hoti vihiṃsādhippāyābhāvato.
tika-vin06t:1731_6: Evaṃ cattāro hi maggā anukkamenāpi gahitā honti.
tika-vin06t:1734_3: Mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ kirassa dinnānaṃ catunnampi lekhāparicchedo atthi,
tika-vin06t:1734_4: te vāṇijā devatāya gāravadassanena bhagavato rūpakāyadassanena pasannattā saraṇaṃ aggahesuṃ.
tika-vin06t:1734_5: Devatāya “bhagavā rājāyatanamūle paṭhamābhisambuddho”ti vacanaṃ sutvā sāvakasaṅghābhāvaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1737_7: Atakkāvacaroti takkena ākāraparivitakkena ogāhitabbo na hoti,
tika-vin06t:1737_11: Tañhi phalūpacārena ekampi samānaṃ tathā tathā vuccati.
tika-vin06t:1738_1: Sahaṃpati kira “nassati vata bho loko”ti imaṃ saddaṃ tathā nicchāreti,
tika-vin06t:1738_3: Paññāmaye akkhimhi santānānusayitavasena appaṃ parittaṃ rāgādirajaṃ etesaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1739_6: Vigatarajattā sukhadassanayogge ito ca etto ca āgantvā yathā ṭhito cakkhumā puriso samantato janataṃ passeyya.
tika-vin06t:1740_5: Anto nimuggaposīnīti yāni anto nimuggāneva posiyanti,
tika-vin06t:1740_7: tāni sūriyaraṃsisamphassaṃ āgamayamānāni ṭhitāni ajja pupphanakāni.
tika-vin06t:1740_12: Udakā pana anuggatāni aññānipi sarogauppalādīni nāma honti.
tika-vin06t:1740_16: Etehi ugghaṭitaññū vipañcitaññū neyyo padaparamoti cattāro puggalā yojetabbā.
tika-vin06t:1741_2: Ahañhi attano paguṇaṃ suppavattampi imaṃ paṇītaṃ uttamaṃ dhammaṃ kāyavācākilamathasaññī hutvā nābhāsi.
tika-vin06t:1744_1: Idāni pana sabbo jano saddhābhājanaṃ upanetu,
tika-vin06t:1744_4: Ājānissatīti ce na niṭṭhānamakaṃsu dhammasaṅgāhakā te vinayakkamaññā,
tika-vin06t:1744_6: “muddhāpi tassa vipateyyā”ti ettha viya abhūtaparikappo kireso.
tika-vin06t:1744_7: Loke tassa adhimuttabhāvadīpanatthañhi idaṃ vacanaṃ attano tadupadesena aviditabhāvadīpanatthaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1744_9: Bhagavatopi kho ñāṇanti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ tassa maraṇārammaṇaṃ uppajji.
tika-vin06t:1744_10: Tena tato pubbe tassa sati dhammadesanāya khippaṃ jānanabhāvārammaṇanti dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:1744_15: Sabbadhammānaṃ ekato gahaṇe viruddhakālānaṃ ekato jānanappasaṅgo.
tika-vin06t:1744_17: tasmā sabbassa vinānekañāṇasamodhānaṃ āpajjitadhammesu appaṭihatañāṇavantattā pana sabbaññū eva bhagavāti veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1744_21: Yadābhāvena yadābhāvo tabbhāvena tassābhāvappasaṅgo loke siddhoti.
tika-vin06t:1744_22: “Bhagavatopi kho ñāṇaṃ udapādī”ti vacanato tassa maraṇajānanaṃ siddhanti katvā bhavaṃ mateneva bhagavā
tika-vin06t:1744_23: sabbaññūti siddhaṃ na devatārocanato pubbe ajānanatoti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:1744_26: Na hi so kassaci vacanena aññāsīti.
tika-vin06t:1745_0: Apica kimidaṃ tattha jānanaṃ nāma tadārammaṇañāṇuppattīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:1745_2: Sādhikā hi mayā ekañāṇakkhaṇe sabbaṃ ñāṇaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1745_4: Apica sabbaññuno sabbadhammavisaye ñāṇapaccupaṭṭhānasiddhi tassa ñāṇassa attanāva attano avisayoti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:1745_6: Apica “bhagavatopi kho ñāṇaṃ udapādī”ti ettha visesavacanaṃ atthi.
tika-vin06t:1745_7: Yena devatārocanuttarakālameva bhagavato ñāṇaṃ udapādīti paññāyati.
tika-vin06t:1745_14: ekadivasabbhantare ca pattabbamaggaphalato parihīnattā mahatī jāni assāti mahājāni.
tika-vin06t:1745_15: Tesu hi dvīsu āḷāro ākiñcaññāyatanabhave nibbatto,
tika-vin06t:1745_17: tasmā nesaṃ dhammadesanāya akkhaṇe nibbattabhāvaṃ sandhāya bhagavā evaṃ cintesi,
tika-vin06t:1745_18: na ito manussalokato cutibhāvaṃ sandhāyāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1746_0: Bodhisattassa jātakāle supinapaṭiggāhakā ceva lakkhaṇapariggāhakā ca aṭṭha brāhmaṇā.
tika-vin06t:1746_1: Tesu tayo dvidhā byākariṃsu “imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato agāraṃ ajjhāvasanto rājā hoti cakkavatti,
tika-vin06t:1746_6: Ime pana mantapāraṃ atikkamantā attanā laddhaṃ puññamahattaṃ vissajjetvā bodhisattaṃ uddissa puretarameva pabbajiṃsu.
tika-vin06t:1746_10: Kasmā panettha bhagavā “bahūpakārā kho me”ti cintesi.
tika-vin06t:1746_11: Kiṃ upakārakānaṃ eva esa dhammaṃ deseti,
tika-vin06t:1747_1: Antarā ca gayaṃ antarā ca bodhinti gayāya ca bodhiyā ca majjhe tigāvutantare ṭhāne.
tika-vin06t:1747_4: Upako pana bodhimaṇḍassa ca gayāya ca antare bhagavantaṃ addasa. Antarā-
tika-vin06t:1747_6: Īdisesu ca ṭhānesu akkharacintakā ekameva antarāsaddaṃ payujjanti,
tika-vin06t:1748_3: Natthi me paṭipuggaloti mayhaṃ paṭipuggalo nāma natthi,
tika-vin06t:1748_5: mama sabbaññubhāve dosaṃ dassetvā loke ṭhātuṃ asamatthatāya mama paccatthikapuggalo vā natthīti attho.
tika-vin06t:1748_6: Āhañchaṃ amatadundubhinti dhammacakkhupaṭilābhāya amatabheriṃ paharissāmīti gacchāmi.
tika-vin06t:1749_0: Arahasi anantajino bhavituṃ yutto tvanti attho.
tika-vin06t:1749_4: Bhagavāpi “tattha tassa migaluddakassa dhītuyā cāpāya ukkaṇṭhitvā puna āgantvā anāgāmī ayaṃ bhavissatī”ti
tika-vin06t:1749_6: So ca tathevāgantvā pabbajitvā anāgāmī hutvā anukkamena kālaṃ katvā avihesu uppajjitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
tika-vin06t:1750_4: “vācaṃ bhāsitameva”nti ca evarūpaṃ kañci vacanabhedaṃ akāsīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:1750_5: Bhagavantaṃ sussūsiṃsūti bhagavato vacanaṃ sotukāmā ahesuṃ.
tika-vin06t:1751_7: Taṇhāavijjāti hi saṃsārappavattiyā sīsabhūtā dve kilesā.
tika-vin06t:1751_8: Te ca samathavipassanānaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtattā antā nāma.
tika-vin06t:1751_9: Tesu taṇhāvasena kāmasukhallikānuyogaṃ bhajanto samathaṃ parihāpeti bālo,
tika-vin06t:1751_10: tathā avijjāvasena attakilamathānuyogaṃ bhajanto gacchanto vipassananti na sakkā ubho dve ante appahāya amataṃ adhigantunti evaṃ vuttā.
tika-vin06t:1751_14: Ubhopi te vīriyasamatāya paṭipakkhattā antā nāma.
tika-vin06t:1751_15: Apica tisso sāsane paṭipadā vuttā āgāḷhā, nijjhāmā,
tika-vin06t:1751_22: Tattha kāmasukhallikānuyogo āgāḷhā nāma paṭipadā hoti sabbākusalamūlattā.
tika-vin06t:1751_24: Ubhopete majjhimāya paṭipadāya paṭipakkhabhūtattā antā nāma,
tika-vin06t:1751_26: Kimatthaṃ bhagavā “pabbajitena na sevitabbā”ti pabbajite eva adhikaroti,
tika-vin06t:1751_33: nanu te pakatiyāpi kāmapariccāgaṃ katvā taṃ nissaraṇatthaṃ pabbajitāti? Na,
tika-vin06t:1751_35: Te hi idha loke kāmena visuddhimicchanti attakilamathānuyogamanuyuttā tasseva tapassa phalena pecca dibbe
tika-vin06t:1752_0: Yo cāyaṃ kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogoti ettha kāmesūti vatthukāmo adhippeto,
tika-vin06t:1752_27: kintu mayā tathāgateneva satā abhisambodhiñāṇena abhisambuddho”ti.
tika-vin06t:1752_29: Bhesajjaṃ āturassa viya “cakkhukaraṇī”ti iminā ñāṇacakkhuvisodhanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1752_34: Nibbānāyāti sopādisesanibbānadhātuyā anupādisesanibbānadhātuyāti evaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ yojetvā kathetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1753_1: Kasmā panettha bhagavā aññattha viya anupubbiṃ kathaṃ akathetvā paṭhamameva asevitabbamantadvayaṃ vatvā majjhimapaṭipadaṃ desesīti?
tika-vin06t:1753_3: kummaggapaṭipattinivāraṇatthañca antadvayavajjanaṃ vatvā attano visesādhigamadīpananayena abāhullikādibhāvadassanatthaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1753_4: tesañca majjhimapaṭipadādīpanena tattha anuyojanatthaṃ pacchā sammāpaṭipadaṃ desesi,
tika-vin06t:1753_5: tato tassa majjhimapaṭipadāsaṅkhātassa ariyamaggassa visayadassanatthaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ saṅkhepavitthāravasena desetukāmo “idaṃ kho pana,
tika-vin06t:1753_11: Yathāvuttaṃ paṭipadaṃ sutvā kira koṇḍañño āha “kathaṃ bhagavatā vuttapaṭipadāya uppatti siyā.
tika-vin06t:1753_12: Ayañhi paṭipadā kilesānaṃ anuppattiyā sati sambhavati,
tika-vin06t:1753_14: Kilesānañca yadi lobhato uppatti khuppipāsānaṃ viya,
tika-vin06t:1753_19: tasmā kathaṃ panetissāya sammāpaṭipadāya uppatti sambhaveyyā”ti.
tika-vin06t:1755_0: Jīvite sati taṃ hoti, tañca jīvitasādhane.
tika-vin06t:1758_0: “Jīvitañca yathā loke, bhinne kāye na vijjati;
tika-vin06t:1780_0: Cintāmayissa paññāparipuṇṇā bhāvanāmayipaññāsampatti jānitabbā imehi iti bhagavā suttamidamāhāti kira.
tika-vin06t:1780_1: Kasmā bhagavā koṇḍaññassa purimameva saccadesanaṃ avaḍḍhetvā attano adhigatakkamamāhāti?
tika-vin06t:1780_4: Tattha “pubbe ananussutesu dhammesū”ti iminā idaṃ atthadvayaṃ dasseti,
tika-vin06t:1780_7: kintu pubbe ananussutesveva ñāṇaṃ me udapādīti majjhimāya paṭipadāya ānubhāvaṃ pakāseti.
tika-vin06t:1780_8: Apica yasmā evaṃ paṭipanno vināpi paropadesena ariyasaccāni passati,
tika-vin06t:1780_9: tasmā kathaṃ tumheva mamāpadesena na passathāti.
tika-vin06t:1781_8: Tattha paṭhamena parivaṭṭena saccānaṃ aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarato ṭhapanapaññaṃ dasseti,
tika-vin06t:1782_1: Yāvakīvañcāti dvīhi padehi yāvaicceva vuttaṃ hoti “iti cittamano”tiādi viya.
tika-vin06t:1782_4: Sā hi dhammānaṃ byākaraṇato pakāsanato “veyyākaraṇa”nti vuccati.
tika-vin06t:1782_12: na tattha satto vā jīvo vā kārako vā vedako vāti,
tika-vin06t:1782_16: Tañhi nirodhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā kiccavasena eva saṅkhataṃ paṭivijjhantaṃ uppajjati.
tika-vin06t:1783_6: devakāyavimānadassanato pītipāmojjacalitattā cāti evamādīnettha kāraṇāni vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1784_8: Tattha cara brahmacariyanti avasiṭṭhaṃ maggattayabrahmacariyaṃ samadhigaccha.
tika-vin06t:1784_11: “Ehibhikkhū”ti iminā bhagavato vacanena nipphannattā kāraṇūpacārena “ehibhikkhūpasampadā”ti vuttā.
tika-vin06t:1784_12: Sāva tassāyasmato yāvajīvaṃ upasampadā ahosīti attho.
tika-vin06t:1784_13: Tena tassā upasampadāya sikkhāpaccakkhātādinā vicchedā vā tadaññāya upasampadāya kiccaṃ vā natthīti idamatthadvayaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin06t:1784_15: aññatarāya upasampannassa antarā vicchedo vā tadaññūpasampadāya kiccaṃ vā natthi,
tika-vin06t:1784_20: Tadadhigatakiriyāvasena nibbattiyā asekkhā tadadhivāsanacetanāya paribhāvitapañcakkhandhikā ajjhattasantati.
tika-vin06t:1784_23: tassa pattiyā tāya paribhāvanāya vasena katthaci “samannāgato”ti vuccati.
tika-vin06t:1784_27: Etthāhu nikāyantarikā “yathāvuttāya upasampadāya pattisaṅkhāto cittavippayutto saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpanno dhammo atthi,
tika-vin06t:1784_28: tassa santativasena pubbāpariyaṃ uppajjamānassa yāva avicchedo,
tika-vin06t:1784_30: aññathā tato dhammantaruppattikkhaṇe tassa upasampannassa anupasampannabhāvappasaṅgo āpajjatī”ti.
tika-vin06t:1784_32: Te ce vadeyyuṃ “yo tesaṃ dasannaṃ asekkhānaṃ dhammānaṃ upādāya paṭilābhasamannāgamo ariyo hoti vippahīnoti evamādīni no suttānī”ti.
tika-vin06t:1784_38: cakkavattī sattahi ratanehi samannāgato hotī”ti vitthāro.
tika-vin06t:1784_40: Tassahitesu ratanesu vasibhāvo kāmacāro atthīti ce?
tika-vin06t:1785_2: assajittherassa catutthiyanti evaṃ nānādivasesu pāṭekkaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi,
tika-vin06t:1786_4: Te hi manāpānaṃ kāmānaṃ aniccatādassanena saṃviggā pabbajiṃsūti aniccalakkhaṇaṃ tāva nesaṃ ekadesena pākaṭaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1786_7: tasmā tadubhayaṃ vajjitvā anattalakkhaṇameva dīpetuṃ ārabhi.
tika-vin06t:1786_15: tasmā tena tāva suṭṭhu pākaṭena anattalakkhaṇaṃ dīpetvā puna tadeva tadubhayenāpi dīpetuṃ “taṃ kiṃ maññatha,
tika-vin06t:1786_17: rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti vakkhati.
tika-vin06t:1789_1: Yena samayena bhagavā pañcavaggiye pañcamiyaṃ arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā sattamiyaṃ nāḷakattherassa nāḷakapaṭipadaṃ
tika-vin06t:1789_2: ācikkhitvā bhaddapadapuṇṇamāyaṃ yasassa indriyānaṃ paripakkabhāvaṃ ñatvā taṃ udikkhanto bārāṇasiyaṃ vihāsi,
tika-vin06t:1789_4: Tassa kira uppattito paṭṭhāya tassa kulassa kittisaddasaṅkhāto,
tika-vin06t:1789_9: Evaṃ uttamabhogasamappitānampi uttamesu bhogesu appamattakenāpi asubhanimittena vitajjetvā kālākālaṃ
tika-vin06t:1789_10: agaṇetvā vivekābhiratiyā mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ tiṇaṃ viya pahāya gehato nikkhamanā ahosi,
tika-vin06t:1789_14: Niddā okkamīti manāpesupi visayesu pavattiṃ nivāretvā tassa cittaṃ atikkamitvā abhibhavitvā attano vasaṃ upanesīti attho.
tika-vin06t:1789_16: Tena parijanassa vikāradassane kāraṇaṃ dasseti. Ratti-
tika-vin06t:1789_22: Mudiṅgassa hi upari kaṇṭhaṃ ṭhapetvā sayantiyā kaṇṭhe mudiṅgaṃ addasāti attho.
tika-vin06t:1789_27: Susānaṃ maññeti susānaṃ viya addasa sakaṃ parijananti sambandho.
tika-vin06t:1789_29: Nibbidāya cittaṃ saṇṭhātīti vimuccitukāmatāsaṅkhātāya ukkaṇṭhāya cittaṃ namīti attho.
tika-vin06t:1789_30: Udānaṃ udānesīti “ito paṭṭhāya imāhi itthīhi saha nāhaṃ bhavissāmī”ti attamanavācaṃ nicchāresi.
tika-vin06t:1789_31: Dve kira ākārā tassa pamādasuttaparijanadassane pākaṭā jātā kilesānaṃ balavabhāvo,
tika-vin06t:1789_33: Evaṃ sati oḷārikatare ca asubhākāre kilesavasenāyaṃ sabbopi loko ettha pīḷito mucchito.
tika-vin06t:1789_34: Aho kilesā balavatarāti hi passato passato tassa dvepi te ākārā pākaṭā jātā,
tika-vin06t:1790_1: So hi balavasaṃvegābhitunnahadayattā parijanassa pabodhe satipi attano gamananivāraṇasamatthabhāvaṃ asahamāno attānaṃ takkento vissaṭṭho agamāsi.
tika-vin06t:1790_4: Na hi asamānajātikā tiracchānādayo “abrāhmaṇā”ti vā “avasalā”ti vā vuccanti,
tika-vin06t:1790_6: evaṃ manussehi kenaci ākārena sabhāgatāya devatā “amanussā”ti vuttā.
tika-vin06t:1790_7: Aññathā manussā na hontīti tiracchānagatāpi “amanussā”ti vattabbā bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-vin06t:1791_1: Vanagahanaṃ disvā “sumuttohaṃ nagarato”ti pamuditattā bhagavato avidūre udānesi.
tika-vin06t:1791_2: Idaṃ kho yasāti bhagavā nibbānaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-vin06t:1791_5: Dhammaṃ desessāmīti yena taṃ nibbānaṃ idha nisinnamattova tvaṃ adhigamissasīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:1791_10: Tassa nisinnamattasseva aññaṃ sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ akatvā anāmantetvā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi.
tika-vin06t:1791_14: Kimatthaṃ bhagavā tassa suṭṭhutaraṃ saṃviggahadayassa bhavato muccitukāmassa bhavābhavūpāyānisaṃsakathaṃ paṭhamameva kathesīti?
tika-vin06t:1791_17: na saggānanti kadāci saggalokaṃ sukhato maññeyya.
tika-vin06t:1791_18: Tattha sukhasaññena nibbānābhimukhaṃ cittaṃ peseyyāti saggānampi ādīnavaṃ dassetukāmatāya anupubbiṃ kathaṃ ārabhi.
tika-vin06t:1791_27: Nekkhamme tadabhāvato ca taṃnissaraṇato ca tabbiparītaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ kathento nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāseti nāma.
tika-vin06t:1791_29: Saṃkilesanti saṃkilissanaṃ bādhanaṃ upatāpanaṃ vāti attho.
tika-vin06t:1791_33: vihiṃsāsārambhādikilesapavesaṃ nivāretvā cittamudutādikusaladhammappavesanaṃ karontaṃ sahajātaṃ cittaṃ muduṃ karoti.
tika-vin06t:1791_39: Sāmukkaṃsikāti etaṃ visayavasena desanaṃ upālitthero pakāseti.
tika-vin06t:1791_41: Aññathā dukkhādīni sāmukkaṃsikā dhammadesanāti āpajjati tassa vibhāvane saccānaṃ niddiṭṭhattā.
tika-vin06t:1792_8: Diṭṭhasaccopi “dehi te mātuyā jīvita”nti vadanto kimaññaṃ na kareyya.
tika-vin06t:1792_9: Yasopi taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā arahāpi samāno sayaṃ appaṭikkhipitvā bhagavantaṃ ullokento kimaññāya saṇṭhaheyya.
tika-vin06t:1793_1: Ubhohipi pattabbavisesakoṭiyā pattattā bhagavā puna taṃ paṭippassambhesi.
tika-vin06t:1793_3: Sotāpanno hi agāramajjhe vasanārahattā agāriyabhūto nāma hoti apabbajito.
tika-vin06t:1793_4: Sampati pabbajito samāno agāramajjhavasanassa abhabbattā “agāriko”ti na vuccati,
tika-vin06t:1793_8: “Seyyathāpi pubbe agārikabhūto”ti vacanena laddhanayattā pacchā gahapati gihivesadhārimeva yasaṃ sandhāyāha “yasena kulaputtena pacchāsamaṇenā”ti.
tika-vin06t:1793_9: Tattha cara brahmacariyanti ābhisamācārikasīlaṃ brahmacariyaṃ cara paripūrehi tāva,
tika-vin06t:1794_1: pajāpatiyā ca bhattakiccaṃ akatvāva dhammaṃ desesīti?
tika-vin06t:1794_2: Yasassa pabbajjāya sokasallasamappitattā dānañca somanassikacittena na dadeyyuṃ,
tika-vin06t:1794_3: satthari ca domanassappattā hutvā maggapaṭivedhampi na labheyyunti bhagavā paṭhamaṃ tāva tā vigatasokasallahadayāyo katvā puna bhattakiccaṃ akāsi.
tika-vin06t:1795_5: Dhammavinayoti sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ pāvacananti idha atthato ekaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1795_17: dhammo ca vinayo cāti dhammavinayo phalāphalaṃ viya napuṃsakamiti pulliṅgāpadesato assa liṅgabhāvo siddho,
tika-vin06t:1795_20: dhammena yutto vā vinayo dhammavinayo assaratho viyāti evamādinā nayena yojanā veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:1796_2: Tena “sabhikkhuke vihāre aññampi etassa kese chindā”ti vattuṃ na vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin06t:1796_3: Pabbājetvāti imassa adhippāyapakāsanatthaṃ “kāsāyāni acchādetvā ehī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1796_4: Upajjhāyo ce kesamassuoropanādīni akatvā pabbajatthaṃ saraṇāni deti,
tika-vin06t:1799_0: Bhikkhunā hi sahatthena vā āṇattiyā vā dinnameva kāsāvaṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:1799_1: adinnaṃ na vaṭṭatīti pana santesveva kāsāvesu,
tika-vin06t:1799_8: imehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi pabbajjaṃ upasampadanti ettha iminā anukkamena dinnehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi
tika-vin06t:1802_1: Ācariyena adinnaṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha “pabbajjā na ruhatīti vadantī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1802_5: “Anunāsikantaṃ katvā ekasambandhaṃ katvā dānakāle antarā aṭṭhatvā vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1802_8: Anunāsikante diyyamāne khalitvā “buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti makārena missībhūte khette otiṇṇattā vaṭṭatīti upatissatthero.
tika-vin06t:1802_10: vacanakāle pana anunāsikaṭṭhāne vicchedaṃ akatvā vattabbanti dhammasiritthero.
tika-vin06t:1802_12: Ubhatosuddhiyāva vaṭṭatīti ettha mahāthero patitadantādikāraṇatāya acaturassaṃ katvā vadati,
tika-vin06t:1802_13: byattasāmaṇero samīpe ṭhito pabbajjāpekkhaṃ byattaṃ vadāpeti.
tika-vin06t:1802_20: Atha therena caturassaṃ vuttaṃ pabbajjāpekkhaṃ vattuṃ asakkontaṃ sāmaṇero sayaṃ vatvā vadāpeti,
tika-vin06t:1802_21: ubhatosuddhi eva hoti therena vuttasseva vuttattā.
tika-vin06t:1802_25: asekkhadhammañca saraṇaṃ gacchatīti aggahitaggahaṇavasena yojanā kātabbā.
tika-vin06t:1802_29: Tattha cārittassa akaraṇe vārittassa karaṇe daṇḍakammāraho hotīti dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:1805_1: “Tena hetunā”ti vacanato pāḷiyaṃ “yonisomanasikārāsammappadhānā”ti hetvatthe nissakkavacananti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1808_1: Vaseyyāmāti “tvañca ahañca vaseyyāmā”ti piyavacanena tassa saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ vuttaṃ kira.
tika-vin06t:1808_9: Kasmā pana bhagavā agyāgārampi anādittaṃ nādhiṭṭhāsīti?
tika-vin06t:1808_15: Agyāgārassa parittattā itaro attho na sambhavati.
tika-vin06t:1808_19: Paduminisaṇḍe ṭhito hi bhagavā tattha ahosīti tesaṃ mati.
tika-vin06t:1809_16: Ye ca anekavaṇṇā acciyo hontīti taṃ dassetuṃ “nīlā atha lohitikā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin06t:1811_1: Paṃsukūlaṃ uppannanti pariyesamānassa paṭilābhavasena uppannaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:1812_7: Kesamissantiādimhi abbokiṇṇaṃ visuṃ visuṃ bandhitvā pakkhittattā kesādayova kesamissāti porāṇā.
tika-vin06t:1812_9: Jaṭile pāhesīti dve tayo tāpase pāhesi.
tika-vin06t:1813_1: Aggihutte kataparicayattā bhagavā tesaṃ ādittapariyāya- mabhāsi.
tika-vin06t:1813_2: Tattha ekaccaṃ ārammaṇavasena ādittaṃ cakkhādi rāgagginā,
tika-vin06t:1813_8: tadanusārena pana itaraṃ lakkhaṇadvayampi tehi diṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ dukkhākārassa itarākāradīpanato.
tika-vin06t:1813_9: Santasukhataṇhābhiniviṭṭhattā panesaṃ dukkhalakkhaṇapubbaṅgamā desanā katāti veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:1816_3: Yasmā anuppanne eva bhagavati buddhakolāhalaṃ loke paṭhamameva vassasahassaṃ uppajjati.
tika-vin06t:1816_4: Brahmāno ca brāhmaṇavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā vedesu sahassattayamattaṃ buddhapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ pariyattiṃ pakkhipitvā vācenti,
tika-vin06t:1816_5: bhagavato jātito paṭṭhāya ca buddhakathā lakkhaṇaññūhi brāhmaṇehi uppāditā,
tika-vin06t:1816_10: pāsādasmiṃ patiṭṭhito”tiādigāthāhi bodhisattakāle eva abhisittatā bimbisārassa siddhā.
tika-vin06t:1817_1: Idhāvuso khīṇāsavo bhikkhu pañcaṅgavippahīno hoti chaḷaṅgasamannāgato ekārakkho caturāpasseno paṇunnapaccekasacco
tika-vin06t:1817_2: samavayasaṭṭhesano anāvilasaṅkappo passaddhakāyasaṅkhāro suvimuttacitto suvimuttapaññoti dasa ariyavāsā nāma.
tika-vin06t:1817_19: catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati evaṃ suvimuttacitto hoti.
tika-vin06t:1825_3: kiṃ karosī”ti vā byañjanaṃ bahuṃ vatvāti attho.
tika-vin06t:1825_13: Kappanahutehīti evamanusārato abbhatītaṃ nāmāti khandhakabhāṇakānaṃ pāṭhoti.
tika-vin06t:1826_4: nādhammenā”ti na puna codesunti evaṃ pāṭhasesena sambandho kātabbo.
tika-vin06t:1827_0: Ettāvatā thero nidānaṃ niṭṭhapesīti veditabbaṃ. Honti cettha –
tika-vin06t:1838_1: Buddhupajjhāyakānaṃ itaresaṃ ehibhikkhūnaṃ nivāsanapārupanakappato nesaṃ visuṃ visuṃ sadisattā “dunnivatthā duppārutā anākappasampannā”ti vuttā.
tika-vin06t:1839_4: Upajjhāyena ca sādhūti sampaṭicchanaṃ sandhāyā”ti kehici likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1839_5: Taṃ te evaṃ jānanti “upajjhāyena ‘sāhū’tiādinā sampaṭicchite saddhivihārikassa ‘sādhu suṭṭhu sampaṭicchāmī’ti vacanaṃ kevalaṃ bhikkhūhi āciṇṇameva,
tika-vin06t:1839_7: tasmā vināpi tena upajjhāyo gahitova hotī”ti.
tika-vin06t:1839_10: tvaṃ mama na bhāriyosīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:1839_12: iminā upāyena tvaṃ me ito paṭṭhāya bhāro jātosīti attho.
tika-vin06t:1840_2: Ito paṭṭhāyāti “na upajjhāyassa bhaṇamānassā”ti ettha vuttana-
tika-vin06t:1840_22: Parato hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sace pana kāḷavaṇṇakatā vā sudhābaddhā vā hoti nirajamattikā,
tika-vin06t:1840_23: tathārūpāya bhūmiyā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatī”tiādinā nayena nayo dassito.
tika-vin06t:1841_1: yasmā pāḷiyaṃyeva “sace upajjhāyassa anabhirati uppannā hoti,
tika-vin06t:1841_2: diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hotī”ti bhagavato vacanavasena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayo yuttoti dassetuṃ “nātidūre nāccāsanne”ti ettha ko bhagavato vacanalesoti? Vuccate –
tika-vin06t:1841_7: Na hi vārittassa anumati anāpattikarā hoti,
tika-vin06t:1844_1: Adhimattaṃ gehassitapemaṃ na hotīti ettha gehassitapemaṃ na akusalamicceva daṭṭhabbaṃ khīṇāsavānampi sādhāraṇattā imassa lakkhaṇassa.
tika-vin06t:1844_4: tasmā “mamesa bhāro”ti mamattakaraṇaṃ tattha pemanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1844_6: tesaṃ anāpattī’ti ettha viya sace eko vattasampanno bhikkhu ‘bhante,
tika-vin06t:1847_1: “Pūtimuttanti muttaṃ pūtikāyo viyā”ti vatvāpi “pūtibhāvena muttaṃ paṭinissaṭṭhaṃ bhesajjaṃ pūtimuttabhesajja”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1853_1: Disaṃ gatoti tattha dhuranikkhittavāso hutvā tirogāmaṃ gato.
tika-vin06t:1853_3: tattha gantabbanti etthāpi upajjhāye vuttanayeneva “katipāhena gamissāmī”ti gamane cesa ussāho rakkhati.
tika-vin06t:1853_4: Mā idha paṭikkamīti mā idha gaccha.
tika-vin06t:1853_9: Vasituṃ vaṭṭatīti upajjhāyena pariccattattā upajjhāyasamodhānaṃ niratthakanti attho.
tika-vin06t:1853_13: saddhivihārikena anekakkhattuṃ vāretvā aviramantaṃ upajjhāyaṃ pahāya vināpi nissayapaṇāmanena aññassa santike nissayaṃ gahetvā vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1853_21: Sammāvattantaṃ pana passitvā kammapaṭippassaddhiṃ āgametuṃ labhati.
tika-vin06t:1853_28: Yaṃ pana pārivāsikakkhandhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “saddhivihārikānampi sādiyantassa dukkaṭamevā”tiādi,
tika-vin06t:1853_30: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “sace saddhāpabbajitā kulaputtā ‘tumhe, bhante,
tika-vin06t:1853_35: saddhivihārikānaṃ sāpekkhataṃ vā sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1853_36: Tasmā te ce upajjhāyena vāritānurūpameva paṭipajjanti,
tika-vin06t:1854_0: Dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā nivattatīti “ettāvatā disāpakkanto nāma hoti,
tika-vin06t:1854_2: Ācariyupajjhāyā dve leḍḍupāte anatikkamma leḍḍupātadvayabbhantare tirovihārepi parikkhitte,
tika-vin06t:1854_5: ettha pana aparikkhittassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato vimutte aññasmiṃ vihāre vasantīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:1854_6: Vihāroti cettha “tādisassa vihārassa ante ṭhitā ekā kuṭikā adhippetāti upatissatthero”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1854_8: nissayo na paṭippassambhatī”ti iminā sāmaññato vuttena aṭṭhakathāvacanena dhammasirittheravādo sameti.
tika-vin06t:1854_9: Aparikkhitte vāti dvinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ anto parikkhitto vā hoti aparikkhitto vā.
tika-vin06t:1854_10: “Bahisīma”nti ca vuttattā antovihārasīmāyaṃ dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvāpi vasituṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhattā pana upatissattheravādo na sameti.
tika-vin06t:1854_11: Ekāvāse hi parikkhitte vā aparikkhitte vā antamaso antotiyojanepi vasato nissayo na paṭippassambhati.
tika-vin06t:1854_13: sā ca upacārasīmā parikkhittassa vihārassa parikkhepena aparikkhittassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānena paricchinno ekāvāso.
tika-vin06t:1855_0: Uposathakkhandhake ekāvāsavimatiyaṃ sīmāya anuññātattāti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:1855_5: Tato naṃ āhaṃsu “avippavāsasīmā nāma tiyojanāpi hoti,
tika-vin06t:1855_6: evaṃ sante tiyojane ṭhitā lābhaṃ gaṇhissanti,
tika-vin06t:1855_7: tiyojane ṭhatvā āgantukavattaṃ pūretvā ārāmaṃ pavisitabbaṃ bhavissati,
tika-vin06t:1855_10: pārivāsikena tiyojanaṃ atikkamitvā aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetabbaṃ bhavissati,
tika-vin06t:1855_11: bhikkhuniyā tiyojane ṭhatvā ārāmappavesanā āpucchitabbā bhavissati,
tika-vin06t:1855_13: Tasmā antoupacārasīmāya leḍḍupātadvayaṃ atikkamitvāpi vasato nissayo tiyojanātikkame nissayo na paṭippassambhatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1855_18: tasmā tādisassa vihārassa ante ṭhitā ekā kuṭi vihāroti idhādhippetā.
tika-vin06t:1855_19: Sāpi tasseva vihārassa kuṭikāva hotīti katvā so āvāso hoti.
tika-vin06t:1855_22: Dvinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ abbhantare pana aparikkhitte nānāvāse nissayo na paṭippassambhatīti yvāyaṃ “no takko”ti vutto,
tika-vin06t:1855_23: so tādise nānāvāse senāsanaggāhassa appaṭippassaddhinayena vutto.
tika-vin06t:1855_24: Senāsanaggāho hi “gahaṇena gahaṇaṃ ālayo paṭippassambhatī”ti lakkhaṇattā itarattha paṭippassambhati.
tika-vin06t:1855_25: Tatrāyaṃ pāḷi “tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto eko dvīsu āvāsesu vassaṃ vasi…pe… detha,
tika-vin06t:1855_28: Aṭṭhakathāyañcassa evaṃ vuttaṃ “idañca nānālābhehi nānūpacārehi ekasīmavihārehi kathitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1855_32: Ettāvatā leḍḍupātadvayabbhantare aparikkhitte aññasmiṃ vihāre vasato nissayo pana na paṭippassambhati,
tika-vin06t:1855_33: parikkhitte paṭippassambhati evāti ayamattho sādhitoti. Etthāha –
tika-vin06t:1855_34: dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvāva satopi nissayo na paṭippassambhati.
tika-vin06t:1855_35: Vuttañhi nissaggiyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sace gacchantānaṃyeva asampattesu daharesu aruṇaṃ uggacchati,
tika-vin06t:1855_41: Keci pana “dve leḍḍupātaṃ atikkammāti idaṃ devasikaṃ ārocetvā vasanavasena vutta”nti vadanti,
tika-vin06t:1855_43: Devasikaṃ ārocetvā vatthabbanti hi neva pāḷiyaṃ na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dissati,
tika-vin06t:1861_1: Yo so aññatitthiyapubboti ettha dve atthavikappā –
tika-vin06t:1861_3: so bhikkhu taṃyeva titthāyatanaṃ saṅkamīti ayameko attho.
tika-vin06t:1861_4: Evaṃ titthiyapakkantako puna gihivesena āgato aññatitthiyapubbo,
tika-vin06t:1861_5: so āgato na upasampādetabboti ayameko attho.
tika-vin06t:1861_8: aññatitthiyapubbo”ti ettha na gihivesadhāraṇova pubbasaddena vutto,
tika-vin06t:1861_13: Kiṃ imassa aññatitthiyapubbassa bhikkhuvesaṃ gahetvā saraṇagamanena sāmaṇerapabbajjā jātā,
tika-vin06t:1861_17: aññopi aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhati pabbajjaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1861_19: tassa cattāro māse parivāso dātabbo”ti vacanaṃ virujjhati.
tika-vin06t:1861_22: Tattha mahāvihāravāsino “sāmaṇerasseva sato parivāso dātabbo”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1861_24: Te hi “evaṃ ārādhako kho bhikkhave aññatitthiyapubbo āgato upasampādetabbo’ti suttapadaṃ pariharitabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1861_25: pure ca pacchā ca ‘aññatitthiyapubbo’ti vacanasāmaññato na sāmaṇero jātoti ce,
tika-vin06t:1861_30: cattāro māse paripuṇṇepi puna paripūretabbaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin06t:1861_31: Vuttampi tassa saṃvaraṃ bhikkhukaraṇatthāya anuññātattā sīle vattabbaṃ natthī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin06t:1867_2: tasmā bhikkhūhi apabbājetabbakampi coraṃ aṅgulimālaṃ pabbājetvā āyatiṃ evamāhāti attho.
tika-vin06t:1871_6: “Bhikkhusaṅghassa ārāmike demā”ti dinnattā na te tesaṃ dāsā.
tika-vin06t:1871_7: “Ārāmiko ca neva dāso na bhujissoti vattabbato na dāso”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1871_10: Nissāmikaṃ dāsaṃ attanāpi bhujissaṃ kātuṃ labhati.
tika-vin06t:1871_11: “Dāsassa pabbajitvā attano sāmike disvā palāyantassa āpatti natthīti vadantī”ti ca likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1871_12: Attano vā dāso assa bhikkhunoti attho.
tika-vin06t:1871_14: tasmā rājānaṃ vā tasmiṃ gāme manusse vā āpucchitvā pabbājetabboti eke.
tika-vin06t:1871_18: Evaṃ saṅkappena vatvā “payojanaṃ natthī”ti kehici likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1871_22: “Asuddhā kira metipi taṃ sandhāyeva vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1874_1: Kammārabhaṇḍūti ettha dārako cūḷāmattaṃ ṭhapetvā āgacchati,
tika-vin06t:1874_3: Tañce so vā añño vā avaharati,
tika-vin06t:1875_3: anubyañjanasoti sabbopāyaṃ pabhedo mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ ñāto hotī”ti ca “āpattiṃ jānātīti pāṭhe avattamānepi idaṃ nāma katvā idaṃ āpajjatīti jānāti ce,
tika-vin06t:1875_5: “Tañca kho tato pubbe pāṭhe paguṇe kateti gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1922_1: Paṭṭabandhoti ettha paṭṭoti tasmiṃ kule āciṇṇo alaṅkāraviseso.
tika-vin06t:1922_6: Thero rādhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ pubbe pabbajitvā kasmā idāni “kathāhaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin06t:1922_10: idāni anāgate saṃsayāpanayanādhippāyo bhagavā”ti ñatvā āha.
tika-vin06t:1922_14: aññathā nandādayopi pabbajitvā buddhā siyuṃ “sace pabbajati,
tika-vin06t:1923_1: āpucchissāmāti pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭatīti ca idaṃ yasmā videsappatto nāma lokasaṅketenāpi mātāpituvāsato mutto serivihārīti vuccati,
tika-vin06t:1923_2: tasmāssa te asantapakkhe ṭhitā viya hontīti katvā “na tassa pabbajjācariye vā appasādaṃ karontī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ naṭṭhameva.
tika-vin06t:1923_4: Teneva cettha dukkhappattādinā desantaragamanañca samagatikaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin06t:1923_5: Videsaṃ gantvāti cettha videso nāma mātāpituvāsato añño deso,
tika-vin06t:1923_7: Byañjanattho eva ce pamāṇaṃ, na yutti.
tika-vin06t:1923_9: tasmā anuppattabbaṭṭhāne ṭhitehiyeva mātāpitūhi ananuññāto putto na pabbājetabboti evamidhādhippāyo veditabbo,
tika-vin06t:1923_11: āpattiṭṭhānassa ca sithilakaraṇaṃ aṭṭhakathāya na yujjati.
tika-vin06t:1923_13: “vihāraṃ vā jhāpemī”tiādinayo kathaṃ na virujjhatīti ce?
tika-vin06t:1923_16: Evañhi sati sayameva so attanā pabbajito hoti,
tika-vin06t:1923_18: “Puttapemaṃ vā puttarakkhe piyo hotī”ti nidānānulomato na virujjhati.
tika-vin06t:1926_8: taṃ āvaraṇaṃ mukhadvārikaṃ āhāraṃ karontīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:1929_4: Porāṇā pana “yāvatatiyaṃ vuccamāno ce na oramati,
tika-vin06t:1929_6: puna pabbajjaṃ yācamānopi apaloketvā pabbājetabbo”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1929_7: Bhikkhūnaṃ upasampadakammavācāsadisanti ettha “yathā upasampanno sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya yathānivatthapārutova
tika-vin06t:1929_8: hutvā pacchā upasampanno pubbe attano navakatarassa samānavassikassa puna vandanādīni karoti,
tika-vin06t:1929_9: evaṃ sāmaṇeropi puna gahitasaraṇo tato pubbe attano navakatarassa samānavassikassa sāmaṇerassa puna vandanādīni karoti.
tika-vin06t:1929_10: Liṅgaṃ panettha vuḍḍhatarabhāvaṃ na sādhetīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1929_16: “yāvatatiyanti vuttattā buddhādīnaṃ avaṇṇabhāsitamattena ca diṭṭhiggahitamattena ca saraṇāni na bhijjantīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1929_17: Evaṃ sante pāṇātipātādiṃ karontassāpi taṃ sambhotīti mama takko.
tika-vin06t:1929_18: “Nissīlassa puna nāsanā vuttā”ti ca keci vadanti,
tika-vin06t:1929_20: Na hi bhagavā sīlavantassa liṅganāsanaṃ anujānātīti vicāretabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1929_22: “Pabbajjampi na labhatīti yathā cettha ayamattho dassito,
tika-vin06t:1929_26: upasampanno nāsetabbo’ti ādinā nayena vuttānampi pabbajjaṃ natthīti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:1929_27: Na hi idaṃ ṭhānaṃ ṭhapetvā tesaṃ pabbajjāya vāritaṭṭhānaṃ atthi.
tika-vin06t:1929_31: upasampanno nāsetabbo’ti vuttenapi samānattā tassa pabbajjā viya tesampi pabbajjā vāritāva hotītipi dassetuṃ
tika-vin06t:1929_34: Nanu aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “yassa cettha pabbajjā vāritā,
tika-vin06t:1929_35: taṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo,
tika-vin06t:1932_4: na nāsanā kātabbāti no takkoti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:1932_14: pabbajjā na vāritāti vinicchayaṃ vadantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1933_0: “Pabbajjā vāritāti apaṇḍakapakkhe pabbājetvā paṇḍakapakkhe nāsetabboti adhippāyo”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1933_1: Porāṇagaṇṭhipade pana māsapaṇḍakalekhapaṇḍakehi saha satta paṇḍakā vuttā.
tika-vin06t:1933_2: Tattha lekhapaṇḍako nāma kira mantavasena upahatabījo.
tika-vin06t:1936_1: Theyyasaṃvāsakoti ettha kiñcāpi byañjanatthavasena saṃvāsatthenakova theyyasaṃvāsakoti paññāyati,
tika-vin06t:1936_4: kintu bhikkhuvassagaṇanādiko kiriyabhedo idha saṃvāso nāma.
tika-vin06t:1936_7: Videsaṃ gantvā pabbajitehi pucchite “dasavasso”tiādiṃ bhaṇantassa doso.
tika-vin06t:1936_9: Rājabhayādīhi gahitaliṅgānaṃ “gihī maṃ samaṇoti jānātū”ti vañcanacitte satipi bhikkhūnaṃ vañcetukāmatāya,
tika-vin06t:1936_10: tehi saṃvasitukāmatāya ca abhāvā doso na jāto.
tika-vin06t:1936_11: “Sabbapāsaṇḍiyabhattānīti vihāraṃ āgantvā saṅghikaṃ gaṇhantassa saṃvāsaṃ pariharituṃ dukkaraṃ,
tika-vin06t:1936_20: raṭṭhapiṇḍo bhutto”ti iminā kira pariyāyenāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1937_0: Sayaṃ sāmaṇerova kūṭavassāni gaṇetvā gaṇhanto pārājiko hoti,
tika-vin06t:1937_3: so pana bhaṇḍagghena kāretabboti iminā adhippāyena “sayaṃ sāmaṇerovā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1937_4: Ayaṃ pana theyyasaṃvāsako nāma yasmā pabbajitova hoti,
tika-vin06t:1937_9: pabbajito nāsetabbo”ti vattuṃ na sakkāti katvā imassa vasena paṇḍakato paṭṭhāya “anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo”tiādinā pāḷi ṭhapitā,
tika-vin06t:1937_10: na upasampadāmattasseva abhabbattā ekādasannampi nesaṃ pabbajjārahabhāvappasaṅgato.
tika-vin06t:1937_11: Apica aniṭṭhadosappasaṅgato tathā eva pāḷi ṭhapitā.
tika-vin06t:1937_19: apabbajito na pabbājetabbo”tiādipāḷiyā sati te ubhopi apabbājetabbā hontīti aniṭṭhappasaṅgo āpajjatīti.
tika-vin06t:1937_20: Tīsu pana theyyasaṃvāsakesu sāmaṇerālayaṃ karonto liṅgatthenako,
tika-vin06t:1937_23: Na hi sāmaṇerasaṃvāso idha saṃvāso nāma,
tika-vin06t:1937_24: teneva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “bhikkhuvassagaṇanādiko hi sabbopi kiriyabhedo imasmiṃ atthe saṃvāso”ti vuttanti eke.
tika-vin06t:1940_1: bhikkhavetiādi attano nidānabhūte pasūravatthusmiṃ eva vattabbaṃ samānampi tattha vāritaadhikārābhāvā abhabbā.
tika-vin06t:1940_3: Tattha “atha kho na pabbājetabbopī”ti idheva vacanaṃ pasūrassa upasampadāya eva yācanicchāya dassanena,
tika-vin06t:1940_4: “so āgato na upasampādetabbo”ti bhagavato upasampadāmattapaṭisedhanena ca pabbajjānumatidosappasaṅgabhayāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1940_5: Tesaṃ liṅge ādinnamatte laddhiyā gahitāyapi aggahitāyapi titthiyapakkantako hoti,
tika-vin06t:1940_9: ājīvako bhavissanti visamacittavasena gatattā naggo hutvā na gamanenā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1940_15: Pasūrassa upasampannattā upasampannānaṃ eva titthiyapakkantatāvacanatoti eke.
tika-vin06t:1940_21: Aññatitthiyapubbassa upasampannassa sato pakkhasaṅkantabhayā anupasampannakāle upasampadatthaṃ parivāsapaññāpanenāti eke.
tika-vin06t:1940_30: aññatitthiyapubbo tibbacchando hoti uddese paripucchāya adhisīle”ti.
tika-vin06t:1949_0: 116. “Yadi paṭisandhiyaṃ uppannaliṅgena etaṃ nāmaṃ labhantīti adhippāyo”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1952_6: akammaṃ na ca karaṇīya”ntiādinā nayena vuttattā paṇḍakādīnaṃ gaṇapūraṇabhāve eva kammaṃ kuppati,
tika-vin06t:1952_9: akammaṃ na ca karaṇīya”ntiādikāya pāḷiyā bhavitabbaṃ siyā.
tika-vin06t:1952_10: Yathā aparipuṇṇapattacīvarassa upasampādanakāle kammavācāyaṃ “paripuṇṇassa pattacīvara”nti asantaṃ vatthuṃ
tika-vin06t:1952_11: kittetvā upasampadāya katāya tasmiṃ asantepi upasampadā ruhati,
tika-vin06t:1952_12: evaṃ “ayaṃ buddharakkhito āyasmato dhammarakkhitassa upasampadāpekkho”ti avatthuṃ paṇḍakupajjhāyādiṃ,
tika-vin06t:1952_14: vatthuṃ kittetvā katāyapi gaṇapūrakānamatthitāya upasampadā ruhateva. “Na,
tika-vin06t:1952_19: so ca puggalo anupasampanno”tiādivacanassābhāvā ayamattho siddhova hoti.
tika-vin06t:1952_20: Na hi buddhā vattabbayuttaṃ na vadanti,
tika-vin06t:1952_24: Tathā “byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo’ti vacanato theyyasaṃvāsakādiācariyehi anussāvanāya
tika-vin06t:1952_25: katāya upasampadā na ruhati tesaṃ abhikkhuttā”ti vacanampi na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1952_26: Kiñca bhiyyo “imāni cattāri kammāni pañcahākārehi vipajjantī”tiādinā nayena kammānaṃ sampattivipattiyā
tika-vin06t:1952_27: kathiyamānāya “sattahi ākārehi kammāni vipajjanti vatthuto vā ñattito vā anussāvanato vā sīmato vā parisato
tika-vin06t:1952_28: vā upajjhāyato vā ācariyato vā”ti akathitattā na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1952_29: “Parisato vā”ti vacanena ācariyaupajjhāyānaṃ vā saṅgaho katoti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:1952_30: “dvādasahākārehi parisato kammāni vipajjantī”ti etassa vibhaṅge tesamanāmaṭṭhattā.
tika-vin06t:1952_31: Ayamattho “yasmā tattha tattha sarūpena vuttapāḷivaseneva sakkā jānituṃ,
tika-vin06t:1952_32: tasmā nayamukhaṃ dassetvā saṃkhittoti ayamassa yuttigavesanā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1952_34: anupajjhāyakaṃ upasampādentā te bhikkhū yathāvuttanayena abhūtaṃ taṃ vatthuṃ kittayiṃsu,
tika-vin06t:1952_35: udāhu musāvādabhayā tāneva padāni na sāvesunti.
tika-vin06t:1952_36: Kiñcettha yadi tāva upajjhāyābhāvata na sāvesuṃ,
tika-vin06t:1952_41: “kammaṃ pana na kuppatī”ti aṭṭhakathāya vuttattā ca,
tika-vin06t:1952_44: Na hi sakkā musāvādena kammavipattisampattiṃ kātunti.
tika-vin06t:1952_45: Tasmā “anupajjhāyakaṃ upasampādentī”ti vacanassa ubhayadosavinimutto attho pariyesitabbo.
tika-vin06t:1953_1: “yathā pubbe pabbajjupasampadupajjhāyesu vijjamānesupi upajjhāyaggahaṇakkamena aggahitattā ‘tena kho
tika-vin06t:1953_3: tathā idhāpi upajjhāyassa vijjamānasseva sato aggahitattā ‘anupajjhāyakaṃ upasampādentī’ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1953_4: Kammavācācariyena pana gahito tena upajjhāyoti saññāya upajjhāyaṃ kittetvā kammavācaṃ sāvetabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1953_5: kenaci vā kāraṇena kāyasāmaggiṃ adentassa upajjhāyassa chandaṃ gahetvā kammavācaṃ sāveti,
tika-vin06t:1953_6: upajjhāyo vā upasampadāpekkhassa upajjhaṃ datvā pacchā upasampanne tasmiṃ tādise vatthusmiṃ samanuyuñjiyamāno
tika-vin06t:1953_7: vā asamanuyuñjiyamāno vā upajjhāyadānato pubbe eva sāmaṇero paṭijānāti,
tika-vin06t:1953_9: chandahārakādayo viya upajjhāyo vā aññasīmāgato hoti,
tika-vin06t:1953_12: paccantimesu janapadesu vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena upasampada’nti vuttattā keci ‘vinayadharapañcamena
tika-vin06t:1953_13: upajjhāyena sannihiteneva bhavitabba’nti vadantī”ti porāṇagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1953_14: So ce pāṭho pamāṇo majjhimesu janapadesu tassa vacanassābhāvato.
tika-vin06t:1953_15: Asannihitepi upajjhāye kammavācā ruhatīti āpajjatīti ce? Na, kasmā?
tika-vin06t:1953_17: Na hi tattha asannihito upajjhāyasaṅkhāto puggalo parāmasanaṃ arahati,
tika-vin06t:1953_18: tasmā tattha saṅghaparāmasanaṃ viya puggalaparāmasanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1953_19: Saṅghena gaṇena upajjhāyena upasampādenti tesaṃ atthato puggalattā.
tika-vin06t:1955_2: kevalaṃ atthasampattiṃ anapekkhitvā santapadanihārena vā “paripuṇṇassa pattacīvara”nti kammavācaṃ sāveti.
tika-vin06t:1955_3: Yathā etarahi matavippavutthamātāpitikopi “anuññātosi mātāpitūhī”ti puṭṭho “āma bhante”ti vadati.
tika-vin06t:1955_6: “tasmiṃ samaye cattāri kammāni pañcahākārehi vipajjantī”ti lakkhaṇassa na tāva paññattattā anupajjhāyakādiṃ upasampādenti,
tika-vin06t:1955_11: ñatticatutthena kammena upasampādetu”nti evaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ anuññātakammavācāya “paripuṇṇassa pattacīvara”nti avacanamettha sādhakanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1957_3: badhiraṃ pabbājentī”ti idaṃ kathaṃ sambhavitumarahati ādito paṭṭhāya “anujānāmi,
tika-vin06t:1957_5: imehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi pabbajja”ntiādinā anuññātattāti? Vuccate –
tika-vin06t:1957_10: tatiyampi saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti ettha “evaṃ vadehīti vattabbo”ti imassa vacanassa micchā atthaṃ gahetvā mūgaṃ pabbājesuṃ.
tika-vin06t:1957_11: “Evaṃ vadehī”ti taṃ pabbajjāpekkhaṃ āṇāpetvā sayaṃ upajjhāyena vattabbo “tatiyaṃ saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti,
tika-vin06t:1957_12: so pabbajjāpekkho tathā āṇatto upajjhāyavacanassa anu anu vadatu vā, mā vā,
tika-vin06t:1957_20: Tadanumānena vā kāyena tena pabbajjāpekkhena viññattaṃ hoti saraṇagamananti vā lokepi kāyena viññāpento “evaṃ vadatī”ti vuccati,
tika-vin06t:1957_21: taṃ pariyāyaṃ gahetvā mūgaṃ pabbājentīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1957_22: Porāṇagaṇṭhipade “mūgaṃ kathaṃ pabbājentī’ti pucchaṃ katvā tassa kāyappasādasambhavato kāyena pahāraṃ
tika-vin06t:1957_26: yathā pubbe pabbajjādhikāre vattamāne pabbajjābhilāpaṃ upacchinditvā “paṇḍako,
tika-vin06t:1957_28: anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo”tiādinā nayena upasampadavaseneva abhilāpo kato.
tika-vin06t:1957_29: Theyyasaṃvāsakapade asambhavato kiñcāpi so na kato pabbajjāva tattha katā,
tika-vin06t:1957_31: Upasampadāya pabbajjāya vāritāya upasampadā vāritā hotīti katvā.
tika-vin06t:1957_32: Tathā idha upasampadādhikāre vattamāne upasampadābhilāpaṃ upacchinditvā upasampadameva sandhāya pabbajjābhilāpo katoti veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:1957_34: mūgapade asambhavato tassa vasena ādito paṭṭhāya upasampadābhilāpova kattabbo viya dissati,
tika-vin06t:1957_35: tathāpi tasseva mūgapadassa vasena ādito paṭṭhāya pabbajjābhilāpova kato micchāgahaṇanivāraṇatthaṃ. Kathaṃ? “Mūgo,
tika-vin06t:1957_39: sosārito”ti vacanato mūgo upasampanno hotīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1957_41: na pana pabbajito tassa pabbajjāya asambhavato”ti micchāgāho hoti.
tika-vin06t:1958_4: “pabbajitā supabbajitā”ti vuttaṭṭhānābhāvena ca tesaṃ pabbajjābhāvappasaṅkā bhaveyya.
tika-vin06t:1958_12: Teneva pana nayena pabbajitā te sabbepi supabbajitā evāti dīpeti,
tika-vin06t:1958_23: so ca apabbajito”ti vā tantiyā ṭhapitāya campeyyakkhandhake “sosārito”ti vuttattā kevalaṃ “ime hatthacchinnādayo upasampannāva honti,
tika-vin06t:1959_1: “so ca apabbajito”ti vacanābhāvato mūgassa pabbajjasiddhippasaṅgato pabbajjāpi ekatosuddhiyā hotīti ayamaniṭṭhakoṭṭhāso kathaṃ nāpajjatīti?
tika-vin06t:1959_3: aññathā yathābyañjanaṃ atthe gahite yathāpaññattadukkaṭābhāvasaṅkhāto aparopi aniṭṭhakoṭṭhāso āpajjati. Kathaṃ? “Na,
tika-vin06t:1959_10: tasmā mūgassa pabbajjapariyosānasseva abhāvato imassa dukkaṭassa okāso ca sabbakālaṃ na sambhaveyya.
tika-vin06t:1959_11: Upasampadāvasena pana atthe gahite sambhavati kammanipphattito.
tika-vin06t:1959_18: ettāvatā siddhametaṃ “pabbajjābhilāpena upasampadā ca tattha adhippetā,
tika-vin06t:1960_1: sāmaṇerapabbajjā na kāyapayogato hotīti kathaṃ paññāyatīti? Vuccate –
tika-vin06t:1963_2: saddaṃ gahetvā niddosaṃ hutvā uju gattaṃ yassa so brahmujugatto”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1963_3: Atha vā kāmabhogittā devindādayo upamāvasena aggahetvā brahmā viya ujugatto brahmujugatto.
tika-vin06t:1963_9: Kilāsopi idhādhippetoti na kevalaṃ so eveko,
tika-vin06t:1963_12: rāhulavatthumhi āgatā ananuññātamātāpitaro cāti dasapi janā idhādhippetā.
tika-vin06t:1963_13: Tadatthadīpanatthameva likhitakakasāhatalakkhaṇāhate pubbe vuttepi ānetvā upālitthero idha hatthacchinnapāḷiyaṃ āha.
tika-vin06t:1963_19: ekacco dosārito”ti imassa vibhaṅge “pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭhā,
tika-vin06t:1963_22: ananuññātamātāpitaro cā”ti satta janā na gahitā,
tika-vin06t:1963_24: aññathā imepi tassa vibhaṅge vattabbā siyuṃ.
tika-vin06t:1963_27: ekacco dosārito”ti imassa vibhaṅge vattabbā paṇḍakādayo viya,
tika-vin06t:1963_29: Ubhayattha avuttattā na cime anubhayā bhavitumarahanti,
tika-vin06t:1963_30: tasmā avuttānameva dasannaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ puna likhitakādayo vuttāti.
tika-vin06t:1963_31: Atha kimatthaṃ te idha uppaṭipāṭiyā vuttāti?
tika-vin06t:1963_32: Iṇāyikadāsānaṃ sosāritabhāvepi iṇāyikadāsā sāmikānaṃ dātabbāti tadadhīnabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1963_37: Atha vā yathāvuttalakkhaṇo sabbopi iṇāyikadāsānaṃ “sosārito”ti vattabbāraho na hotīti katvā tesaṃ parivajjanatthaṃ uppaṭipāṭiyā desanā upari ārohati,
tika-vin06t:1964_0: Ettāvatā bhagavatā attano desanākusalatāya pubbe gahitaggahaṇena yathāvuttānaṃ dasannampi pabbajjupasampadākammanipphatti,
tika-vin06t:1964_1: uppaṭipāṭivacanena puggalavemattatañca desanāya kovidānaṃ dīpitaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1966_0: Sandīpayantaṃ sugatassa vākyaṃ, cittaṃ vicittaṃva karotipī”ti.
tika-vin06t:1967_1: campeyyakkhandhake ūnavīsativasso ubhayattha avuttattā anubhayo siyāti?
tika-vin06t:1967_12: “Nānāvidhehi osadhehi pādaṃ bandhitvā āvāṭake pavesetvā kattabbavidhānassetaṃ adhivacana”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1967_20: upasampadāpi tesaṃ paṭikkhittāvātiādi yasmā hatthacchinnādayo upasampadāvaseneva vuttā,
tika-vin06t:1970_2: alajjīnaṃ nissayo dātabbo”ti iminā alajjīhi bhikkhūhi,
tika-vin06t:1970_3: sāmaṇerehi vā saddhiṃ dvepi dhammāmisaparibhogā paṭikkhittā honti nissayabhāve bhāvato tesaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1970_6: antevāsiko saṅgahetabbo anuggahetabbo uddesena paripucchāya ovādena anusāsaniyā”tiādi upajjhāyassapi nissayappaṇāmanasambhavato,
tika-vin06t:1970_9: na taṃ nissāya vasitabbanti siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:1970_18: kiṃ bhikkhusabhāgatājānanenāti jānane dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā vasituṃ na labhatīti attho”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1970_20: kiṃ me nissayārocanenā”ti aruṇaṃ uṭṭhapetuṃ na labhati.
tika-vin06t:1970_21: “Pure aruṇaṃ uṭṭhahitvā gamissāmī”ti ābhogena sayantassa ce aruṇo uggacchati, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:1972_1: “Addhānamaggappaṭipannena bhikkhunā nissayaṃ alabhamānena anissitena vatthunti avassakāleyeva vassakāle
tika-vin06t:1972_9: “Yadā patirūpo nissayadāyako āgacchissatī”ti vacanena ayaṃ vidhi avassakāle evāti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1972_11: Sace so jalapaṭṭane vā thalapaṭṭane vā vasanto vassūpanāyikāya āsannāya gantukāmo suṇāti “asuko mahāthero āgamissatī”ti,
tika-vin06t:1973_1: “Nāhaṃ ussahāmi therassa nāmaṃ gahetu”nti itthannāmo itthannāmassa āyasmatoti lakkhaṇato āha.
tika-vin06t:1973_4: tasmā ‘ko nāmo te upajjhāyo’ti puṭṭhenāpi gottameva nāmaṃ katvā vattabbanti siddhaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:1973_5: tasmā catubbidhesu nāmesu yena kenaci nāmena anussāvanā kātabbā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1973_8: ekaṃ anussāvanāya kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, atthato,
tika-vin06t:1973_10: Katthaci “āyasmato buddharakkhitattherassā”ti vatvā katthaci kevalaṃ “buddharakkhitassā”ti sāveti,
tika-vin06t:1973_11: “sāvanaṃ hāpetī”ti na vuccati nāmassa ahāpitattāti eke.
tika-vin06t:1973_12: Sace katthaci “āyasmato buddharakkhitassā”ti vatvā katthaci “buddharakkhitassāyasmato”ti sāveti,
tika-vin06t:1973_14: Byañjanabhedappasaṅgato anussāvane taṃ na vaṭṭatīti eke.
tika-vin06t:1973_17: Lakkhaṇavirodhato aññathā na vaṭṭatīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:1973_23: sāvanāhāpanā eva hi pāḷiyaṃ tadatthavibhāvane āgatāti aññapadesu sāvanesu parihāro na sambhavati āciṇṇakappavirodhato.
tika-vin06t:1974_1: Dve ekānussāvaneti ettha gaṇṭhipade tāva evaṃ likhitaṃ “ekato pavattaanussāvane”.
tika-vin06t:1974_2: Idaṃ sandhāyāti nānupajjhāyaṃ ekācariyaṃ anussāvanakiriyaṃ sandhāya,
tika-vin06t:1974_3: tañca anussāvanakiriyaṃ ekenupajjhāyena nānācariyehi anujānāmīti attho.
tika-vin06t:1974_4: Nānupajjhāyehi ekenācariyena na tveva anujānāmīti atthoti.
tika-vin06t:1974_5: Porāṇagaṇṭhipadepi tatheva vatvā “tiṇṇaṃ uddhaṃ na kenaci ākārena ekato vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1974_7: na hi saṅgho saṅghassa kammaṃ karotīti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:1974_9: Cattāro vā atirekā vā upasampadāpekkhā saṅghavohāraṃ na labhanti bhikkhubhāvaṃ appattattā.
tika-vin06t:1974_10: Kevalaṃ bhagavatā paricchinditvā “tayo”ti vuttattā tato uddhaṃ na vaṭṭatīti no takkoti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:1974_13: Na sabbattha imasmiṃ atthavikappe matibhedo atthi.
tika-vin06t:1974_20: taṃ dassetvā eko ce ācariyo dvinnaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1974_21: tiṇṇaṃ vā upasampadāpekkhānaṃ ekaṃ kammavācaṃ ekenupajjhāyena sāveti,
tika-vin06t:1974_24: na hi sakkā sithiladhanitādibyañjanalakkhaṇasampannaṃ tasmiṃ khaṇe kammavācaṃ dassetuṃ vimuttadosādīsu patanato.
tika-vin06t:1974_25: Visuṃ visuṃ karaṇaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttanti dīpanatthaṃ “tayo paripuṇṇavīsativassā,
tika-vin06t:1974_31: Evañhi vutte sakkā tīsu ākāsaṭṭhamapanetvā sīmaṭṭhānaṃ dvinnamanurūpaṃ kammavācaṃ dassetuṃ,
tika-vin06t:1974_39: Ekakkhaṇabhāve sati ubhinnaṃ sampatti vā siyā vipatti vā,
tika-vin06t:1974_40: na ekasseva sampatti ekassa vipattīti sambhavati vimuttādibyañjanadosappasaṅgato”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1974_41: taṃ vacanaṃ ubhopi cete sīmagatāva honti,
tika-vin06t:1974_42: ubhinnaṃ ekato kammasampattidīpanato dvinnaṃ ekato anussāvanaṃ ekena upajjhāyena ekenācariyena vaṭṭatīti sādheti. Dvinnaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1974_43: tiṇṇañca ekato sasamanubhāsanā ca pāḷiyaṃyeva dassitā,
tika-vin06t:1975_2: tattha tattha garukesu ṭhānesu vattabbayuttaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1975_4: Yasmā cettha pubbe anuññātakammavācāya nānattaṃ natthi,
tika-vin06t:1975_7: dve tayo ekānussāvane kātu”nti vatvā “evañca pana,
tika-vin06t:1975_11: bahūnaṃ vā vasena vuttakammavācānusārena gahetabbato avuttanti ce?
tika-vin06t:1975_12: Na hi lahukesu ṭhānesu vatvā garukesu avacanaṃ dhammatāti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:1975_13: Aññatarasmiṃ pana gaṇṭhipade evaṃ papañcitaṃ dve ekānussāvaneti dve ekato anussāvane.
tika-vin06t:1975_16: Purimanayenevāti “ekena vā dvīhi vā ācariyehī”ti vuttanayena eva,
tika-vin06t:1975_17: tasmā ekenācariyena dve vā tayo vā anussāvetabbā.
tika-vin06t:1975_19: Nānācariyā nānupajjhāyāti ettha “tañca kho ekena upajjhāyena,
tika-vin06t:1975_20: na tveva nānupajjhāyenā”ti vuttattā na vaṭṭatīti ce? Vaṭṭati. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin06t:1975_21: Ekena anussāvane ekānussāvaneti viggahassa pākaṭattā līnameva dassetuṃ “ekato anussāvane”ti viggahova vutto,
tika-vin06t:1975_22: tasmā ujukattameva sandhāya tañca kho ekena anussāvanaṃ ekānussāvanaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1975_26: tasmā “nānācariyehi nānupajjhāyā na vaṭṭantīti siddhamevā”ti aññathāpi vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1975_27: Tañca kho ekena upajjhāyena ekassa upajjhāyassa vā vattabbaṃ anussāvanaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1975_31: dve vā tayo vā upasampadāpekkhā dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā upajjhāyānaṃ na tveva anujānāmī”ti kira vuttanti.
tika-vin06t:1975_32: Aparasmiṃ pana gaṇṭhipade “ekena anussāvaneti viggahassa pākaṭattā taṃ pakāsetuṃ ‘ekenā’ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1975_39: ‘ekenā’ti vutte pana taṃ sabbaṃ na hotīti vutta”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1975_40: Evaṃ ettha aneke ācariyā ca takkikā ca anekadhā papañcenti,
tika-vin06t:1975_41: taṃ sabbaṃ suṭṭhu upaparikkhitvā garukulaṃ payirupāsitvā vaṃsānugatova attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin06t:1975_42: “Na sabbattha imasmiṃ atthavikappe matibhedo atthī”ti vuttameva.
tika-vin06t:1977_1: Kuṭṭhaṃ gaṇḍoti ettha kuṭṭhādiggahaṇena hatthacchinnādayopi gahitāva hontīti porāṇā,
tika-vin06t:1977_3: “Bhujissosi aṇaṇosī”tiādīhi pubbe hatthacchinnādhikāre vuttaatthavikappesu dutiyaṃ vikappaṃ upathambheti.
tika-vin06t:1977_4: Tattha “aṇaṇosi bhujissosī”ti anukkamena avatvā uppaṭipāṭiyā vacanena bhujisso hoti,
tika-vin06t:1977_6: Rājādhīnattā pana so rājabhaṭapakkhaṃ bhajatīti tabbipakkhabhāvapucchanatthaṃ “nasi rājabhaṭo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1977_7: Aññathā pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭhānaṃ gahaṇeneva sabbesaṃ gahaṇe siddhe itare na vattabbā.
tika-vin06t:1979_1: “Tāvadeva chāyā metabbā”tiādi “bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vandāpetvā”ti vacanato therātherabhāvajānanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1980_1: Anāpatti sambhoge saṃvāseti ukkhittakena saddhiṃ sambhogasaṃvāsapaccayā pācittiyāpatti paññattā,
tika-vin06t:1980_5: Alajjinā saddhiṃ sambhogapaccayā āpajjitabbaṃ dukkaṭaṃ pana āpajjati eva,
tika-vin06t:1980_7: Na hi alajjinā saddhiṃ saṃvāso paṭikkhitto.
tika-vin06t:1980_10: Ayaṃ saṃvāso ukkhittakena saddhiṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:1980_14: Kiñca bhiyyo paṭipattikkamatova āpattito suddhi hoti,
tika-vin06t:1980_16: tasmā upasampanno bhikkhu antamaso dubbhāsitampi āpajjitvā aparabhāge vibbhamitvā āgato upasampajjati,
tika-vin06t:1980_19: Asādhāraṇāpattiyā adassanapaccayā ukkhittakassa liṅgaparivattanena āpattito vuṭṭhitassa puna ce pakatiliṅgamevuppajjati,
tika-vin06t:1980_21: vibbhamitvā āgatepi yathāvuttanayeneva upasampādetvā na vuṭṭhitattāti ce?
tika-vin06t:1980_27: Vibbhamena ca anupasampanno nānāsaṃvāsakabhāvena kammaṃ kopeti dhammissarena āhacca bhāsitattā.
tika-vin06t:1980_29: Tādiso pana gahaṭṭho nikkhittavattapārivāsiko viya pakatattabhūmiyaṃ vibbhamādinā anupasampannapakatiyaṃyeva
tika-vin06t:1980_30: tiṭṭhatīti imassa sabbassapi atthavikappassa dassanatthamidaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1980_31: Pubbe vuttappakāro pana parivattitaliṅgo hutvā puna pakatiliṅge ṭhitaukkhittako puna pucchitabbo “passasī”ti.
tika-vin06t:1980_34: Tappaṭikammo ukkhittako pucchitabbo “paṭikammaṃ kiṃ te kata”nti,

tika-vin06t:2015_23: Na kammavācaṃ vaggaṃ karontīti kammaṃ na kopentīti attho.
tika-vin06t:2015_25: “Yadi bhikkhūnaṃ avippavāsasīmā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca na otarati,
tika-vin06t:2015_26: atha kasmā gāme sīmābandhanakāle avippavāsaṃ sammannantīti ce?
tika-vin06t:2015_28: na tato aññaṃ kañci atthaṃ apekkhitvā”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2015_29: “Atthato hi sā bahiddhāpi abaddhā eva hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2015_30: Antaragāme baddhā samānasaṃvāsasīmā yasmā gāmasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati,
tika-vin06t:2015_32: Sopi sīmāsaṅkhyameva gacchatīti avippavāsasīmāsaṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti attho.
tika-vin06t:2015_34: gāmaṃ antokatvā baddhāya sīmāya puna avippavāsasammutiyaṃ araññapadese ṭhatvā avippavāsakammavācā kātabbā,
tika-vin06t:2015_37: Bahisīme ṭhitasammatadosānulomattā akappiyabhūmiyaṃ ṭhatvā na kātabbāti no takko,
tika-vin06t:2015_39: Khaṇḍasīmāyaṃ ṭhatvā avippavāsasīmātiādīsu mahāsīmā kira “avippavāsasīmā”ti vuttā.
tika-vin06t:2016_1: “Yassāyasmato khamati etissā sīmāya samānasaṃvāsāya ekūposathāya samugghāto,
tika-vin06t:2018_1: Sā cāti sā paricchinditvā dinnagāmasīmā ca itarā ca.
tika-vin06t:2018_4: Baddhasīmāsadisāyeva hontīti sā ca hoti itarā ca hotīti adhippāyo,
tika-vin06t:2018_6: taṃ na yuttaṃ ubhinnampi gāmattāti eke. “Honti,
tika-vin06t:2018_8: “Sā ca itarā cā”ti vuttā “majjhe bhinditvā dinnagāmasīmā pakatigāmādayo abhinnā”ti ca vadanti.
tika-vin06t:2018_16: Sace paṭhamaṃ sīmāya baddhāya pacchā nadiādayo honti,
tika-vin06t:2018_21: Kintu tassa tassa bhikkhuno udakukkhepasīmāti sīmānānattaṃ dassetīti no takkoti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:2018_22: Yaṃ majjhimassa purisassa samantā udakukkhepāti pana ekissā nadiyā catuvaggādīnaṃ saṅghānaṃ visuṃ catuvaggakaraṇīyādikammakaraṇakāle
tika-vin06t:2018_25: tasmā udakukkhepaparicchedābhāvepi antonadiyaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2019_11: Sace panettha bahū bhikkhūtiādimhi keci adhiṭṭhānuposathaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2019_13: keci saṅghuposathanti vattukāmatāya “bahū saṅghā”ti avatvā “bhikkhū”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2019_14: Ūnakaṃ pana na vaṭṭatīti ettha sīmāsambhedasambhavatoti upatissatthero.
tika-vin06t:2019_17: Gacchantiyā panāti ettha “udakukkhepamanatikkamitvā parivattamānāya kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2019_18: Aññissā sīmāya ñattītiādi kiṃ sīmato kammavipattibhayā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2019_23: Ekissā hi sīmāya ekaṃ kammaṃ aniṭṭhapento hāpetīti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:2020_0: Bahinaditīre jātarukkhassa antonadiyaṃ paviṭṭhasākhāya vāti ettha ca naditīre khāṇukaṃ koṭṭetvāti ettha
tika-vin06t:2020_1: ca sace pana setu vā setupādā vā bahitīre patiṭṭhitāti ettha ca sīmāsodhanaṃ nāma gāmasīmaṭṭhe hatthapāsānayanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2020_2: Khaṇḍasīmāya uṭṭhitarukkhato viyojetvā kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:2020_4: “Ubhatobhāgena gāmasīmaṃ phusitvā ṭhitasetu khaṇḍasīmāmahāsīmāyo phusitvā ṭhitarukkhena upametabbo”ti ca likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2020_6: tādise ṭhāne katakammaṃ kiṃ nadiyaṃ katasaṅkhyaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin06t:2020_9: Kiñcettha taṃ ce nadiyaṃ katasaṅkhyaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin06t:2020_14: dvīsu sīmāsu ekakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti aniṭṭhappasaṅgo āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:2020_16: aññissā anussāvanā hotī”ti idañca “khaṇḍasīmāmahāsīmaṭṭhānaṃ kāyasāmaggiyā kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti idañcāniṭṭhaṃ āpajjatīti?
tika-vin06t:2020_19: na ca yathāvuttaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ āpajjati. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:2020_22: Ubhayatthāpi ṭhātuṃ sakkuṇeyyatāya pana taṃ akāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2020_24: Ekībhāvaṃ upagatāsu hi dvīsu nadīgāmasīmāsu kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti ca.
tika-vin06t:2020_28: Tesu ṭhitabhikkhu sattabbhantarasīmāyaṃ ṭhitasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati.
tika-vin06t:2020_29: Tattha ce nadiādilakkhaṇaṃ appatto dīpako, pāsāṇo,
tika-vin06t:2021_0: Pacchimanaye sace setu nadīlakkhaṇaṭṭhānaṃ aphusitvā ṭhito,
tika-vin06t:2025_0: Ekakammaṃ siyā tassa, kopo parisato siyāti.
tika-vin06t:2026_1: nadiyaṃ karontānaṃ udakukkhepato bahi rukkhādisambandho appamāṇaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2026_2: Gāme karontānaṃ nadiyaṃ sambandharukkhassa udakukkhepato bahi ṭhitabhikkhu appamāṇaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2026_4: Baddhasīmāya sambandharukkhassa baddhasīmāya ṭhitabhikkhu pamāṇanti veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2026_6: “Sace pana setu vā setupādā vā bahitīre patiṭṭhitā kammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vacanampi pārohādīsu viya sakalasīmāsodhanameva kātabbanti sādheti,
tika-vin06t:2026_8: Ativuṭṭhikāle panāti ettha ativuṭṭhi nāma yathā cātumāsikāyāti veditabbā,
tika-vin06t:2026_11: Atha ekissāpi ativuṭṭhiyā ogho catumāsaṃ tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin06t:2026_13: bahitīre patiṭṭhitaoghena otthaṭokāso sabbopi nadī eva.
tika-vin06t:2026_14: Nadiṃ ottharitvā sandanaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāyāti tameva vā nadiṃ aññaṃ vā apubbaṃ vā padesaṃ attano pavattavasena
tika-vin06t:2027_3: So pana vaḍḍhanto sīmāsaṅkaraṃ karotīti baddhasīmaṭṭhānappavesanavasena “ekadesabaddhasīmā”ti vattabbato saṅkaradoso hoti. Na,
tika-vin06t:2027_5: sīmāya sīmā sambhinditabbāti ettha “paṭhamaṃ baddhasīmāya pacchā attanā bandhitabbasīmā na sambhinditabbā”ti eke adhippāyaṃ saṃvaṇṇayanti.
tika-vin06t:2027_6: Paṭhamaṃ sammatasīmāyaṃ sambhedābhāvato svādhippāyo ajjhottharaṇena yujjati,
tika-vin06t:2027_7: tasmā pacchā bandhitabbasīmāya paṭhamaṃ baddhasīmā na sambhinditabbā.
tika-vin06t:2027_8: Sakalaṃ vā ekadesato vā nimittānaṃ antokaraṇena paṭhamaṃ baddhasīmāya sīmantarike akittetvā sammannanato hi sambhindati nāma,
tika-vin06t:2027_9: paresaṃ baddhasīmaṃ sakalaṃ vā ekadesato vā nimittānaṃ antokaraṇena ajjhottharati nāma,
tika-vin06t:2027_12: paṭhamaṃ baddhasīmāya sīmantarikaṃ pacchā bandhitabbasīmāya nimittabhūtaṃ ṭhapetvā pacchā sīmaṃ sammannitunti.
tika-vin06t:2027_13: Imā dvepi vipattiyo bhikkhubhikkhunīsīmānaṃ aññamaññaṃ na sambhavanti.
tika-vin06t:2027_14: So pana vaḍḍhanto sīmāsaṅkaraṃ karotīti ettha kevalaṃ sīmāsaṅkarameva karoti.
tika-vin06t:2027_17: Idaṃ sabbaṃ suṭṭhu vicāretvā garukule payirupāsitvā gahetabbayuttakaṃ gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2029_4: na ca kammavācāya bhagavatā payogo dassito,
tika-vin06t:2029_6: Tathā pañcannaṃ pātimokkhuddesānaṃ uddesakkamo siddhoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2029_7: Tayo vā dve vā pātimokkhaṃ uddisanti,
tika-vin06t:2029_8: adhammena samaggaṃ nāma hotīti ettha kāmaṃ saṅghassa sāmaggī nāma hoti vaggakathāya yathākammaṃ sāmaggīvavatthānato.
tika-vin06t:2029_15: na gaṇassāti katvā vaggaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin06t:2029_19: “Pañcasu ekassa chandaṃ āharitvā catūhi pātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin06t:2029_21: chandahārake bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ patte tena saṅgho pahoti,
tika-vin06t:2029_22: tasmā chando saṅghappatto hotīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2031_6: Evametaṃ dhārayāmī’ti vatvā ‘uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidāna’ntiādinā nayena avasese sutena sāvite uddiṭṭho
tika-vin06t:2031_7: hotī”ti vuttattā “evametaṃ dhārayāmīti sutā kho panāyasmantehī”ti ettha “dhārayāmī”ti vatvā “uddiṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin06t:2031_8: kho āyasmanto nidāna”nti vacanaṃ saṃkhittanti gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2031_11: tatthāyasmante”ti etthāpi “uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidāna”nti vacanaṃ saṃkhittanti gahetabbanti eke.
tika-vin06t:2031_12: Keci “avivadamānehi sikkhitabba’nti vutte nidānuddeso niṭṭhito nāma hoti,
tika-vin06t:2031_15: “Nidānaṃ uddisitvā”ti niṭṭhānavacanena hi nidānassa niṭṭhitabhāvo vutto,
tika-vin06t:2033_1: “Tesaṃ anupaddavatthāyā”ti saṅgho saṅghassa kammaṃ na karoti,
tika-vin06t:2035_1: “Therādhikaṃ pātimokkha”nti vatvāpi pacchā avisesena “yo tattha byatto paṭibalo,
tika-vin06t:2035_2: tassādheyya”nti vuttattā “bhante”ti vacanaṃ therassāpi atthīti siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:2035_3: “Gacchāvuso saṃkhittena vā vitthārena vā”ti vacanato asatipi antarāye thāmaṃ pamāṇanti siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:2039_4: Sampajānamusāvādena dukkaṭāpatti nāma kevalaṃ bhagavatā vuttattā akiriyasamuṭṭhānā hotīti.
tika-vin06t:2039_10: “Harā”ti ca “ārocehī”ti ca hārakassa anārocanapaccayā dukkaṭamocanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2039_18: Ubhayatthāpi “saṅghappatto pakkamatī”tiādivacanato saṅghe samagge eva chandapārisuddhidānaṃ ruhati,
tika-vin06t:2039_21: āhaṭā hoti pārisuddhī”tiādivacanato ukkhittakādīnampi chandapārisuddhidānaṃ ruhatīti siddhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2039_28: Biḷālasaṅkhalikā nāma pārisuddhīti ettha saṅkhalikā nāma anantarena sambajjhati,
tika-vin06t:2039_29: aññena ca saṅkhalikenāti kevalaṃ saṅkhalikā pārisuddhi nāma hotīti upatissatthero.
tika-vin06t:2039_31: Biḷālasaṅkhalikā baddhāva hoti antogehe eva sampayojanattā.
tika-vin06t:2039_33: tathā sāpi na katthaci gacchatīti kira adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:2041_1: “Chandaṃ datvā khaṇḍasīmaṃ vā sīmantarikaṃ vā bahisīmaṃ vā gantvā āgato bhikkhu kammaṃ na kopeti,
tika-vin06t:2041_2: tasmā gamikabhikkhūnaṃ chandaṃ gaṇhitvā khaṇḍasīmaṃ bandhitvā puna vihārasīmaṃ bandhituṃ tesaṃ chandaṃ na gaṇhantī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:2041_3: “Muhuttaṃ ekamantaṃ hothā”tiādivacanato yaṃ kiñci bhikkhukammaṃ gahaṭṭhādīsu hatthapāsagatesu na vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2041_5: Tassa sammutidānakiccaṃ natthīti tasmiṃ satipi vaṭṭatīti attho.
tika-vin06t:2041_10: “Ajja me uposatho pannaraso”ti adhiṭṭhānaṃ sadā na kiñci,
tika-vin06t:2043_1: Paṭidesemīti yāya kāyaci bhāsāya vutte desanā ca paṭiggaho ca hotiyeva diṭṭhāvikammena visuddhiyā vuttattāti keci.
tika-vin06t:2043_6: Evaṃ kate yāva nibbematiko na hoti,
tika-vin06t:2043_10: Na cāti neva pāḷiyaṃ na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ atthi,
tika-vin06t:2043_12: Tathā ito vuṭṭhahitvā taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikarissāmīti ettha ca sakalasaṅghe sabhāgāpattiṃ āpanne,
tika-vin06t:2043_14: Tathā ca “sabbo saṅgho sabhāgāpattiṃ āpajjitvā yadā suddhaṃ passissatī”ti,
tika-vin06t:2043_15: “tadā tassa santike taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikarissatī’ti vatvā ‘uposathaṃ kātuṃ labhatī”ti ca likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2045_3: Sīmaṃ okkante vā okkamante vā passanti.
tika-vin06t:2047_0: 178. “Na akāmā dātabbā”tivacanato icchāya sati dātabbāti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2049_2: Kammanānāsaṃvāsakañhi diṭṭhiṃ paṭinissajjāpetvā tassa osāraṇakammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2049_3: Evañhi kate tena saddhiṃ uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:2049_5: Āpattiyā adassane appaṭikamme ukkhittakañca diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhittakañca jānitvā tena saddhiṃ karontassa pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2051_2: “Aññatra saṅghenā”ti vacanato yasmiṃ vihāre sataṃ bhikkhū viharanti,
tika-vin06t:2051_3: te sabbe kenacideva karaṇīyena dasa dasa hutvā visuṃ visuṃ nānāudakukkhepasīmādīsu ṭhatvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ labhanti.
tika-vin06t:2051_4: Navakammasālādikā nānāsīmākoṭi uposathādhiṭṭhānatthaṃ sīmāpi nadīpi na gantabbā.
tika-vin06t:2051_5: Garukaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ vissajjitvā lahukassa akattabbattā “aññatra saṅghenā”ti vacanaṃ sādheti.
tika-vin06t:2051_7: akatvā na gantabbo”ti vacanato vissaṭṭhauposathāpi āvāsā gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2051_9: khaṇḍasīmaṃ vā pavisitunti apare vadantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2053_1: “Antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannassa nisinnaparisāya kalahādibhayena nāhaṃ karissāmī”ti cittaṃ uppādetvā nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:2053_2: Aññakamme tassa nisinnaparisāya āpatti natthīti eke. “Na ca,
tika-vin06t:2053_4: anuposathe uposatho kātabbo aññatra saṅghasāmaggiyā”ti vacanato sāmaggīdivaso anuposathadivasoti atthato vuttaṃ viya dissati. “Dveme,
tika-vin06t:2053_9: pannarasiyaṃ vā ce saṅgho samaggo hoti,
tika-vin06t:2053_10: “ajjuposatho sāmaggī”ti avatvā pakatinīhāreneva kattabbanti dassanatthaṃ yathādesanā katāti no takko.
tika-vin06t:2053_12: tattha uposathaṃ akatvā anuposathadivase eva sāmaggīuposatho kātabboti āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:2053_13: Aññathā pubbe paṭisiddhattā idāni paṭisedhanakiccaṃ natthi. “Na,
tika-vin06t:2053_15: devasikaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisitabba”nti pubbe hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2053_18: uposathe pātimokkhaṃ uddisitu”nti pubbe vuttattā “sakiṃ pakkhassa cātuddase vā pannarase vā”ti ca “dveme,
tika-vin06t:2053_20: uposathā”ti ca pacchā vuttattā tato aññasmiṃ divase uposatho na kātabboti atthato āpannaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2053_21: sati saṅghasāmaggiyā añño divaso pakativasena anuposathopi uposathadivaso nāma hotīti dassanavasena nivāretumpi evaṃdesanā katāti veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:2057_3: “Kati nu kho vassūpanāyikā”ti cintāyaṃ “kiṃ nimitta”nti vutte “anujānāmi,
tika-vin06t:2057_6: taṃ “imaṃ temāsaṃ vassaṃ upemī”ti vatvā upagantabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2059_1: Anapekkhagamanena vā aññattha aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpanena vā āpatti veditabbāti ettha paṭhamaṃ tāva so sattāhaṃ anāgatāya pavāraṇāya sakaraṇīyo pakkamati.
tika-vin06t:2059_4: bhikkhu taṃ āvāsaṃ na vā āgaccheyya, tassa,
tika-vin06t:2059_7: paṭissave ca anāpattī”ti vacanato oraṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2061_1: Dutiyaṃ pana “so taṃ sattāhaṃ bahiddhā vītināmeti, tassa,
tika-vin06t:2061_4: paṭissave ca āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato sattāhato paraṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2061_5: Tathā hi “so taṃ sattāhaṃ anto sannivattaṃ karoti, tassa,
tika-vin06t:2061_10: tasmā tīṇipi etāni vacanāni yathāsambhavaṃ yojitāni viggahāni honti.
tika-vin06t:2063_3: sattāhaṃ sannivatto kātabbo”ti vacanato antovasse saṃhārikabhāvena gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:2063_4: Tattha dhammachandavasenapi āgate saṅghassa āyamukhaṃ vinassati.
tika-vin06t:2063_10: Aṭṭhakathāyampi taṃ padaṃ uddharitvā “yaṃ kiñci uposathāgārādīsu senāsanesū”tiādinā senāsanameva dassitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2064_0: Animantitena gantuṃ na vaṭṭatīti tassa ratticchedo ca dukkaṭāpatti ca hoti,
tika-vin06t:2064_2: Nimantitoyeva nāma hotīti ettha upāsakehi “imasmiṃ nāma divase dānādīni karoma,
tika-vin06t:2064_3: sabbe sannipatantū”ti katāyapi katikāya gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:2064_4: Pavāraṇāya navamito paṭṭhāya paṃsukūlikacīvaraṃ pariyesituṃ kāvīrapaṭṭane viya sabbesaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭati
tika-vin06t:2064_6: Vuttampi cetaṃ andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “bhikkhusaṅghena vā katikā katā ‘samantā bhikkhū gacchantū’ti,
tika-vin06t:2064_8: tattha gacchantassa ratticchedo natthīti tathā ‘anusaṃvaccharaṃ āgacchantū’ti sakiṃ nimantitepi vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin06t:2064_9: ca “cīvarakālato paṭṭhāya niyamaṃ katvā samantato āgatānaṃ sajjetvā dānato kāvīrapaṭṭane ghosetvā karaṇākāro
tika-vin06t:2066_2: sattāhavārena aruṇo uṭṭhāpetabbo”ti vacanato ‘yasmiṃ antarāye sati vassacchedaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:2066_3: tasmiṃ antarāyeva vassacchedamakatvā sattāhakaraṇīyena vītināmetuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpitanti apare”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2066_5: tasmā “sattāhavārena aruṇo uṭṭhāpetabbo”ti idaṃ tatruppādādinimittaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2066_6: Taṃ sandhāya “ācariyā pana evaṃ na vadantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2066_8: Bahisīmāya ṭhitānanti tehi khaṇḍasīmāya ṭhitehipīti upatissatthero.
tika-vin06t:2066_10: Vihārā aññattha vuṭṭhāpentehi tattheva sannipatitvā “iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇena imasmiṃ nāma padese imaṃ
tika-vin06t:2068_1: Vajena saddhiṃ gatassa vassacchede anāpattīti vassacchedo na hotīti kira adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:2068_2: Satthassa avihārattā “imasmiṃ vihāre”ti avatvā “idha vassaṃ upemī”ti ettakaṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2068_3: “Satthe pana vassaṃ upagantuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ‘imasmiṃ vihāre imaṃ temāsa’nti vā ‘idha vassaṃ upemī’ti vā na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:2068_6: “Idha vassaṃ upemīti tikkhattuṃ vattabba”nti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2068_11: Tattha ṭhite kuṭikāya “idha vassaṃ upemī”ti vatvā vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2068_15: sañcārimhi pana satthe kuṭikāya abhāvato vassaṃ upagantuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:2068_16: Sati sivikāya vā sakaṭakuṭikāya vā vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:2068_18: Tīsu ṭhānesu bhikkhuno natthi vassacchede āpatti.
tika-vin06t:2069_4: tena gantu”nti idaṃ kiṃ vassarakkhaṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2069_9: Atha vassacchedāpattirakkhaṇatthaṃ vuttanti siddhaṃ na so pavāretuṃ labhatīti,
tika-vin06t:2069_11: Yato ayameva tividho pavāretuṃ labhati, netaro.
tika-vin06t:2069_15: tattha gatopi pavāretuṃ labhatīti ekenāti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:2069_16: Yo hi pubbe “idha vassaṃ upemī”ti na upagato,
tika-vin06t:2069_19: Aññathā vinā vihārena kevalaṃ gāmaṃ sandhāya “idha vassaṃ upemī”ti upagantuṃ vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin06t:2069_23: vaje satthe nāvāya vassaṃ upagantu”nti vacanaṃ viya “gāme upagantu”nti vacanābhāvato.
tika-vin06t:2069_24: Yasmā “tīsu ṭhānesu bhikkhuno natthi vassacchede āpattī”ti vacanaṃ tattha vassūpagamanaṃ atthīti dīpeti tadabhāve chedābhāvā,
tika-vin06t:2069_25: tasmā “satthe pana vassaṃ upagantuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti kuṭiyā abhāvakālaṃ sandhāya vuttanti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2069_26: Tīsu ṭhānesu bhikkhuno natthi vassacchede āpattīti “tehi saddhiṃ gacchantasseva natthi,
tika-vin06t:2069_29: tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “atha sattho antovasseyeva bhikkhunā patthitaṭṭhānaṃ patvā atikkamati…pe…
tika-vin06t:2069_30: antarā ekasmiṃ gāme tiṭṭhati vā vippakirati vā”tiādi,
tika-vin06t:2069_31: taṃ ettāvatā virujjhitvā gatānampi virujjhitvā gamanaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin06t:2070_0: Tattha “padaracchadanaṃ kuṭiṃ katvā upagantabba”nti vacanato senāsanatthāya rukkhaṃ āruhituṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:2070_5: asenāsanikena vassaṃ upagantabba”nti iminā paṭikkhepena siddhe “na,
tika-vin06t:2070_7: ajjhokāse vassaṃ upagantabba”nti paṭikkhepo viya siyāti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:2070_9: Ajjhokāso hi “ajjhokāse palālapuñje”ti vacanato senāsananti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2070_12: tasmā idha asenāsaniko nāma attanā vā parena vā attano nibaddhavāsatthaṃ apāpitasenāsanikoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2070_13: Aññathā dvinnaṃ paṭikkhepānaṃ aññatarātirekatā ca rukkhamūlepi nibbakosepi vassaṃ upagantuṃ vaṭṭatīti ca,
tika-vin06t:2070_14: apāpitasenāsanikenāpi gabbhe vasituṃ vaṭṭatīti ca āpajjati,
tika-vin06t:2070_15: sadvārabandhameva senāsanaṃ idha adhippetanti kathaṃ paññāyatīti ce? Nidānato.
tika-vin06t:2070_16: Ayañhi asenāsanikavassūpagamanāpatti “tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū asenāsanikā vassaṃ upagacchanti,
tika-vin06t:2070_17: sītenapi uṇhenapi kilamantī”ti imasmiṃ nidāne paññattā,
tika-vin06t:2070_18: tasmā sītādipaṭikkhepameva idha senāsananti adhippetabbanti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2070_19: Evaṃ sante siddhaṃ pubbapakkhanidassananti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:2070_21: Dutiyajjhānaniddese “vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā avitakkaṃ avicāra”nti vacanāni nidassanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2070_24: tasmā na nidānaṃ pamāṇanti ce? Na, niyamato.
tika-vin06t:2070_25: Kiñci hi sikkhāpadaṃ nidānāpekkhaṃ hotīti sādhitametaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2070_28: na hi ettha ubhatovibhaṅge viya sikkhāpadānaṃ padabhājanaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2070_31: “Deve vassante rukkhamūlampi nibbakosampi upadhāvantī”ti hi imehi dvīhi nidānavacanehi bahi vā anto vā sabbaṃ ovassakaṭṭhānaṃ idha ajjhokāso nāma.
tika-vin06t:2070_32: Anovassakaṭṭhānampi anibbakosameva idha icchitabbanti siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:2070_38: “Akavāṭabaddhasenāsane attano pāpite sabhāgaṭṭhāne sakavāṭabaddhe vasati ce,
tika-vin06t:2070_41: “asenāsanikena vassaṃ na upagantabba”nti pāḷi ca aṭṭhakathā ca,
tika-vin06t:2072_1: Mahāvibhaṅge vuttanti ettha ayaṃ andhakaṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ ūnapannarasavassena sāmaṇerena idha vihāre na vatthabbā,
tika-vin06t:2072_5: na aññassa bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā santakaṃ bhuñjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2073_3: “rañño vuttavacanānurūpato musāvādoti gahaṭṭhā gaṇhantīti vutta”nti ca vadanti.
tika-vin06t:2074_3: Puna ‘paṭhame eva vasāmī’ti citte uppanne dutiyo paṭippassambhati.
tika-vin06t:2074_5: Porāṇagaṇṭhipade pana “paṭhamaṃ gahitaṭṭhāne avasitvā aññasmiṃ vihāre senāsanaṃ gahetvā dvīhatīhaṃ vasati,
tika-vin06t:2074_6: tato paṭhamaggāho paṭippassambhatīti purimikā ca na paññāyati.
tika-vin06t:2074_11: idaṃ senāsanaggāhānaṃ vasena paṭippassambhanaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2074_17: Antarāmagge dvīsu āvāsesu yattha tadaheva pacchimaggāho,
tika-vin06t:2074_18: tattha paṭhamaṃ gahitaṭṭhāne sattāhakaraṇīyena gacchato na vassacchedo,
tika-vin06t:2074_19: so tadaheva akaraṇīyo pakkamatītiādimhi “karaṇīyaṃ nāma sattāhakaraṇīya”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2075_1: Ādimhi catūsu vāresu nirapekkhapakkamanassādhippetattā “sattāhakaraṇīyenā”ti na vuttaṃ tasmiṃ sati nirapekkhagamanābhāvato.
tika-vin06t:2075_2: Tattha purimā dve vārā vassaṃ anupagatassa vasena vuttā,
tika-vin06t:2075_3: tasmā upagatassa tadaheva sattāhakaraṇīyena gantvā antosattāhaṃ āgacchato na vassacchedoti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2075_4: Pacchimā dve vārā upagatassa nirapekkhagamanavasena vuttā,
tika-vin06t:2075_5: “sattāhaṃ anāgatāya pavāraṇāya sakaraṇīyo pakkamatī”ti tato bahiddhā sattāhaṃ vītināmentassa vassacchedoti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2075_6: Tattha “akaraṇīyo pakkamatī”ti vacanābhāvā vinā ratticchedakāraṇena gantuṃ na vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2075_7: Pavāretvā pana gantuṃ vaṭṭati pavāraṇāya taṃdivasasannissitattā.
tika-vin06t:2075_9: Ācariyo pana “na puna idhāgacchāmī’ti nirapekkhopi sakaraṇīyova gantuṃ labhatīti dassanatthaṃ akaraṇīyo’ti na vutta”nti vadati.
tika-vin06t:2075_11: taṃ pavāraṇaṃ katvā yathāsukhaṃ sakaraṇīyā gacchanti,
tika-vin06t:2075_13: “Tattha cha aruṇā antovasse honti, eko bahi,
tika-vin06t:2075_14: tasmā so temāsaṃ vuttho hotīti apare”ti ca,
tika-vin06t:2075_16: Sabbattha vihāraṃ upetīti attano vassaggena pattagabbhaṃ upetīti porāṇā.
tika-vin06t:2075_17: Asatiyā pana vassaṃ na upetīti ettha “imasmiṃ vihāre imaṃ temāsa”nti avacanena.
tika-vin06t:2075_18: “Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaratticchedakāraṇaṃ vinā tirovihāre vasitvā āgacchissāmīti gacchatopi vassaccheda”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2076_3: aññena pana purimaṃ anupagantvā pacchimikāyaṃ paṭissavo na kātabbo.
tika-vin06t:2076_4: Ratticchede sabbattha vassacchedoti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā vadanti.
tika-vin06t:2076_6: Taṃ sādhetuṃ anekadhā papañcenti. Kiṃ tena.
tika-vin06t:2080_1: “Saṅghaṃ āvuso pavāremī”ti vuttattā pacchāpi “vadatu maṃ saṅgho”ti vattabbaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin06t:2080_5: navā vā avisesenāyasmanto sabbepi maṃ vadantūti.
tika-vin06t:2082_2: pavāraṇāti ettha tādise kicce sati yattha katthaci pavāretuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:2082_3: Teneva mahāvihāre bhikkhū cātuddasiyaṃ pavāretvā pannarasiyaṃ kāyasāmaggiṃ idānipi denti.
tika-vin06t:2086_0: “Tassā ca pavāraṇāya ārocitāya saṅghena ca pavārite sabbesaṃ suppavāritaṃ hotīti vacanato kevalaṃ pavāraṇāya
tika-vin06t:2087_1: Avuṭṭhitāya parisāyāti pavāretvā pacchā aññamaññaṃ kathentiyā.
tika-vin06t:2087_2: Ekaccāya vuṭṭhitāyāti ekaccesu yathānisinnesu ekaccesu sakasakaṭṭhānaṃ gatesu.
tika-vin06t:2087_3: Puna pavāretabbanti punapi sabbehi samāgantvā pavāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2087_5: tesaṃ santike pavāretabbanti “gate anānetvā nisinnānaṃyeva santike pavāretabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2087_8: tesaṃ santike pavāretabbanti “yadi sabbe vuṭṭhahitvā gatā,
tika-vin06t:2087_10: ekacce sannipātāpetvā pavāretuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Kasmā?
